GE07hv_conpu:4045: [k: K1-3 Ñ2.3 V B1 Ds D1-4 after *383 cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4047: jahnus tv ajanayat putraṃ surathaṃ nāma bhūmipam | *HV_23.110*384:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4048: śrutaseno 'grasenau ca bhīmasenaś ca nāmataḥ // HV_23.110 //
GE07hv_conpu:4049: [k: K2-4 Ñ2.3 V B D (except D6) T3.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4051: janamejayasya putrau tu suratho matimāṃs tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:4052: surathasya tu vikrāntaḥ putro jajñe vidūrathaḥ // HV_23.111 //
GE07hv_conpu:4054: dvitīyaḥ sa babhau rājā nāmnā tenaiva saṃjñitaḥ // HV_23.112 //
GE07hv_conpu:4055: dvāv ṛkṣau tava vaṃśe 'smin dvāv eva ca parīkṣitau /
GE07hv_conpu:4056: bhīmasenās trayo rājan dvāv eva janamejayau // HV_23.113 //
GE07hv_conpu:4059: devāpir bāhlikaś caiva traya eva mahārathāḥ // HV_23.114 //
GE07hv_conpu:4060: śāṃtanoḥ prasavas tv eṣa yatra jāto 'si pārthiva /
GE07hv_conpu:4061: bāhlikasya tu rājyaṃ vai saptabāhlyaṃ viśāṃ pate // HV_23.115 //
GE07hv_conpu:4063: jajñire somadattāt tu bhūrir bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ // HV_23.116 //
GE07hv_conpu:4064: upādhyāyas tu devānāṃ devāpir abhavan muniḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4065: cyavanasya putraḥ kṛtaka iṣṭaś cāsīn mahātmanaḥ // HV_23.117 //
GE07hv_conpu:4066: śāṃtanus tv abhavad rājā kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ // HV_23.118 //
GE07hv_conpu:4067: [k: all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4069: gāṅgaṃ devavrataṃ nāma putraṃ so 'janayat prabhuḥ | *HV_23.118*386:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4070: sa tu bhīṣma iti khyātaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ pitāmahaḥ | *HV_23.118*386:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4071: kālī vicitravīryaṃ tu janayām āsa bhārata /
GE07hv_conpu:4072: śāṃtanor dayitaṃ putraṃ dharmātmānam akalmaṣam // HV_23.119 //
GE07hv_conpu:4074: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ ca viduraṃ cāpy ajījanat // HV_23.120 //
GE07hv_conpu:4075: [k: all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3; K1.3 Ñ2 V3 D1.2.4 after the firstoccurrence of 119a-b) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4077: teṣāṃ duryodhanaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām eva sa prabhuḥ | *HV_23.120*387:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4078: pāṇḍor dhanaṃjayaḥ putraḥ saubhadras tasya cātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4079: abhimanyoḥ parīkṣit tu pitā tava janeśvara // HV_23.121 //
GE07hv_conpu:4080: eṣa te pauravo vaṃśo yatra jāto 'si pārthiva /
GE07hv_conpu:4081: turvasos tu pravakṣyāmi druhyoś cānor yados tathā // HV_23.122 //
GE07hv_conpu:4082: turvasos tu suto vahnir vahner gobhānur ātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4083: gobhānos tu suto rājā triśānur aparājitaḥ // HV_23.123 //
GE07hv_conpu:4084: karaṃdhamas tu triśānor maruttas tasya cātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4085: anyas tv āvikṣito rājā maruttaḥ kathitas tava // HV_23.124 //
GE07hv_conpu:4087: duhitā saṃmatā nāma tasyāsīt pṛthivīpateḥ // HV_23.125 //
GE07hv_conpu:4088: dakṣiṇārthaṃ hi sā dattā saṃvartāya mahātmane /
GE07hv_conpu:4089: duḥṣantaṃ pauravaṃ cāpi lebhe putram akalmaṣam // HV_23.126 //
GE07hv_conpu:4091: pauravaṃ turvasor vaṃśaḥ praviveśa nṛpottama // HV_23.127 //
GE07hv_conpu:4093: śarutthāmād athākrīḍaś catvāras tasya cātmajāḥ // HV_23.128 //
GE07hv_conpu:4094: pāṇḍyaś ca keralaś caiva kolaś colaś ca pārthivaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4095: teṣāṃ janapadāḥ sphītāḥ pāṇḍyaś colaś ca keralāḥ // HV_23.129 //
GE07hv_conpu:4096: druhyos tu tanayo rājan babhrusenaś ca pārthivaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4097: aṅgārasetus tatputro marutāṃ patir ucyate // HV_23.130 //
GE07hv_conpu:4099: yuddhaṃ sumahad āsīd dhi māsān pari caturdaśa // HV_23.131 //
GE07hv_conpu:4100: aṅgārasya tu dāyādo gāndhāro nāma pārthivaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4101: khyāyate yasya nāmnā vai gāndhāraviṣayo mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:4102: gāndhāradeśajāś caiva turagā vājināṃ varāḥ // HV_23.132 //
GE07hv_conpu:4103: anos tu putro dharmo 'bhūd dhṛtas tasyātmajo 'bhavat /
GE07hv_conpu:4104: dhṛtāt tu duduho jajñe pracetās tasya cātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4105: pracetasaḥ sucetās tu kīrtitā hy anavo mayā // HV_23.133 //
GE07hv_conpu:4106: [k: all Mss. (except Ś1 K1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4111: babhūvus tu yadoḥ putrāḥ pañca devasutopamāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4112: sahasradaḥ payodaś ca kroṣṭā nīlo 'ñjikas tathā // HV_23.134 //
GE07hv_conpu:4117: hehayaś ca hayaś caiva rājan veṇuhayas tathā // HV_23.135 //
GE07hv_conpu:4119: dharmanetrasya kāntas tu kāntaputrās tato 'bhavan // HV_23.136 //
GE07hv_conpu:4122: [k: all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3; K1 after *391) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4124: sāhañjasya tu dāyādo mahiṣmān nāma pārthivaḥ | *HV_23.136*392:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4125: māhiṣmatī nāma purī yena rājñā niveśitā || *HV_23.136*392:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4127: [k: K1.3.4 B2 Dn G3 after *392 (Ś1 after *391) cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4128: vārāṇasyadhipo rājā kathitaḥ pūrvam eva tu | *HV_23.136*393 |
GE07hv_conpu:4129: [k: all Mss. (except Ñ1 M1-3) after *392 (Ś1 K1.3.4 B2 Dn G3 after *393)cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4131: durdamasya suto dhīmān kanako nāma nāmataḥ | *HV_23.136*394:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4133: kṛtavīryaḥ kṛtaujāś ca kṛtadhanvā tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4134: kṛtāgniś ca caturtho 'bhūt kṛtavīryāt tathārjunaḥ // HV_23.137 //
GE07hv_conpu:4137: sa hi varṣaśataṃ taptvā tapaḥ paramaduścaram /
GE07hv_conpu:4139: tasmai datto varān prādāc caturo bhūritejasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4140: pūrvaṃ bāhusahasraṃ tu prārthitaṃ paramaṃ varam // HV_23.140 //
GE07hv_conpu:4141: adharme dhīyamānasya sadbhiḥ syān me nibarhaṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:4143: saṃgrāmān subahūñ jitvā hatvā cārīn sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4144: saṃgrāme vartamānasya vadhaṃ cābhyadhikād raṇe // HV_23.142 //
GE07hv_conpu:4145: tasya bāhusahasraṃ tu yudhyataḥ kila bhārata /
GE07hv_conpu:4148: sasamudrā sanagarā ugreṇa vidhinā jitā // HV_23.144 //
GE07hv_conpu:4149: tena saptasu dvīpeṣu sapta yajñaśatāni vai /
GE07hv_conpu:4150: prāptāni vidhinā rājñā śrūyante janamejaya // HV_23.145 //
GE07hv_conpu:4152: sarve kāñcanayūpāś ca sarve kāñcanavedayaḥ // HV_23.146 //
GE07hv_conpu:4154: gandharvair apsarobhiś ca nityam evopaśobhitāḥ // HV_23.147 //
GE07hv_conpu:4155: yasya yajñe jagau gāthāṃ gandharvo nāradas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:4156: varīdāsātmajo vidvān mahimnā tasya vismitaḥ // HV_23.148 //
GE07hv_conpu:4157: na nūnaṃ kārtavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti pārthivāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4158: yajñair dānais tapobhir vā vikrameṇa śrutena vā // HV_23.149 //
GE07hv_conpu:4161: akarod arjuno rājyaṃ hariṃ caivānvahaṃ smaran | *HV_23.149*395:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4163: sa hi saptasu dvīpeṣu khaḍgī carmī śarāsanī /
GE07hv_conpu:4164: rathī dvīpān anucaran yogī saṃdṛśyate nṛbhiḥ // HV_23.150 //
GE07hv_conpu:4165: [k: K1-3 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2-6 T2 G1-3.5 M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4166: anaṣṭadravyatā caiva na śoko na ca vibhramaḥ | *HV_23.150*396:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4168: sa sarvaratnabhāk samrāṭ cakravartī babhūva ha | *HV_23.150*396:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4169: sa eva paśupālo 'bhūt kṣetrapālaḥ sa eva ca | *HV_23.150*396:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4170: sa eva vṛṣṭyā parjanyo yogitvād arjuno 'bhavat || *HV_23.150*396:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:4173: sa hi nāgān manuṣyeṣu māhiṣmatyāṃ mahādyutiḥ | *HV_23.150*396:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:4176: krīḍann iva bhujodbhinnaṃ pratisrotaś cakāra ha || *HV_23.150*396:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:4183: prāvartayat tadā rājā sahasreṇa ca bāhunā | *HV_23.150*396:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:4189: sa vai baddhvā dhanur jyābhir utsiktaṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ | *HV_23.150*396:24 |
GE07hv_conpu:4190: laṅkeśaṃ mohayitvā tu sabalaṃ rāvaṇaṃ balāt | *HV_23.150*396:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:4192: śrutvā tu baddhaṃ paulastyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ tv arjunena tu | *HV_23.150*396:27 |
GE07hv_conpu:4193: tato gatvā pulastyas tam arjunaṃ dadṛśe svayam | *HV_23.150*396:28 |
GE07hv_conpu:4196: yugānte tv ambudasyeva sphuṭato hy aśaner iva || *HV_23.150*396:31 |
GE07hv_conpu:4197: aho bata mṛdhe vīryaṃ bhārgavasya yad acchinat | *HV_23.150*396:32 |
GE07hv_conpu:4198: rājño bāhusahasraṃ tu haimaṃ tālavanaṃ yathā || *HV_23.150*396:33 |
GE07hv_conpu:4199: tṛṣitena kadā cit sa bhikṣitaś citrabhānunā | *HV_23.150*396:34 |
GE07hv_conpu:4200: [k: Ñ2.3 V B2.3 D5 after line 2 of *396 (Dn after line 3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4205: sa bhikṣām adadād vīraḥ sapta dvīpān vibhāvasoḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4206: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2.3.5.6 T2 G1-3.5 M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4210: dadāha kārtavīryasya śailāṃś caiva vanāni ca || *HV_23.151*397:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4211: sa śūnyam āśramaṃ ramyaṃ varuṇasyātmajasya vai | *HV_23.151*397:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:4213: yaṃ lebhe varuṇaḥ putraṃ purā bhāsvantam uttamam | *HV_23.151*397:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:4214: vasiṣṭhaṃ nāma sa muniḥ khyāta āpava ity uta | *HV_23.151*397:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:4215: yatrāpavas tu taṃ krodhāc chaptavān arjunaṃ vibhuḥ // HV_23.151 //
GE07hv_conpu:4216: yasmān na varjitam idaṃ vanaṃ te mama hehaya /
GE07hv_conpu:4217: tasmāt te duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtam anyo hariṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:4218: arjuno nāma kauravyaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ kuntinandanaḥ // HV_23.152 //
GE07hv_conpu:4219: [k: all Mss. (except Ś1 T1 M1-3; D6 T2 G M4 after 153b) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4221: chittvā bāhusahasraṃ te pramathya tarasā balī /
GE07hv_conpu:4222: tapasvī brāhmaṇaś ca tvāṃ haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ // HV_23.153 //
GE07hv_conpu:4224: prabhāveṇa narendrasya prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ // HV_23.154 //
GE07hv_conpu:4225: rāmāt tato 'sya mṛtyur vai tasya śāpān mahāmuneḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4226: varaś caiṣa hi kauravya svayam eva vṛtaḥ purā // HV_23.155 //
GE07hv_conpu:4228: kṛtāstrā balinaḥ śūrā dharmātmāno yaśasvinaḥ // HV_23.156 //
GE07hv_conpu:4229: śūrasenaś ca śūraś ca dhṛṣṭoktaḥ kṛṣṇa eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4230: jayadhvajaś ca nāmnāsīd āvantyo nṛpatir mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:4233: tasya putrāḥ śatākhyās tu tālajaṅghā iti śrutāḥ // HV_23.158 //
GE07hv_conpu:4235: vītihotrāḥ sujātāś ca bhojāś cāvantayas tathā // HV_23.159 //
GE07hv_conpu:4236: tauṇḍikerā iti khyātās tālajaṅghās tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4237: bharatāś ca sujātāś ca bahutvān nānukīrtitāḥ // HV_23.160 //
GE07hv_conpu:4239: vṛṣo vaṃśadharas tatra tasya putro 'bhavan madhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4240: madhoḥ putraśataṃ tv āsīd vṛṣaṇas tasya vaṃśabhāk // HV_23.161 //
GE07hv_conpu:4241: vṛṣaṇād vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve madhos tu mādhavāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4242: yādavā yadunā cāgre nirucyante ca hehayāḥ // HV_23.162 //
GE07hv_conpu:4243: [k: K1-3 Ñ2.3 V1.3 Dn Ds D3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4244: śūrāś ca śūravīrāś ca śūrasenās tathānagha || *HV_23.162*399:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4245: śūrasena iti khyātas tasya deśo mahātmanaḥ | *HV_23.162*399:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4246: na tasya vittanāśaḥ syān naṣṭaṃ pratilabhec ca saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4247: kārtavīryasya yo janma kathayed iha nityaśaḥ // HV_23.163 //
GE07hv_conpu:4249: vittavāṃś ca bhavec caiva dharmaścaiva vivardhate | *HV_23.163*400:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4250: yathā sṛṣṭir yador jātā tathā svarge mahīyate | *HV_23.163*400:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4251: [k: Ñ2.3 D3 (all these after an addl. colophon) V1 after *400 cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4253: kimarthaṃ tad vanaṃ dagdham āpavasya mahātmanaḥ | *HV_23.163*401:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4254: kārtavīryeṇa vikramya tan me brūhi prapṛcchataḥ || *HV_23.163*401:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4255: rakṣitā sa hi rājarṣiḥ prajānām iti naḥ śrutam | *HV_23.163*401:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4256: kathaṃ sa rakṣitā bhūtvā nāśayām āsa tadvanam || *HV_23.163*401:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4261: bhagavan kena tṛptis te bhaved brūhi vibhāvaso | *HV_23.163*401:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:4262: kīdṛśaṃ bhojanaṃ dadmi śrutvā te vidadhāmy aham || *HV_23.163*401:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:4264: sthāvaraṃ dehi me sarvam āhāraṃ vadatāṃ vara | *HV_23.163*401:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:4265: tena tṛpsir bhaven mahyaṃ tena tuṣṭiś ca pārthiva || *HV_23.163*401:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:4267: na śakyaṃ sthāvaraṃ sarvaṃ tejasā mānuṣeṇa tu | *HV_23.163*401:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:4268: nirdagdhuṃ tapatāṃ śreṣṭha tvām eva praṇamāmy aham || *HV_23.163*401:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:4270: tuṣṭas te 'haṃ śarān dadmi cākṣayān sarvatomukhān | *HV_23.163*401:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:4273: śuṣkaṃ bhasma kariṣyāmi tena tṛptir narādhipa || *HV_23.163*401:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:4274: tataḥ śarāṃs tadādityo arjunāya tadā dadau | *HV_23.163*401:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:4275: tataḥ sa prācyam adahat sthāvaraṃ sarvam eva tat || *HV_23.163*401:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:4276: āśramān atha grāmāṃś ca ghoṣāṃś ca nagarāṇy api | *HV_23.163*401:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:4278: evaṃ sa prācyam adahat tataḥ sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇam | *HV_23.163*401:21 |
GE07hv_conpu:4279: nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā bhūmir dagdhā sā yogatejasā || *HV_23.163*401:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:4280: etasminn eva kāle tu āpavo jalam āśritaḥ | *HV_23.163*401:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:4282: pūrṇe vrate mahātejā udatiṣṭhan mahān ṛṣiḥ | *HV_23.163*401:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:4283: krodhāc chaśāpa rājarṣiṃ kīrtitaṃ vai yathā mayā | *HV_23.163*401:26 |
GE07hv_conpu:4284: ete yayātiputrāṇāṃ pañca vaṃśā viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_conpu:4285: kīrtitā lokavīrāṇāṃ ye lokān dhārayanti vai /
GE07hv_conpu:4288: vaśī bhavati pañcānām ātmajānāṃ tatheśvaraḥ // HV_23.165 //
GE07hv_conpu:4289: labhet pañca varāṃś caiṣa durlabhān iha laukikān /
GE07hv_conpu:4290: āyuḥ kīrtiṃ dhanaṃ putrān aiśvaryaṃ bhūya eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4291: dhāraṇāc chravaṇāc caiva pañcavargasya bhārata // HV_23.166 //
GE07hv_conpu:4294: kroṣṭos tu śṛṇu rājendra vaṃśam uttamapūruṣam /
GE07hv_conpu:4296: kroṣṭor hi vaṃśaṃ śrutvemaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:4298: [h: HV (CE) chapter 24, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h]
GE07hv_conpu:4300: gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca kroṣṭor bhārye babhūvatuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4301: gāndhārī janayām āsa anamitraṃ mahābalam // HV_24.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:4302: mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato vai devamīḍhuṣam /
GE07hv_conpu:4303: teṣāṃ vaṃśas tridhā bhūto vṛṣṇīnāṃ kulavardhanaḥ // HV_24.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:4304: mādryāḥ putrau tu jajñāte śrutau vṛṣṇyandhakāv ubhau /
GE07hv_conpu:4305: jajñāte tanayau vṛṣṇeḥ śvaphalkaś citrakas tathā // HV_24.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:4306: śvaphalkas tu mahārāja dharmātmā yatra vartate /
GE07hv_conpu:4307: nāsti vyādhibhayaṃ tatra nāvarṣabhayam apyuta // HV_24.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:4309: trīṇi varṣāṇi viṣaye nāvarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ // HV_24.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:4310: sa tatra vāsayām āsa śvaphalkaṃ paramārcitam /
GE07hv_conpu:4312: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B2.3 Dn D4 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4313: sā mātur udarasthā tu bahūnvarṣagaṇān kila | *HV_24.6*403:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4314: nivasantī na vai jajñe garbhasthāṃ tāṃ pitābravīt || *HV_24.6*403:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4315: jāyasva śīghraṃ bhadraṃ te kimartham iha tiṣṭhasi | *HV_24.6*403:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4316: provāca cainaṃ garbhasthā kanyā gāṃ ca dine dine || *HV_24.6*403:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4317: yadi dadyāṃ tato 'dyāhaṃ jāyayiṣyāmi tāṃ pitā | *HV_24.6*403:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:4318: tathety uvāca taṃ cāsyāḥ pitā kāmam apūrayat | *HV_24.6*403:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:4320: gāndinīṃ nāma sā gāṃ tu dadau vipreṣu nityaśaḥ // HV_24.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:4321: dātā yajvā ca dhīraś ca śrutavān atithipriyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4322: akrūraḥ suṣuve tasmāc chvaphalkād bhūridakṣiṇaḥ // HV_24.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:4326: āvāhaprativāhau ca sundarā ca varāṅganā // HV_24.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:4332: prasenaś copadevaś ca jajñāte devavarcasau // HV_24.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:4333: citrakasyābhavan putrāḥ pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4335: ariṣṭanemir aśvaś ca sudharmā dharmabhṛt tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:4336: subāhur bahubāhuś ca śraviṣṭhāśravaṇe striyau // HV_24.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:4337: aśmakyāṃ janayām āsa śūraṃ vai devamīḍhuṣam /
GE07hv_conpu:4338: mahiṣyāṃ jajñire śūrād bhojyāyāṃ puruṣā daśa // HV_24.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:4340: jajñe yasya prasūtasya dundubhyaḥ prāṇadan divi // HV_24.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:4341: ānakānāṃ ca saṃhrādaḥ sumahān abhavad divi /
GE07hv_conpu:4342: papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca śūrasya bhavane mahat // HV_24.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:4343: manuṣyaloke kṛtsne 'pi rūpe nāsti samo bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:4344: yasyāsīt puruṣāgryasya kāntiś candramaso yathā // HV_24.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:4345: devabhāgas tato jajñe tato devaśravāḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4346: anādhṛṣṭiḥ kanavako vatsavān atha gṛñjimaḥ // HV_24.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:4347: śyāmaḥ śamīko gaṇḍūṣaḥ pañca cāsya varāṅganāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4349: rājādhidevī ca tathā pañcaitā vīramātaraḥ // HV_24.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:4350: [k: K2 Ñ2 Dn Ds2 D3.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4352: śūraḥ pūjyāya vṛddhāya kuntibhojāya tāṃ dadau | *HV_24.19*405:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4356: śrutadevyāṃ kekayas tu pañca putrān akalmaṣān | *HV_24.20*406:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4360: śrutaśravāyāṃ caidyas tu śiśupālo mahābalaḥ // HV_24.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:4362: yo hato rājasūye vai kṛṣṇena sumahātmanā | *HV_24.20*407 |
GE07hv_conpu:4364: pṛthukīrtyāṃ tu saṃjajñe tanayo vṛddhaśarmaṇaḥ // HV_24.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:4366: pṛthāṃ duhitaraṃ cakre kauntyas tāṃ pāṇḍur āvahat // HV_24.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:4367: yasyāṃ sa dharmavid rājā dharmād jajñe yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4368: bhīmasenas tathā vātād indrāc caiva dhanaṃjayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4371: śaineyaḥ satyakas tasmād yuyudhānas tu sātyakiḥ // HV_24.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:4374: bhūmer yugaṃdharaḥ putra iti vaṃśaḥ samāpyate | *HV_24.24*408:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4376: paṇḍitānāṃ paraṃ prāhur devaśravasam uddhavam // HV_24.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:4388: adbhir dadau sutaṃ vīraṃ śauriḥ kauśikam aurasam // HV_24.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:4391: gaṇḍūṣāya tv aputrāya viṣvakseno dadau sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:4392: cārudeṣṇaṃ sucāruṃ ca pañcālaṃ kṛtalakṣaṇam // HV_24.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:4393: asaṃgrāmeṇa yo vīro nāvartata kadā cana /
GE07hv_conpu:4397: tantrijas tantripālaś ca sutau kanavakasya tu /
GE07hv_conpu:4398: vīraś cāśvahanuś caiva vīrau tāv atha gṛñjimau // HV_24.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:4399: śyāmaputraḥ sumitras tu śamīko rājyam āvahat /
GE07hv_conpu:4402: ajātaśatruḥ śatrūṇāṃ jajñe tasya vināśanaḥ // HV_24.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:4403: vasudevasya tu sutān kīrtayiṣyāmy tāñ śṛṇu // HV_24.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:4404: vṛṣṇes trividham etaṃ tu bahuśākhaṃ mahaujasam /
GE07hv_conpu:4407: dhārayan vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ nānarthair iha yujyate // HV_24.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:4408: [h: HV (CE) chapter 25, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h]
GE07hv_conpu:4412: [k: After the ref., all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4415: vaiśākhī ca tathā bhadrā sunāmnī caiva pañcamī || *HV_25.0*415:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4417: vṛkadevy upadevī ca devakī caiva saptamī || *HV_25.0*415:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:4418: sutanur vaḍavā caiva dve ete paricārike | *HV_25.0*415:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:4419: lebhe jyeṣṭhaṃ sutaṃ rāmaṃ śāraṇaṃ śaṭham eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4421: citrāṃ nāma kumārīṃ ca rohiṇītanayā nava /
GE07hv_conpu:4422: citrā subhadreti punar vikhyātā kurunandana // HV_25.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:4423: vasudevāc ca devakyāṃ jajñe śaurir mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4427: vipulaṃ teṣv aṣṭatamo svayam eva hariḥ kila | *HV_25.4*416:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4428: rāmāc ca niśaṭho jajñe revatyāṃ dayitaḥ sutaḥ // HV_25.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:4432: ye putrā jajñire śūrā namatas tān nibodhata // HV_25.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:4433: bhojaś ca vijayaś caiva śāntidevāsutāv ubhau /
GE07hv_conpu:4436: vṛkadevaḥ sunāmāyāṃ gadaś cāsyāḥ sutāv ubhau /
GE07hv_conpu:4439: vijayaṃ lomapādaṃ ca vardhamānaṃ ca devakī || *HV_25.7*418:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4440: ete svayaṃ mahātmanā upadevyāṃ ca jajñire | *HV_25.7*418:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4441: sutanū ca narāvī ca śaurer āstāṃ parigrahaḥ || *HV_25.7*418:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4442: pauṇḍraś ca kapilaś caiva vasudevasutāv ubhau | *HV_25.7*418:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4443: narākhyāṃ kapilo jajñe pauṇḍraś ca sutanūsutaḥ | *HV_25.7*418:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:4444: tayor nṛpo 'bhavat pauṇḍraḥ kapilas tu vanaṃ yayau || *HV_25.7*418:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:4448: jijñāsāṃ pauruṣe cakre na caskande 'tha pauruṣam // HV_25.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:4455: dhārayām āsa gārgyasya garbhaṃ durdharam acyutam // HV_25.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:4457: sa kālayavano nāma jajñe rājā mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4458: vṛṣapūrvārdhakāyās tam avahan vājino raṇe // HV_25.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:4459: aputrasya sa rājñas tu vavṛdhe 'ntaḥpure śiśuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4463: akṣauhiṇyā tu sainyasya mathurām abhyayāt tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:4464: dūtaṃ ca preṣayām āsa vṛṣṇyandhakaniveśane // HV_25.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:4466: sametā mantrayām āsur jarāsaṃdhabhayena ca // HV_25.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:4467: kṛtvā ca niścayaṃ sarve palāyanam arocayan /
GE07hv_conpu:4469: tyaktvā gṛhān dhanaṃ sarve palāyanta manoratham | *HV_25.16*420 |
GE07hv_conpu:4475: iti kṛṣṇasya janmedaṃ yaḥ śucir niyatendriyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4476: parvasu śrāvayed vidvān nirṛṇaḥ sa sukhī bhavet // HV_25.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:4477: [h: HV (CE) chapter 26, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h]
GE07hv_conpu:4480: vārjinīvatam icchanti svāhiṃ svāhākṛtāṃ varam // HV_26.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:4482: mahākratubhir īje yo vividhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ // HV_26.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:4483: śataprasūtim icchan vai ruṣadguḥ so 'gryam ātmajam /
GE07hv_conpu:4484: citraiś citrarathas tasya putraḥ karmabhir anvitaḥ // HV_26.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:4486: śaśabinduḥ paraṃ vṛttaṃ rājarṣīṇām anuṣṭhitaḥ // HV_26.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:4488: śaṃsanti ca purāṇajñāḥ pārthaśravasam antaram // HV_26.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:4490: uṣato yajñam akhilaṃ svadharmam uṣatāṃ varaḥ // HV_26.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:4494: maruttas tasya tanayo rājarṣir abhavan nṛpaḥ // HV_26.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:4496: cacāra paramaṃ dharmam amarṣāt pretyabhāvavit // HV_26.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:4500: dhanvināṃ niśitair bāṇair avāpa śriyam uttamām // HV_26.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:4502: jajñire pañca putrās tu mahāvīryāḥ parājitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4503: rukmeṣuḥ pṛthurukmaś ca jyāmaghaḥ pālito hariḥ // HV_26.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:4504: pālitaṃ ca hariṃ caiva videhebhyaḥ pitā dadau /
GE07hv_conpu:4505: rukmeṣur abhavad rājā pṛthurukmaś ca saṃśritaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4506: tābhyāṃ pravrājito rājyāj jyāmagho 'vasad āśrame // HV_26.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:4508: jagāma ratham āsthāya deśam anyaṃ dhvajī rathī // HV_26.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:4510: ṛkṣavantaṃ giriṃ jitvā śuktimatyām uvāsa saḥ // HV_26.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:4512: aputro 'pi ca rājā sa nānyāṃ bhāryām avindata // HV_26.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:4513: tasyāsīd vijayo yuddhe tatra kanyām avāpa saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4515: ratham āropya sā nītā patnyarthaṃ strīniveśanam || *HV_26.16*423:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4516: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ruṣitā śaibyā bhartāram idam abravīt | *HV_26.16*423:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4517: kimartham iyam ānītā sapatnī durnayā mama | *HV_26.16*423:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4518: bhāryām uvāca saṃtrāsāt snuṣeti sa nareśvaraḥ // HV_26.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:4519: etac chrutvābravīd enaṃ kasya ceyaṃ snuṣeti vai /
GE07hv_conpu:4521: na hi prasūtā putreṇa nānyā bhāryāsti te'nagha | *HV_26.17*424:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4522: snuṣā saṃbandhavāg eṣā katamena sutena te | *HV_26.17*424:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4523: [k: all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4525: yas te janiṣyate putras tasya bhāryeti jātabhīḥ // HV_26.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:4526: ugreṇa tapasā tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ sā vyajāyata /
GE07hv_conpu:4527: putryāṃ vidarbhaṃ subhāgā caitrā pariṇatā satī // HV_26.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:4534: kaiśikasya cidiḥ putras tasmāc caidyā nṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ | *HV_26.19*426:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4536: kunter dhṛṣṭaḥ suto jajñe raṇadhṛṣṭaḥ pratāpavān // HV_26.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:4538: āvantaś ca daśārhaś ca balī viṣṇuharaś ca yaḥ // HV_26.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:4539: daśārhasya suto vyomā vidvāñ jīmūta ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:4540: jīmūtaputro vṛkatis tasya bhīmarathaḥ sutaḥ // HV_26.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:4542: tasya cāsīd daśarathaḥ śakunis tasya cātmajaḥ // HV_26.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:4546: madhūnāṃ vaṃśakṛd rājā madhur madhuravāg api // HV_26.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:4547: madhor jajñe tu vaidarbhyāṃ purutvān puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4551: mātā jajñe 'tha vaidarbhyāṃ bhadravatyāṃ kurūdvaha // HV_26.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:4552: ekṣvākī cābhavad bhāryā mātus tasyām ajāyata /
GE07hv_conpu:4557: yujyate parayā prītyā prajāvāṃś ca bhavaty uta // HV_26.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:4558: [h: HV (CE) chapter 27, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h]
GE07hv_conpu:4561: bhajinaṃ bhajamānaṃ ca divyaṃ devāvṛdhaṃ nṛpam // HV_27.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:4562: andhakaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ vṛṣṇiṃ ca yadunandanam /
GE07hv_conpu:4563: teṣāṃ visargāś catvāro vistareṇeha tāṅ śṛṇu // HV_27.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:4565: āstāṃ bhārye tayos tasmāj jajñire bahavaḥ sutāḥ // HV_27.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:4566: nimiś ca kramaṇaś caiva viṣṇuḥ śūraḥ puraṃjayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4570: yajvā devāvṛdho rājā cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4571: putraḥ sarvaguṇopeto mama syād iti niścitaḥ // HV_27.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:4572: saṃyujyātmānam evaṃ sa parṇāśāyā jalaṃ spṛśan /
GE07hv_conpu:4573: sadopaspṛśatas tasya cakāra priyam āpagā // HV_27.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:4575: kalyāṇatvān narapates tasya sā nimnagottamā // HV_27.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:4576: nādhyagacchata tāṃ nārīṃ yasyām evaṃvidhaḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4579: jāyet tasmāt svayaṃ hanta bhavāmy asya sahavratā // HV_27.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:4580: atha bhūtvā kumārī sā bibhratī paramaṃ vapuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4581: varayām āsa nṛpatiṃ tām iyeṣa ca sa prabhuḥ // HV_27.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:4584: atha sā daśame māsi suṣuve saritāṃ varā /
GE07hv_conpu:4585: putraṃ sarvaguṇopetaṃ babhruṃ devāvṛdhān nṛpāt // HV_27.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:4589: babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devair devāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ // HV_27.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:4590: ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ ca puruṣāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4591: ete 'mṛtatvaṃ saṃprāptā babhror daivāvṛdhād iti // HV_27.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:4595: tasyānvavāyaḥ sumahān bhojā ye mārtikāvatāḥ // HV_27.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:4597: kukuraṃ bhajamānaṃ ca śamiṃ kambalabarhiṣam // HV_27.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:4598: kukurasya suto dhṛṣṇur dhṛṣṇos tu tanayas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:4600: jajñe punar vasus tasmād abhijit tu punar vasoḥ // HV_27.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:4602: āhukaś cāhukī caiva khyātau khyātimatāṃ varau // HV_27.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:4603: imāś codāharanty atra gāthāḥ prati tam āhukam // HV_27.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:4605: aśīticarmaṇā yukto nāhukaḥ prathamaṃ vrajet // HV_27.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:4607: nāśuddhakarmā nāyajvā yo bhojam abhito vrajet // HV_27.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:4609: [k: N (except Ñ1 D6) T3.4 (Ś1 after 19, K1.3 after 20, K4 after 22) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4613: tāvanty eva sahasrāṇi uttarasyāṃ tathā diśi /
GE07hv_conpu:4614: ā bhūmipālān bhojān svān atiṣṭhan kiṃkiṇīkinaḥ // HV_27.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:4615: āhukīṃ cāpy avantibhyaḥ svasāraṃ dadur andhakāḥ // HV_27.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:4616: āhukasya tu kāśyāyāṃ dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4617: devakaś cograsenaś ca devagarbhasamāv ubhau // HV_27.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:4620: kumāryaḥ sapta cāpyāsan vasudevāya tā dadau // HV_27.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:4622: vṛkadevy upadevī ca sunāmnī caiva saptamī // HV_27.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:4623: navograsenasya sutās teṣāṃ kaṃsas tu pūrvajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4625: rāṣṭrapālo 'tha sutanur anādhṛṣṭiś ca puṣṭimān // HV_27.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:4626: eṣāṃ svasāraḥ pañcāsan kaṃsā kaṃsavatī tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:4627: sutanū rāṣṭrapālī ca kaṅkā caiva varāṅganā // HV_27.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:4630: ātmano vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ prajāvān āpnute naraḥ // HV_27.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:4641: śamī ca daṇḍaśarmā ca dattaśatruś ca śatrujit /
GE07hv_conpu:4642: śravaṇā ca śraviṣṭhā ca svasārau saṃbabhūvatuḥ // HV_28.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:4644: svayaṃbhojaḥ svayaṃbhojād dhṛdikaḥ saṃbabhūva ha // HV_28.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:4645: tasya putrā babhūvur hi sarve bhīmaparākramāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4646: kṛtavarmāgrajas teṣāṃ śatadhanvā tu madhyamaḥ // HV_28.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:4647: devāntaś ca narāntaś ca bhiṣag vaitaraṇaś ca yaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4648: sudāntaś cādhidāntaś ca kīnāśo dāmadambhakau // HV_28.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:4651: kroṣṭoḥ putro 'namitras tu tasmād vai devamīḍhuṣaḥ | *HV_28.7*433 |
GE07hv_conpu:4652: asamaujās tathā vīro nāsamaujāś ca tāv ubhau // HV_28.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:4654: sudaṃṣṭraṃ ca sucāruṃ ca kṛṣṇam ity andhakāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_28.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:4655: [k: Ś1 K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B2 Dn D3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4656: ete cānye ca bahavo andhakāḥ kathitās tava | *HV_28.8*434:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4657: andhakānām imaṃ vaṃśaṃ dhārayed yas tu nityaśaḥ | *HV_28.8*434:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4658: ātmano vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ | *HV_28.8*434:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4659: gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca kroṣṭor bhārye babhūvatuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4660: gāndhārī janayām āsa sumitraṃ mitranandanam // HV_28.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:4661: mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato vai devamīḍhuṣam /
GE07hv_conpu:4662: anamitram amitrāṇāṃ jetāraṃ ca mahābalam // HV_28.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:4664: prasenaś cātha satrājic chatrusenājitāv ubhau // HV_28.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:4666: divyaṃ syamantakaṃ nāma samudrād upalabdhavān // HV_28.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:4667: [k: K2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 (K1.3 after 19ab) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4669: sa kadācin niśāpāye rathena rathināṃ varaḥ | *HV_28.12*435:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4673: atha rājā vivasvantam uvāca sthitam agrataḥ | *HV_28.12*435:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:4674: yathaiva vyomni paśyāmi sadā tvāṃ jyotiṣāṃ pate | *HV_28.12*435:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:4676: ko viśeṣo 'sti me tvattaḥ sakhyenopāgatasya vai | *HV_28.12*435:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:4677: etac chrutvā tu bhagavān maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam || *HV_28.12*435:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:4679: tato vigrahavantaṃ taṃ dadarśa nṛpatis tadā | *HV_28.12*435:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:4680: prītimān atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā muhūrtaṃ kṛtavān kathām | *HV_28.12*435:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:4681: tam abhiprasthitaṃ bhūyo vivasvantaṃ sa satrajit | *HV_28.12*435:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:4682: lokān udbhāsayasy etān yena tvaṃ satataṃ prabho || *HV_28.12*435:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:4683: tad etan maṇiratnaṃ me bhagavan dātum arhasi | *HV_28.12*435:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:4685: sa tam ābadhya nagarīṃ praviveśa mahīpatiḥ | *HV_28.12*435:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:4686: taṃ janāḥ paryadhāvanta sūryo 'yaṃ gacchatīti ha | *HV_28.12*435:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:4687: purīṃ vismāpayitvā sa rājā tv antaḥpuraṃ yayau || *HV_28.12*435:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:4689: dadau bhrātre narapatiḥ premṇā satrājid uttamam | *HV_28.12*435:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:4693: dine dine svarṇabhārān aṣṭau sa sravati prabho | *HV_28.12*435A:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4696: tataḥ satrājitaḥ sūryaṃ jvalantaṃ vapuṣā tadā | *HV_28.12*435B:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4698: stutvā ca vividhaiḥ stotraiḥ prīṇayām āsa bhāskaram | *HV_28.12*435B:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4699: tataḥ prasanno bhagavān vṛṇīṣva varam īpsitam || *HV_28.12*435B:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:4700: ity uvāca sa rājānaṃ sa ca vavre maṇiṃ tadā | *HV_28.12*435B:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:4701: sa cāpi taṃ maṇiṃ dattvā tatraivāntaradhīyata || *HV_28.12*435B:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:4704: kālavarṣī ca parjanyo na ca vyādhibhayaṃ bhavet // HV_28.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:4705: lipsāṃ cakre prasenāt tu maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam /
GE07hv_conpu:4706: govindo na ca taṃ lebhe śakto 'pi na jahāra saḥ // HV_28.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:4707: kadācin mṛgayāṃ yātaḥ prasenas tena bhūṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4708: syamantakakṛte siṃhād vadhaṃ prāpa vanecarāt // HV_28.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:4710: nihatya maṇiratnaṃ tam ādāya bilam āviśat // HV_28.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:4712: prārthanāṃ tāṃ maṇer buddhvā sarva eva śaśaṅkire // HV_28.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:4713: sa śaṅkyamāno dharmātmā nakārī tasya karmaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4714: āhariṣye maṇim iti pratijñāya vanaṃ yayau // HV_28.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:4717: [k: Ś1 K2 Ñ2.3 V B Ds D2-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4718: yatra praseno bhṛgayām ācarat tatra cāpy atha | *HV_28.18*437 |
GE07hv_conpu:4720: ṛkṣavantaṃ girivaraṃ vindhyaṃ ca girim uttamam // HV_28.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:4722: sāśvaṃ hataṃ prasenaṃ tu nāvindac caiva taṃ maṇim // HV_28.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:4724: ṛkṣena nihato dṛṣṭaḥ pādair ṛkṣasya sūcitaḥ // HV_28.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:4725: pādais tair anviyāyātha guhām ṛkṣasya mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4726: mahaty ṛkṣabile vāṇīṃ śuśrāva pramaderitām // HV_28.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:4727: dhātryā kumāram ādāya sutaṃ jāmbavato nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:4728: krīḍāpayantyā maṇinā mā rodīr ity atheritām // HV_28.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:4730: siṃhaḥ prasenam avadhīt siṃho jāmbavatā hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4731: sukumāraka mā rodīs tava hy eṣa syamantakaḥ // HV_28.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:4732: vyaktīkṛtaś ca śabdaḥ sa tūrṇaṃ cāpi yayau bilam /
GE07hv_conpu:4733: [k: All Mss. except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4734: praviśya cāpi bhagavāṃs tam ṛkṣabilam añjasā | *HV_28.25*438:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4736: śārṅgadhanvā bilasthaṃ tu jāmbavantaṃ dadarśa ha // HV_28.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:4737: yuyudhe vāsudevas tu bile jāmbavatā saha /
GE07hv_conpu:4738: bāhubhyām eva govindo divasān ekaviṃsatim // HV_28.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:4746: adṛṣṭvā nirgamaṃ śaureḥ praviṣṭasya bilaṃ janāḥ | *HV_28.27*440:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4748: punar dvāravatīm etya hataṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nyavedayan // HV_28.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:4755: lebhe jāmbavatīṃ kanyām ṛkṣarājasya saṃmatām // HV_28.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:4757: anunīyarkṣarājānaṃ niryayau ca tadā bilāt // HV_28.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:4758: [k: All Mss. except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4759: dvārakām agamat kṛṣṇaḥ śriyā paramayā yutaḥ | *HV_28.29*443 |
GE07hv_conpu:4760: evaṃ sa maṇim āhṛtya viśodhyātmānam acyutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4761: dadau satrājite taṃ vai sarvasātvatasaṃsadi // HV_28.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:4763: ātmā viśodhitaḥ pāpād vinirjitya syamantakam // HV_28.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:4764: satrājito daśa tv āsan bhāryās tāsāṃ śataṃ sutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4765: khyātimantas trayas teṣāṃ bhaṅgakāras tu pūrvajaḥ // HV_28.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:4766: vīro vātapatiś caiva upasvāvāṃs tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4767: kumāryaś cāpi tisro vai dikṣu khyātā narādhipa // HV_28.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:4769: tathā padmāvatī caiva bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasya tā dadau // HV_28.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:4770: sabhākṣo bhaṅgakārāt tu nāreyaś ca narottamau /
GE07hv_conpu:4772: madhoḥ putrasya jajñe 'tha pṛśniḥ putro yudhājitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4773: jajñāte tanayau pṛśneḥ śvaphalkaś citrakas tathā // HV_28.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:4775: gāṃdīṃ tasyās tu gāṃdītvaṃ sadā gāḥ pradadau hi sā // HV_28.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:4776: tasyāṃ jajñe tadā vīraḥ śrutavān iti bhārata /
GE07hv_conpu:4780: carmabhṛc cārivarmā ca gṛdhram ojā naras tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:4781: āvāhaprativāhau ca sundarā ca varāṅganā // HV_28.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:4785: sudevaś copadevaś ca jajñāte devavarcasau // HV_28.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:4786: citrakasyābhavan putrāḥ pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4788: ariṣṭanemes tu sutā dharmo dharmabhṛd eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4789: subāhur bahubāhuś ca śraviṣṭḥāśravaṇe striyau // HV_28.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:4791: veda mithyābhiśāpās taṃ na spṛśanti kadācana // HV_28.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:4799: yat tat satrājite kṛṣṇo maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam /
GE07hv_conpu:4800: adāt tad dhārayad babhrur bhojena śatadhanvanā // HV_29.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:4801: sadā hi prārthayām āsa satyabhāmām aninditām /
GE07hv_conpu:4802: akrūro 'ntaram anvicchan maṇiṃ caiva syamantakam // HV_29.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:4804: rātrau taṃ maṇim ādāya tato 'krūrāya dattavān // HV_29.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:4805: akrūras tu tadā ratnam ādāya bharatarṣabha /
GE07hv_conpu:4806: samayaṃ kārayāṃ cakre nāvedyo 'haṃ tvayācyute // HV_29.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:4808: mamādya dvārakā sarvā vaśe tiṣṭhaty asaṃśayam // HV_29.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:4810: prayayau ratham āruhya nagaraṃ vāraṇāvatam // HV_29.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:4811: satyabhāmā tu tad vṛttaṃ bhojasya śatadhanvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4812: bhartur nivedya duḥkhārtā pārśvasthāśrūṇy avartayat // HV_29.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:4813: pāṇḍavāṇāṃ tu dagdhānāṃ hariḥ kṛtvodakaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:4814: kulyārthe ca sa bhrātṝṇāṃ nyayojayata sātyakim // HV_29.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:4816: pūrvajaṃ halinaṃ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_29.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:4818: syamantakaḥ sa madgāmī tasya prabhur ahaṃ vibho // HV_29.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:4819: tadāroha rathaṃ śīghraṃ bhojaṃ hatvā mahābalam /
GE07hv_conpu:4820: syamantako mahābāho saha nau sa bhaviṣyati // HV_29.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:4827: anāptau ca vadhārhau ca kṛtvā bhojajanārdanau /
GE07hv_conpu:4829: apayāne tato buddhiṃ bhojaś cakre bhayārditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4830: yojanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ hayayā pratyapadyata // HV_29.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:4832: bhojasya vaḍavā rājan yayā kṛṣṇam ayodhayat // HV_29.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:4834: tataḥ kruddhau bhojakṛṣṇau tvaritau tu mahābalau | *HV_29.15*445:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4837: atha drutam agāt kṛṣṇo rathena rathināṃ varaḥ | *HV_29.15*445:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4838: balena sahito rājan prayayau tasya mārgaṇe | *HV_29.15*445:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:4840: dṛṣṭvā rathasya svāṃ vṛddhiṃ śatadhanvānam ārdayat // HV_29.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:4841: tatas tasyā hayāyās tu śramāt khedāc ca bhārata /
GE07hv_conpu:4842: kham utpetur atha prāṇāḥ kṛṣṇo rāmam athābravīt // HV_29.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:4844: padbhyāṃ gatvā hariṣyāmi maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam // HV_29.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:4845: padbhyām eva tato gatvā śatadhanvānam acyutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4846: mithilām abhito rājañ jaghāna paramāstravit // HV_29.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:4847: syamantakaṃ ca nāpaśyad dhatvā bhojaṃ mahābalam /
GE07hv_conpu:4848: nivṛttaṃ cābravīt kṛṣṇaṃ ratnaṃ dehīti lāṅgalī // HV_29.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:4849: nāstīti kṛṣṇaś covāca tato rāmo ruṣānvitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4851: bhrātṛtvān marṣayāmy eṣa svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham /
GE07hv_conpu:4852: kṛtyaṃ na me dvārakayā na tvayā na ca vṛṣṇibhiḥ // HV_29.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:4855: etasminn eva kāle tu babhrur matimatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4856: nānārūpān kratūn sarvān ājahāra nirargalān // HV_29.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:4857: dīkṣāmayaṃ sa kavacaṃ rakṣārthaṃ praviveśa ha /
GE07hv_conpu:4859: arthān ratnāni cāgryāṇi dravyāṇi vividhāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4860: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣāṇi dharmātmā yajñeṣu viniyojayat // HV_29.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:4861: akrūrayajñā iti te khyātās tasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4863: atha duryodhano rājā gatvā sa mithilāṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4864: gadāśikṣāṃ tato divyāṃ balabhadrād avāptavān // HV_29.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:4866: ānīto dvārakām eva kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā // HV_29.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:4867: akrūras tv andhakaiḥ sārdham apāyād bharatarṣabha /
GE07hv_conpu:4868: hatvā satrājitaṃ yuddhe sahabandhuṃ mahābalī // HV_29.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:4876: anāvṛṣṭyā tadā rāṣṭram abhavad bahudhā kṛśam /
GE07hv_conpu:4877: tataḥ prasādayām āsur akrūraṃ kukurāndhakāḥ // HV_29.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:4878: punar dvāravatīṃ prāpte tasmin dānapatau tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4879: pravavarṣa sahasrākṣaḥ kacche jalanidhes tadā // HV_29.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:4881: akrūraḥ pradadau dhīmān prītyarthaṃ kurunandana // HV_29.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:4882: atha vijñāya yogena kṛṣṇo babhrugataṃ maṇim /
GE07hv_conpu:4883: sabhāmadhyagataṃ prāha tam akrūraṃ janārdanaḥ // HV_29.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:4884: yat tad ratnaṃ maṇivaraṃ tava hastagataṃ vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:4885: tat prayacchasva mānārha mayi mānāryakaṃ kṛthāḥ // HV_29.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:4886: ṣaṣṭivarṣagate kāle yad roṣo 'bhūt tadā mama /
GE07hv_conpu:4887: sa saṃrūḍho 'sakṛtprāptas tataḥ kālātyayo mahān // HV_29.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:4889: pradadau taṃ maṇiṃ babhrur akleśena mahāmatiḥ // HV_29.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:4890: tatas tam āryavatprāptaṃ babhror hastād ariṃdamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4891: dadau hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇas taṃ maṇiṃ babhrave punaḥ // HV_29.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:4895: yas tv evaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ | *HV_29.40*447:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4897: ā brahmabhavanāc cāpi yaśaḥkhyātir na saṃśayaḥ | *HV_29.40*447:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4898: bhaviṣyati naraśreṣṭha satyam etad bravīmi te | *HV_29.40*447:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4900: tataḥ sarve yaduvarā hṛṣṭāḥ prāñjalayas tadā | *HV_29.40*448:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:4910: śrotum icchāmy aśeṣeṇa hareḥ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ // HV_30.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:4911: [k: After the ref., N (except Ś1) T1.3.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4913: satāṃ kathayatāṃ eva vārāha iti naḥ śrutam | *HV_30.1*449:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:4914: na jāne tasya caritaṃ vidhiṃ naiva ca vistaram | *HV_30.1*449:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:4915: na karmaguṇasaṃtānaṃ na hetuṃ na manīṣitam | *HV_30.1*449:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:4916: kimātmako varāhaḥ sa kā mūrtiḥ kā ca devatā | *HV_30.1*449:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:4917: kimācāraḥ prabhāvo vā kiṃ vā tena purā kṛtam | *HV_30.1*449:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:4920: yathā nārāyaṇo brahman vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ | *HV_30.1*449:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:4922: karmaṇām ānupūrvyā ca prādurbhāvāś ca ye vibhoḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4923: yā cāsya prakṛtir brahmaṃs tāṃ ca vyākhyātum arhasi // HV_30.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:4928: devamānuṣayor netā dyor bhuvaḥ prabhavo vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4929: kimarthaṃ divvyam ātmānaṃ mānuṣye saṃnyayojayat // HV_30.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:4930: yaś cakraṃ vartayaty eko mānuṣāṇām anāmayam /
GE07hv_conpu:4931: mānuṣye sa kathaṃ buddhiṃ cakre cakrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // HV_30.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:4933: sa kathaṃ gāṃ gato viṣṇur gopatvam agamad vibhuḥ // HV_30.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:4934: mahābhūtāni bhūtātmā yo dadhāra cakāra ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4935: śrīgarbhaḥ sa kathaṃ garbhe striyā bhūcarayā dhṛtaḥ // HV_30.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:4936: yena lokān kramair jitvā tribhis trīṃs tridaśepsayā /
GE07hv_conpu:4937: sthāpitā jagato mārgās trivargaprabhavās trayaḥ // HV_30.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:4938: yo 'ntakāle jagat pītvā kṛtvā toyamayaṃ vapuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4939: lokam ekārṇavaṃ cakre dṛśyādṛśyena vartmanā // HV_30.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:4940: yaḥ purāṇe purāṇātmā vārāhaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4942: yaḥ purā puruhūtārthe trailokyam idam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:4943: dadau jitvā vasumatīṃ surāṇāṃ surasattamaḥ // HV_30.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:4944: yena saiṃhaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā dvidhā kṛtvā ca tat punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4946: yaḥ purā hy analo bhūtvā aurvaḥ saṃvartako vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4949: sahasraśirasaṃ devaṃ yam āhur vai yuge yuge // HV_30.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:4951: ekārṇavagate loke tat paṅkajam apaṅkajam // HV_30.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:4952: yena te nihatā daityāḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye /
GE07hv_conpu:4955: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4956: nirjitaś ca mahādaityas tārakaś ca mahāsuraḥ | *HV_30.17*450 |
GE07hv_conpu:4958: yaḥ śete śāśvataṃ yogam āsthāya timiraṃ mahat // HV_30.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:4959: surāraṇir garbham adhatta divyaṃ tapaḥprakarṣād aditiḥ purāṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:4960: śakraṃ ca yo daityagaṇāvaruddhaṃ garbhāvasāne nakṛśaṃ cakāra // HV_30.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:4961: padāni yo lokapadāni kṛtvā cakāra daityān salilāśayasthān /
GE07hv_conpu:4962: kṛtvā ca devāṃs tridivasya devāṃś cakre sureśaṃ puruhūtam eva // HV_30.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:4963: [k: N (except Ś1) T G1.3.4 (G5 after 21) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4966: agnim āhavanīyaṃ ca vedīṃ caiva kuśān sruvam // HV_30.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:4967: prokṣaṇīyaṃ dhruvāṃ caiva āvabhṛthyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4968: arāṃs trīṇi ca yaś cakre havyakavyapradān makhe // HV_30.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:4969: havyādāṃś ca surāṃś cakre kavyādāṃś ca pitṝn api /
GE07hv_conpu:4971: yūpān samit srucaṃ somaṃ pavitraṃ paridhīn api /
GE07hv_conpu:4972: yajñiyāni ca dravyāṇi yajñāṃś ca cayanānalān /
GE07hv_conpu:4973: sadasyāny ajamānāṃś ca medhādīṃś ca kratūttamān // HV_30.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:4974: vibabhāja purā yaś ca pārameṣṭhyena karmaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:4975: yugānurūpaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā lokān anu parikraman // HV_30.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:4976: kṣaṇā nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāś ca kalās traikālyam eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:4977: muhūrtās tithayo māsā dinasaṃvatsarās tathā // HV_30.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:4978: ṛtavaḥ kālayogāś ca pramāṇaṃ vividhaṃ nṛṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:4979: āyuḥ kṣetrāṇy upacayo lakṣaṇaṃ rūpasauṣṭhavam // HV_30.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:4980: trayo varṇās trayo lokās traividyaṃ pāvakās trayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4981: traikālyaṃ trīṇi karmāṇi trayo 'pāyās trayo guṇāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4982: sṛṣṭā lokās trayo 'nantā yenānantyena vartmanā // HV_30.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:4984: nṛṇām indriyapūrveṇa yogena ramate ca yaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4985: gatāgatābhyāṃ yo netā tatreha ca vidhīśvaraḥ // HV_30.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:4991: yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate jyotir yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate tapaḥ // HV_30.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:4992: yaḥ paraṃ prāha parataḥ paraṃ yaḥ paramātmavān /
GE07hv_conpu:4993: [k: Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D3.4.6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4998: ādityādis tu yo divyo yaś ca daityāntako vibhuḥ // HV_30.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:4999: yugānteṣv antako yaś ca yaś ca lokāntakāntakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5000: setur yo lokasetūnāṃ medhyo yo medhyakarmaṇām // HV_30.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5001: vedyo yo vedaviduṣāṃ prabhur yaḥ prabhavātmanām /
GE07hv_conpu:5004: vinayo nayavṛttānāṃ tejas tejasvinām api // HV_30.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:5006: vigraho vigrahārhāṇāṃ gatir gatimatām api // HV_30.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:5009: rasād vai śoṇitaṃ bhavati śoṇitān māṃsam ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:5010: māṃsāt tu medaso janma medaso 'sthi nirucyate // HV_30.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:5012: śukrād narbhaḥ samabhavad rasamūlena karmaṇā // HV_30.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:5013: tatrāpāṃ prathamo bhāgaḥ sa saumyo rāśir ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:5014: garbhoṣmasaṃbhavo jñeyo dvitīyo rāśir ucyate // HV_30.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:5016: bhāvau rasānugāv etau vīryaṃ ca śaśipāvakau // HV_30.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:5017: kaphavarge bhavec chukraṃ pittavarge ca śoṇitam /
GE07hv_conpu:5018: kaphasya hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ nābhyāṃ pittaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // HV_30.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:5019: dehasya madhye hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ tu manasaḥ smṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:5020: nābhikaṇṭhāntarasthas tu tatra devo hutāśanaḥ // HV_30.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:5021: manaḥ prajāpatir jñeyaḥ kaphaḥ somo vibhāvyate /
GE07hv_conpu:5022: pittam agniḥ smṛtas tv evam agnīṣomamayaṃ jagat // HV_30.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:5024: vāyuḥ praveśanaṃ cakre saṃgataḥ paramātmanā // HV_30.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:5025: [k: After 46, K2-6 Ñ V B1.2 Dn Ds D1-4.5 (marg.) T G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5027: sa pañcadhā śarīrastho bhidyate vardhate punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5028: prāṇāpānau samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca // HV_30.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:5030: apānaḥ paścimaṃ kāyam udānordhvaṃ śarīriṇaḥ // HV_30.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:5033: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam /
GE07hv_conpu:5034: tasyendriyāṇi śiṣṭāni svaṃ svaṃ yogaṃ pracakrire // HV_30.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:5035: pārthivaṃ deham āhus tu prāṇātmānaṃ ca mārutam /
GE07hv_conpu:5037: jyotiś cakṣuṣi tejaś ca teṣāṃ yantṛ manaḥ smṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:5038: grāmyāś ca viṣayāś caiva yasya vīryāt pravartitāḥ // HV_30.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:5039: ity etān puruṣaḥ sarvān sṛjaṃl lokān sanātanān /
GE07hv_conpu:5040: naidhane 'smin kathaṃ loke naratvaṃ viṣṇur āgataḥ // HV_30.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:5041: eṣa me saṃśayo brahmann eṣa me vismayo mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:5042: kathaṃ gatir gatimatām āpanno mānuṣīṃ tanum // HV_30.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:5043: śruto me svasya vaṃśasya pūrvajānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5044: śrotum icchāmi viṣṇos tu vṛṣṇīnāṃ ca yathākramam // HV_30.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:5045: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇur devair daityaiś ca kathyate /
GE07hv_conpu:5046: viṣṇor utpattim āścaryaṃ mamācakṣva mahāmune // HV_30.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:5060: yathāśakti tu vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_31.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:5061: viṣṇoḥ prabhāvaśravaṇe diṣṭyā te matir utthitā /
GE07hv_conpu:5062: hanta viṣṇoḥ samastās tvaṃ śṛṇu divyāḥ pravṛttayaḥ // HV_31.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:5067: sahasraśatadhā bhūtvā pralayaṃ kārayet tu yaḥ | *HV_31.3*455:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5070: savanaṃ havanaṃ caiva havyaṃ hotāram eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5071: pātrāṇi ca pavitrāṇi vediṃ dīkṣāṃ caruṃ sruvam // HV_31.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:5073: adhvaryuṃ sāmagaṃ vipraṃ sadasyaṃ sadanaṃ savam // HV_31.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:5075: prāgvaṃśaṃ yajñabhūmiṃ ca hotāraṃ cayanaṃ ca yat // HV_31.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:5077: prāyaścittāni cārghyaṃ ca sthaṇḍilāni kuśāṃs tathā // HV_31.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5078: mantraṃ yajñavahaṃ vahniṃ bhāgaṃ bhāgavahaṃ ca yat /
GE07hv_conpu:5080: āhur vedavido viprā yaṃ yajñaṃ śāśvataṃ vibhum // HV_31.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:5085: bhūyaś caiva bhaviṣyantīty evam āha pitāmahaḥ // HV_31.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:5086: yat pṛcchasi mahārāja divyāṃ puṇyāṃ kathāṃ śubhām /
GE07hv_conpu:5091: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5092: vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ caritaṃ ca mahādyuteḥ // HV_31.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:5095: prādurbhāvāṃś ca vakṣyāmi puṇyān devaguṇair yutān // HV_31.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:5096: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T1.3.4 G4.5 K2 (after 13d) G3 (after *461) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5099: idaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam | *HV_31.13*458:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5100: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi viṣṇor divyāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu | *HV_31.13*458:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5101: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V B D(except D1.3) G4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5102: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata | *HV_31.13*459:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5104: tasya hy ekā mahārāja mūrtir bhavati sattama | *HV_31.13*459:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5105: nityaṃ diviṣṭhā yā rājaṃs tapaś carati duścaram | *HV_31.13*459:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5109: pūrṇe yugasahasre tu devadevo jagatpatiḥ // HV_31.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:5110: [k: K2.4, Ñ, V, B, Dn, Ds, D2-6, T1.3.4 K1.3(after 15) D1(after 15ab) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5112: brahmā ca kapilaś caiva parameṣṭhī tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5113: devāḥ saptarṣayaś caiva tryambakaś ca mahāyaśāḥ // HV_31.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:5115: vāyuḥ samudrāḥ śailāś ca tasya dehe samāśritāḥ | *HV_31.15*461 |
GE07hv_conpu:5116: sanatkumāraś ca mahānubhāvo manur mahātmā bhagavān prajākaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5121: hatau prabhavatā tena tayor dattvāmitaṃ varam // HV_31.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:5123: puṣkare yatra saṃbhūtā devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā // HV_31.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:5127: yatra viṣṇuḥ suraśreṣṭho vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ // HV_31.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:5133: ājyanāsaḥ sruvas tuṇḍaḥ sāmaghoṣasvano mahān // HV_31.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:5142: [k: All Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5153: sadyo jagāma nirvāṇaṃ medinī tasya dhāraṇāt | *HV_31.28*465:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5154: cakāra ca namaskāraṃ tasmai devāya vedhase | *HV_31.28*465:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:5156: sahasraśīrṣo devādiś cakāra jagatīṃ punaḥ // HV_31.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5158: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī sāgarāmbudharā purā // HV_31.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5159: vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃham ataḥ śṛṇu /
GE07hv_conpu:5160: yatra bhūtvā mṛgendreṇa hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ // HV_31.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5162: daityānām ādipuruṣaś cakāra tapa uttamam // HV_31.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:5163: daśa varśasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5166: brahmā prītamanās tasya tapasā niyamena ca // HV_31.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5167: taṃ vai svayaṃbhūr bhagavān svayam āgamya bhūpate /
GE07hv_conpu:5169: ādityair vasubhiḥ sādhyair marudbhir daivataiḥ saha /
GE07hv_conpu:5171: diśābhir vidiśābhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgarais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:5172: nakṣatraiś ca muhūrtaiś ca khecaraiś ca mahāgrahaiḥ // HV_31.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:5175: carācaraguruḥ śrīmān vṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ surais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:5176: brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_31.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:5178: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi // HV_31.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:5181: na mānuṣāḥ piśācā vā hanyur māṃ devasattama // HV_31.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:5182: ṛṣayo vā na māṃ śāpaiḥ kruddhā lokapitāmaha /
GE07hv_conpu:5183: śapeyus tapasā yuktā varam etaṃ vṛṇomy aham // HV_31.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:5184: na śastreṇa na cāstreṇa giriṇā pādapena vā /
GE07hv_conpu:5185: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa syān na cānyena me vadhaḥ // HV_31.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:5188: yo māṃ nāśayituṃ śaktaḥ sa me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati | *HV_31.43*466:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5190: nākāśe vā na bhūmau vā rātrau vā divase 'pi vā | *HV_31.43*467:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5191: nāntar vā na bahir vāpi syād vadho me pitāmaha | *HV_31.43*467:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5192: paśubhir vā mṛgendrair vā pakṣibhir vā sarīsṛpaiḥ | *HV_31.43*467:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5193: bhaveyam aham evārkaḥ somo vāyur hutāśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5194: salilaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa // HV_31.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:5195: ahaṃ krodhaś ca kāmaś ca varuṇo vāsavo yamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5196: dhanadaś ca dhanādhyakṣo yakṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣādhipaḥ // HV_31.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:5199: evam uktas tu daityena svayaṃbhur bhagavāṃs tadā | *HV_31.45*468:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5202: na divā na ca rātrau vā na me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati | *HV_31.45*469 |
GE07hv_conpu:5204: ete divyā varās tāta mayā dattās tavādbhutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5205: sarvān kāmān imāṃs tāta prāpsyasi tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // HV_31.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:5206: evam uktvā tu bhagavāñ jagāmākāśam eva ha /
GE07hv_conpu:5208: [k: K2-4 Ñ2.3 V B Dn D1.2.4-6 T3.4 Ds(after 48) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5209: śrutvā devā varaṃ taṃ ca dattaṃ salilayoninā | *HV_31.47*470:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5211: tato devāś ca nāgāś ca gandharvā munayas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:5215: tat prasīdasva bhagavan vadho 'sya pravicintyatām // HV_31.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:5217: sraṣṭā ca havyakavyānām avyaktaḥ prakṛtir dhruvaḥ // HV_31.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:5218: tato lokahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5219: provāca bhagavān vākyaṃ sarvān devagaṇāṃs tadā // HV_31.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:5220: avaśyaṃ tridaśās tena prāptavyaṃ tapasaḥ phalam /
GE07hv_conpu:5221: tapaso 'nte 'sya bhagavān vadhaṃ viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati // HV_31.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:5222: etac chrutvā surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ paṅkajajanmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5223: svāni sthānāni divyāni jagmus te vai mudā yutāḥ // HV_31.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:5224: labdhamātre vare cāpi sarvāḥ so 'bādhata prajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5227: satyadharmaratān dāntān purā dharṣitavāṃs tu saḥ // HV_31.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:5229: trailokyaṃ vaśam ānīya svarge vasati dānavaḥ // HV_31.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:5231: yajñiyān akarod daityān ayajñīyāś ca devatāḥ // HV_31.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:5232: ādityāś ca tataḥ sādhyā viśve 'tha vasavas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:5235: ṛṣināgāḥ suparṇāś ca ye cānye 'py evamādayaḥ | *HV_31.58*471:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5236: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ viṣṇum upatasthur mahābalam // HV_31.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:5239: nārāyaṇaṃ vibhuḥ devāḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇyaṃ gatāḥ // HV_31.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:5241: tvaṃ hi na paramo devas tvaṃ hi na paramo guruḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5242: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo dhātā brahmādīnāṃ surottama // HV_31.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:5244: kṣayāya ditivaṃśasya śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ bhavasva naḥ // HV_31.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:5246: bhayaṃ tyajadhvam amarā abhayaṃ vo dadāmy aham /
GE07hv_conpu:5247: tathaiva tridivaṃ devāḥ pratipadyata māciram // HV_31.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:5249: avadhyam amarendrāṇāṃ dānavendraṃ nihanmi tam // HV_31.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:5250: evam uktvā sa bhagavān visṛjya tridaśeśvarān /
GE07hv_conpu:5251: hiraṇyakaśipo rājann ājagāma hariḥ sabhām // HV_31.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:5255: nārasiṃhena vapuṣā pāṇiṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā // HV_31.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:5260: samutpatya nakhais tīkṣṇair vidārya nihato yudhi | *HV_31.66*473:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5262: dṛptair daityagaṇair guptaṃ hatavān ekapāṇinā // HV_31.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:5264: yatra vāmanam āśritya rūpaṃ daityavināśanam // HV_31.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:5265: baler balavato yajñe balinā viṣṇunā purā /
GE07hv_conpu:5266: vikramais tribhir akṣobhyāḥ kṣobhitās te mahāsurāḥ // HV_31.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:5267: vipracittiḥ śibiḥ śaṅkur ayaḥśaṅkus tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5269: vegavān ketumān ugraḥ sogravyagro mahāsuraḥ // HV_31.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:5270: puṣkaraḥ puṣkalaś caiva sāśvo 'śvapatir eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5273: [k: Bom. and Poona eds. ins. after 71a: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5276: śarabhaḥ śalabhaś caiva kupanaḥ kopanaḥ krathaḥ // HV_31.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:5279: vāyur gaviṣṭho namuciḥ śambaro vikṣaro mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:5280: candrahantā krodhahantā krodhavardhana eva ca // HV_31.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:5281: kālakaḥ kālakeyaś ca vṛtraḥ krodho virocanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5282: gariṣṭhaś ca variṣṭhaś ca pralambanarakāv ubhau // HV_31.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:5284: asilomā pulomā ca bāṣkalaḥ pramado madaḥ // HV_31.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:5285: khasṛmaḥ kālavadanaḥ karālaḥ keśir eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5286: ekākṣaś candrahā rāhuḥ saṃhrādaḥ sṛmaraḥ svanaḥ // HV_31.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:5295: bhīmā makaravaktrāś ca kroṣṭuvaktrāś ca dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5296: ākhudarduravaktrāś ca ghorā vṛkamukhās tathā // HV_31.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:5309: rūpaṃ kṛtvā mahābhīṃaṃ jahārāśu sa medinīm // HV_31.88 //
GE07hv_conpu:5311: nabhaḥ prakramamāṇasya nābhyāṃ kila samāsthitau // HV_31.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:5313: viṣṇor amitavīryasya vadanty evaṃ dvijātayaḥ // HV_31.90 //
GE07hv_conpu:5314: hṛtvā sa medinīṃ kṛtsnāṃ hatvā cāsurapuṃgavān /
GE07hv_conpu:5315: dadau śakrāya vasudhāṃ viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ // HV_31.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:5316: eṣa te vāmano nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5317: vedavidbhir dvijair etat kathyate vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_31.92 //
GE07hv_conpu:5319: dattātreya iti khyātaḥ kṣamayā parayā yutaḥ // HV_31.93 //
GE07hv_conpu:5320: tena naṣṭeṣu deveṣu prakriyāsu makheṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5321: cāturvarṇye ca saṃkīrṇe dharme śithilatāṃ gate // HV_31.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:5323: prajāsu śīryamāṇāsu dharme cākulatāṃ gate // HV_31.95 //
GE07hv_conpu:5324: sayajñāḥ sakriyā vedāḥ pratyānītā hi tena vai /
GE07hv_conpu:5325: cāturvarṇyam asaṃkīrṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā // HV_31.96 //
GE07hv_conpu:5327: varadena varo datto dattātreyeṇa dhīmatā // HV_31.97 //
GE07hv_conpu:5328: etad bāhudvayaṃ yat te tat te mama kṛte nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:5329: śatāni daśa bāhūnāṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_31.98 //
GE07hv_conpu:5332: eṣa te vaiṣṇavaḥ śrīmān prādurbhāvo 'dbhutaḥ śubhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5333: [k: Ñ2.3 V B D2 M3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5335: bhūyaś ca jāmadagnyo 'yaṃ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ // HV_31.100 //
GE07hv_conpu:5337: rāmo 'rjunam anīkasthaṃ jaghāna nṛpatiṃ prabhuḥ // HV_31.101 //
GE07hv_conpu:5339: dharṣayitvā yathākāmaṃ krośamānaṃ ca meghavat // HV_31.102 //
GE07hv_conpu:5341: paraśvadhena dīptena jñātibhiḥ sahitasya vai // HV_31.103 //
GE07hv_conpu:5343: triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī tena niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā // HV_31.104 //
GE07hv_conpu:5347: mārīcāya dadau prītaḥ kaśyapāya vasuṃdharām // HV_31.106 //
GE07hv_conpu:5348: vāruṇāṃs turagāñ śubhrān rathaṃ ca rathināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5349: hiraṇyam akṣayaṃ dhenūr gajendrāṃś ca mahāmatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5350: dadau tasmin mahāyajñe vājimedhe mahāyaśāḥ // HV_31.107 //
GE07hv_conpu:5352: caramāṇas tapo dīptaṃ jāmadagnyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5353: tiṣṭhate devavac chrīmān mahendre parvatottame // HV_31.108 //
GE07hv_conpu:5357: jāmadagnya iti khyātaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ // HV_31.109 //
GE07hv_conpu:5361: loke rāma iti khyātas tejasā bhāskaropamaḥ // HV_31.111 //
GE07hv_conpu:5363: dharmasya ca vivṛddhyarthaṃ jajñe tatra mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5364: tam apy āhur manuṣyendraṃ sarvabhūtapates tanum // HV_31.112 //
GE07hv_conpu:5366: vadhārthaṃ devaśatrūṇāṃ durdharāṇi surair api // HV_31.113 //
GE07hv_conpu:5368: mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca balena balināṃ varau /
GE07hv_conpu:5369: nihatau ca nirāśau ca kṛtau tena mahātmanā // HV_31.114 //
GE07hv_conpu:5371: bhagnaṃ māheśvaraṃ cāpaṃ krīḍatā līlayā purā // HV_31.115 //
GE07hv_conpu:5374: rūpiṇī yasya pārśvasthā sīteti prathitā janaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5376: caturdaśa vane taptvā tapo varṣāṇi rāghavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5377: janasthāne vasan kāryaṃ tridaśānāṃ cakāra saḥ // HV_31.118 //
GE07hv_conpu:5379: virādhaṃ ca kabandhaṃ ca rākṣasau bhīmavikramau /
GE07hv_conpu:5382: surendravajrāśanitulyasāraiḥ śaraiḥ śarīreṣu viyojitau balāt // HV_31.120 //
GE07hv_conpu:5384: vālī vinihataḥ saṃkhye sugrīvaś cābhiṣecitaḥ // HV_31.121 //
GE07hv_conpu:5386: yatrāvadhyaṃ rākṣasendraṃ rāvaṇaṃ yudhi durjayam // HV_31.122 //
GE07hv_conpu:5391: jaghāna sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ sasainyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:5394: [k: Ś1 K2 Ñ2 V3 Ds D2-5 G2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5396: rāvaṇaṃ nijaghānāśu rāmo bhūtapatiḥ purā // HV_31.126 //
GE07hv_conpu:5397: madhoś ca tanayo dṛpto lavaṇo nāma dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5399: samare yuddhaśauṇḍena tathānye cāpi rākṣasāḥ // HV_31.127 //
GE07hv_conpu:5400: etāni kṛtvā karmāṇi rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5403: na vittaharaṇaṃ cāsīd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.129 //
GE07hv_conpu:5404: paryadevan na vidhavā nānarthaś cābhavat tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:5405: sarvam āsīj jagaddāntaṃ rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.130 //
GE07hv_conpu:5407: na ca sma vṛddhā bālānāṃ pretakāryāṇi kurvate // HV_31.131 //
GE07hv_conpu:5408: brahma paryaccarat kṣatraṃ viśaḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5409: śūdrāś caiva hi varṇāṃs trīñ śuśrūṣanty anahaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_31.132 //
GE07hv_conpu:5410: nāryo nātyacaran bhartṝn bhāryāṃ nātyacarat patiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5411: sarvam āsīj jagaddāntaṃ nirdasyur abhavan mahī /
GE07hv_conpu:5412: rāma eko 'bhavad bhartā rāmaḥ pālayitābhavat // HV_31.133 //
GE07hv_conpu:5414: arogāḥ prāṇinaś cāsan rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.134 //
GE07hv_conpu:5415: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5416: pṛthivyāṃ sahavāso 'bhūd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.135 //
GE07hv_conpu:5418: rāmo rāmo rāma iti prajānām abhavat kathāḥ | *HV_31.135*478:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5420: gāthā apy atra gāyanti ye purāṇavido janāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5421: rāme nibaddhās tattvārthā māhātmyaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // HV_31.136 //
GE07hv_conpu:5425: ayodhyādhipatir bhūtvā rāmo rājyam akārayat // HV_31.138 //
GE07hv_conpu:5427: avyucchinno 'bhavad rāṣṭre dīyatāṃ bhujyatām iti // HV_31.139 //
GE07hv_conpu:5429: ati sūryaṃ ca candraṃ ca rāmo dāśarathir babhau // HV_31.140 //
GE07hv_conpu:5433: rāvaṇaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā divam ācakrame prabhuḥ // HV_31.142 //
GE07hv_conpu:5435: vikhyāto māthure kalpe sarvalokahitāya vai // HV_31.143 //
GE07hv_conpu:5436: yatra sālvaṃ ca kaṃsaṃ ca maindaṃ dvividam eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5437: ariṣṭaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ keśiṃ pūtanāṃ daityadārikām // HV_31.144 //
GE07hv_conpu:5439: daityān mānuṣadehasthān sūdayām āsa vīryavān // HV_31.145 //
GE07hv_conpu:5441: narakaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye yavanaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_31.146 //
GE07hv_conpu:5443: durācārāś ca nihatāḥ pārthivā ye mahītale // HV_31.147 //

GE07hv_conpu:5447: eko vedaś caturdhā tu kṛtas tena mahātmanā | *HV_31.147*479:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5448: janito bhārato vaṃśaḥ satyavatyāḥ sutena ca | *HV_31.147*479:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5450: [k: K2-4 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2 D4-6 T3.4 G1.5; T1 cont. after *148: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5451: atītāḥ kathitā rājan kathyante cāpy anāgatāḥ | *HV_31.148*480 |
GE07hv_conpu:5452: kalkī viṣṇuyaśā nāma bhūyaś cotpatsyate prabhuḥ // HV_31.148 //
GE07hv_conpu:5453: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.3.4 G3.5 ins. after 148c: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5456: [k: After 148, N(except Ś1 Ñ1) T3.4 G3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5458: kṣapayitvā ca tān sarvān bhāvinārthena coditān | *HV_31.148*482:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5460: tataḥ kāle vyatīte tu sāmātye sahasainike | *HV_31.148*482:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5461: nṛpeṣv atha pranaṣteṣu tadā tv apragrahāḥ prajāḥ || *HV_31.148*482:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:5462: kṣaṇena nirvṛte caiva hatvā cānyonyam āhave | *HV_31.148*482:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:5465: prajāḥ kṣayaṃ prayāsyanti sārdhaṃ kaliyugena ha | *HV_31.148*482:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:5466: kṣīṇe kaliyuge tasmiṃs tataḥ kṛtayugaṃ punaḥ | *HV_31.148*482:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:5468: [k: After line 1 of *482, Ñ2.3 V1.3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5471: niḥśeṣāñ śuddharājāṃs tāṃs tadā sa tu kariṣyati | *HV_31.148*482A:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5472: pāṣaṇḍān mlecchajātīṃś ca dasyūṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ | *HV_31.148*482A:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5473: nātyarthaṃ dhārmikā ye ca ye ca dharmadviṣaḥ kvacit | *HV_31.148*482A:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:5476: tathaiva dākṣiṇātyāṃś ca draviḍān siṃhalaiḥ saha | *HV_31.148*482A:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:5477: gāndhārān pāradāṃś caiva pahlavān yavanāñ śakān | *HV_31.148*482A:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:5478: tukhārān barbarāṃś caiva śvānikān daradān khaśān | *HV_31.148*482A:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:5479: lambakāṃś ca maruṃdhāṃś ca kirātāṃś caiva sa prabhuḥ | *HV_31.148*482A:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:5482: mānuṣaḥ sa tu saṃjajñe devasyāgrasya dhīmataḥ | *HV_31.148*482A:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:5483: pūrvajanmani viṣṇuḥ sa pramatir nāma vīryavān | *HV_31.148*482A:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:5485: ity etā vāsudevasya daśa saṃbhūtayaḥ smṛtāḥ | *HV_31.148*482A:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:5486: taṃ taṃ kālaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca taṃ tathoddeśakāriṇam | *HV_31.148*482A:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:5487: aṃśena triṣu lokeṣu tāṃs tān yonīn viśaty api | *HV_31.148*482A:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:5490: kṛtvā bījāvaśeṣāṃ tu mahīṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā | *HV_31.148*482A:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:5491: saṃyodhayitvā ca khalān prāyas tān apy adhārmikān | *HV_31.148*482A:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:5492: tad eṣa vai tadā kalkī caritārthaḥ sasainikaḥ | *HV_31.148*482A:24 |
GE07hv_conpu:5493: prajānāṃ sādhayitvā ca saṃsiddhārthaḥ punaḥ svayam | *HV_31.148*482A:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:5495: [k: After line 7 of *482 Ñ2 V1.3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5496: purāṇi hatvā grāmāṃś ca tadā duṣpragrahāḥ prajāḥ | *HV_31.148*482B:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5498: hvasvā alpāyuṣaś caiva bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge | *HV_31.148*482B:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5502: ete cānye ca bahavo divyā devaguṇair yutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5509: viṣṇor amitavīryasya yaḥ śṛṇoti kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_31.152 //
GE07hv_conpu:5513: nāśubhaṃ vidyate tasya putravān dyutimān bhavet | *HV_31.152*484 |
GE07hv_conpu:5514: etās tu yogeśvarayogamāyāḥ śrutvā naro mucyati sarvapāpaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5515: ṛddhiṃ samṛddhiṃ vipulāṃś ca bhogān prāpnoti śīghraṃ bhagavatprasādāt // HV_31.153 //
GE07hv_conpu:5523: viśvatvaṃ śṛṇu me viṣṇor haritvaṃ ca kṛte yuge /
GE07hv_conpu:5524: vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ ca deveṣu kṛṣṇatvaṃ mānuṣeṣu ca // HV_32.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:5525: īśvarasya hi tasyemāṃ karmaṇāṃ gahanāṃ gatim /
GE07hv_conpu:5526: saṃpratyatītāṃ bhāvyāṃ ca śṛṇu rājan yathātatham // HV_32.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:5527: avyakto vyaktaliṅgastho ya eṣa bhagavān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5528: nārāyaṇo hy anantātmā prabhavo 'vyaya eva ca // HV_32.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:5529: eṣa nārāyaṇo bhūtvā harir āsīt sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5530: brahmā śakraś ca somaś ca dharmaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ // HV_32.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:5532: eṣa viṣṇur iti khyāta indrād avarajo 'bhavat // HV_32.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:5533: prasādajaṃ hy asya vibhor adityāṃ putrajanma tat /
GE07hv_conpu:5535: pradhānātmā purā hy eṣa brahmāṇam asṛjat prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5537: te tanvānās tanūs tatra brahmavaṃśān anuttamān /
GE07hv_conpu:5538: tebhyo 'bhavan mahātmabhyo bahudhā brahma śāśvatam // HV_32.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5540: kīrtitaṃ kīrtanīyasya kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me // HV_32.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:5541: vṛtte vṛtravadhe tāta vartamāne kṛte yuge /
GE07hv_conpu:5543: tatra sma dānavā ghorāḥ sarve saṃgrāmadarpitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5546: trātāraṃ manasā jagmur devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // HV_32.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:5552: rarāsa ghorair utpātair dahyamānam ivāmbaram // HV_32.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:5554: nyubjāni ca vimānāni prapatanty utpatanti ca // HV_32.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:5557: tamasā niṣprabhaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃcana /
GE07hv_conpu:5558: timiraughaparikṣiptā na rejuś ca diṣo daśa // HV_32.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:5560: dyaur na bhāty abhibhūtārkā ghoreṇa tamasā vṛtā // HV_32.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:5561: tān ghanaughān satimirān dorbhyāṃ vikṣipya sa prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5562: vapuḥ saṃdarśayām āsa divyaṃ kṛṣṇavapur hariḥ // HV_32.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:5564: tejasā vapuṣā caiva kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇam ivācalam // HV_32.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:5578: dadṛśus te sthitaṃ devaṃ divyalokamaye rathe // HV_32.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:5580: jayaśabdaṃ puraskṛtya śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // HV_32.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5582: tuṣṭuvuś ca jagannāthaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim | *HV_32.29*485:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5583: jaya deva jagannātha jaya deva janārdana | *HV_32.29*485:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5584: jaya deva prabho viṣṇo jaya śaṅkhagadādhara | *HV_32.29*485:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5585: namas tubhyaṃ hṛṣīkeśa namo deva janārdana | *HV_32.29*485:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5587: namas tubhyaṃ prabho viṣṇo bhūtādipataye namaḥ | *HV_32.29*485:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:5588: nama ādyāya bījāya puruṣāya namo namaḥ | *HV_32.29*485:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:5589: namo 'stu te jagannātha namo bhūyo mahātmane | *HV_32.29*485:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:5592: sa teṣāṃ tāṃ giraṃ śrutvā viṣṇur dayitadaivataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5593: manaś cakre vināśāya dānavānāṃ mahāmṛdhe // HV_32.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5594: ākāśe tu sthito viṣṇur uttamaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5595: uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ sapratijñam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_32.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5596: śāntiṃ vrajata bhadraṃ vo mā bhaiṣṭa marutāṃ gaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5597: jitā me dānavāḥ sarve trailokyaṃ pratigṛhyatām // HV_32.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:5598: te tasya satyasaṃdhasya viṣṇor vākyena toṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5599: devāḥ prītiṃ parāṃ jagmuḥ prāpyevāmṛtam uttamam // HV_32.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:5600: tatas tamaḥ saṃhriyate vineśuś ca balāhakāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5601: pravavuś ca śivā vātāḥ prasannāś ca diśo daśa // HV_32.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5602: suprabhāṇi ca jyotiṃṣi candraṃ cakruḥ pradakṣiṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:5603: dīptimanti ca tejāṃsi cakrur arkaṃ pradakṣiṇam // HV_32.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:5604: na vigrahaṃ grahāś cakruḥ praseduś cāpi sindhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5605: virajaskā babhur mārgā nākamārgādayas trayaḥ // HV_32.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:5609: yajñeṣu ca haviḥ svādu śivam āpa ca pāvakaḥ // HV_32.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:5620: giraṃ te dānavān ugrān menire nihatān yudhi | *HV_32.39*489 |
GE07hv_conpu:5629: udyogaṃ vipulaṃ cakrur yuddhāya yudhi durjayāḥ // HV_33.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:5633: racitaṃ ratnajālaiś ca hemajālaiś ca śobhitam // HV_33.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:5643: atiṣṭhat samarākāṅkṣī meruṃ dīpta ivāṃśumān // HV_33.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5644: tāras tu kroṣavistāram āyasaṃ vāhayan ratham /
GE07hv_conpu:5649: āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ pūrṇaṃ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_33.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:5650: prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca vitatair avasaktaiś ca mudgaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5651: śobhitaṃ trāsanīyaiś ca tomaraiḥ saparaśvadhaiḥ // HV_33.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:5652: udyataṃ dviṣatāṃ hetor dvitīyam iva mandaram /
GE07hv_conpu:5655: pramukhe tasya sainyasya dīptaśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // HV_33.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:5659: varāhaḥ pramukhe tasthau sāvaroha ivācalaḥ // HV_33.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:5660: kṣaras tu vikṣaran darpān netrābhyāṃ roṣajaṃ jalam /
GE07hv_conpu:5662: tvaṣṭā tv aṣṭādaśahayaṃ yānam āsthāya dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5663: vyūhito dānavair vyūhaiḥ paricakrāma vīryavān // HV_33.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:5668: kiśoras tv atisaṃharṣāt kiśora iva coditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5669: abhavad daityasainyasya madhye ravir ivoditaḥ // HV_33.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:5675: hasaṃs tiṣṭhati daityānāṃ pramukhe sumukho grahaḥ // HV_33.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:5680: pattinas tv apare daityā bhīṣaṇā vikṛtānanāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5681: ekapādā dvipādāś ca nanṛtur yuddhakaṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_33.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:5685: bāhubhiḥ parighākārais tarjayanti sma dānavāḥ // HV_33.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:5686: prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca tomarāṅkuśapaṭṭisaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5687: cikrīḍus te śataghnībhiḥ śitadhāraiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_33.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5688: gaṇḍaśailaiś ca śailaiś ca parighaiś cottamāyudhaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5689: cakraiś ca daityapravarāś cakrur ānanditaṃ balam // HV_33.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5692: evaṃ tad dānavaṃ sainyaṃ sarvaṃ yuddhamadotkaṭam /
GE07hv_conpu:5693: devān abhimukhaṃ tasthau meghānīkam ivoddhatam // HV_33.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5703: śrutas te daityasainyasya vistaras tāta vigrahe /
GE07hv_conpu:5704: surāṇāṃ sarvasainyasya vistaraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śṛṇu // HV_34.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:5705: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahābalau /
GE07hv_conpu:5706: sabalāḥ sānugāś caiva saṃnahyanta yathākramam // HV_34.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:5712: dīptimadbhiḥ sadasyaiś ca brahmarṣibhir abhiṣṭutaḥ // HV_34.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:5714: gupto balāhakagaṇaiḥ parvatair iva kāmagaiḥ // HV_34.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:5715: yam ārūḍhaḥ sa bhagavān paryeti maghavān gajam /
GE07hv_conpu:5716: havir dhāneṣu gāyanti viprā makhamukhe sthitāḥ // HV_34.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:5718: indraṃ samupanṛtyanti śataśo hy apsarogaṇāḥ // HV_34.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5721: sa syandanavaro bhāti yukto mātalinā tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:5722: kṛtsnaḥ parivṛto merur bhāskarasyeva tejasā // HV_34.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:5723: yamas tu daṇḍam udyamya kālayuktaṃ ca mudgaram /
GE07hv_conpu:5724: tasthau suragaṇānīke daityān nādena bhīṣayan // HV_34.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:5725: caturbhiḥ sāgarair gupto lelihadbhiś ca pannagaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5738: [k: N (except Ś1) T1.3.4 G1.4 (G2 after 14ab) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5740: yuktaś ca śaṅkhapadmābhyāṃ nidhīnām adhipaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5744: prekṣamāṇaḥ śivasakhaḥ sākṣād iva śivaḥ svayam // HV_34.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:5746: kṣaumavāsāḥ śivaḥ sākṣāc chivarūpaḥ svayaṃ svayam | *HV_34.17*495 |
GE07hv_conpu:5747: pūrvaṃ pakṣaṃ sahasrākṣaḥ pitṛrājas tu dakṣiṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:5748: varuṇaḥ paścimaṃ pakṣam uttaraṃ naravāhanaḥ // HV_34.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:5750: svāṃ svāṃ diśaṃ rarakṣus te tasya devabalasya ha // HV_34.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:5752: śriyā jājvalyamānena dīpyamānaiś ca raśmibhiḥ // HV_34.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:5756: cacāra madhye devānāṃ dvādaśātmā dineśvaraḥ // HV_34.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:5761: jyotiṣām īraṇaṃ vyomni rasānāṃ rasanaṃ prabhum /
GE07hv_conpu:5762: oṣadhīnāṃ paritrāṇaṃ nidhānam amṛtasya ca // HV_34.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:5763: jagataḥ prathamaṃ bhāgaṃ saumyaṃ śaityamayaṃ rasam /
GE07hv_conpu:5764: dadṛśur dānavāḥ somaṃ himapraharaṇaṃ sthitam // HV_34.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:5765: yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pañcadhā bhidyate nṛṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:5766: saptaskandhagato lokāṃs trīn dadhāra cacāra ca // HV_34.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:5767: yam āhur agner yantāraṃ sarvaprabhavam īśvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:5768: saptasvaragatā yasya yonir gībhir udīryate // HV_34.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:5769: yaṃ vadanty uttamaṃ bhūtaṃ yaṃ vadanty aśarīriṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:5770: yam āhur ākāśagamaṃ śīghragaṃ śabdayoninam // HV_34.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5771: sa vāyuḥ sarvabhūtāyur uddhataḥ svena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:5772: pravavau vyathayan daityān pratilomaḥ satoyadaḥ // HV_34.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5774: cikrīḍur asibhiḥ śubhrair nirmuktair iva pannagaiḥ // HV_34.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5776: yakṣaiś ca sumahābhogaiḥ pannagair garuḍair api | *HV_34.31*496 |
GE07hv_conpu:5778: śarabhūtāḥ surendrāṇāṃ cerur vyāttamukhā divi // HV_34.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:5779: parvatās tu śilāśṛṅgaiḥ śataśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5780: upatasthuḥ suragaṇān prahartuṃ dānavaṃ balam // HV_34.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:5781: yaḥ sa devo hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmanābhas trivikramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5782: kṛṣṇavartmā yugāntābho viśvasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_34.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5789: saparīveṣam udyantaṃ savitur maṇḍalaṃ yathā // HV_34.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:5791: kareṇa kālīṃ vapuṣā śatrukālapradāṃ gadām // HV_34.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:5802: [k: K1 Ñ2.3 V1 Ds2 D3-5 (K3 D2 after 41) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5813: suparṇaḥ svena vapuṣā suparṇaṃ khecarottamam // HV_34.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:5816: tam anvayur devagaṇā munayaś ca samāhitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5817: gīrbhiḥ paramamantrābhis tuṣṭuvuś ca gadādharam // HV_34.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:5819: namas te 'stu hṛṣīkeśa jahi daityabalaṃ vibho | *HV_34.47*501:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5824: yaṃ ca jñānamayaṃ tejaḥ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ | *HV_34.47*501:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:5825: taṃ natāḥ sma jagannāthaṃ jahi daityagaṇān hare | *HV_34.47*501:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:5826: tvāṃ stotuṃ hi vayaṃ deva śaktā varṣaśatair api | *HV_34.47*501:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:5827: na hi deva jagannātha jayasva puruṣottama | *HV_34.47*501:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:5828: itīritāṃ giriṃ śrutvā gantum abhyudyato hariḥ | *HV_34.47*501:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:5835: viṣṇor jiṣṇoḥ sahiṣṇoś ca bhrājiṣṇos tejasā vṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:5837: svasty astu devebhya iti stuvaṃs tatrāṅgirābravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:5839: svasty astv iti stuvaṃs tatra devān āṅgiraso 'bravīt | *HV_34.51*503 |
GE07hv_conpu:5840: svasty astu daityebhya iti uśanā vākyam abravīt // HV_34.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:5842: svasti daityebhya iti cāpy uśanā vākyam ādade | *HV_34.51*504 |
GE07hv_conpu:5850: tābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ saṃjajñe tumulo vigrahas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:5852: [k: After the ref., K1.3 Ñ2 V3 Dn Ds2 D2-6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5853: sarvadevamayo yas tu sarvadharmamayas tu yaḥ | *HV_35.0*505:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:5854: tasya viṣṇoḥ sureśasya tejasā vidhṛtāḥ surāḥ | *HV_35.0*505:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5855: sabalāḥ sānugāś caiva tridaśāś ca madotkaṭāḥ | *HV_35.0*505:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5856: prahartuṃ dānavaṃ sainyaṃ tarasā hi samabhyayuḥ | *HV_35.0*505:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5858: samīyur yudhyamānā vai parvatā iva parvataiḥ // HV_35.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:5861: tato rathaiḥ prajvalitair vāhanaiś ca pracoditaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5862: utpatadbhiś ca gaganaṃ sāsihastaiḥ samantataḥ // HV_35.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:5863: kṣipyamāṇaiś ca musalaiḥ saṃpreṣyadbhiś ca sāyakaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5864: cāpair visphāryamāṇaiś ca pātyamānaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_35.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:5868: dānavāḥ samare jaghnur devān indrapurogamān // HV_35.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:5870: viṣaṇṇamanaso devā jagmur ārtiṃ mahāmṛdhe // HV_35.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5872: bhinnoraskā ditisutair vemū raktaṃ vraṇair bahu // HV_35.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:5873: saṃditāḥ pāśajālaiś ca niryatnāś ca śaraiḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5874: praviṣṭā dānavīṃ māyāṃ na śekus te viceṣṭitum // HV_35.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:5876: balaṃ surāṇām asurair niṣprayatnāyudhaṃ kṛtam // HV_35.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:5877: māyāpāśānvikarṣaṃś ca chindan vajreṇa tāñ śarān /
GE07hv_conpu:5878: śakro daityabalaṃ ghoraṃ viveśa bahulocanaḥ // HV_35.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:5879: sa daityān pramukhe hatvā taddānavabalaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:5881: te 'nyonyaṃ nāvabudhyanta devān vā vāhanāni vā /
GE07hv_conpu:5886: petus te dānavagaṇāś chinnapakṣā ivācalāḥ // HV_35.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:5891: sā dadāha tamaḥ sarvaṃ māyā mayavikalpitā /
GE07hv_conpu:5892: daityāś cādityavapuṣaḥ sadya uttasthur āhave // HV_35.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:5896: śaśaṃsur vajriṇe devāḥ saṃtaptāḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ // HV_35.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:5897: saṃtapte māyayā sainye dahyamāne ca dānavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5898: codito devarājena varuṇo vākyam abravīt // HV_35.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:5899: purā brahmarṣijaḥ śakra tapas tepe sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:5900: aurvaḥ pūrvaṃ sa tejasvī sadṛśo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ // HV_35.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:5901: taṃ tapantam ivādityaṃ tapasā jagad avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:5902: upatasthur munigaṇā devā devarṣibhiḥ saha // HV_35.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:5904: ṛṣiṃ vijñāpayām āsa purā paramatejasam // HV_35.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:5906: ṛṣivaṃśeṣu bhagavañś chinnamūlam idaṃ kulam // HV_35.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:5907: ekas tvam anapatyaś ca gotrāpatyaṃ na vartate /
GE07hv_conpu:5908: kaumāraṃ vratam āsthāya kleśam evānuvartase // HV_35.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:5910: ekadehāni tiṣṭhanti viviktāni vinā prajāḥ // HV_35.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:5912: bhavāṃs tu tapasā śreṣṭhaḥ prajāpatisamadyutiḥ // HV_35.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5914: ādadhat svorjitaṃ tejo dvitīyāṃ kuru vai tanum // HV_35.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5915: sa evam ukto munibhir munir manasi tāḍitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5916: jagarhe tān ṛṣigaṇān vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_35.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5917: yathāyaṃ śāśvato dharmo munīnāṃ vihitaḥ purā /
GE07hv_conpu:5918: ārṣaṃ vai sevatāṃ karma vanyamūlaphalāśinaḥ // HV_35.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:5920: brahmacaryaṃ sucaritaṃ brahmāṇam api cālayet // HV_35.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:5922: asmākaṃ tu vanaṃ vṛttir vanyāśramanivāsinām // HV_35.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5924: aśmakuṭṭā daśatapāḥ pañcasaptatapāś ca ye // HV_35.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:5925: ete tapasi tiṣṭhanto vratair api suduṣcaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5926: brahmacaryaṃ puraskṛtya prārthayanti parāṃ gatim // HV_35.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:5928: evam āhuḥ pare loke brahmacaryavido janāḥ // HV_35.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:5929: brahmacarye sthitaṃ dhairyaṃ brahmacarye sthitaṃ tapaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5930: ye sthitā brahmacaryeṇa brāhmaṇā divi te sthitāḥ // HV_35.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:5931: nāsti yogaṃ vinā siddhir nāsti siddhiṃ vinā yaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5932: nāsti loke yaśomūlaṃ brahmacaryāt paraṃ tapaḥ // HV_35.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:5934: brahmacaryaṃ samādhatte kim ataḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // HV_35.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:5936: brahmacaryaṃ ca caryā ca trayaṃ syād dambhasaṃjñitam // HV_35.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:5937: kva dārāḥ kva ca saṃyogaḥ kva ca bhāvaviparyayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5938: yad iyaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā manasā mānasī prajā // HV_35.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:5939: yady asti tapaso vīryaṃ yuṣmākam amitātmanām /
GE07hv_conpu:5942: smaraṇaṃ sundarīṇāṃ ca manaso vikṛtiḥ purā | *HV_35.43*506:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5943: tasyām utpattim āsādya tasyāṃ bījaṃ ka āvehat | *HV_35.43*506:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:5944: pāpātmā vikalo mūḍho bhavādṛśa iti śrutiḥ | *HV_35.43*506:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:5945: smṛtvā brahmapadāt khinno dṛṣṭvā śukraṃ pramuñcati | *HV_35.43*506:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:5946: sṛṣṭvā vidrāvayaty ātmā tasyāṃ bījaṃ ka āvahet | *HV_35.43*506:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:5947: brahmacarye yadā bhūte bhaved yadi viniścayaḥ | *HV_35.43*506:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:5952: sṛjadhvaṃ mānasān putrān prājāpatyena karmaṇā // HV_35.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:5954: na dārayogaṃ bījaṃ vā vratamuktaṃ tapasvinām // HV_35.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:5955: yad idaṃ luptadharmārthaṃ yuṣmābhir iha nirbhayaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5956: vyāhṛtaṃ sadbhir atyartham asadbhir iva me matam // HV_35.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:5958: dārayogaṃ vinā srakṣye putram ātmatanūruham // HV_35.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:5959: evam ātmānam ātmā me dvitīyaṃ janayiṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:5960: vanyenānena vidhinā didhakṣantam iva prajāḥ // HV_35.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:5966: didhakṣann iva lokāṃs trīñ jajñe paramakopanaḥ // HV_35.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:5968: kṣudhā me bādhate tāta jagad dhakṣye tyajasva mām // HV_35.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:5971: etasminn anantare brahmā munim ūrvaṃ sabhājayan /
GE07hv_conpu:5972: [k: After 53a, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.3.4 G3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5974: ājagāma munir yatra vyasṛjat putram uttamam | *HV_35.53a*507:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:5978: putredaṃ dhāryatāṃ tejo lokānāṃ kriyatāṃ dayā // HV_35.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:5979: asyāpatyasya te vipra kariṣye sāhyam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:5981: tathyam etan mama vacaḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara // HV_35.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:5983: bhojanaṃ cāsya dāsyāmi yena prīto bhaviṣyati | *HV_35.54*508 |
GE07hv_conpu:5985: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yan me 'dya bhagavāñ śiśoḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5986: matim etāṃ dadātīha paramānugrahāya vai // HV_35.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:5988: bhagavaṃs tarpitaḥ putraḥ kair havyaiḥ prāpsyate sukham // HV_35.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:5989: kutra vāsya nivāsaḥ syād bhojanaṃ ca kimātmakam /
GE07hv_conpu:5990: vidhāsyati bhavān asya vīryatulyaṃ mahaujasaḥ // HV_35.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:5993: mama yonir jalaṃ vipra tac ca me toyapaṃ mukham // HV_35.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:5994: tatrāham āse nirataḥ piban vārimayaṃ havaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5995: taddhavis tava putrasya visṛjāmy ālayaṃ ca tat // HV_35.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:5996: tato yugānte bhūtānām eṣa cāhaṃ ca suvrata /
