GE07hv_conpu:6000: evam astv iti so 'py agniḥ saṃvṛtajvālamaṇḍalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6002: pratiyātas tato brahmā te ca sarve maharṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6003: aurvasyāgneḥ prabhāvajñāḥ svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritāḥ // HV_35.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:6005: aurvaṃ praṇatasarvāṅgo vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // HV_35.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:6007: tapasā te muniśreṣṭha parituṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ // HV_35.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:6008: ahaṃ tu tava putrasya tava caiva mahāvrata /
GE07hv_conpu:6009: bhṛtya ity avagantavyaḥ ślāghyo 'smi yadi karmaṇā // HV_35.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:6010: taṃ mā paśya samāpannaṃ tavaivārādhane ratam /
GE07hv_conpu:6011: yat sīdeyaṃ muniśreṣṭha tavaiva syātparājayaḥ // HV_35.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:6013: śiṣyo 'smi te tapaḥśreṣṭha surebhyo me bhayaṃ nuda | *HV_35.67*509 |
GE07hv_conpu:6015: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya te 'haṃ gurur mataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6016: nāsti te tapasānena bhayam adyeha suvrata // HV_35.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:6017: imāṃ ca māyāṃ gṛhṇīṣva mama putreṇa nirmitām /
GE07hv_conpu:6018: nirindhanām agnimayīṃ duḥsparśāṃ pāvakair api // HV_35.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:6020: rakṣiṣyaty ātmapakṣaṃ ca parāṃś ca pradahiṣyati // HV_35.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:6021: evam astv iti tāṃ gṛhya praṇamya munipuṃgavam /
GE07hv_conpu:6022: jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtārtho dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_35.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:6023: saiṣā durviṣahā māyā devair api durāsadā /
GE07hv_conpu:6025: tasmiṃs tu vyutthite daitye nirvīyaiṣā na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6026: śāpo hy asyāḥ purā dattaḥ sṛṣṭā yenaiva tejasā // HV_35.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:6027: yady eṣā pratihantavyā kartavyo bhagavān sukhī /
GE07hv_conpu:6028: dīyatāṃ me sakhā śakra toyayonir niśākaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6030: tenāhaṃ saha saṃgamya yādobhiś ca samāhitaḥ | *HV_35.74*510 |
GE07hv_conpu:6031: māyām etāṃ haniṣyāmi tvatprasādān na saṃśayaḥ // HV_35.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:6039: evam astv iti saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śakras tridaśavardhanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6041: gaccha soma sahāyatvaṃ kuru pāśadharasya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:6042: asurāṇāṃ vināśāya jayārthaṃ ca divaukasām // HV_36.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6044: tvanmayaṃ sarvalokānāṃ rasaṃ rasavido viduḥ // HV_36.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6045: kṣayavṛddhis tava vyaktā sāgare khe ca maṇḍale /
GE07hv_conpu:6046: parivartasy ahorātraṃ kālaṃ jagati yojayan // HV_36.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6048: na viduḥ soma devāś ca ye ca nakṣatrayoginaḥ // HV_36.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6049: tvam ādityapathād ūrdhvaṃ jyotiṣāṃ copari sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6050: tamaḥ protsārya vapuṣā bhāsayasy akhilaṃ jagat // HV_36.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6055: tvaṃ kāntiḥ kāntavapuṣāṃ tvaṃ somaḥ somavṛttinām /
GE07hv_conpu:6056: saumyas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ timiraghnas tvam ṛkṣarāṭ // HV_36.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6057: tad gaccha tvaṃ sahānena varuṇena varūthinā /
GE07hv_conpu:6058: śamayasvāsurīṃ māyāṃ yayā dahyāma saṃyuge // HV_36.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6060: yan mā vadasi yuddhārthe devarāja varaprada /
GE07hv_conpu:6063: vimāyān vimadāṃś caiva daityasaṃghān mahāhave // HV_36.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6065: veṣṭayanti sma tān ghorān daityān meghagaṇā iva // HV_36.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6067: jaghnatur himapātaiś ca pāśapātaiś ca dānavān // HV_36.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6069: mṛdhe ceratur ambhobhiḥ kṣubdhāv iva mahārṇavau // HV_36.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6070: tābhyām āplāvitaṃ sainyaṃ tad dānavam adṛśyata /
GE07hv_conpu:6073: tāṃ māyāṃ śamayām āstāṃ devau daiteyanirmitām // HV_36.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6075: na śekuś calituṃ daityā viśiraskā ivādrayaḥ // HV_36.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6076: śītāṃśunihatās te tu petur daityā himārditāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6078: teṣāṃ tu divi daityānāṃ viparītaprabhāṇi ha /
GE07hv_conpu:6079: vimānāni vicitrāṇi prapatanty utpatanti ca // HV_36.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6081: mayo dadarśa māyāvī dānavān divi dānavaḥ // HV_36.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6086: nirmitāṃ svena putreṇa krauñcena divi kāmagām /
GE07hv_conpu:6087: prathitāṃ pārvatīṃ māyāṃ sasṛje sa samantataḥ // HV_36.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6089: nijaghne devasaṃghāṃs tān dānavāṃś cāpy ajīvayat // HV_36.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6093: abhavad dyaur asaṃhāryā pṛthivī parvatair iva // HV_36.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6098: sa hi yuddhagataḥ śrīmān īśo na sma vyakampata /
GE07hv_conpu:6099: sahiṣṇutvāj jagatsvāmī na cukrodha gadādharaḥ // HV_36.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6103: [k: N (except Ś1 K1 Ñ1) S (except M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6106: coditau viṣṇuvākyena tau māyām apakarṣatām // HV_36.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6108: dagdhā sā pārvatī māyā bhasmabhūtā nanāśa ha // HV_36.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:6110: daityasenāṃ dadahatur yugānteṣv iva mūrcchitau // HV_36.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:6111: vāyuḥ pradhāvitas tatra paścād agniś ca mārutāt /
GE07hv_conpu:6118: saṃprahṛṣṭeṣu deveṣu sādhu sādhv iti sarvaśaḥ // HV_36.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:6120: dikṣu sarvāsu śuddhāsu pravṛtte dharmasaṃstare // HV_36.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:6124: virājamānā devās tu tato munigaṇaiḥ saha | *HV_36.40*512 |
GE07hv_conpu:6126: yajñaśobhiṣu deveṣu svargārthaṃ darśayatsu ca // HV_36.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:6128: bhāve tapasi śuddhānām abhāve pāpakarmaṇām // HV_36.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:6132: svadharmastheṣu varṇeṣu loke 'sminn āśrameṣu ca // HV_36.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:6134: [k: N (except Ś1) T2.4 G1.3-5 M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6136: praśāntakalmaṣe loke śānte tamasi dāruṇe // HV_36.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:6138: tanmayā vimalā lokās tābhyāṃ jayakṛtakriyāḥ // HV_36.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6140: kālanemir iti khyāto dānavaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_36.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6145: kakṣe mahati saṃvṛddho nidāgha iva pāvakaḥ // HV_36.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:6148: bāhubhis tulayan vyoma kṣipan padbhyāṃ mahīdharān /
GE07hv_conpu:6151: didhakṣantam ivāyāntaṃ sarvān devagaṇān mṛdhe // HV_36.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:6153: saṃvartakāle tṛṣitaṃ dṛptaṃ mṛtyum ivotthitam // HV_36.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:6157: dānavān devanihatān uttiṣṭhata iti bruvan // HV_36.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:6159: vīkṣanti sma surāḥ sarve bhayavitrastalocanāḥ // HV_36.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:6160: taṃ sma vīkṣanti bhūtāni kramantaṃ kālaneminam /
GE07hv_conpu:6165: kālanemir babhau daityaḥ saviṣṇur iva mandaraḥ // HV_36.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:6167: dṛṣṭvā kālam ivāyāntaṃ kālanemiṃ bhayāvaham // HV_36.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:6175: dānavānāṃ tu piprīṣuḥ kālanemiḥ sa dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6176: vyavardhata mahātejās tapānte jalado yathā // HV_37.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:6183: mantram abhyasyataṃ teṣāṃ vyūhaṃ ca paridhāvatām /
GE07hv_conpu:6184: prekṣatāṃ cābhavat prītir dānavaṃ kālaneminam // HV_37.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6185: ye tu tatra mayasyāsan mukhyā yuddhapuraḥsarāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6186: te'pi sarve bhayaṃ tyaktvā hṛṣṭā yoddhum upasthitāḥ // HV_37.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6187: mayas tāro varāhaś ca hayagrīvaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:6188: vipracittisutaḥ śvetaḥ kharalambāv ubhāv api // HV_37.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6189: ariṣṭo baliputraś ca kiśorāṣṭrau tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6192: dānavāḥ kṛtino jagmuḥ kālaneminam uttamam // HV_37.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:6193: te gadābhiś ca gurvībhiś cakraiś ca saparaśvaghaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6194: kālakalpaiś ca musalaiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_37.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6196: paṭṭisair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca parighaiś cottamāyasaiḥ // HV_37.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6197: ghātanībhiś ca gurvībhiḥ śataghnībhis tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6198: yugair yantraiś ca nirmuktair argalaiś cāgratāḍitaiḥ // HV_37.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6201: dorbhiś cāyatapīnābhiḥ prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca mudgaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6202: sarpair lelihyamānaiś ca visarpadbhiś ca sāyakaiḥ // HV_37.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6203: vajraiḥ praharaṇīyaiś ca dīpyadbhiś cāpi tomaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6204: vikośaiś cāsibhis tīkṣṇaiḥ śūlaiś ca śitanirmalaiḥ // HV_37.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6217: tayoś camvos tadānīṃ tu babhūva sa samāgamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6218: dvāvāpṛthivyoḥ saṃyogo yathā syād yugaparyaye // HV_37.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6221: niścakramur balābhyāṃ tu tābhyāṃ bhīmāḥ surāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6223: tābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ saṃhṛṣṭāś cerus te devadānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6224: vanābhyāṃ pārvatīyābhyāṃ puṣpitābhyāṃ yathā gajāḥ // HV_37.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6225: samājaghnus tato bherīḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca naikaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6226: sa dyāṃ divaṃ bhuvaṃ caiva diśaś ca samapūrayat // HV_37.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6228: duṃdubhīnāṃ ca ninadā daityam antardadhuḥ svanam // HV_37.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6230: babhañjur bāhubhir bāhūn dvaṃdvam anye yuyutsavaḥ // HV_37.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6231: devatās tv aśanīr ghorāḥ parighāṃś cottamāyasān /
GE07hv_conpu:6232: sasarjur ājau nistriṃśān gadā gurvīś ca dānavāḥ // HV_37.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6234: paripetur bhṛśaṃ kecin nyubjāḥ kecic ca jajñire // HV_37.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6236: samīyus te susaṃrabdhā roṣād anyonyam āhave // HV_37.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6238: rathā rathair nirudhyante padātāś ca padātibhiḥ // HV_37.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6239: teṣāṃ rathānāṃ tumulaḥ sa śabdaḥ śabdavāhinām /
GE07hv_conpu:6240: nabhaḥ svasvāna hi yathā nabhasye jaladasvanaiḥ // HV_37.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6243: babhañjire rathān kecit kecit saṃmṛditā rathaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6244: saṃbādham eke saṃprāpya na śekuś calituṃ rathāḥ // HV_37.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6245: anyonyam anye samare dorbhyām utkṣipya darpitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6247: astrair anye vinirbhinnā raktaṃ vemur hatā yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:6253: etasminn antare kruddhaḥ kālanemiḥ sa dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6259: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca gagane vavṛdhus tasya bāhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6262: divyam ākāśam āvavre parvatair ucchritair iva // HV_37.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:6268: na śekuś calituṃ devāḥ kālanemihatā yudhi // HV_37.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:6269: muṣṭibhir nihatāḥ kecit kecid dhi vidalīkṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6272: na śekur yatnavanto 'pi yatnaṃ kartuṃ vicetasaḥ // HV_37.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6277: adyaprabhṛti devendro na tvaṃ bhavasi vṛtrahan | *HV_37.46*517:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:6278: eṣa te gadayā śakra śiro bhetsyāmi paśyataḥ || *HV_37.46*517:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:6280: bhaviṣyāmi na saṃdeho hatvā tvām ugrapauruṣam | *HV_37.46*517:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:6281: iti bruvāṇaṃ samare vṛtrahā vajram ādade | *HV_37.46*517:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:6282: jaghāna tarasā śakro vajreṇa hi sa dānavam | *HV_37.46*517:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:6284: aśaktaṃ vajram āsīt tu dānavaṃ hantum ojasā | *HV_37.46*517:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:6285: punaḥ papāta sahasā śakrasyaiva tadā karam | *HV_37.46*517:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:6286: kālanemis tu sahasā gadām ādāya yatnataḥ | *HV_37.46*517:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:6289: sasrāva rudhiraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gajarājas tadā balī | *HV_37.46*517:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:6290: punaś ca gadayā rājaṃs tadā samaramūrdhani | *HV_37.46*517:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:6298: airāvatagataḥ saṃkhye calituṃ na śaśāka ha // HV_37.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6300: nirvyāpāraḥ kṛtas tena vipāśo varuṇo mṛdhe // HV_37.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:6303: jaghāna devarājam ca somaṃ varuṇam aśvinau | *HV_37.48*518:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6310: svaśaktyā tāḍayām āsa vasum urvyāṃ papāta saḥ | *HV_37.48*518:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:6311: dhanadaś ca kṛtāntaś ca varuṇaś ca śacīpatiḥ || *HV_37.48*518:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:6313: nivārya tāni śastrāṇi tāñ jaghāna pṛthak pṛthak | *HV_37.48*518:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:6314: yamena preṣitaṃ daṇḍaṃ jagṛhe sa mahāsuraḥ | *HV_37.48*518:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:6315: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve lokapālā mahaujasaḥ | *HV_37.48*518:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:6317: vajreṇa nihato daityo na cakampe girir yathā | *HV_37.48*518:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:6318: punar vajreṇa taṃ daityam indro mārutavartmani | *HV_37.48*518:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:6319: sthitas tadā jṛmbhaṇena jigīrṇe sāyudhaṃ hariḥ | *HV_37.48*518:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:6321: tatkṣaṇād eva devendraḥ pārśvaṃ nirbhidya niryayau || *HV_37.48*518:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:6323: tataḥ śūlam amoghaṃ tu śaṃkaro hantum ādade | *HV_37.48*518:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:6325: na śūlena na cānyena hantuṃ śakyo mahāsuraḥ | *HV_37.48*518:24 |
GE07hv_conpu:6326: śūlaṃ etad amoghaṃ ca mā prayuñkṣva mahāsure || *HV_37.48*518:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:6327: ity uktaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ sa saṃjahārāyudhaṃ svakam | *HV_37.48*518:26 |
GE07hv_conpu:6329: ūcuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmāno gīrbhiḥ stutvā janārdanam | *HV_37.48*518:28 |
GE07hv_conpu:6335: tadaiva lokapālāś ca nihatās tena saṃyugam | *HV_37.49*519 |
GE07hv_conpu:6337: yāmyām avasthām amaro nītaḥ svāṃ diśam āviśat // HV_37.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:6339: lokapālās tu te sarve mānuṣīṃ tanum āsthitāḥ | *HV_37.50*520:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:6340: vihāya svapadaṃ rājan vivadanti sma mānuṣe | *HV_37.50*520:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6341: sa lokapālān utsādya hṛtvā teṣāṃ ca karma tat /
GE07hv_conpu:6342: dikṣu sarvāsu dehaṃ svaṃ caturdhā vidadhe tadā // HV_37.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:6344: jahāra lakṣmīṃ somasya taṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ mahat // HV_37.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:6346: sāyanaṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ jahāra dinakarma ca // HV_37.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:6348: vāyuṃ ca tarasā jitvā cakārātmavaśānugam // HV_37.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:6349: sa samudrān samānīya sarvāś ca sarito balāt /
GE07hv_conpu:6350: cakārātmavaśe vīryād dehabhūtāś ca sindhavaḥ // HV_37.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:6351: āpaḥ sa vaśagāḥ kṛtvā divijātāś ca bhūmijāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6352: sthāpayām āsa jagatīṃ suguptāṃ dharaṇīdharaiḥ // HV_37.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:6358: taṃ tuṣṭuvur daityagaṇā devā iva pitāmaham // HV_37.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:6367: vedo dharmaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ śrīś ca nārāyaṇāśrayā // HV_38.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:6369: vaiṣṇavaṃ padam anvicchan yayau nārāyaṇāntikam // HV_38.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6371: dānavānāṃ vināśāya bhrāmayantaṃ gadāṃ śubhām // HV_38.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6373: svārūḍhaṃ svarṇapatrāḍhyaṃ śikhinaṃ kāśyapaṃ khagam // HV_38.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6375: dānavo viṣṇum akṣobhyaṃ babhāṣe kṣubdhamānasaḥ // HV_38.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6376: ayaṃ sa ripur asmākaṃ pūrveṣāṃ dānavarṣiṇām /
GE07hv_conpu:6377: arṇavāvāsinaś caiva madhor vai kaiṭabhasya ca // HV_38.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6378: ayaṃ sa vigraho 'smākam aśāmyaḥ kila kathyate /
GE07hv_conpu:6379: yena naḥ saṃyugeṣv adya bahavo dānavā hatāḥ // HV_38.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:6382: ayaṃ sa viṣṇur devānāṃ vaikuṇṭhaś ca divaukasām /
GE07hv_conpu:6383: ananto bhoginām apsu svayaṃbhūś ca svayaṃbhuvaḥ // HV_38.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6384: ayaṃ sa nātho devānām asmābhir viprakṛṣyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:6385: asya krodhaṃ samāsādya hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ // HV_38.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6386: asya cchāyāṃ samāśritya devā makhamukhe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6387: ājyaṃ maharṣibhir dattam aśnuvanti tridhā hutam // HV_38.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6388: ayaṃ sa nidhane hetuḥ sarveṣāṃ daitavadviṣām /
GE07hv_conpu:6389: asya cakraṃ praviṣṭāni kulāny asmākam āhave // HV_38.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6390: ayaṃ sa kila yuddheṣu surārthe tyaktajīvitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6391: savitus tejasā tulyaṃ cakraṃ kṣipati śatruṣu // HV_38.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6392: ayaṃ sa kālo daityānāṃ kālabhūte mayi sthite /
GE07hv_conpu:6393: atikrāntasya kālasya phalaṃ prāpsyati durmatiḥ // HV_38.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6394: diṣṭyedānīṃ samakṣaṃ me viṣṇur eṣa samāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6395: adya madbāṇaniṣpiṣṭo mayy eva praṇamiṣyati // HV_38.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6396: yāsyāmy apacitiṃ diṣṭyā pūrveṣām adya saṃyuge /
GE07hv_conpu:6397: imaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ hatvā dānavānāṃ bhayāvaham // HV_38.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6398: kṣipram eva vadhiṣyāmi raṇe nārāyaṇaṃ śairaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6399: jātyantaragato hy eṣa mṛdhe bādhati dānavān // HV_38.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6400: eṣo 'ntakaḥ purā bhūtvā padmanābha iti smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6401: jaghānaikārṇave ghore tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau // HV_38.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6402: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D4.6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6405: pitaraṃ me jaghānaiko hiraṇyakaśipuṃ purā // HV_38.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6407: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D4.6 T2 G M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6408: yajñakāle baler yo vai kṛtvā vāmanarūpatām | *HV_38.20*522 |
GE07hv_conpu:6409: trīṃl lokāṃś ca jahāraiṣa kramamāṇas tribhiḥ kramaiḥ // HV_38.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6410: bhūyas tv idānīṃ samare saṃprāpte tārakāmaye /
GE07hv_conpu:6411: mayā saha samāgamya sadevo vinaśiṣyati // HV_38.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6412: sa evam uktvā bahudhā kṣipan nārāyaṇaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:6415: kṣamābalena manasā sasmitaṃ vākyam abravīt // HV_38.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6416: alaṃ darpabalaṃ daitya sthiraṃ matkrodhajaṃ balam /
GE07hv_conpu:6417: hatas tvaṃ darpajair doṣaiḥ kṣamāṃ yo 'tītya bhāṣase // HV_38.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6418: adhamas tvaṃ mama mato dhig etat tava vāgbalam /
GE07hv_conpu:6419: na tatra puruṣāḥ santi yatra garjanti yoṣitaḥ // HV_38.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6420: ahaṃ tvāṃ daitya paśyāmi pūrveṣāṃ mārgagāminam /
GE07hv_conpu:6421: prajāpatikṛtaṃ setuṃ ko bhittvā svastimān vrajet // HV_38.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6423: sveṣu sveṣu ca sthāneṣu sthāpayiṣyāmi devatāḥ // HV_38.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6424: evaṃ bruvati vākyaṃ tu mṛdhe śrīvatsadhāriṇi /
GE07hv_conpu:6425: jahāsa dānavaḥ krodhād dhastāṃś cakre ca sāyudhān // HV_38.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6427: krodhād rudhiraraktākṣo viṣṇor vakṣasy atāḍayat // HV_38.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6431: na cacāla harir yuddhe 'kampyamāna ivācalaḥ // HV_38.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6434: mumoca jvalitāṃ ghorāṃ saṃrabdho garuḍopari // HV_38.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6435: karmaṇā tena daityasya viṣṇur vismayam āgamat /
GE07hv_conpu:6437: sa tena tāḍitaḥ pakṣī cacāla ca punaḥ punaḥ | *HV_38.33*523:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:6439: yena tasya suparṇasya patitā mūrdhni sā gadā // HV_38.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:6440: [k: K1-3 Ñ2.3 V B D (except D1) T3.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6444: jaghnus te samare viṣṇuṃ gopālaṃ ca mahāraṇe | *HV_38.33*525:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6445: bhramantaṃ ghūrṇamānaṃ ca stutiṃ devāḥ pracakrire | *HV_38.33*525:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:6448: uttasthau ca raṇād viṣṇur amaraiḥ saṃstutaḥ purā | *HV_38.33*525:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:6449: hataṃ viṣṇuṃ samājñāya śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau sa dānavaḥ | *HV_38.33*525:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:6450: mṛdaṅgāṃś ca tridhā tatra vādayanto mahāsurāḥ | *HV_38.33*525:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:6452: suparṇaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣataṃ ca vapur ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6454: vyavardhata ca vegena suparṇena samaṃ vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6455: bhujāś cāsya vyavardhanta vyāpnuvanto diśo daśa // HV_38.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:6456: sa diśaḥ pradiśaś caiva khaṃ ca gāṃ caiva pūrayan /
GE07hv_conpu:6457: vavṛdhe sa punar lokān krāntukāma ivaujasā // HV_38.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:6459: ṛṣayaḥ saha gandharvais tuṣṭuvur madhusūdanam // HV_38.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:6462: viṣṇo kṛṣṇa hṛṣīkeśa jahi daityaṃ mahābalam | *HV_38.37*526:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6464: pāhi naḥ sakalān asmāñ jahi daityaṃ mahābalam | *HV_38.37*526:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:6465: sa dyāṃ kirīṭena likhan sābhram ambaram ambaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6466: padbhyām ākramya vasudhāṃ diśaḥ pracchādya bāhubhiḥ // HV_38.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:6476: kravyādāni ca bhūtāni tṛptiṃ yānti mahāmṛdhe // HV_38.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:6478: cakram udyasya samare krodhadīpto gadādharaḥ // HV_38.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:6479: saṃmuṣṇan dānavaṃ tejaḥ samare svena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:6480: ciccheda bāhūṃś cakreṇa śrīdharaḥ kālaneminaḥ // HV_38.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:6481: tac ca vaktraśataṃ ghoraṃ sāgnicūrṇāṭṭahāsi yat /
GE07hv_conpu:6482: tasya daityasya cakreṇa pramamātha balād dhariḥ // HV_38.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6483: sa cchinnabāhur viśirā na prākampata dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6484: kabandhāvasthitaḥ saṃkhye viśākha iva pādapaḥ // HV_38.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6485: taṃ vitatya mahāpakṣau vāyoḥ kṛtvā samaṃ javam /
GE07hv_conpu:6486: urasā pātayām āsa garuḍaḥ kālaneminam // HV_38.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:6487: sa tasya deho vimukho viśākhaḥ khāt paribhraman /
GE07hv_conpu:6488: nipapāta divaṃ tyaktvā kṣobhayan dharaṇītalam // HV_38.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:6489: tasmin nipatite daitye devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:6490: sādhu sādhv iti vaikuṇṭhaṃ sametāḥ pratyapūjayan // HV_38.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:6491: apare ye tu daityā vai yuddhe dṛṣṭaparākramāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6492: te sarve bāhubhir vyāptā na śekuś calituṃ raṇe // HV_38.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:6493: kāṃścit keśeṣu jagrāha kāṃścit kaṇṭhe nyapīḍayat /
GE07hv_conpu:6494: pāṭayan kasyacid vaktraṃ madhye kāṃścid agṛhyata // HV_38.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:6498: tasthau śakrapriyaṃ kṛtvā kṛtakarmā gadādharaḥ // HV_38.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:6500: taṃ deśam ājagāmāśu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ // HV_38.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:6502: devadevo hariṃ devaṃ pūjayan vākyam abravīt // HV_38.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:6503: kṛtaṃ deva mahatkarma surāṇāṃ śalyam uddhṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:6504: vadhenānena daityānāṃ vayaṃ ca paritoṣitāḥ // HV_38.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:6505: yo 'yaṃ tvayā hato viṣṇo kālanemir mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6506: tvam eko 'sya mṛdhe hantā nānyaḥ kaścana vidyate // HV_38.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:6507: eṣa devān paribhavaṃl lokāṃś ca sacarācarān /
GE07hv_conpu:6508: ṛṣīṇāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtvā mām api pratigarjati // HV_38.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:6510: yad ayaṃ kālatulyābhaḥ kālanemir nipātitaḥ // HV_38.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:6511: tadāgacchasva bhadraṃ te gacchāma divam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:6512: brahmarṣayas tvāṃ tatrasthāḥ pratīkṣante sadogatāḥ // HV_38.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:6513: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) S (except M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6514: ahaṃ maharṣayaś caiva tatra tvāṃ vadatāṃ vara | *HV_38.61*527:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:6516: kiṃ cāhaṃ tava dāsyāmi varaṃ varabhṛtāṃ vara /
GE07hv_conpu:6517: sureṣv api sadaityeṣu varāṇāṃ varado bhavān // HV_38.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:6519: asminn eva mṛdhe viṣṇo śakrāya sumahātmane // HV_38.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:6520: evam ukto bhagavatā brahmaṇā harir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6521: devāñ śakramukhān sarvān uvāca śubhayā girā // HV_38.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:6522: śrūyatāṃ tridaśāḥ sarve yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6524: asmin naḥ samare sarve kālanemimukhā hatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6525: dānavā vikramopetāḥ śakrād api mahattarāḥ // HV_38.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:6526: asmin mahati saṃkrande dvāv eva tu viniḥsṛtau /
GE07hv_conpu:6527: vairocaniś ca daityendraḥ svarbhānuś ca mahāgrahaḥ // HV_38.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:6528: tad iṣṭāṃ bhajatāṃ śakro diśaṃ varuṇa eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6529: yāmyāṃ yamaḥ pālayatām uttarāṃ ca dhanādhipaḥ // HV_38.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:6530: ṛkṣaiḥ saha yathāyogaṃ kālaṃ caratu candramāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6531: abdaṃ hy ṛtumukhaṃ sūryo bhajatām ayanaiḥ saha // HV_38.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:6533: hūyantām agnayo viprair vedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā // HV_38.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:6535: śrāddhena pitaraś caiva tṛptiṃ yāntu yathāsukham // HV_38.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:6536: vāyuś caratu mārgasthas tridhā dīpyatu pāvakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6537: trayo varṇāś ca lokāṃs trīṃs tarpayantv ātmajair guṇaiḥ // HV_38.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:6539: dakṣiṇāś cāpi vartantāṃ yathoktaṃ sarvasatriṇām // HV_38.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:6540: gāś ca sūryo rasān somo vāyuḥ prāṇāṃś ca prāṇiṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:6541: tarpayantaḥ pravartantāṃ śivaiḥ saumyaiś ca karmabhiḥ // HV_38.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:6543: trailokyamātaraḥ sarvāḥ sāgaraṃ yāntu nimnagāḥ // HV_38.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:6544: daityebhyas tyajyatāṃ bhītiḥ śāntiṃ vrajata devatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6545: svasti vo 'stu gamiṣyāmi brahmalokaṃ sanātanam // HV_38.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:6546: svagṛhe svargaloke vā saṃgrāme vā viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6547: visrambho vo na gantavyo nityaṃ kṣudrā hi dānavāḥ // HV_38.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:6548: chidreṣu praharanty ete na caiṣāṃ saṃsthitir dhruvā /
GE07hv_conpu:6549: saumyānām ṛjubhāvānāṃ bhavatāṃ cārjavā matiḥ // HV_38.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:6550: [k: N(except Ś1 Ñ1) S(except M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6553: yadā ca sudurādharṣaṃ dānavebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet | *HV_38.78*528:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:6556: jagāma brahmaṇā sārdhaṃ brahmalokaṃ mahāyaśāḥ // HV_38.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:6558: dānavānāṃ ca viṣṇoś ca yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // HV_38.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:6567: brahmalokaṃ gato brahman vaikuṇṭhaḥ kiṃ cakāra ha // HV_39.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:6569: viṣṇur daityavadhe vṛtte devair akṛtasatkriyaḥ // HV_39.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6570: brahmaloke ca kiṃ sthānaṃ kaṃ vā yogam upāsta saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6571: kaṃ vā dadhāra niyamaṃ sa vibhur bhūtabhāvanaḥ // HV_39.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6572: kathaṃ tatrāsatas tasya viśvaṃ jagad idaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:6575: kathaṃ ca brahmalokastho dhuraṃ vahati laukikīm // HV_39.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6576: caritaṃ tasya viprendra divyaṃ bhagavato divi /
GE07hv_conpu:6577: vistareṇa yathātattvaṃ sarvam icchāmi veditum // HV_39.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6580: brahmalokaṃ yathārūḍho brahmaṇā saha modate // HV_39.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:6581: kāmaṃ tasya gatiḥ sūkṣmā devair api durānugā /
GE07hv_conpu:6582: yat tu śakṣyāmy ahaṃ vaktuṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu // HV_39.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:6583: eṣa lokamayo devo lokāś caitan mayāstrayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6584: eṣa devamayaś caiva devāś caitan mayā divi // HV_39.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6585: devena vardhate yad dhi sarvaṃ tad dhi janārdanāt /
GE07hv_conpu:6586: yat pravṛttaṃ ca devebhyas tad viddhi madhusūdanāt // HV_39.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6587: agnīṣomamayaṃ lokaṃ yaṃ vidur viduṣo janāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6588: taṃ somam agniṃ lokaṃ ca veda viṣṇuṃ pitāmahaḥ // HV_39.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6589: kṣīrād yathā dadhi bhaved dadhnaḥ sarpir yathā bhavet /
GE07hv_conpu:6590: mathyamāneṣu bhūteṣu tathā loko janārdanāt // HV_39.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6591: yathendriyaiś ca bhūtaiś ca paramātmā vidhīyate /
GE07hv_conpu:6592: tathā vedaiś ca devaiś ca lokaiś ca vidito hariḥ // HV_39.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6594: tathā prāṇeśvarāvāptir devānāṃ divi vaiṣṇavī // HV_39.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6596: lokatantradharo hy eva mantrair mantra ivārcyate // HV_39.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6597: asya pāraṃ na paśyanti bahavaḥ pāratantriṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6598: eṣa pāraṃ paraṃ caiva lokānāṃ veda mādhavaḥ // HV_39.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6600: śṛṇu vai yat tadā vṛttaṃ brahmaloke purātanam // HV_39.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6601: sa gatvā brahmaṇo lokaṃ dṛṣṭvā paitāmahaṃ padam /
GE07hv_conpu:6602: vavande tān ṛṣīn sarvān viṣṇur ārṣeṇa karmaṇā // HV_39.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6603: so 'gniṃ prāk savane dṛṣṭvā hūyamānaṃ maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6604: avandata mahātejāḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ vidhim // HV_39.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6605: sa dadarśa makheṣv ājyair ijyamānaṃ maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6606: bhāgaṃ yajñiyam aśnānaṃ svadeham aparaṃ sthitam // HV_39.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6610: makheṣu ca brahmarṣibhiḥ śataśaḥ kṛtalakṣaṇān // HV_39.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:6612: yajñair ijyantam ātmānam paśyaṃs tatra cacāra ha // HV_39.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6613: tam ūcur ṛṣayo devāḥ sadasyāḥ sadasi sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6619: prabhus tvaṃ sarvadevānāṃ lokānāṃ prabhur avyayaḥ | *HV_39.25ab*529:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:6620: tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam | *HV_39.25ab*529:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:6621: idaṃ yajñiyam ātithyaṃ mantrataḥ pratigṛhyatām // HV_39.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6622: tvam asya yajñapūtasya pātraṃ pādyasya pāvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6623: atithis tvaṃ hi mantroktaḥ sa dṛṣṭaḥ satataṃ mataḥ // HV_39.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6624: tvayi yoddhu gate viṣṇo na prāvartanta naḥ kriyāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6625: avaiṣṇavasya yajñasya na hi karma vidhīyate // HV_39.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6629: yady ātmānam ihāsmābhir ijyamānaṃ nirīkṣase // HV_39.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6630: evam astv iti tān viprān bhagavān pratyapūjayat /
GE07hv_conpu:6631: mumude brahmalokastho brahmaiva hi pitāmahaḥ // HV_39.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6638: ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitas tais tu viveśa harir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6640: sa tatra viviśe hṛṣṭas tān āmantrya sadogatān /
GE07hv_conpu:6642: svena nāmnā parijñātaṃ sa taṃ nārāyaṇāśramam /
GE07hv_conpu:6643: praviśann eva bhagavān āyudhāni vyasarjayat // HV_40.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6645: svadhiṣṭhitaṃ bhūtagaṇaiḥ śāśvataiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // HV_40.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6648: na tatra viṣayo vāyor nendor nāpi vivasvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6649: vapuṣā padmanābhasya sa deśas tejasā vṛtaḥ // HV_40.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6650: sa tatra praviśann eva jaṭābhāraṃ samudvahan /
GE07hv_conpu:6653: upatasthe mahātmānaṃ nidrā taṃ kālarūpiṇī // HV_40.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:6658: harir ekārṇavoktena vratena vratināṃ varaḥ // HV_40.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6659: taṃ śayānaṃ mahātmānaṃ bhavāya jagataḥ prabhum /
GE07hv_conpu:6660: upāsāṃ cakrire viṣṇuṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā // HV_40.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6662: ādyasya sadanaṃ padmaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sūryasaṃnibham // HV_40.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6663: [k: K1-3 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2-5 T1.3.4 G3.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6668: prajānāṃ paṅktayo hy oghair niṣpatanti viśanti ca // HV_40.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6669: te sṛṣṭāḥ prāṇinām oghā vibhaktā brahmaṇā svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:6670: caturdhā svāṃ gatiṃ jagmuḥ kṛtāntoktena karmaṇā // HV_40.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6671: na taṃ veda svayaṃ brahmā nāpi brahmarṣayo 'vyayāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6672: viṣṇuṃ nidrāmayaṃ yogaṃ praviṣṭaṃ tamasāvṛtam // HV_40.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6674: na vidus taṃ kvacit suptaṃ kvacid āsīnam āsane // HV_40.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6675: jāgarti ko 'tra kaḥ śete kaḥ śvasan kaś ca neṅgate /
GE07hv_conpu:6676: ko bhogavān ko dyutimān kṛṣṇāt kṛṣṇataraś ca kaḥ // HV_40.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6677: vimṛśanti sma taṃ devaṃ divyābhir upapattibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6680: na cainaṃ śekur anveṣṭuṃ karmato janmato 'pi vā // HV_40.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6681: kathābhis tatpradiṣṭābhir ye tasya caritaṃ viduḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6682: purāṇaṃ taṃ purāṇeṣu ṛṣayaḥ saṃpracakṣate // HV_40.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6683: śrūyate cāsya caritaṃ deveṣv api purātanam /
GE07hv_conpu:6684: mahāpurāṇāt prabhṛti paraṃ tasya na vidyate // HV_40.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6686: tat purāṇād ṛte tasya caritaṃ naiva vidyate | *HV_40.20*534 |
GE07hv_conpu:6687: yac cāsya veda vedo 'pi caritaṃ svaprabhāvajam /
GE07hv_conpu:6688: tenemāḥ śrutayo vyāptā vaidikā laukikāś ca yāḥ // HV_40.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6691: yadainaṃ vīkṣituṃ devā na śekuḥ suptam acyutam /
GE07hv_conpu:6692: tataḥ svapiti gharmānte jāgarti jaladakṣaye // HV_40.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6693: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1; D6 om.) T1.3.4 G3.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6694: sa hi yajñāś ca vedāś ca yajñāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ | *HV_40.23*535:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:6695: yā tu yajñagatiḥ proktā sa eṣa puruṣottamaḥ | *HV_40.23*535:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6696: tasmin supte na vartante mantrapūtāḥ kratukriyāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6699: śaratprabhṛti yajñā hi jāgrati śrīdhare harau | *HV_40.24*536 |
GE07hv_conpu:6700: tad idaṃ vārṣikaṃ cakraṃ kārayaty ambudeśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6701: vaiṣṇavaṃ karma kurvāṇaḥ supte viṣṇau puraṃdaraḥ // HV_40.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6702: yā hy eṣā gahvarī māyā nidreti jagati sthitā /
GE07hv_conpu:6703: akasmād dveṣiṇī ghorā kālarātrir mahīkṣitām // HV_40.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6706: naitayā kaścid āviṣṭo jṛmbhamāṇo muhur muhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6707: śaktaḥ prasahituṃ vegaṃ majjann iva mahārṇave // HV_40.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6708: annajā bhuvi martyānāṃ śramajā vā kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_conpu:6709: naiśā bhavati lokasya nidrā sarvasya laukikī // HV_40.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6710: svapnānte kṣīyate hy eṣā prāyaśo bhuvi dehinām /
GE07hv_conpu:6711: mṛtyukāle ca bhūtānāṃ prāṇān nāśayate bhṛśam // HV_40.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6712: deveṣv api dadhāraināṃ nānyo nārāyaṇād ṛte /
GE07hv_conpu:6715: lokān alpena kālena bhajate bhūtamohinī // HV_40.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6718: sa tayā nidrayā channas tasmin nārāyaṇāśrame /
GE07hv_conpu:6719: śete sma hi tadā viṣṇur mohayañ jagad avyayaḥ // HV_40.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:6721: jagmuḥ kṛtayugaṃ caiva tretā caiva yugottamam // HV_40.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:6722: sa tu dvāparaparyante dṛṣṭvā lokān suduḥkhitān /
GE07hv_conpu:6725: jahīhi nidrāṃ sahajāṃ bhuktapūrvām iva srajam /
GE07hv_conpu:6726: ime te brahmaṇā sārdhaṃ devā darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_40.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:6730: śṛṇu viṣṇo śubhāṃ vācaṃ bhūvyomāgnyanilāmbhasām // HV_40.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:6731: ime tvā sapta munayaḥ sahitā munimaṇḍalaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6732: stuvanti deva divyābhir geyābhir gīrbhir añjasā // HV_40.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:6734: kāraṇaṃ kiṃcid utpannaṃ devānāṃ kāryagauravāt // HV_40.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:6737: tvayi supte jagat suptaṃ tvayi jāgrati jāgṛtam || *HV_40.41*537:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6739: kiṃ tvaṃ svapiṣi govinda naṣṭe jagati sāṃpratam | *HV_40.41*537:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:6742: sa saṃkṣipya jagat sarvaṃ timiraughaṃ vidārayan /
GE07hv_conpu:6743: udatiṣṭhad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ śriyā paramayā jvalan // HV_40.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:6744: sa dadarśa surān sarvān sametān sapitāmahān /
GE07hv_conpu:6748: kuto vo vigraho devāḥ kuto vo bhayam āgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:6749: kasya vā kena vā kāryaṃ kiṃ vā mayi na vartate // HV_40.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:6750: na khalv akuśalaṃ loke vartate dānavotthitam /
GE07hv_conpu:6751: nṛṇām āyāsajananaṃ śīghram icchāmi veditum // HV_40.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6753: śivāya bhavatām arthe sthitaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ // HV_40.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6762: uvāca paramaṃ vākyaṃ hitaṃ sarvadivaukasām // HV_41.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:6763: nāsti kiṃcid bhayaṃ viṣṇo surāṇām asurāntaka /
GE07hv_conpu:6764: yeṣāṃ bhavān abhayadaḥ karṇadhāro raṇe raṇe // HV_41.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6766: dharme prayatamānānāṃ mānavānāṃ kuto bhayam // HV_41.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6767: satye dharme ca niratā mānavā vigatajvarāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6769: mānavānāṃ ca patayaḥ pārthivāś ca parasparam /
GE07hv_conpu:6770: ṣaḍbhāgam upayuñjānā na bhedaṃ kurvate mithaḥ // HV_41.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6772: akarair viprayuktārthāḥ kośam āpūrayan sadā // HV_41.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6774: atīkṣṇad aṇḍāś caturo varṇāñ jugupur añjasā // HV_41.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:6778: yajanti ca yathākālaṃ yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ // HV_41.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6780: śrāddhaiś ca medhyaiḥ śataśas tarpayanti pitāmahān // HV_41.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6781: naiṣām aviditaṃ kiṃcit trividhaṃ bhuvi vidyate /
GE07hv_conpu:6782: vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ caiva dharmaśāstroktam eva ca // HV_41.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6784: bhūyaḥ kṛtayugaṃ kartum utsahante narādhipāḥ // HV_41.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6785: teṣām eva prabhāvena śivaṃ varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6786: yathārthaṃ ca vavur vātā virajaskā diśo daśa // HV_41.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6790: nirutpātā ca vasudhā supracārāś ca vai grahāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6791: candramāś ca sanakṣatraḥ saumyaṃ carati yogataḥ // HV_41.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6792: anulomakaraḥ sūryo ayane dve cacāra ha /
GE07hv_conpu:6793: havyaiś ca vividhais tṛptaḥ śubhagandho hutāśanaḥ // HV_41.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6795: tarpayatsu mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ nṛṇāṃ kālabhayaṃ kutaḥ // HV_41.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6797: rājñāṃ balair balavatāṃ pīḍyate vasudhātalam // HV_41.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6799: pṛthivī samanuprāptā naur ivāsann aviplavā // HV_41.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6801: jalotpīḍākulā svedaṃ darśayantī muhur muhuḥ // HV_41.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6802: kṣatriyāṇāṃ vapurbhiś ca tejasā ca balena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6803: nṛṇāṃ ca rāṣṭrair vistīrṇaiḥ śrāmyatīva vasuṃdharā // HV_41.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6806: tac chṛṇuṣva mahābāho rahasyam idam uttamam | *HV_41.20*539:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6807: pure pure narapatiḥ koṭisaṃkhyair balair vṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6808: rāṣṭre rāṣṭre ca bahavo grāmāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_41.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6809: bhūmipānāṃ sahasraiś ca teṣāṃ ca balināṃ balaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6810: grāmāyutāḍhyai rāṣṭraiś ca bhūmir nirvivarīkṛtā // HV_41.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:6811: seyaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ kṛtvā niśceṣṭaṃ kālam agrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6812: prāptā mamālayaṃ viṣṇo bhavāṃś cāsyāḥ parā gatiḥ // HV_41.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6813: karmabhūmir ihasthānāṃ bhūmir eṣā vyathāṃ gatā /
GE07hv_conpu:6814: yathā na sīdet tatkāryaṃ jagaty eṣā hi śāśvatī // HV_41.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6815: asyā hi pīḍane doṣo mahān syān madhusūdana /
GE07hv_conpu:6816: kriyālopaś ca lokānāṃ dūṣitaṃ ca jagad bhavet // HV_41.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6818: sahajāṃ yā kṣamāṃ tyaktvā calatvam acalā gatā // HV_41.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6819: tad asyāḥ śrutavantaḥ sma tac cāpi bhavatā śrutam /
GE07hv_conpu:6820: bhārāvataraṇārthaṃ hi mantrayāmas tvayā saha // HV_41.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6821: satpathe hi sthitāḥ sarve rājāno rāṣṭravardhanāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6822: narāṇāṃ ca trayo varṇā brāhmaṇān anuyāyinaḥ // HV_41.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6823: sarvaṃ satyamayaṃ vākyaṃ varṇā dharmaparās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:6824: sarve vedaparā viprāḥ sarve vipraparā narāḥ // HV_41.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6826: yathā dharmavadho na syāt tathā mantraḥ pravartatām // HV_41.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6827: satāṃ gatir iyaṃ nānyā dharmaś cāsyāḥ susādhanam /
GE07hv_conpu:6828: rājñāṃ caiva vadhaḥ kāryo dharaṇyā bhāranirṇaye // HV_41.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6841: bāḍham ity eva saha tair durdināmbhodanisvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6844: sa jatāmaṇḍalaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ bibhrat kṛṣṇavapur hariḥ // HV_42.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6847: pīte vasāno vasane lokānāṃ gurur avyayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6848: hariḥ so 'bhavad ālakṣyaḥ sasaṃdhyābhra ivācalaḥ // HV_42.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6852: dadṛśur devatās tatra svāṃ sabhāṃ kāmarūpiṇīm // HV_42.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6858: [k: D2 ins., D5 ins. line 1 after 9: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6863: yathānideśaṃ tridaśā viviśus te sabhāṃ śubhām // HV_42.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6864: te niṣedur yathokteṣu vimāneṣv āsaneṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6865: bhadrāsaneṣu pīṭheṣu kuthāsv āstaraṇeṣu ca // HV_42.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6866: tataḥ prabhañjano vāyur brahmaṇā sādhu coditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6867: mā śabda iti sarvatra pracakrāma sabhāṃ śubhām // HV_42.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6869: babhāṣe dharaṇī vākyaṃ svedāt karuṇabhāṣiṇī // HV_42.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6870: [k: K1.3 Ñ2.3 V B2 Dn D2.3.5 T3 ins., B1 after 34ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6872: tvayā dhāryā tv ahaṃ deva tvayā vai dhāryate jagat | *HV_42.13*542:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:6873: tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ bibharṣi ca || *HV_42.13*542:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6874: yat tvayā dhāryate kiṃcit tejasā ca balena ca | *HV_42.13*542:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:6875: tatas tava prasādena mayā paścāt tu dhāryate || *HV_42.13*542:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:6876: tvayā dhṛtaṃ dhārayāmi nādhṛtaṃ dhārayāmy aham | *HV_42.13*542:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:6877: na hi tad vidyate bhūtaṃ yat tvayā nānudhāryate || *HV_42.13*542:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:6878: tvam eva kuruṣe deva nārāyaṇa yuge yuge | *HV_42.13*542:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:6881: trāyasva māṃ suraśreṣṭha tavaiva śaraṇaṃ gatām || *HV_42.13*542:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:6883: tvām eva śaraṇaṃ nityam upayāsye sanātanam || *HV_42.13*542:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:6884: tāvan me 'sti bhayaṃ bhūyo yāvan na tvāṃ kakudminam | *HV_42.13*542:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:6885: śaraṇaṃ yāmi manasā śataśo hy upalakṣaye | *HV_42.13*542:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:6887: māṃ ca badhvā kṛtau pūrvaṃ mṛṅmayau dvau mahāsurau // HV_42.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6888: karṇasrotodbhavau tau hi viṣṇor asya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6890: tau viveśa svayaṃ vāyur brahmaṇā sādhu coditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6891: tau divaṃ chādayantau tu vavṛdhāte mahāsurau // HV_42.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6892: vāyuprāṇau tu tau gṛhya brahmā parimṛśyañ śanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6893: ekaṃ mṛdutaraṃ mene kaṭhinaṃ veda cāparam // HV_42.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6894: nāmanī tu tayoś cakre sa vibhuḥ salilodbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6895: mṛdus tv ayaṃ madhur nāma kaṭhinaḥ kaiṭabho 'bhavat // HV_42.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6897: sarvam ekārṇavaṃ lokaṃ yoddhukāmau sunirbhayau // HV_42.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6901: rocayām āsa vasatiṃ guhyāṃ brahmā caturmukhaḥ // HV_42.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6903: bahūn varṣagaṇān apsu śayānau na cakampatuḥ // HV_42.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:6904: atha dīrghasya kālasya tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau /
GE07hv_conpu:6905: ājagmatus tam uddeśaṃ yatra brahmā vyavasthitaḥ // HV_42.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6906: dṛṣṭvā tāv asurau ghorau mahāntau yuddhadurmadau /
GE07hv_conpu:6907: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6908: brahmaṇā tāḍito viṣṇuḥ padmanālena vai purā | *HV_42.24ab*543 |
GE07hv_conpu:6910: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tayos tasya ca vai tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:6911: ekārṇave tadā loke trailokye jalatāṃ gate // HV_42.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6912: tad abhūt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ varṣasaṃkhyāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6913: na ca tāv asurau yuddhe tadā śramam avāpatuḥ // HV_42.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6914: atha dīrghasya kālasya tau daityau yuddhadurmadau /
GE07hv_conpu:6915: ūcatuḥ prītamanasau devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ hariṃ // HV_42.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6916: prītau svas tava yuddhena ślāghyas tvaṃ mṛtyur āhave /
GE07hv_conpu:6917: āvāṃ jahi na yatrorvī jalena samabhiplutā // HV_42.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6918: hatau ca tava putratvaṃ prāpnuyāvaḥ surottama /
GE07hv_conpu:6919: so hy āvāṃ yudhi nirjetā tasyāvāṃ vihitau sutau // HV_42.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6920: sa hi gṛhya mṛdhe daityau dorbhyāṃ tau samapīḍayat /
GE07hv_conpu:6921: janmatur nidhanaṃ cāpi tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau // HV_42.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6922: tāv ubhāv āplutau toye vapurbhyām ekatāṃ gatau /
GE07hv_conpu:6923: medo mumucatur daityau mathyamānau jalormibhiḥ // HV_42.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6924: medasā tajjalaṃ vyāptaṃ tābhyāṃ antardadhe tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:6925: nārāyaṇaś ca bhagavān asṛjat sa punaḥ prajāḥ // HV_42.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6926: daityayor medasā channā medinīti tataḥ smṛtā /
GE07hv_conpu:6927: prabhāvāt padmanābhasya śāśvatī ca nṛṇāṃ kṛtā // HV_42.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:6930: hṛtāhaṃ kramatā bhūyas tadā yuṣmākam agrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6931: baleḥ sakāśād daityasya viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_42.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:6933: anāthā jagato nāthaṃ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā // HV_42.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:6934: agniḥ suvarṇasya gurur gavāṃ sūryo guruḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6935: akṣatrāṇāṃ guruḥ somo mama nārāyaṇo guruḥ // HV_42.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:6937: mayā dhṛtaṃ dhārayate sarvam etad gadādharaḥ // HV_42.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:6941: bhārgaveṇa pituḥ śrāddhe kaśyapāya niveditā // HV_42.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:6944: sa māṃ brahmarṣir apy āha kim urvi tvam avāṅmukhī /
GE07hv_conpu:6947: patayo me hatā brahman bhārgaveṇa mahātmanā // HV_42.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:6949: vidhavā śūnyanagarā na dhārayitum utsahe // HV_42.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:6950: tan mahyaṃ dīyatāṃ bhartā bhagavaṃs tvatsamo nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6951: rakṣet sagrāmanagarāṃ yo māṃ sāgaramālinīm // HV_42.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:6952: sa śrutvā bhagavān vākyaṃ bāḍham ity abravīt prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6953: tato māṃ mānavendrāya manave saṃprayacchata // HV_42.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6955: vipulenāsmi kālena pārthivāt pārthivaṃ gatā // HV_42.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6958: bahavaḥ kṣatriyāḥ śūrā māṃ jitvā divam āśritāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6959: te sma kālavaśaṃ prāpya mayy eva pralayaṃ gatāḥ // HV_42.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:6960: matkṛte vigrahā loke vṛtte vartanta eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6963: jagaddhitārthaṃ kuruta rājñāṃ hetuṃ raṇakṣaye // HV_42.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:6965: ekaś cakradharaḥ śrīmān abhayaṃ me prayacchatu // HV_42.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:6967: bhāro yady avaroptavyo viṣṇur eṣa bravītu mām // HV_42.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:6970: mā bhair dharaṇi kalyāṇi śāntiṃ vraja samāhite | *HV_42.53*544:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:6971: eṣa tvām ucitaṃ sthānaṃ sthāpayāmi vasiṃdhare | *HV_42.53*544:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6976: chapter 43, transliterated and proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of October 10, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:6978: te śrutvā pṛthivīvākyaṃ sarva eva divaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6981: śarīrakartā lokānāṃ tvaṃ hi lokasya ceśvaraḥ // HV_43.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6982: yat kartavyaṃ mahendreṇa yamena varuṇena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6983: yad vā kāryaṃ dhaneśena svayaṃ nārāyaṇena vā // HV_43.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6984: yad vā candramasā kāryaṃ bhāskareṇānilena vā /
GE07hv_conpu:6985: ādityair vasubhir vāpi rudrair vā lokabhāvanaiḥ // HV_43.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6986: aśvibhyāṃ vā surāgryābhyāṃ sādhyair vā tridivālayaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6988: marudbhir vā suraśreṣṭhaiḥ pāvakenāpi ca prabho | *HV_43.5ab*546 |
GE07hv_conpu:6989: bṛhaspatyuśanobhyāṃ vā kālena kalināpi vā // HV_43.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6990: maheśvareṇa vā brahman viśākhena guhena vā /
GE07hv_conpu:6992: parvataiḥ śailamukhyair vā sāgarair vā mahormibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6993: gaṅgāmukhābhir divyābhiḥ saridbhir vā sureśvara // HV_43.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:6994: kṣipram ājñāpaya vibho katham aṃśaḥ prayujyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:6995: yadi te pārthivaṃ kāryaṃ kāryaṃ pārthivavigrahe // HV_43.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:6997: antarikṣagatā ye ca pṛthivyāṃ ye ca pārthivāḥ // HV_43.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6998: sadasyānāṃ ca viprāṇāṃ pārthivānāṃ kuleṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6999: ayonijāś cāpi tanūḥ sṛjāma jagatītale // HV_43.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:7001: devaiḥ parivṛtaḥ prāha vākyaṃ lokapitāmahaḥ // HV_43.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7002: rocate me suraśreṣṭhā yuṣmākam api niścayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7005: bhāvayanto bhuvaṃ devīṃ labdhvā tribhuvanaśriyam // HV_43.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:7006: pārthive bhārate vaṃśe pūrvam eva vijānatā /
GE07hv_conpu:7007: pṛthivyāṃ saṃbhavam imaṃ śrūyatāṃ yan mayā kṛtam // HV_43.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:7008: samudre 'haṃ surāḥ pūrve velām āsādya paścimām /
GE07hv_conpu:7009: āse sārdhaṃ tanūjena kaśyapena mahātmanā // HV_43.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7011: itivṛttaiś ca bahubhiḥ purāṇaprabhavair guṇaiḥ // HV_43.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7014: kurvatas tu kathās tās tāḥ samudraḥ saha gaṅgayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7020: sa māṃ paribhavann eva svāṃ velāṃ samatikraman /
GE07hv_conpu:7021: kledayām āsa capalair lāvaṇair ambuvisravaiḥ // HV_43.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7022: taṃ ca deśaṃ vyavasitaḥ samudro 'dbhir vimarditum /
GE07hv_conpu:7023: uktaḥ saṃrabdhayā vācā śānto 'sīti tato mayā // HV_43.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7024: śānto 'sīty uktamātras tu tanutvaṃ sāgaro gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7026: bhūyaś caiva mayā śaptaḥ samudraḥ saha gaṅgayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7027: sakāraṇāṃ matiṃ kṛtvā yuṣmākaṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_43.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7029: gacchārṇava mahīpālo rājaiva tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // HV_43.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:7030: tatrāpi sahajāṃ līlāṃ dhārayan svena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:7031: bhaviṣyasi nṛṇāṃ bhartā bhāratānāṃ kulodvahaḥ // HV_43.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7032: śānto 'sīti mayoktas tvaṃ yac cāsi tanutāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7033: sutanur yaśasā loke śaṃtanus tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // HV_43.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7036: iyam apy āgatā gaṅgā tavārthe varavarṇinī | *HV_43.27ab*548 |
GE07hv_conpu:7037: rūpiṇī vai saric chreṣṭhā tatra tvām upayāsyati // HV_43.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7038: evam uktas tu māṃ kruddhaḥ so 'bhigamyāṛṇavo 'bravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:7039: māṃ prabho devadeveśa kimarthaṃ śaptavān asi // HV_43.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7041: aśapo 'sadṛśair vākyair ātmajaṃ māṃ kim ātmanā // HV_43.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7043: yady ahaṃ calito brahman ko 'tra doṣo mamātmanaḥ // HV_43.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7044: kṣiptābhiḥ pavanenādbhiḥ spṛṣṭo yady asi parvaṇi /
GE07hv_conpu:7045: atra me bhagavan kiṃ nu vidyate śāpakāraṇam // HV_43.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7046: uddhūtaiś ca mahāvātaiḥ pravṛddhaiś ca balāhakaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7047: parvaṇā cenduyuktena tribhiḥ kṣubdho 'smi kāraṇaiḥ // HV_43.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7049: kṣantum arhasi me brahmañ śāpo 'yaṃ vinivartyatām // HV_43.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7050: evaṃ mayi nirālambe śāpāc chithilatāṃ gate /
GE07hv_conpu:7051: kāruṇyaṃ kuru deveśa pramāṇaṃ yady avekṣase // HV_43.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7052: asyāś ca deva gaṅgāyā gāṃ gatāyās tavājñayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7053: maddoṣāt samadoṣāyāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // HV_43.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:7055: prasādaṃ kuru me brahman vidyate śāpakāraṇam | *HV_43.35*549 |
GE07hv_conpu:7056: tam ahaṃ ślakṣṇayā vācā mahārṇavam athābruvam /
GE07hv_conpu:7058: śāntiṃ vraja na bhetavyaṃ prasanno 'smi mahāmate /
GE07hv_conpu:7059: śāpe 'smin saritāṃ nātha bhaviṣyaṃ śṛṇu kāraṇam // HV_43.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7060: tvaṃ gaccha bhārate vaṃśe svadehaṃ svena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:7061: ādhatsva saritāṃ nātha tyaktvemāṃ sāgarīṃ tanum // HV_43.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:7063: pālayaṃś caturo varṇān raṃsyase salileśvara // HV_43.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7064: iyaṃ ca tvāṃ saric chreṣṭhā bibhratī mānuṣīṃ tanum /
GE07hv_conpu:7069: prājāpatyena vidhinā gaṅgayā saha sāgara // HV_43.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:7070: vasavaḥ pracyutāḥ svargāt praviṣṭāś ca rasātalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7071: teṣām utpādanārthāya tvaṃ mayā viniyojitaḥ // HV_43.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:7072: aṣṭau tāñ jāhnavīgarbhān apatyārthaṃ dadāmy aham /
GE07hv_conpu:7074: utpādya tvaṃ vasūñ śīghraṃ kṛtvā kurukulaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:7075: praveṣṭāsi tanuṃ tyaktvā punaḥ sāgara sāgarīm // HV_43.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7076: evam etan mayā pūrvaṃ hitārthaṃ vaḥ surottamāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7077: bhaviṣyaṃ paśyatā bhāraṃ pṛthivyāḥ pārthivātmakam // HV_43.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7078: tad eṣa śaṃtanor vaṃśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ropito mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7079: vasavo yatra gaṅgāyāṃ utpannās tridivaukasaḥ // HV_43.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7080: adyāpi bhuvi gāṅgeyas tatraiva vasur aṣṭamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7081: sapteme vasavaḥ prāptāḥ sa ekaḥ parilambate // HV_43.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7082: dvitīyāyāṃ striyāṃ sṛṣṭā dvitīyā śaṃtanos tanuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7083: vicitravīryo dyutimān āsīd rājā pratāpavān // HV_43.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7084: vaicitravīryau dvāv eva pārthivau bhuvi sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_conpu:7085: pāṇḍuś ca dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca vikhyātau puruṣarṣabhau // HV_43.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:7086: tatra pāṇḍoḥ śriyā juṣṭe dve bhārye yauvanasthite /
GE07hv_conpu:7087: śubhe kuntī ca mādrī ca devayoṣopame bhuvi // HV_43.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:7089: gāndhārī bhuvi vikhyātā bhartur nityaṃ vrate sthitā // HV_43.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:7090: atra vo 'ṃśā vibhajyantāṃ vipakṣaḥ pakṣa eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7091: putrāṇāṃ hi tayo rājñor bhavitā vigraho mahān // HV_43.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:7092: teṣāṃ vimarde dāyādye nṛpāṇāṃ bhavitā kṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7093: yugāntapratimaṃ caiva bhaviṣyati mahad bhayam // HV_43.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:7097: kṣayaṃ yāsyanti śastreṇa pārthivāḥ saha vāhanaiḥ // HV_43.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:7101: samāptam idam ākhyāsye tṛtīyaṃ dvāparaṃ yugam // HV_43.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:7103: tiṣyaṃ prapatsyate paścād yugaṃ dāruṇamānuṣam // HV_43.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:7106: maheśvaraṃ kumāraṃ ca dvau ca devau samāśritāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7107: bhaviṣyanti narāḥ sarve loke nasthavirāyuṣaḥ // HV_43.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:7108: tad eṣa nirṇayaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pārthivāntakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7109: aṃśāvataraṇaṃ sarve surāḥ kuruta māciram // HV_43.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:7110: dharmasyāṃśo 'tha kuntyāṃ vai mādryāṃ ca viniyujyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:7111: vigrahasya kalir mūlaṃ gāndhāryāṃ viniyujyatām // HV_43.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:7114: gacchatv iyaṃ vasumatī svāṃ yoniṃ lokadhāriṇī /
GE07hv_conpu:7115: sṛṣṭo 'yaṃ naiṣṭhiko rājñām upāyo lokaviśrutaḥ // HV_43.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:7117: pṛthivī saha kālena vadhāya pṛthivīkṣitām // HV_43.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:7119: naraṃ caiva purāṇarṣiṃ śeṣaṃ ca dharaṇīdharam // HV_43.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:7121: varuṇaṃ ca yamaṃ caiva sūryācandramasau tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:7124: yathā te kathitaṃ pūrvam aṃśāvataraṇaṃ mayā // HV_43.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:7125: ayonijā yonijāś ca te devāḥ pṛthivītale /
GE07hv_conpu:7132: kuruvaṃśe ca devās te pāñcāleṣu ca pārthivāḥ // HV_43.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:7135: [k: K2-4 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.3-5 T G1-3.5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7137: ācālayeyuḥ śailāṃs te kruddhā bhindyur mahītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7140: nārāyaṇe samāveśya lokāñ śāntim upāgamat // HV_43.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:7141: bhūyaḥ śṛṇu yathā viṣṇur avatīrṇo mahītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7142: prajānāṃ vai hitārthāya prabhuḥ prāṇadhaneśvaraḥ // HV_43.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:7144: kule pūjye yaśaskāmo jajñe nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_43.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:7147: chapter 44, transliterated and proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of October 24, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:7149: kṛtakārye gate kāle jagatyāṃ ca yathānayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7150: aṃśāvataraṇe vṛtte surāṇāṃ bhārate kule // HV_44.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7152: aśvinor devabhiṣajor bhāge vai bhāskarasya ca // HV_44.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7154: vasūnām aṣṭame bhāge prāg eva dharaṇīṃ gate // HV_44.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:7155: mṛtyor bhāge kṣitigate kaler bhāge tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7156: bhāge somasya vahneś ca varuṇasya ca gāṃ gate // HV_44.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7157: śaṃkarasya gate bhāge viśveṣāṃ ca divaukasām /
GE07hv_conpu:7161: varuṇasya gate tv aṃśe pṛthivīṃ janamejaya | *HV_44.5*551:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7167: vīṇāṃ gṛhītvā mahatīṃ kakṣāsaktāṃ sakhīm iva // HV_44.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7169: daṇḍī kamaṇḍaludharaḥ sākṣāc chakra ivāparaḥ // HV_44.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7175: gātā caturṇāṃ vedānām udgātā prathamartvijām // HV_44.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7176: [k: Ś1 K1 Ñ2.3 V B Ds D2.4.5 ins. after 11ab, K4 after 9, D1 G1.3.5 after 11: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7179: sthito devasabhāmadhye saṃrabdho viṣṇum abravīt // HV_44.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7181: svaraiś ca saptabhir viṣṇuṃ jagau vipraḥ sa nāradaḥ | *HV_44.12*554:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7182: ṣaḍjaṃ prathamam āvidhya ṛṣabhaṃ ca tataḥ param || *HV_44.12*554:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7184: pañcamaṃ ca tataḥ kurvan niṣādaṃ tadanantaram || *HV_44.12*554:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:7185: kākalīṃ ca vimātrāṃ tu tato dve ca śrutī prabho | *HV_44.12*554:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:7186: tisras tisras tathā rājaṃl layaiś ca saha sarvaśaḥ || *HV_44.12*554:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:7188: taiś cāpi saptabhir vācyaṃ vācakaiś cāpi sarvaśaḥ | *HV_44.12*554:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:7190: etaiḥ saptabhir ādyeśaṃ vicinvan prabhavaṃ tathā | *HV_44.12*554:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:7191: evaṃ samāpya geyaṃ tu vākyam etad uvāca ha | *HV_44.12*554:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:7192: aṃśāvataraṇaṃ viṣṇo yad idaṃ tridaśaiḥ kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:7193: kṣayāya pṛthivīndrāṇāṃ sarvam etad akāraṇam // HV_44.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:7194: yad etat pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ sthitaṃ tvayi vidhīśvara /
GE07hv_conpu:7196: na yuktaṃ jānatā deva tvayā tattvārthadarśinā /
GE07hv_conpu:7197: devadeva pṛthivyarthe prayoktuṃ kāryam īdṛśam // HV_44.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7198: tvaṃ hi cakṣuṣmatāṃ cakṣuḥ ślāghyaḥ prabhavatāṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7199: śreṣṭho yogavatāṃ yogī gatir gatimatām api // HV_44.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7200: devabhāgān gatān dṛṣṭvā kiṃ tvaṃ sarvāgrago vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7201: vasuṃdharāyāḥ sāhyārtham aṃśaṃ svaṃ nānuyuñjase // HV_44.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7203: jagatyāṃ saṃtariṣyanti kāryāt kāryāntaraṃ gatāḥ // HV_44.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:7204: tad ahaṃ tvarayā viṣṇo prāptaḥ surasabhām imām /
GE07hv_conpu:7205: tava saṃcodanārthaṃ vai śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam // HV_44.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7206: ye tvayā nihatā daityāḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye /
GE07hv_conpu:7207: teṣāṃ śṛṇu gatiṃ viṣṇo ye gatāḥ pṛthivītalam // HV_44.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7208: pūḥ pṛthivyāṃ samuditā mathurā nāma nāmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7210: madhur nāma mahān āsīd dānavo yudhi durjayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7212: ghoraṃ madhuvanaṃ nāma yatrāsau nyavasat tadā // HV_44.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7213: tasya putro mahān āsīl lavaṇo nāma dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7216: trāsanaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bale mahati tasthivān // HV_44.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7217: sa tatra dānavaḥ krīḍan varṣapūgān anekaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7220: rājyaṃ śāsati dharmajñe rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahe // HV_44.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7221: sa dānavo balaślāghī ghoraṃ vanam upāśritaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7222: preṣayām āsa rāmāya dūtaṃ paruṣavādinam // HV_44.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7223: viṣayāsannabhūto 'smi tava rāma ripuś ca saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7224: na ca sāmantam icchanti rājāno baladarpitam // HV_44.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7226: jetavyā ripavaḥ sarve sphītaṃ viṣayam icchatā // HV_44.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7228: jetavyānīndriyāṇy ādau taj jaye hi dhruvo jayaḥ // HV_44.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7230: nayānām upadeśena nāsti lokasamo guruḥ // HV_44.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7232: balajyeṣṭhasya nṛpater nāsti sāmantajaṃ bhayam // HV_44.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7234: amitrāṇāṃ priyakarair mohair adhṛtir īśvaraḥ // HV_44.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7235: yat tvayā strīkṛte mohāt sabalo rāvaṇo hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7236: naitad aupayikaṃ manye mahat te karma kutsitam // HV_44.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7238: prahṛtaṃ rākṣase nīce naiṣa dṛṣṭaḥ satāṃ vidhiḥ // HV_44.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7239: satām akrodhajo dharmaḥ śubhāṃ nayati sadgatim /
GE07hv_conpu:7240: yat tvayā nihato mohād dūṣitāś ca vanaukasaḥ // HV_44.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:7241: sa eva rāvaṇo dhanyo yas tvayā vratacāriṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:7242: strīnimittaṃ hato yuddhe grāmyān dharmān avekṣatā // HV_44.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:7243: yadi te sa hataḥ saṃkhye durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7244: yudhyasvādya mayā sārdhaṃ mṛdhe yady asi vīryavān // HV_44.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7245: tasya dūtasya tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tattvavādinaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7247: asad etat tvayā dūta kathitaṃ tasya gauravāt /
GE07hv_conpu:7248: yan māṃ kṣipasi doṣeṇa vedātmānaṃ ca susthiram // HV_44.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7249: yady ahaṃ satpathe mūḍho yadi vā rāvaṇo hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7250: yadi vā me hṛtā bhāryā tasya kā paridevanā // HV_44.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:7251: na vāṅmātreṇa duṣyanti sādhavaḥ satpathe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7252: jāgarti ca yathā daivaṃ sadā satsv itareṣu ca // HV_44.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:7253: kṛtaṃ dūtena yat kāryaṃ gaccha tvaṃ dūta māciram /
GE07hv_conpu:7256: tasya daityasya durbuddhe mṛdhe pratikariṣyati // HV_44.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:7257: evam uktaḥ sa dūtas tu yayau saumitriṇā saha /
GE07hv_conpu:7259: sa śīghrayānaḥ saṃprāptas tad dānavavanaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:7260: cakre niveśaṃ saumitrir vanānte yuddhalālasaḥ // HV_44.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7261: tato dūtasya vacanāt sa daityaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7262: jaghane tad vanaṃ kṛtvā yuddhāyābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_44.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7263: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ saumitrer dānavasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7264: ubhayor eva dhṛtayoḥ śūrayo raṇamūrdhani // HV_44.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7266: na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyaṃ śramaṃ vāpy upajagmatuḥ // HV_44.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7267: atha saumitriṇā bāṇaiḥ pīḍito dānavo yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:7268: tataḥ sa śūlarahitaḥ paryahīyata dānavaḥ // HV_44.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7270: sa gṛhītvāṅkuśaṃ caiva devair dattavaraṃ raṇe | *HV_44.49*556:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7275: śiraś ciccheda khaḍgena lavaṇasya mahāmṛdhe // HV_44.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:7276: [k: For 50cd, Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2(marg) Ds D4.5 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7277: aṅkuśaṃ caiva ciccheda daityasya ca śiro mahat | *HV_44.50*557 |
GE07hv_conpu:7278: sa hatvā dānavaṃ saṃkhye saumitrir mitranandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7279: tad vanaṃ tasya daityasya cicchedāstreṇa buddhimān // HV_44.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:7280: chittvā vanaṃ sa saumitrir niveśam abhirocayat /
GE07hv_conpu:7281: bhavāya tasya deśasya purīṃ paramadharmavit // HV_44.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:7282: tasmin madhuvanasthāne mathurā nāma sā purī /
GE07hv_conpu:7283: śatrughnena purā sṛṣṭā hatvā taṃ dānavaṃ raṇe // HV_44.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:7293: kṣetrāṇi rasavanty asyāḥ kāle devaś ca varṣati // HV_44.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:7298: yamunāyās taṭe ramye mathurā nāma viśrutā | *HV_44.58*558:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:7300: niviṣṭo viṣayaś caiva śūrasenas tato 'bhavat // HV_44.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:7303: tasya putratvam āpanno yo 'sauviṣṇo tvayā hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7308: bhayadaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ satpathād bāhyatāṃ gataḥ // HV_44.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:7310: yuktas tenaiva darpeṇa prajānāṃ lomaharṣaṇaḥ // HV_44.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:7313: sa kaṃsas tatra saṃbhūtas tvayā yuddhe parājitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7315: sa badhvā pitaraṃ rājā mathurām abhyarakṣata | *HV_44.66*559 |
GE07hv_conpu:7317: yo 'py asau hayavikrānto hayagrīva iti smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7318: keśī nāma hayo jātaḥ sa tasyaiva jaghanyajaḥ // HV_44.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:7320: vṛndāvane vasaty eko nṛṇāṃ māṃsāni bhakṣayan // HV_44.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:7322: gavām aritvam āpannaḥ kāmarūpī mahāsuraḥ // HV_44.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:7323: riṣṭo nāma diteḥ putro variṣṭho dānaveṣu yaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7324: sa kuñjaratvam āpanno daityaḥ kaṃsasya vāhanaḥ // HV_44.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:7325: [k: For 70cd, K2-4 Ñ V B D (D6 om.) T3.4 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7326: kuñjaratvam agād daityaḥ kaṃsasyaiva sa vāhanaḥ | *HV_44.70*560 |
GE07hv_conpu:7328: pralambo nāma bhūtvāsau vaṭaṃ bhāṇḍīram āśritaḥ // HV_44.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:7330: śikharo nāma balavān ya āsīd dānavarṣabhaḥ | *HV_44.71*561 |
GE07hv_conpu:7331: khara ity ucyate daityo dhenukaḥ so 'surottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7332: ghoraṃ tālavanaṃ daityaś caraty utsārayan prajāḥ // HV_44.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:7333: varāhaś ca kiśoraś ca tāv ubhau dānavottamau /
GE07hv_conpu:7334: mallau raṅgagatau tau tu jātau cāṇūramuṣṭikau // HV_44.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:7335: yau tau mayaś ca tāraś ca dānavau dānavāntaka /
GE07hv_conpu:7336: prāgjyotiṣe tau bhaumasya narakasya pure ratau // HV_44.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:7337: ete daityā vinihatās tvayā viṣṇo nirākṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7338: mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthāya bādhante bhuvi mānavān // HV_44.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:7340: tava prasādāt teṣāṃ vai dānavānāṃ kṣayo bhavet // HV_44.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:7341: tava te divi bibhyanti tvatto bibhyanti sāgare /
GE07hv_conpu:7342: pṛthivyāṃ bibhyati tvatto nānyasya tu kathaṃcana // HV_44.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:7344: divaś cyutasya daityasya gatir bhavati medinī // HV_44.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:7346: durlabhaṃ svargagamanaṃ tvayi jāgrati keśava // HV_44.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:7347: tad āgaccha svayaṃ viṣṇo gacchāva pṛthivītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7350: tāsu sṛṣṭās tvayā devāḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti bhūtale // HV_44.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:7352: setsyate ca sa kāryārtho yasyārthe bhūmir āgatā // HV_44.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:7353: tvaṃ bhārate kāryagurus tvaṃ cakṣus tvaṃ parāyaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7354: tad āgaccha hṛṣīkeśa kṣitau tāñ jahi dānavān // HV_44.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:7357: chapter 45, transliterated and proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of December 19, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:7360: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ vareṇyaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_45.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7361: trailokyasya hitārthāya yan mā vadasi nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:7362: tasya samyakpravṛttasya śrūyatām uttaraṃ vacaḥ // HV_45.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7363: viditā dehino jātā mayaite bhuvi dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7364: yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ samāsthāya daityaḥ puṣyati vigraham // HV_45.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:7366: keśinaṃ cāpi jānāmi daityaṃ turagavigraham // HV_45.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7368: ariṣṭaṃ caiva jānāmi daityaṃ vṛṣabharūpiṇam // HV_45.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:7369: vidito me kharaś caiva pralambaś ca mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7370: sā ca me viditā vipra pūtanā duhitā baleḥ // HV_45.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:7373: vidito me jarāsaṃdhaḥ sthito mūrdhni mahīkṣitām /
GE07hv_conpu:7374: prāgjyotiṣapure cāpi narakaṃ sādhu tarkaye // HV_45.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7375: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Ds D4 T3.4 ins. after 8, D2 cont. after *563: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7377: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Ds D4 T3.4 cont., K Dn D1-3.5 T1.2 G M4 ins. after 8: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7380: [k: T1.2 G M4 cont., M1-3 ins. after 8: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7381: śiśupālaṃ ca jānāmi tau haṃsaḍimakau tathā | *HV_45.8*564:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7382: jānāmi pauṇḍraṃ sālvaṃ ca taṃ kālayavanaṃ tathā || *HV_45.8*564:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7383: ekalavyaṃ ca jānāmi ye cānye duṣṭacāriṇaḥ | *HV_45.8*564:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:7384: tān sarvān nihaniṣyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā | *HV_45.8*564:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:7385: mayy āsaktāṃ ca jānāmi bhāratīṃ mahatīṃ dhuram /
GE07hv_conpu:7386: tac ca sarvaṃ vijānāmi yathā sthāsyanti te nṛpāḥ // HV_45.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7387: kṣayo bhuvi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ śakraloke ca satkriyā /
GE07hv_conpu:7389: saṃpravekṣyāmy ahaṃ yogam ātmanaś ca parasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7390: saṃprāpya pārthivaṃ lokaṃ mānuṣatvam upāgataḥ // HV_45.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7391: kaṃsādīṃś cāpi tān sarvān vadhiṣyāmi mahāsurān /
GE07hv_conpu:7392: tena tena vidhānena yena yaḥ śāntim eṣyati // HV_45.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7393: anupraviśya yogena tās tā hi gatayo mama /
GE07hv_conpu:7394: amīṣām amarendrāṇāṃ hantavyā ripavo yudhi // HV_45.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:7397: viniścayo hi prāg eva nāradāyaṃ kṛto mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7398: nivāsaṃ tu na me brahmā vidadhāti pitāmahaḥ // HV_45.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7399: yatra deśe yathā jāto yena veṣeṇa vā vasan /
GE07hv_conpu:7400: tān ahaṃ samare hanyāṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha // HV_45.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7402: nārāyaṇemaṃ siddhārtham upāyaṃ śṛṇu me vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:7403: bhuvi yas te janayitā jananī ca bhaviṣyati // HV_45.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7404: yatra vai tvaṃ mahābāho jātaḥ kulakaro bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:7406: tāṃś cāsurān samutsādya vaṃśaṃ kṛtvātmano mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:7407: sthāpayiṣyasi maryādāṃ nṛṇāṃ tan me niśāmaya // HV_45.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7408: purā hi kaśyapo viṣṇo varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7409: jahāra yajñiyā gāvaḥ payodāś ca mahāmakhe // HV_45.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7410: aditiḥ surabhiś cobhe dve bhārye kaśyapasya tu /
GE07hv_conpu:7411: pradīyamānā gās tās tu naicchatāṃ varuṇasya vai // HV_45.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7413: uvāca bhagavan gāvo guruṇā me hṛtā iti // HV_45.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7414: kṛtakāryo hi gās tās tu nānujānāti me guruḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7415: anvavartata bhārye dve aditiṃ surabhiṃ tathā // HV_45.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7416: mama tā hy akṣayā gāvo divyāḥ kāmadughā vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:7417: caranti sagārān sarvān rakṣitāḥ svena tejasā // HV_45.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:7418: kas tā dharṣayituṃ śakto mama gāḥ kaśyapād ṛte /
GE07hv_conpu:7419: akṣayaṃ yāḥ kṣaranty agraṃ payo devāmṛtopamam // HV_45.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7420: prabhur vā vyutthito brahman gurur vā yadi vetaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7421: tvayā niyamyāḥ sarve vai tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_45.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7422: yadi prabhavatāṃ daṇḍo loke kāryam ajānatām /
GE07hv_conpu:7423: na vidyate lokaguro na syur vai lokasetavaḥ // HV_45.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7424: yathā vāstu tathā vāstu kartavye bhagavān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7425: mama gāvaḥ pratīyantāṃ tato gantāsmi sāgaram // HV_45.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7426: yas te 'tmā devatā gāvo yā gāvaḥ sa tvam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7427: lokānāṃ tvatpravṛttānām ekaṃ gobrāhmaṇaṃ smṛtam // HV_45.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7428: trātavyāḥ prathamaṃ gāvas trātās trāyanti tā dvijān /
GE07hv_conpu:7431: gavāṃ kāraṇatattvajñaḥ kaśyape śāpam utsṛjam // HV_45.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7433: sa tenāṃśena jagatīṃ gatvā gopatvam eṣyati // HV_45.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7434: yā ca sā surabhir nāma yāditiś ca surāraṇiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7435: te 'py ubhe tasya vai bhārye saha tenaiva yāsyataḥ // HV_45.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7436: [k: K1(marg.).2.3 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.2.4.5 T3.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7437: tābhyāṃ saha sa gopatve kaśyapo bhuvi raṃsyate | *HV_45.33*565 |
GE07hv_conpu:7439: vasudeva iti khyāto goṣu tiṣṭhati bhūtale // HV_45.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7440: girir govardhano nāma mathurāyās tv adūrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7441: tatrāsau goṣu nirataḥ kaṃsasya karadāyakaḥ // HV_45.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:7442: tasya bhāryādvayaṃ caiva aditiḥ surabhis tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:7443: devakī rohiṇī caiva vasudevasya dhīmataḥ // HV_45.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:7445: surabhī rohiṇī devī cāditir devakī tv abhūt | *HV_45.36*566 |
GE07hv_conpu:7447: jayāśīrvacanais tv ete vardhayanti divaukasaḥ // HV_45.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7448: ātmānam ātmanā hi tvam avatārya mahītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7449: devakīṃ rohiṇīṃ caiva garbhābhyāṃ paritoṣaya // HV_45.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:7451: vardhayasva mahābāho purā traivikrame yathā // HV_45.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7454: gāś ca te rakṣato viṣṇo vanāni paridhāvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7455: vanamālāparikṣiptaṃ dhanyā drakṣyanti te vapuḥ // HV_45.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:7460: bāle tvayi mahābāho loko bālatvam eṣyati // HV_45.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:7462: [k: K3 Ñ2.3 V B Dn D2.5(marg.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7463: goṣu gopā bhaviṣyanti sahāyāḥ satataṃ tava | *HV_45.43*568 |
GE07hv_conpu:7464: vane cārayato gās tu goṣṭhāṃś ca paridhāvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7465: majjato yamunāyāṃ ca ratim āpsyanti te tvayi // HV_45.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:7467: yas tvayā tāta ity uktaḥ putra ity eva vakṣyati // HV_45.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:7469: sa hi dhanyataro loke yasya tvaṃ putratāṃ gataḥ | *HV_45.44*569:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7470: sa hi puṇyakṛtāṃ śreṣṭho yas tvāṃ putreti kīrtayet || *HV_45.44*569:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7472: te hi puṇyakṛtāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ praṇamyāḥ sarvajantubhiḥ | *HV_45.44*569:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:7473: atha vā kasya putratvaṃ gaccheran yatra kaśyapāt /
GE07hv_conpu:7474: kā ca dhārayituṃ śaktā viṣṇo tvām aditiṃ vinā // HV_45.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7476: vayam apy ālayaṃ svaṃ gacchāmo madhusūdana // HV_45.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7477: [k: T G1.2.4.5 M ins. after 46, G3 after 48ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7479: jagāma sa prabhur gehaṃ devāś cāpi yathāgatam | *HV_45.46*570:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7481: jagāma viṣṇuḥ svaṃ deśaṃ kṣīrodasyottarāṃ diśam // HV_45.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7482: tatraiva pārvatī nāma guhā meroḥ sudurgamā /
GE07hv_conpu:7483: tribhis tasyaiva vikrāntair nityaṃ parvasu pūjitā // HV_45.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7484: purāṇaṃ tatra vinyasya dehaṃ harir udāradhīḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7485: ātmānaṃ yojayām āsa vasudevagṛhe prabhuḥ // HV_45.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7488: ch. 46, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version March 4, 2002. Not yet proof-read. :h]
GE07hv_conpu:7489: [k: Before the ref., Poona ed. ins. the introductory mantra; while G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7494: māṃ nirāśaṃ gatakleśaṃ kurvan āśaṃ hare 'niśam | *HV_46.0*571:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7496: jñātvā viṣṇuṃ kṣitigataṃ bhāgāṃś ca tridivaukasām /
GE07hv_conpu:7497: vināśaśaṃsī kaṃsasya nārado mathurāṃ yayau // HV_46.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7499: preṣayām āsa kaṃsasya ugrasenasutasya vai // HV_46.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7500: [k: K3 Ñ2.3 V B D(D6 om.) T3.4 ins. after 2; G(ed.) cont. after *573: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7501: sa dūtaḥ kathayām āsa muner āgamanaṃ nṛpe | *HV_46.2*572 |
GE07hv_conpu:7502: [k: On the other hand, T1.2 G M G(ed.) ins. after 2: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7504: iti śrutvā sa kaṃsasya dvārapālas tvarann iva || *HV_46.2*573:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7505: gatvā tu tvaritaṃ rājann uvāca madhureśvaram | *HV_46.2*573:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:7513: niṣasādāsane tasmin sa vai śakrasakho muniḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7516: gate tv evaṃ mama vacaḥ śrūyatāṃ gṛhyatāṃ ca vai // HV_46.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:7518: evaṃ gate mahārāja śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama | *HV_46.7*574 |
GE07hv_conpu:7520: gataḥ sūryasakhaṃ tāta vipulaṃ meruparvatam // HV_46.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7522: āplutaṃ me sutīrthāsu saritsu saha daivataiḥ // HV_46.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7523: divyā tridhārā dṛṣṭā me puṇyā tripathagā nadī /
GE07hv_conpu:7525: divyāṃ tripathagāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇyāṃ bhāgirathīṃ nadīm | *HV_46.10ab*575 |
GE07hv_conpu:7527: divyā tripathagā dṛṣṭā puṇyā bhāgīrathī nadī | *HV_46.10ab*576 |
GE07hv_conpu:7528: [k: After 10ab, N (except Ś1 K4 Ñ1; D6 om.) T G M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7529: smaraṇād eva sarveṣām aṃhasāṃ yā vibhedinī | *HV_46.10ab*577 |
GE07hv_conpu:7530: upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca tīrtheṣu divyeṣu ca yathākramam // HV_46.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:7534: saṃgṛhya vīṇāṃ saṃsaktām agacchaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sabhām // HV_46.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7537: tatra manatrayatām evaṃ devatānāṃ mayā śrutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7539: tatraiṣā devakī yā te mathurāyāṃ pitṛṣvasā /
GE07hv_conpu:7540: asyā garbho 'ṣṭamaḥ kaṃsa sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_46.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7541: devānāṃ sa tu sarvasvaṃ tridivasya gatiś ca saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7542: paraṃ rahasyaṃ devānāṃ sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_46.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7543: parato 'pi paras tv eṣāṃ svayaṃbhūś ca savayaṃbhuvām /
GE07hv_conpu:7544: tatas te tan mahad bhūtaṃ divyaṃ na kathayāmy aham // HV_46.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7545: ślāghyaś ca sa hi te mṛtyur bhūtapūrvaś ca taṃ smara /
GE07hv_conpu:7546: yatnaś ca kriyatāṃ kaṃsa garbhasthe yadi śakyate // HV_46.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:7547: eṣā me tvadgatā prītir ityarthaṃ cāham āgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7548: bhujyantāṃ sarvakāmārthāḥ svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham // HV_46.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7552: ity uktvā nārade yāte tasya vākyaṃ vicintayan /
GE07hv_conpu:7553: jahāsoccais tataḥ kaṃsaḥ pakāśadaśanaś ciram // HV_46.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7554: sasmitaṃ ceva provāca bhṛtyānām agrataḥ sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7555: hāsyaḥ khalu sa sattveṣu nārado na viśāradaḥ // HV_46.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7556: nāhaṃ bhīṣayituṃ śakyo devair api savāsavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7557: āhavasthaḥ śayāno vā pramato matta eva vā // HV_46.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7558: yo 'haṃ dorbhyām udārābhyāṃ kṣobhaye 'haṃ dharām imām /
GE07hv_conpu:7559: ko 'sti yo mānuṣe loke māṃ kṣobhayitum utsahet // HV_46.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7562: ājñāpyatāṃ hayaḥ keśī pralambo dhenukas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:7563: ariṣṭo vṛṣabhaś caiva pūtanā kāliyas tathā // HV_46.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7565: praharadhvaṃ ca sarveṣu ye 'smākaṃ pakṣadūṣakāḥ // HV_46.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7566: garbhasthānām api gatir vijñeyā bhuvi dehinām /
GE07hv_conpu:7567: nāradena hi garbhebhyo bhayaṃ naḥ samudāhṛtam // HV_46.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7569: māṃ ca vo nātham āśritya nāsti devakṛtaṃ bhayam // HV_46.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7570: sa tu kelikilo vipro bhedaśīlaś ca nāradaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7571: suśliṣṭān api lokeṣu bhedayaṃl labhate ratim // HV_46.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7573: ghaṭayāno narendrāṇāṃ tantrīvairāṇi caiva ha // HV_46.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7574: evaṃ sa vilapann eva vāṅmātreṇa tu kevalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7575: viveśa kaṃso bhavanaṃ dahyamānena cetasā // HV_46.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7577: ch. 47, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version March 4, 2002. Not yet proof-read. :h]
GE07hv_conpu:7579: so ājñāpayata saṃrabdhaḥ sacivān ātmano hitān /
GE07hv_conpu:7580: yattā bhavata sarve vai devakyā garabhakṛntane // HV_47.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7581: prathamād eva hantavyā garbhās te sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_conpu:7582: mūlād eva hi hantavyaḥ so 'nartho yatra saṃśayaḥ // HV_47.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7583: devakī ca gṛhe guptā pracchannair abhirakṣitā /
GE07hv_conpu:7584: svairaṃ caratu visrabdhā madbalair yatnam āsthitaiḥ // HV_47.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:7585: māsān vai puṣpamāsādīn gaṇayantu mama striyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7586: pariṇāme tu garbhasya śeṣaṃ jñāsyāmahe vayam // HV_47.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7588: apramattair mama hitai rātrāv ahani caiva ha /
GE07hv_conpu:7589: strībhir varṣavaraiś caiva vaktavyaṃ na ca kāraṇam // HV_47.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:7590: eṣa mānuṣako yatno mānuṣair eva sādhyate /
GE07hv_conpu:7591: śrūyatāṃ yena daivaṃ hi madvidhaiḥ pratihanyate // HV_47.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:7593: yatnena cānukūlena daivam apy anuvartate // HV_47.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:7595: bhayena mantrayām āsa śrutārtho nāradāt sa vai // HV_47.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7602: antardhānaṃ gato viṣṇuś cintayām āsa vīryavān // HV_47.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7604: aṣṭame ca mayā garbhe kāryam ādhānam ātmanaḥ // HV_47.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:7605: tasya cintayatas tv evaṃ pātālam agaman manaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7606: yatra te garbhaśayanāḥ ṣadgarbhā nāma dānavāḥ // HV_47.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7608: amarapratimā yuddhe putrā vai kālaneminaḥ // HV_47.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7609: [k: After 12, all Mss. (except Ś1 M1-3; G4 damaged) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7615: teṣāṃ prīto 'bhavad brahmā ṣadgarbhāṇāṃ varaṃ dadau /
GE07hv_conpu:7616: [k: Ñ (except Ś1) T G1.3-5 M4 G2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7619: brūta vo yasya yaḥ kāmaḥ ko varo vaḥ pradīyatāṃ // HV_47.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:7620: te tu sarve samānārthā daityā brahmāṇam abruvan /
GE07hv_conpu:7621: yadi no bhagavān prītaḥ śrūyatāṃ no varo varaḥ // HV_47.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7625: mā bhūd vadho no bhagavan dadāsi yadi no varam // HV_47.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7627: bhavadbhir yad idaṃ proktaṃ sarvam etad bhaviṣyati // HV_47.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:7628: ṣaḍgarbhāṇāṃ varaṃ dasttvā svayaṃbhūs tridivaṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7629: tato hiraṇyakaśipuḥ saroṣo vākyam abravīt // HV_47.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7630: mām utsṛjya varo yasmād vṛto vaḥ padmasaṃbhavāt /
GE07hv_conpu:7631: tasmād vas tyājitaḥ snehaḥ śatrubhūtāṃs tyajāmy aham // HV_47.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7632: ṣaḍgarbhā iti yo yaṃ vaḥ śabdaḥ pitrābhivardhitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7633: sa eva vo garbhagatān pitā sarvān vadhiṣyati // HV_47.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7634: ṣaḍ eva devakīgarbhāḥ ṣadgarbhā vai mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7635: bhaviṣyanti tataḥ kaṃso garbhasthān vo vadhiṣyati // HV_47.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7637: śaptvā caivaṃ tato daityān daityeśo roṣamūrcchitaḥ | *HV_47.22*584:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7639: jñātvā haris tu taṃ śāpaṃ kaṃsasya ca viniścayam | *HV_47.22*584:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:7640: jagāmātha tato viṣṇuḥ pātālaṃ yatra te śurāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7642: sa dadarśa jale suptān ṣaḍgarbhān garbhasaṃsthitān /
GE07hv_conpu:7643: nidrayā kālarūpiṇyā sarvān antarhitān iva // HV_47.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:7644: svapnarūpeṇa teṣāṃ vai viṣṇur dehān athāviśat /
GE07hv_conpu:7645: prāṇeśvarāṃś ca niṣkṛṣya nidrāyai pradadau tadā // HV_47.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7646: tāṃ covāca tadā nidrāṃ viṣṇuḥ satyaparākramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7648: imān prāṇeśvarān gṛhya ṣaḍgarbhān nāma dehinaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7649: [k: K N V B2 Dn Ds D1.4.5 G4 ins. after 27a, D6 after 27b: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7652: ṣaṭsu garbheṣu devakyā yojayasva yathākramam // HV_47.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7653: jāteṣv eteṣu garbheṣu nīteṣu ca yamakṣayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7654: kaṃsasya viphale yatne devakyāḥ saphale śrame // HV_47.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7656: yena sarvasya lokasya devi devī bhavīṣyasi // HV_47.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7661: sa saṃkrāmayitavyas te saptame māsi rohiṇīm // HV_47.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7662: saṃkarṣaṇāt tu garbhasya sa tu saṃkarṣaṇo yuvā /
GE07hv_conpu:7663: bhaviṣyaty agrajo bhrātā mama śītāṃśudarśanaḥ // HV_47.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7665: aṣṭame mayi garbhasthe kaṃso yatnaṃ kariṣyati // HV_47.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7666: yā tu sā nandagopasya dayitā kaṃsagopateḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7667: yaśodā nāma bhadraṃ te bhāryā gopakulodvahā // HV_47.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7668: tasyās tvaṃ navamo 'smākaṃ kule garbho bhaviṣyasi /
GE07hv_conpu:7669: navamyām eva saṃjāto kṛṣṇapakṣasya vai tithau // HV_47.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7670: ahaṃ tv abhijito yoge niśāyā yauvane gate /
GE07hv_conpu:7672: aṣṭamasya tu māsasya jātāv āvāṃ tataḥ samam /
GE07hv_conpu:7673: prāpsyāvo garabhavyatyāsaṃ prāpte kaṃsasya śasane // HV_47.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:7674: ahaṃ yaśodāṃ yāsyāmi tvaṃ devi bhaja devakīm /
GE07hv_conpu:7675: āvayor garbhavyatyāse kaṃso gacchatu mūḍhatām // HV_47.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7676: tatas tvāṃ gṛhya caraṇe śilāyāṃ nirasiṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:7679: nirasyamānā gagane sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam // HV_47.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:7681: bibhratī vipulān bāhūn mama bāhūpamān bhuvi // HV_47.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7682: triśikhaṃ śūlam udyamya khaḍgaṃ ca kanakatsarum /
GE07hv_conpu:7683: pātrīṃ ca pūrṇāṃ madhunaḥ paṅkajaṃ ca sunirmalam // HV_47.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:7690: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-5 T3.4 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7691: bhujagābhair bhujair bhīmair bhūṣayantī diśo daśa | *HV_47.43*588 |
GE07hv_conpu:7695: aṅgajena mayūrāṇām aṅgadena ca bhāsvatā // HV_47.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:7697: kaumāraṃ vratam āsthāya atridivaṃ tvaṃ gamiṣyasi // HV_47.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7698: tatra tvāṃ śatadṛk śakro matpradiṣṭena karmaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:7699: abhiṣekeṇa divyena daivataiḥ saha yokṣyate // HV_47.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7700: tatraiva tvāṃ bhaginyarthe grahiṣyati sa vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7701: kuśikasya tu gotreṇa kauśikī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // HV_47.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7702: sa te vindhye nagaśreṣṭhe sthānaṃ dāsyati śāśvatam /
GE07hv_conpu:7703: tataḥ sthānasahasreais tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ śobhayiṣyasi // HV_47.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7705: tau ca kṛtvā manasi māṃ sānugau nāśayiṣyasi // HV_47.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7709: tithau navamyāṃ pūjāṃ ca prāpsyase sapaśukriyām // HV_47.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:7710: ye ca tvāṃ matprabhāvajñāḥ praṇamiṣyanti mānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7711: na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcit putrato dhanato 'pi vā // HV_47.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:7713: dasyubhir vā niruddhānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā nṛṇām // HV_47.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:7714: tvaṃ siddhiḥ śrīr dhṛtiḥ kīrtir hrīr vidyā saṃnatir matiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7716: saṃdhyā lakṣmīr vapur medhā kāntiḥ śraddhā kriyā gatiḥ | *HV_47.54ab*590 |
GE07hv_conpu:7717: saṃdhyā rātriḥ prabhā nidrā kālarātris tathaiva ca // HV_47.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:7718: [k: K1-3 Ñ V B D T2-4 G M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7719: tvāṃ tu stoṣyanti ye bhaktyā stavenānena vai śubhe | *HV_47.54*591:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7720: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati || *HV_47.54*591:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7725: [k: Ś1 K4 Ñ1 V2.3 B1 Ds D1 T3 ins. after 54,
GE07hv_conpu:7726: K1-3 Ñ2.3 V1 B2.3 Dn D2-6 T1.2.4 G1.2.4.5 M4 after the repetition of 54,
GE07hv_conpu:7728: a passage given in App. I (No. 8). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7729: nṛṇāṃ bandhaṃ vadhaṃ ghoraṃ putranāśaṃ dhanakṣayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7733: mohayitvā ca taṃ kaṃsam ekā tvaṃ bhokṣyase jagat / [k:
GE07hv_conpu:7734: K Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-5 T3 ins. after 56ab;
GE07hv_conpu:7735: D6 T2 G1-3.5 M4 after the repetition of 56ab; T1 after 56: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7736: aham apy ātmano vṛttiṃ vidhāsye goṣu gopavat | *HV_47.56ab*593 |
GE07hv_conpu:7737: svavṛddhyartham ahaṃ caiva kariṣye kaṃsaghātanam // HV_47.56 //

GE07hv_conpu:7970: sa nandagopaṃ tvaritaḥ provāca śubhayā girā /

GE07hv_conpu:7980: bālye kelikilaḥ sarvo bālye mūrcchanty amānuṣāḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:7984: hriyate hi balāt prajñā prājñasyāpi sato mama /

GE07hv_conpu:7986: tad yathā rauhiṇeyaṃ tvaṃ nandagopa mamātmajam /
GE07hv_conpu:7987: gopāyasi yathā tāta tattvānveṣī tathā kuru /
GE07hv_conpu:7988: vighnā hi bahavo loke bālān uttrāsayanti hi // HV_49.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:7989: sa ca putro mama jyāyān kanīyāṃs tava cāpy ayam /

GE07hv_conpu:7992: śobhetāṃ govraje tasmin nandagopa tathā kuru // HV_49.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7993: na ca vṛndāvane kāryo gavāṃ ghoṣaḥ kadācana /
GE07hv_conpu:7996: tatra vāse tu bhetavyaṃ keśinaḥ pāpadarśinaḥ // HV_49.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:7998: goṣṭheṣu gobhyo vatsebhyo rakṣyau te dvāv imau śiśū // HV_49.11 //

GE07hv_conpu:8072: jyeṣṭhaḥ saṃkarṣaṇo nāma yavīyān kṛṣṇa eva tu // HV_50.2 //
