GE07hv_conpu:8077: avadhānaparo bhūtvā śṛṇu rājan yad icchasi || *HV_50.3*630:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:8078: sa tatra yogam āsthāya dānavāṃś cāvadhīt kila || *HV_50.3*630:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:8079: kaścid danoḥ suto vīraḥ kṛṣṇasya vadhakāṅkṣayā | *HV_50.3*630:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:8080: nandasya priyatām āyāc chākaṭaṃ vapur udvahan | *HV_50.3*630:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:8081: śakaṭasya tv adhaḥ suptaṃ kadācit putragṛddhinī /
GE07hv_conpu:8082: yaśodā taṃ samutsṛjya jagāma yamunāṃ nadīm // HV_50.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:8086: hāsyaṃ kurvañ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇo netrābhyāṃ parivibhraman || *HV_50.5ab*631:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:8087: karaṃ kareṇa saṃpīḍya pādaṃ pādena pīḍayan | *HV_50.5ab*631:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:8090: ruroda madhuraṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pādāv ūrdhvaṃ prasārayan // HV_50.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:8092: [k: M3 ins. *631. D6,T,G,M1.2.4 ins. after 6ab: M3 cont. after *631: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8094: nyubjaṃ payodharākāṅkṣī cakāra ca ruroda ca // HV_50.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:8097: sā dadarśa viparyastaṃ śakaṭaṃ vāyunā vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:8098: hāheti kṛtvā tvaritā dārakaṃ jagṛhe tadā // HV_50.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:8099: na sā bubodha tat tena śakaṭaṃ parivartitam /
GE07hv_conpu:8100: svasti me dārakāyeti prītyā bhītā ca sābhavat // HV_50.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:8101: kiṃ nu vakṣyati te putra pitā paramakopanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8102: tvayy adhaḥ śakaṭe supte śakaṭe ca viloḍite // HV_50.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:8103: kiṃ me snānena duḥsnānaṃ kiṃ ca me gamane nadīm /
GE07hv_conpu:8104: paryaste śakaṭe putra yā tvā paśyāmy apāvṛtam // HV_50.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:8106: kāṣāye vāsasī bibhran nandagopo vrajāntikam // HV_50.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:8110: api me svasti putrāyety asakṛd vacanaṃ vadan // HV_50.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:8111: pibantaṃ stanam ālakṣya putraṃ svastho 'bravīt punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8112: vṛṣayuddhaṃ vinā kena paryastaṃ śakaṭaṃ mama // HV_50.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:8114: na vijānāmy ahaṃ kena śakaṭaṃ pātitaṃ bhuvi // HV_50.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:8116: āgatā ca viparyastam apaśyaṃ śakaṭaṃ bhuvi // HV_50.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:8117: tayoḥ kathayator evam abruvaṃs tatra dārakāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8118: anena śiśunā yānam etat pādena pātitam /
GE07hv_conpu:8119: asmābhiḥ saṃpatadbhis tu dṛṣṭam etad yadṛcchayā // HV_50.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:8121: nandagopas tu tac chrutvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayau | *HV_50.18*633:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:8122: prahṛṣṭaś caiva bhītaś ca kim etad iti cintayan | *HV_50.18*633:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:8123: na ca te śraddadhur gopāḥ sarve mānuṣabuddhayaḥ | *HV_50.18*633:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:8125: svasthāne śakaṭaṃ caiva cakrabandham akārayan // HV_50.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:8127: nando 'ṅkam enam āropya bhūreṇuṃ parigṛhya ca | *HV_50.19*634:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:8128: pradakṣiṇaṃ śiraḥ kurvan mantram etaj jajāpa ha | *HV_50.19*634:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:8129: viṣṇus te pūrvataḥ pātu rudro rakṣatu dakṣiṇam | *HV_50.19*634:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:8130: brahmā ca paścimaṃ pāyāt skando rakṣatv athottaram | *HV_50.19*634:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:8131: upariṣṭāt tathā sūryaḥ pāyāc cādhaś ca vāsukiḥ | *HV_50.19*634:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:8132: pāyāc ca tvām atho vatsa śiṣṭāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ samīraṇaḥ | *HV_50.19*634:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:8134: gāvo rakṣantu sarvatra bhūmiḥ pātu sadāśivaḥ | *HV_50.19*634:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:8135: evam uccārya nandas tu kṛṣṇaṃ pasparśa sarvaśaḥ | *HV_50.19*634:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:8136: sa eva mantro bālānāṃ rakṣāyai parikīrtitaḥ | *HV_50.19*634:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:8139: T3 ins. after the addl. colophon; K3.4, Ñ1, Dn,
GE07hv_conpu:8154: sā muñca muñca bālam iti prabhāṣiṇī | *HV_50.20*637:5 |*
GE07hv_conpu:8159: sādrir mahī dyauś ca cacāla sagrahā | *HV_50.20*637:10 |*
GE07hv_conpu:8167: cūrṇayām āsa rājendra mahad āsīt tad adbhutam || *HV_50.20*637:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:8172: bālaṃ ca tasyā urasi krīḍantam akutobhayam | *HV_50.20*637:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:8177: rakṣāṃ cakruś ca śakṛtā dvādaśāṅgeṣu nāmabhiḥ | *HV_50.20*637:28 |
GE07hv_conpu:8181: dadau stanaṃ ca kṛṣṇāya tatra suptajane niśi /
GE07hv_conpu:8182: tasyāḥ stanaṃ papau kṛṣṇaḥ prāṇaiḥ saha nanāda ca // HV_50.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:8185: patantīṃ tāṃ tu saṃdṛśya śakunīṃ bhayaviklavām | *HV_50.22*638:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:8188: cakrākrāntā tu śakunī papāta ca mamāra ca | *HV_50.22*638:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:8189: nanāda ca mahānādaṃ punaḥ punar asau hariḥ | *HV_50.22*638:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:8190: tena śabdena vitrastās tato bubudhire janāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8191: sa nandagopo gopāś ca yaśodā ca suviklavā // HV_50.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:8192: te tām apaśyan patitāṃ visaṃjñāṃ vipayodharām /
GE07hv_conpu:8193: śakuniṃ nihatāṃ bhūmau vajreṇeva vidāritām // HV_50.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:8194: idaṃ kiṃ nv iti saṃtrastāḥ kasyedaṃ karma ceti ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8195: nandagopaṃ puraskṛtya gopās taṃ paryavārayan // HV_50.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8196: [k: After 25, N (except Ś1, Ñ1),S (except M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8197: nādhyagacchanta ca tadā hetuṃ tatra kadācana | *HV_50.25*639:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:8201: ko 'yaṃ vidhir na jānāmi vismayo me mahān ayam /
GE07hv_conpu:8202: putrasya me bhayaṃ bhīru bhīrutvaṃ samupāgatam // HV_50.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:8203: yaśodā tv abravīd bhītā nārya jānāmi kiṃ nv idam /
GE07hv_conpu:8204: dārakeṇa sahānena suptā śabdena bodhitā // HV_50.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:8206: kaṃsād bhayaṃ cakārograṃ vismayaṃ ca jagāma ha // HV_50.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:8209: transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_conpu:8210: extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner. version March 4,
GE07hv_conpu:8213: kāle gacchati saumyau tau dārakau kṛtanāmakau /
GE07hv_conpu:8215: pañca saṃvatsarān prāptau śobhayānau vrajaṃ muhuḥ | *HV_51.1ab*640 |
GE07hv_conpu:8217: tāv anyonyagatau bālau bālyād evaikatāṃ gatau /
GE07hv_conpu:8222: ekacaryau mahāvīryāv ekasya śiśutāṃ gatau // HV_51.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:8224: kṛtsnasya jagato gopau saṃvṛttau gopadārakau // HV_51.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:8228: rejatuḥ pāṃśudigdhāṅgau dṛptau kalabhakāv iva // HV_51.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:8230: tau tatra paridhāvetāṃ kumārāv iva pāvakī // HV_51.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:8234: janaṃ ca vipra kurvāṇau hasantau ca kvacit kvacit // HV_51.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:8244: ehi vatsa piba stanyaṃ durvoḍhuṃ mama saṃprati || *HV_51.13ab*642:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:8245: etāvantam itaḥ kālaṃ kvā gato 'si gṛhād bahiḥ | *HV_51.13ab*642:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:8246: ity ādāya kare putraṃ gṛhān nirvāsya sā ruṣā | *HV_51.13ab*642:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:8247: ānāyya śakaṭīmūlaṃ bhartsayantī punaḥ punaḥ // HV_51.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:8249: yadi śaknoṣi gaccheti tam uktvā karma sākarot /
GE07hv_conpu:8250: vyagrāyām tu yaśodāyām nirjagāma tato 'ṅgaṇāt // HV_51.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:8251: śiśulīlāṃ tataḥ kurvan kṛṣṇo vismāpayan vrajam /
GE07hv_conpu:8252: so 'ṅgaṇān niḥsṛtaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ karṣamāṇa udūkhalam // HV_51.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:8253: sa yamābhyām pravṛddhābhyām arjunābhyāṃ caran vane /
GE07hv_conpu:8254: niścakrāma śiśur madhyāt karṣamāṇa udūkhalam // HV_51.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:8255: tat tasya karṣato baddham tiryag gatam udūkhalam /
GE07hv_conpu:8256: lagnaṃ tābhyāṃ samūlābhyām arjunābhyāṃ cakarṣa ha // HV_51.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:8257: tāv arjunau kṛṣyamāṇau tena bālena raṃhasā /
GE07hv_conpu:8258: samūlaviṭapau bhagnau sa tu madhye jahāsa vai // HV_51.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:8260: tad dāma tasya bālasya prabhāvād abhavad dṛḍham // HV_51.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:8262: krandantyo vismayantyaś ca yaśodānikaṭaṃ yayuḥ // HV_51.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:8263: tās tu saṃbhrāntavadanā yaśodām ūcur aṅganāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8264: ehy āgaccha yaśodeti saṃbhrame kiṃ vilambase // HV_51.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:8265: yau tāv arjunavṛkṣau tu vraje satyopayācitau /
GE07hv_conpu:8267: tāv etau tava putrasya patitāv upari drumau | *HV_51.22ab*643 |
GE07hv_conpu:8268: putrasyopari tāv etau patitau te mahīruhau // HV_51.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:8269: dṛḍhena dāmnā tatraiva baddho vatsa ivodare /
GE07hv_conpu:8270: jahāsa madhye vṛkṣābhyāṃ tava putraḥ sa bālakaḥ // HV_51.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:8271: [k: M1.3 subst. for 23cd; M2 ins. after 23ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8272: prahasann eva vṛkṣābhyāṃ madhye krīḍann ivāṅgaṇe | *HV_51.23cd*644 |
GE07hv_conpu:8274: putram ānaya jīvantuṃ muktaṃ mṛtyumukhād iva // HV_51.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:8276: taṃ deśam agamad yatra patitau tau mahādrumau // HV_51.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8277: dadarśa tābhyāṃ sā madhye drumābhyām ātmajaṃ śiśum /
GE07hv_conpu:8278: dāmnā nibaddham udare karṣamāṇam udūkhalam // HV_51.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:8279: sagopīgopavṛddhaś ca sayuvā ca vrajas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:8280: paryagacchat tato draṣṭuṃ gopeṣu mahad adbhutam // HV_51.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:8285: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyutprapatanaṃ vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:8286: vinā hastikṛtaṃ doṣam kenemau pātitau drumau // HV_51.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:8287: aho bata na śobhetāṃ vimūlāv arjunāv imau /
GE07hv_conpu:8288: imau nipatitau bhūmau vitoyau jaladāv iva // HV_51.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:8289: [k: After 30, B2 Poona, Bom. and Cal. eds. and G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8291: nandagopa prasannau te drumāv evaṃgatāv api /
GE07hv_conpu:8292: yatra te dārako mukto vimūlābhyām avikṣataḥ // HV_51.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:8293: autpātikam idaṃ ghoṣe tṛtīyaṃ vartate tv iha /
GE07hv_conpu:8294: pūtanāyā nipātaś ca drumayoḥ śakaṭasya ca // HV_51.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:8295: asmin sthāne niveśo 'yaṃ ghoṣasyāsya na vidyate /
GE07hv_conpu:8296: utpātā hy atra dṛśyante kathayanto naśobhanam // HV_51.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:8297: nandagopas tu sahasā muktvā kṛṣṇam udūkhalāt /
GE07hv_conpu:8298: niveśya cāṅke suciraṃ mṛtaṃ punar ivāgatam // HV_51.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:8299: [k: K1.4,Ñ2,V2,B2.3,Dn,Ds,D2.3,T3,M4,G(ed.) ins. after 34: D5 after the repetition of 34cd: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8301: tato yaśodāṃ garhan vai nandagopo viveśa ha /
GE07hv_conpu:8302: sa ca gopajanaḥ sarvo ghoṣam eva jagāma ha // HV_51.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:8303: sa ca tenaiva nāmnā tu kṛṣṇo vai dāmabandhanāt /
GE07hv_conpu:8305: yena dāmnā nibaddho 'sāv udare sudṛḍhaṃ vraje | *HV_51.36ab*648 |
GE07hv_conpu:8306: ghoṣe dāmodara iti gopībhiḥ parigīyate // HV_51.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:8308: kṛṣṇasya bharataśreṣṭha ghoṣe nivasatas tadā // HV_51.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:8311: transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_conpu:8312: extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner. version March 4,
GE07hv_conpu:8316: tasminn eva vrajasthāne saptavarṣau babhūvatuḥ // HV_52.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:8320: [k: D6,T2,G,M1-3 ins. after 3ab; T1,M4,G(ed.) after the repetition of 3ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8322: śuśubhāte vanagatau triśīrṣāv iva pannagau // HV_52.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:8331: kālayantau ca daṇḍena vatsān vatsau diśaṃ prati || *HV_52.5*650:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:8335: khādantau khādayantau ca mūlāni ca phalāni ca || *HV_52.5*650:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:8336: tindukaṃ bhakṣayantu ca gopair āpatya bhūtale | *HV_52.5*650:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:8337: kīlair āpatya vṛkṣebhyaḥ khādayantu phalāni ca | *HV_52.5*650:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:8338: kvacid dhasantāv anyonyaṃ krīḍamānau kvacit kvacit /
GE07hv_conpu:8342: kvacid vṛkṣeṣu viśrāntau sthalīṣv iva yathāsukham | *HV_52.6ab*651:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:8349: evaṃ tu vatsapālau tau śobhayām āsatur vanam | *HV_52.7ab*653 |
GE07hv_conpu:8350: cañcūryantau ramantau sma kiśorāv iva cañcalau // HV_52.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:8352: gāyantu ca kvacid geyān susvaraṃ madhurasvaram | *HV_52.7*654:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:8354: gajān paravaśān geyaiḥ kurvantau ca gahāvane | *HV_52.7*654:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:8355: lokam itthaṃ carantau ca ramayantau ca ceṣṭitaiḥ | *HV_52.7*654:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:8356: atha dāmodaraḥ śrīmān saṃkarṣaṇam uvāca ha /
GE07hv_conpu:8357: ārya nāsmin vane śakyaṃ gopālaiḥ saha krīḍitum // HV_52.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:8360: gahanānīha yāny āsan kānanāni vanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8362: govāteṣv api ye vṛkṣāḥ parivṛttārgaleṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8363: sarve goṣṭhāgniṣu gatāḥ kṣayam akṣayavarcasaḥ // HV_52.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:8364: saṃnikṛṣṭāni yāny āsan kāṣṭhāni ca tṛṇāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8372: after 16ab; Ñ3,V1 after 14ab; V3,D1.4.6, T2,G1-3.5,M4 cont. after *656: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8375: nirvihaṃgam idaṃ śūnyaṃ nirvyañjanam ivāśanam // HV_52.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:8376: vikrīyamāṇaiḥ kaṣṭhaiś ca śākaiś ca vanasaṃbhavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8378: śailānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ ghoṣo ghoṣāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:8381: ins. *655, while K1,Ñ3,V,B,D,T2,G,M4 ins. after 16ab; K2,Ñ2 cont. after *655; T3.4 after 28ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8382: vanānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ gāvas tāś cāsmākaṃ parā gatiḥ | *HV_52.16ab*656 |
GE07hv_conpu:8383: tasmād anyad vanaṃ yāmaḥ pratyagravayasendhanam // HV_52.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:8384: icchanty anupabhuktāni bhoktuṃ gāvas tṛṇāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8385: tasmād vanaṃ navatṛṇaṃ gacchantu dhanino vrajāḥ // HV_52.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:8387: praśastā vai vrajā loke yathā vai cakracāriṇaḥ // HV_52.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:8389: na tṛṇaṃ bhuñjate gāvo nāpi tatpayaso hitam // HV_52.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:8391: carāmaḥ sahitā gobhiḥ kṣipraṃ saṃvāhyatāṃ vrajaḥ // HV_52.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:8398: tasya govardhano nāma nātidūre girir mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:8401: bhāṇḍīro nāma śuśubhe nīlamegha ivāmbare // HV_52.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8403: prayātā nandanasyeva nalinī saritāṃ varā // HV_52.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:8404: tatra govardhanaṃ caiva bhāṇḍīraṃ ca vanaspatim /
GE07hv_conpu:8405: kālindīṃ ca nadīṃ ramyāṃ drakṣyāvaś carataḥ sukham // HV_52.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:8407: sukhaṃ carantaṃ drakṣyāvaḥ kālindīṃ ca nadīṃ śubhām | *HV_52.27*657 |
GE07hv_conpu:8408: tatrāyaṃ vasatāṃ ghoṣas tyajyatāṃ nirguṇaṃ vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:8409: saṃvāhayāma bhadraṃ te kiṃcid utpādya kāraṇam // HV_52.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:8413: viniṣpetur bhayakarāḥ sarvataḥ śataśo vṛkāḥ // HV_52.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:8416: vṛkān niṣpatitān dṛṣṭvā goṣu vatseṣv atho nṛṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:8417: gopīṣu ca yathākāmaṃ vraje trāso 'bhavan mahān // HV_52.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:8418: te vṛkāḥ pancabaddhāś ca daśabaddhās tathāpare /
GE07hv_conpu:8424: bhakṣayadbhiś ca tair vatsāṃs trāsayadbhiś ca govrajān /
GE07hv_conpu:8425: niśi bālān haradbhiś ca vṛkair utsādyate vrajaḥ // HV_52.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:8426: na vanaṃ śakyate gantuṃ na gāś ca parirakṣitum /
GE07hv_conpu:8427: na vanāt kiṃcid āhartuṃ na ca vā tarituṃ nadīm // HV_52.35 //

GE07hv_conpu:9482: tvaryamāṇā mahendreṇa toyaṃ mumucur akṣayam // HV_61.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:9483: sa lambamānaḥ kṛṣṇasya bhujāgre saghano giriḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9485: sa meghanicayas tasthau giriṃ taṃ parivārya ha /
GE07hv_conpu:9486: puraṃ puraskṛtya yathā sphīto janapado mahān // HV_61.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:9487: niveśya taṃ kare śailaṃ tulayitvā ca sasmitam /
GE07hv_conpu:9488: provāca goptā gopānāṃ prajāpatir iva sthitaḥ // HV_61.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:9489: etad devair asaṃbhāvyaṃ divyena vidhinā mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:9490: kṛtaṃ girigṛhaṃ gopā nivātaśaraṇaṃ gavām // HV_61.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:9492: na trāsa iha vaḥ kāryo maddhastād dhi nipātane | *HV_61.53*717:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:9495: kṣipraṃ viśantu yūthāni gavām iha hi śāntaye /
GE07hv_conpu:9497: yathāvrajaṃ yathāyūthaṃ yathāsāraṃ ca vai sukham // HV_61.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:9500: [k: After 55cd, Ds D5 Bom. Poona eds. ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:9503: trailokyam apy utsahate grasituṃ kiṃ punar vrajam // HV_61.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:9505: gopānāṃ tumulo jajñe meghanādaś ca bāhyataḥ // HV_61.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:9507: tasya śailasya vipulaṃ pradaraṃ gahvarodaram // HV_61.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:9509: dadhāraikena hastena śailaṃ priyam ivātithim // HV_61.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:9510: tato vrajasya bhāṇḍāni yuktāni śakaṭāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9511: viviśur varṣabhītāni tad gṛhaṃ girinirmitam // HV_61.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:9512: atidaivaṃ tu kṛṣṇasya dṛṣṭvā tat karma vajrabhṛt /
GE07hv_conpu:9513: mithyāpratijño jaladān vārayāmāsa vai vibhuḥ // HV_61.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:9515: jagāma saṃvṛto meghair vṛtrahā svargam uttamam // HV_61.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:9516: nivṛtte saptarātre tu tiṣye skanne śatakratau /
GE07hv_conpu:9517: gatābhre vimale vyomni divase dīptabhāskare // HV_61.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:9519: khaṃ ca sthānaṃ tato ghoṣaḥ pratyayāt punar eva saḥ // HV_61.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:9521: prīto niveśayāmāsa dhruvāya varado vibhuḥ // HV_61.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:9524: transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_conpu:9525: extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; March 4,
GE07hv_conpu:9528: dhṛtaṃ govardhanaṃ dṛṣṭvā paritrātaṃ ca gokulam /
GE07hv_conpu:9529: kṛṣṇasya darśanaṃ śakro rocayāmāsa vismitaḥ // HV_62.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:9534: taṃ dṛśya bālaṃ mahatā tejasā dīptam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:9537: paryāptanayanaḥ śakraḥ sarvair netrair udaikṣata // HV_62.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:9541: sūpaviṣṭaṃ śilāpṛṣṭe śakraḥ sa vrīḍito 'bhavat // HV_62.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:9545: chāyayā ca tayā yuktaṃ keśavaṃ yajñarūpiṇam | *HV_62.7*720 |
GE07hv_conpu:9547: upatasthe gajaṃ hitvā kṛṣṇaṃ balaniṣūdanaḥ // HV_62.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:9549: rarāja devarājo vai vajrapūrṇakaraḥ prabhuḥ // HV_62.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:9551: [k: N (except Ś1),T,G1-3.5,M4 ins. after 10ab; G4 after 8: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:9557: [k: D6,T,G,M4 ins. after line 4; M1-3 after 10ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:9558: praṇāma akaroc chakraḥ kṣantavyam iti cābravīt | *HV_62.10ab*721A:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:9564: namas te viśvarūpāya namo lokahitāya te | *HV_62.10ab*721A:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:9568: yā yās tu devadevasya mūrtayo mūrtimattara | *HV_62.10ab*721A:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:9569: namas tābhyas tathā viṣṇo sarvābhyaḥ sarvakāmada || *HV_62.10ab*721A:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:9571: ajñānād etha vā jñānād roṣād vā yadunandana || *HV_62.10ab*721A:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:9573: na kenacid bhavāñ śāsyaḥ śāstā sarvasya vai prabho || *HV_62.10ab*721A:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:9574: tvannimittam idaṃ sarvam aindraṃ mama sudurlabham | *HV_62.10ab*721A:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:9576: tataś ca devadeveśa kṣantavyaṃ dāsa ity aham | *HV_62.10ab*721A:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:9577: ity uktvātha punar vākyaṃ vyājahāra śacīpatiḥ || *HV_62.10ab*721A:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:9581: na hi dāseṣu kopo 'sti svāmināṃ svāmisattama | *HV_62.10ab*721A:24 |
GE07hv_conpu:9582: atha divyena madhuram vyājahāra svareṇa tam // HV_62.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:9584: atidaivaṃ kṛtaṃ karma tvayā prītimatā gavām // HV_62.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:9586: yat tvayā rakṣitā gāvas tenāsmi paritoṣitaḥ // HV_62.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:9588: dhṛto veśma ivākāśe ko hy etena na vismayet // HV_62.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:9589: pratiṣiddhe mama mahe mayeyaṃ ruṣitena vai /
GE07hv_conpu:9590: ativṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā kṛṣṇa gavāṃ vai saptarātrikī // HV_62.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:9592: devaiḥ sadānavagaṇair durnivāryā mayi sthite // HV_62.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:9593: aho me supriyaṃ kṛṣṇa yat tvaṃ mānuṣadehavān /
GE07hv_conpu:9594: samagraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo vinigūhasi roṣitaḥ // HV_62.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:9595: sādhitaṃ devatānāṃ hi manye 'haṃ kāryam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:9596: tvayi mānuṣyam āpanne yuktenaivaṃ svatejasā // HV_62.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:9597: setsyate vīra kāryārtho na kiṃcit parihāsyate /
GE07hv_conpu:9598: devānām yad bhavān netā sarvakāryapurogamaḥ // HV_62.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:9599: ekas tvam asi lokānāṃ devānāṃ ca sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9600: dvitīyaṃ nānupaśyāmi dhuraṃ yas te samudvahet // HV_62.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:9601: yathā hi puṃgavaḥ śreṣṭho magne dhuri niyujyate /
GE07hv_conpu:9602: evaṃ tvam asi devānāṃ magnānāṃ dvijavāhana // HV_62.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:9604: brahmaṇā sādhu nirdiṣṭaṃ dhātubhya iva kāñcanam // HV_62.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:9605: svayaṃ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān buddhyātha vayasāpi vā /
GE07hv_conpu:9606: na tvānugantuṃ śakto vai paṅgur drutagatiṃ yathā // HV_62.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:9608: garutmān pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭho devatānāṃ bhavān varaḥ // HV_62.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:9609: apām adhastāl loko vai tasyopari mahīdharāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9610: nāgānām upariṣṭād bhūḥ pṛthivyupari mānuṣāḥ // HV_62.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:9611: manuṣyalokād ūrdhvaṃ tu khagānāṃ gatir ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:9612: ākāśasyopari ravir dvāraṃ svargasya bhānumān // HV_62.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:9614: yatrāhaṃ kṛṣṇa devānām aindre vinihitaḥ pade // HV_62.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:9618: tatra somagatiś caiva jyotiṣāṃ ca mahātmanām // HV_62.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:9619: tasyopari gavāṃ lokaḥ sādhyās taṃ pālayanti hi /
GE07hv_conpu:9620: sa hi sarvagataḥ kṛṣṇa mahākāśagato mahān // HV_62.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:9622: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto 'pi pitāmaham // HV_62.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:9626: lokas tv arvāg duṣkṛtināṃ nāgalokas tu dāruṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9627: pṛthivī karmaśīlānāṃ kṣetraṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ // HV_62.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:9630: brāhme tapasi yuktānāṃ brahmalokaḥ parā gatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9631: gavām eva hi goloko durārohā hi sā gatiḥ // HV_62.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:9632: sa tu lokas tvayā kṛṣṇa sīdamānaḥ kṛtātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:9633: dhṛto dhṛtimatā vīra nighnatopadravaṃ gavām // HV_62.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:9634: tad ahaṃ samanuprāpto gavāṃ vākyena coditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9635: brahmanaś ca mahābhāga gauravāt tava cāgataḥ // HV_62.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:9637: aditer garbhaparyāye pūrvajas te purātanaḥ // HV_62.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:9638: tejas tejasvinaś caiva yat te darśitavān aham /
GE07hv_conpu:9639: megharūpeṇa tat sarvaṃ kṣantum arhasi me vibho // HV_62.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:9640: evaṃ kṣāntamanāḥ kṛṣṇa svena saumyena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:9641: brahmaṇaḥ śṛṇu me vākyaṃ gavāṃ ca gajavikrama // HV_62.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:9642: āha tvā bhagavān brahmā gāvaś cākāśagā divi /
GE07hv_conpu:9643: karmabhis toṣitā divyais tava saṃrakṣaṇādibhiḥ // HV_62.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:9644: bhavatā rakṣitā gāvo gobhir lokāś ca rakṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9645: yad vayaṃ puṃgavaiḥ sārdhaṃ vardhāmaḥ prasavais tathā // HV_62.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:9646: karṣakān puṃgavair vāhyair medhyena haviṣā surān /
GE07hv_conpu:9648: tad asmākaṃ gurus tvaṃ hi prāṇadaś ca mahābala /
GE07hv_conpu:9649: adyaprabhṛti no rājā tvam indro vai bhaviṣyasi // HV_62.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:9650: tasmāt tvaṃ kāñcanaiḥ pūrṇair divyasya payaso ghaṭaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9651: ebhis tvam abhiṣicyasva mayā hastāvanāmitaiḥ // HV_62.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:9652: ahaṃ kilendro devānāṃ tvaṃ gavām indratāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9653: govinda iti lokās tvāṃ stoṣyanti bhuvi śāśvatam // HV_62.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:9654: mamopari yathendras tvam sthāpito gobhir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9655: upendra iti kṛṣṇa tvām gāsyanti divi devatāḥ // HV_62.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:9656: ye ceme vārṣikā māsāś catvāro vihitā mama /
GE07hv_conpu:9657: eṣām ardhaṃ prayacchāmi śaratkālaṃ tu paścimam // HV_62.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:9658: varṣārdhe ca dhvajo nityaṃ tataḥ pūjām avāpsyati /
GE07hv_conpu:9659: mamāmbuprabhavaṃ darpaṃ tadā tyakṣyanti barhinaḥ // HV_62.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:9663: sahasraraśmir ādityas tāpayan svena tejasā // HV_62.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:9665: yāvat sukhatarais toyair vipluteṣu pluteṣu ca // HV_62.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:9666: [k: N (except Ś,Ñ1),T2-4,G,M4 ins. after 49; T1 after 52ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:9669: goṣu caiva prahṛṣṭāsu kṣarantīṣu payo bahu // HV_62.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:9670: nivṛtteṣu ca megheṣu niryātya jagato jalam /
GE07hv_conpu:9671: ākāśe śastrasaṃkāśe haṃseṣu vicaratsu ca // HV_62.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:9672: jātapadmeṣu toyeṣu vāpīṣu ca saritsu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9674: taḍāgeṣu ca kānteṣu toyeṣu vimaleṣu ca | *HV_62.52ab*725 |
GE07hv_conpu:9677: sasasyāyāṃ ca sīmāyāṃ manoharyāṃ muner api // HV_62.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:9680: ikṣumatsu ca deśeṣu pravṛtteṣu makheṣu ca // HV_62.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:9682: loke 'smin kṛṣṇa nikhile yathaiva tridive tathā // HV_62.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:9683: narās tvāṃ caiva māṃ caiva dhvajākārāsu yaṣṭiṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:9684: mahendraś cāpy upendraś ca mahīyetāṃ mahītale // HV_62.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:9686: mānavāḥ praṇamiṣyanti teṣāṃ nāsty anayāgamaḥ // HV_62.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:9690: kṛtvā nīrājanaṃ divyair alaṃkṛtya ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ | *HV_62.57*726:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:9691: tataḥ śakras tu tān gṛhya ghaṭān divyapayodharān /
GE07hv_conpu:9693: dṛṣṭvā tam abhiṣicyantaṃ gāvas tāḥ saha yūthapaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9694: stanaiḥ prasnavasaṃyuktaiḥ siṣicuḥ kṛṣṇam avyayam // HV_62.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:9695: meghāś ca divi muktābhiḥ sāmṛtābhiḥ samantataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9698: vavarṣuḥ puṣpavarṣaṃ ca nedus tūryāṇi cāmbare // HV_62.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:9701: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ | *HV_62.62ab*727:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:9703: ete ca munayaḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ | *HV_62.62ab*727:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:9704: ekārṇavavimuktaṃ ca dadhāra vasudhā vapuḥ // HV_62.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:9705: prasādaṃ sāgarā jagmur vavur vātā jagaddhitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9706: ītayaḥ praśamaṃ jagmur jagmur nirvairatāṃ nṛpāḥ // HV_62.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:9710: mārgastho vibabhau bhānuḥ somo yogena saṃgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9712: madaṃ prasusruvur nāgā yātās toṣaṃ vane mṛgāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9713: alaṃkṛtā gātraruhair vātubhir bhānti parvatāḥ // HV_62.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:9716: abhiṣiktaṃ tu taṃ gobhiḥ śakro govindam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:9718: eṣa me prathamaḥ kṛṣṇa niyogo goṣu yaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9720: kṣipraṃ saṃsādhyatāṃ kaṃsaḥ keśī ca turagādhamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9721: ariṣṭaś ca madāviṣṭo rājarājyaṃ tataḥ kuru // HV_62.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:9722: pitṛṣvasari jātas te mamāṃśo 'ham iva sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9723: sa te rakṣyaś ca mānyaś ca sakhye ca viniyujyatām // HV_62.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:9724: tvayā hy anugṛhītaḥ sa tava vṛttānuvartakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9725: tvadvaśe vartamānaḥ sa prāpsyate vipulaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_62.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:9726: bhāratasya ca vaṃśasya sa variṣṭho dhanurdharaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9727: bhaviṣyaty anurūpaś ca tvām ṛte na ca raṃsyate // HV_62.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:9728: bhārataṃ tvayi cāsaktaṃ tasmiṃś ca puruṣottame /
GE07hv_conpu:9729: ubhābhyām api saṃyoge yāsyanti nidhanaṃ nṛpāḥ // HV_62.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:9730: pratijñātaṃ ca me kṛṣṇa ṛṣimadhye sureṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9731: mama putro 'rjuno nāma jātaḥ kuntyāṃ kurūdvahaḥ // HV_62.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:9733: taṃ pravekṣyanti vai sarve rājānaḥ śastrayodhinaḥ // HV_62.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:9737: nānuyāsyanti rājāno devā vā tvāṃ vinā prabho // HV_62.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:9738: sa te bandhuḥ sahāyaś ca saṃgrāmeṣu bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:9739: tasya yogo vidhātavyas tvayā govinda matkṛte // HV_62.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:9740: draṣṭavyaḥ sa yathāhaṃ vai tvayā mānyaś ca nityaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9741: jñātā tvam eva lokānām arjunasya ca nityaśaḥ // HV_62.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:9742: tvayā hi nityaṃ rakṣyaḥ sa āhaveṣu mahatsu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9743: rakṣitasya tvayā tasya na mṛtyuḥ prabhaviṣyati // HV_62.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:9744: arjunaṃ viddhi māṃ kṛṣṇa māṃ caivātmānam ātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:9745: ātmā te 'haṃ yathā śaśvat tathaiva tava so 'rjuna // HV_62.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:9746: tvayā lokān imāñ jitvā baler hastāt tribhiḥ kramaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9747: devatānāṃ kṛto rājā purā jyeṣṭhakramād aham // HV_62.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:9748: tvāṃ ca satyamayaṃ jñātvā satyeṣṭaṃ satyavikramam /
GE07hv_conpu:9749: satyenopetya devā vai yojayanti ripukṣaye // HV_62.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:9750: so 'rjuno nāma me putraḥ pitus te bhaginīsutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9751: iha sauhṛdatāṃ yātu bhūtvā sahacaraḥ purā // HV_62.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:9752: tasya te yudhyataḥ kṛṣṇa svasthāne 'tha gṛhe 'pi vā /
GE07hv_conpu:9753: voḍhavyā puṃgaveneva dhūḥ sarvā raṇavāhinī // HV_62.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:9755: abhitas tan mahadyuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati mahīkṣitām // HV_62.86 //
GE07hv_conpu:9757: vijayasyārjuno bhoktā yaśasā tvaṃ tu yokṣyase // HV_62.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:9758: etan me kṛṣṇa kārtsnyena kartum arhasi bhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:9759: yady ahaṃ te surāś caiva satyaṃ ca priyam acyuta // HV_62.88 //
GE07hv_conpu:9760: śakrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇo govindatāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9761: prītena manasā yuktaḥ prativākyaṃ jagāda ha // HV_62.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:9762: prīto 'smi darśanād eva tava śakra śacīpate /
GE07hv_conpu:9763: yat tvayābhihitaṃ cedaṃ na kiṃcit parihāsyate // HV_62.90 //
GE07hv_conpu:9765: jāne pitṛṣvasā dattā pāṇḍor vasumatīpateḥ // HV_62.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:9767: bhīmasenaṃ ca jānāmi vāyoḥ saṃtānajāṃ tanum // HV_62.92 //
GE07hv_conpu:9770: aśvibhyāṃ sādhu jānāmi sṛṣṭaṃ putradvayaṃ śubham /
GE07hv_conpu:9771: nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca mādryāḥ kukṣibhavāv ubhau // HV_62.93 //
GE07hv_conpu:9772: kānīnaṃ cāpi jānāmi savituḥ prathamaṃ sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:9773: pitṛṣvasari karṇaṃ vai prasūtaṃ sūtatāṃ gatam // HV_62.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:9774: dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca me sarve viditā yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:10086: sādhayaty ātmanaḥ kāryaṃ surāṇām arthasiddhaye // HV_65.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:10087: tad eṣa nūnaṃ viṣṇur vā śakro vā marutāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10088: matsādhanepsayā prāpto nārado māṃ yad uktavān // HV_65.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:10089: atra me śaṅkate buddhir vasudevaṃ prati prabho /
GE07hv_conpu:10090: asya buddhiviśeṣeṇa vayaṃ kātaratāṃ gatāḥ // HV_65.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:10092: dvitīyaṃ sa hi māṃ vipraḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // HV_65.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:10093: yat tvayānuṣṭhito yatnaḥ kaṃsa garbhakṛte mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:10094: vasudevena te rātrau karma tad viphalīkṛtam // HV_65.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:10095: dārikā yā tvayā rātrau śilāyāṃ kaṃsa pātitā /
GE07hv_conpu:10096: tāṃ yaśodāsutāṃ viddhi kṛṣṇaṃ ca vasudevajam // HV_65.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:10097: rātrau vyāvartitāv etau garbhau tava vadhāya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:10099: sā tu kanyā yaśodāyā vindhye parvatasattame /
GE07hv_conpu:10100: hatvā śumbhaniśumbhau dvau dānavau nagacāriṇau // HV_65.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:10104: mayūrāṅgadacitraiś ca barhabhāraiś ca bhūṣitā // HV_65.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:10106: chāgayūthaiś ca saṃpūrṇam aviruddhaiś ca pakṣibhiḥ // HV_65.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:10111: sthānaṃ tasyā nage vindhye nirmitaṃ svena tejasā // HV_65.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:10113: vasate paramaprītā daivatair api pūjitā // HV_65.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:10114: yas tv ayaṃ nandagopasya kṛṣṇa ity ucyate sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10115: atra me nāradaḥ prāha sumahat karma kāraṇam // HV_65.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:10117: sa hi te sahajo mṛtyur bāndhavaś ca bhaviṣyati // HV_65.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:10118: sa eva vāsudevo vai vasudevasuto balī /
GE07hv_conpu:10119: bāndhavo dharmato mahyaṃ hṛdayenāntako ripuḥ // HV_65.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:10120: yathā hi vāyaso mūrdhni padbhyāṃ yasyaiva tiṣṭhati /
GE07hv_conpu:10123: cchinatti mama mūlāni bhuṅkte ca mama pārśvataḥ // HV_65.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:10125: na kṛtaghnasya loko 'sti bāndhavasya viśeṣataḥ // HV_65.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:10127: yaḥ kṛtaghno 'nubandhena prītiṃ vahati dāruṇām // HV_65.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:10129: apāpe pāpahṛdayo yaḥ pāpam anutiṣṭhati // HV_65.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:10132: ahaṃ vā svajanaḥ ślāghyaḥ sa vā ślāghyataraḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10134: hastināṃ kalahe ghore vadham ṛcchanti vīrudhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10135: yuddhavyuparame te tu sahāśnanti mahāvane // HV_65.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:10137: vadhyate yo 'ntaraprepsuḥ svajano yāti vikriyām // HV_65.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:10138: kalis tvaṃ hi vināśāya mayā puṣṭo vijānatā /
GE07hv_conpu:10141: tad dattaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ piṇḍaṃ yad dattaṃ tava jānatā | *HV_65.69ab*752:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:10142: tac chvabhyo yadi dattaṃ syāc chreyo mama bhaviṣyati | *HV_65.69ab*752:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:10144: amarṣī vairaśīlaś ca sadā pāpamatiḥ śaṭhaḥ // HV_65.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:10145: sthāne yadukulaṃ mūḍha śocanīyaṃ tvayā kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:10146: vasudeva vṛthāvṛddha yan mayā tvaṃ puraskṛtaḥ // HV_65.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:10147: śvetena śirasā vṛddho naiva varṣaśatī bhavet /
GE07hv_conpu:10148: yasya buddhiḥ pariṇatā sa vai vṛddhatamo nṛṇām // HV_65.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:10150: na tena vṛddho bhavati yenāsya palitaṃ śiraḥ | *HV_65.71*753 |
GE07hv_conpu:10151: tvaṃ tu karkaśaśīlaś ca buddhyā ca na bahuśrutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10152: kevalaṃ vayasā vṛddho yathā śaradi toyadaḥ // HV_65.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:10153: kiṃ ca tvaṃ sādhu jānīṣe vasudeva vṛthāmate /
GE07hv_conpu:10154: hate kaṃse mama suto mathurāṃ pālayiṣyati // HV_65.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:10155: chinnāśas tvaṃ vṛthāvṛddha mithyā hy evaṃ vicāritam /
GE07hv_conpu:10156: jijīviṣur na sa hy asti yo hi tiṣṭhen mamāgrataḥ // HV_65.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:10157: prahartukāmo viśvaste yas tvaṃ svasthena cetasā /
GE07hv_conpu:10158: tat te pratikariṣyāmi putrayos tava paśyataḥ // HV_65.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:10159: na me vṛddhavadhaḥ kaścid dvijastrīvadha eva vā /
GE07hv_conpu:10160: kṛtapūrvaḥ kariṣye vā viśeṣeṇa tu bāndhave // HV_65.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:10161: iha tvaṃ jātasaṃvṛddho mama pitrā vivardhitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10162: pitṛṣvasur me bhartā ca yadūnāṃ prathamo guruḥ // HV_65.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:10164: gurvarthaṃ pūjitaḥ sadbhir yadubhir dharmabuddhibhiḥ // HV_65.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:10165: kiṃ kariṣyāmahe sarve satsu vaktavyatāṃ gatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10166: yadūnāṃ yūthamukhyasya yasya te vṛttam īdṛśam // HV_65.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:10167: madvadho vā jayo vātha vasudevasya durṇayaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10168: satsu yāsyanti puruṣā yadūnām avaguṇṭhitāḥ // HV_65.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:10169: tvayā hi madvadhopāyaṃ tarkayānena vai mṛdhe /
GE07hv_conpu:10170: aviśvāsyaṃ kṛtaṃ karma vācyāś ca yadavaḥ kṛtāḥ // HV_65.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:10171: aśāmyaṃ vairam utpannaṃ mama kṛṣṇasya cobhayoḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10172: śāntim ekatare śāntiṃ gate yāsyanti yādavāḥ // HV_65.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:10174: tiṣṭha vā gaccha vā mūḍha yatheṣṭaṃ mama pārśvataḥ || *HV_65.82*754:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:10176: mā bhūd ayaṃ parīvādo loke yādavasattamāḥ | *HV_65.82*754:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:10178: gacchatv ayaṃ dānapatiḥ kṣipram ānayituṃ vrajāt /
GE07hv_conpu:10179: nandagopaṃ ca gopāṃś ca karadān mama śāsanāt // HV_65.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:10180: vācyaś ca nandagopo vai karam ādāya vārṣikam /
GE07hv_conpu:10181: śīghram āgaccha nagaraṃ gopaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ // HV_65.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:10183: draṣṭum icchati vai kaṃsaḥ sabhṛtyaḥ sapurohitaḥ // HV_65.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:10186: asmākam api mallau dvau sajjau jayadhṛtotsavau /
GE07hv_conpu:10187: tābhyāṃ saha niyotsyete tau yuddhakuśalāv ubhau // HV_65.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:10188: draṣṭavyau ca mayāvaśyaṃ bālau tāv amaropamau /
GE07hv_conpu:10189: pitṛṣvasuḥ sutau mukhyau vrajavāsau vanecarau // HV_65.88 //
GE07hv_conpu:10190: vaktavyaṃ ca vraje tasmin samīpe vrajavāsinām /
GE07hv_conpu:10191: rājā dhanurmahaṃ nāma kārayiṣyati vai sukhī // HV_65.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:10193: janasyāmantritasyārthe yathā syāt sarvam avyayam // HV_65.90 //
GE07hv_conpu:10194: payasaḥ sarpiṣaś caiva dadhno dadhyuttarsya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:10196: akrūra gaccha śīghraṃ tvaṃ tāv ānaya mamājñayā /
GE07hv_conpu:10197: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_65.92 //
GE07hv_conpu:10198: tābhyām āgamane prītiḥ parā mama kṛtā bhavet /
GE07hv_conpu:10199: dṛṣṭvā tu tau mahāvīryau tad vidhāsyāmi yad dhitam // HV_65.93 //
GE07hv_conpu:10200: syān nāma vākyaṃ śrutvaivaṃ mama tau paribhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:10201: na gacchetāṃ yathākālaṃ nigrāhyāv api tau mama // HV_65.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:10202: sāntvam eva tu bāleṣu pradhānaṃ prathamo nayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10203: madhureṇaiva tau mandau svayam evānayāśu vai // HV_65.95 //
GE07hv_conpu:10204: akrūra kuru me prītim etāṃ paramadurlabhām /
GE07hv_conpu:10205: yadi vā nopajapto 'si vasudevena suvrata // HV_65.96 //
GE07hv_conpu:10207: tathā kartavyam etad dhi yathā tāv āgamiṣyataḥ | *HV_65.96*755 |
GE07hv_conpu:10208: [k: T1.2,G1.4.5,M4 cont.; D6,G2.3 ins. after 95; M1-3 ins. after 93 ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:10209: ity uktvā virarāmaiva kaṃsaḥ sa madhureśvaraḥ | *HV_65.96*756 |
GE07hv_conpu:10213: kṣamāṃ manasi saṃdhyāya nottaraṃ pratyabhāṣata // HV_65.98 //
GE07hv_conpu:10214: ye tu taṃ dadṛśus tatra kṣipyamāṇam anekaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10215: dhig dhig ity asakṛt te vai śanair ūcur avāṅmukhāḥ // HV_65.99 //
GE07hv_conpu:10216: akrūras tu mahātejā jānan divyena cakṣuṣā /
GE07hv_conpu:10217: jalam dṛṣṭveva tṛṣitaḥ preṣitaḥ prītimān abhūt // HV_65.100 //
GE07hv_conpu:10223: adya me saphalaṃ janma dṛṣṭo yena mayā hariḥ || *HV_65.100*757:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:10226: yadi māṃ cakṣuṣā samyak prītiyuktena paśyati | *HV_65.100*757:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:10227: tadānīṃ saphalaṃ janma mama taṃ paśyato harim || *HV_65.100*757:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:10228: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve viramante tapobalāt | *HV_65.100*757:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:10229: sa māṃ vakṣyati kiṃcit tu vacanaṃ vāgvidāṃ varaḥ || *HV_65.100*757:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:10231: tasminn eva muhūrte tu mathurāyāḥ sa niryayau /
GE07hv_conpu:10232: prītimān puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ draṣṭuṃ dānapatiḥ svayam // HV_65.101 //
GE07hv_conpu:10235: transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_conpu:10236: extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; March 4,
GE07hv_conpu:10239: kṣiptaṃ yaduvṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te yadupuṃgavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10240: nipīḍya śravaṇān hastair menire taṃ gatāyuṣam // HV_66.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:10241: andhas tv anāvignamanā dhairyād avikṛtaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10242: provāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ samāsāt kaṃsam ojasā // HV_66.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:10243: aślāghyo me mataḥ putra tavāyaṃ vākpariśramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10244: ayukto garhitaḥ sadbhir bāndhaveṣu viśeṣataḥ // HV_66.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:10245: ayādavo yadi bhavāñ śṛṇu tāvad yad ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:10246: na hi tvāṃ yādavā vīra balāt kurvanti yādavam // HV_66.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:10247: aślāghyā vṛṣṇayaḥ putra yeṣāṃ tvam anuśāsitā /
GE07hv_conpu:10249: bhojo vā yādavo vāsi kaṃso vāsi yathā tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:10250: sahajaṃ te śiras tāta jaṭī muṇḍo 'pi vā bhava // HV_66.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:10251: ugrasenas tv ayaṃ śocyo yo 'smākaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10252: durjātīyena yena tvam īdṛśo janitaḥ sutaḥ // HV_66.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:10253: na cātmano guṇāṃs tāta pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10254: pareṇoktā guṇā gauṇyaṃ yānti vedārtasaṃmitāḥ // HV_66.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:10256: bālaḥ kulāntakṛn mūḍho yeṣāṃ tvam anuśāsitā // HV_66.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:10257: sādhus tvam ebhir vākyaiś ca tvayā sādhv iti bhāṣitaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10258: na vācā sādhitaṃ kāryam ātmā ca vivṛtaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_66.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:10260: kṣepaṇaṃ kaḥ śubhaṃ manyed dvijasyeva vadhaṃ kṛtam // HV_66.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:10261: mānyāś caivābhigamyāś ca vṛddhās tāta yathāgrayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10262: krodho hi teṣāṃ pradahel lokān antargatān api // HV_66.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:10264: dharmasya gatir anveṣyā matsyasya gatir apsv iva // HV_66.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:10265: kevalaṃ tvaṃ tu garveṇa vṛddhān agnisamān iha /
GE07hv_conpu:10266: vācā dunoṣi marmaghnyā amantroktā yathāhutiḥ // HV_66.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:10267: vasudevaṃ ca putrārthe yadi tvaṃ parigarhase /
GE07hv_conpu:10268: tatra mithyāpralāpaṃ te nindāmi kṛpaṇaṃ vacaḥ // HV_66.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:10269: dāruṇe 'pi pitā putre naiva dāruṇatāṃ vrajet /
GE07hv_conpu:10271: dāruṇo 'pi pituḥ putraḥ kaḥ putre dāruṇaḥ pitā | *HV_66.16ab*758 |
GE07hv_conpu:10272: putrārthe hy āpadaḥ kaṣṭāḥ pitaraḥ prāpnuvanti hi // HV_66.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:10274: putrās te hy āpadaḥ kaṣṭāt pitaraṃ tārayanti tu | *HV_66.16*759 |
GE07hv_conpu:10275: chādito vasudevena yadi putraḥ śiśus tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:10276: manyase yady akartavyaṃ pṛcchasva pitaraṃ svakam // HV_66.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:10277: garhatā vasudevaṃ ca yaduvaṃśaṃ ca nindatā /
GE07hv_conpu:10278: tvayā yādavaputrāṇāṃ vairajaṃ viṣam arjitam // HV_66.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:10280: kimartham ugrasenena śiśus tvaṃ na vināśitaḥ // HV_66.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:10281: pun nāmno narakāt putro yasmāt trātā pitṝn sadā /
GE07hv_conpu:10282: tasmād bruvanti putreti putraṃ dharmavido janāḥ // HV_66.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:10284: pitrā putras tu goptaś cet ko doṣo vada sāṃpratam | *HV_66.20*760:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:10285: rakṣitas tava pitrāsi kimarthaṃ vada bāliśa || *HV_66.20*760:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:10286: anena tava vākyena śatravo yādavāḥ kṛtāḥ | *HV_66.20*760:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:10287: jātyā hi yādavaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sa ca saṃkarṣaṇo yuvā /
GE07hv_conpu:10288: tvaṃ cāpi vidhṛtas tābhyāṃ jātavaireṇa cetasā // HV_66.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:10290: vasudeve tvayā kṣipte vāsudeve ca kopite // HV_66.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:10293: tyakṣyāmahe vayaṃ sarve bhavantaṃ yadi sādhavaḥ | *HV_66.23ab*761:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:10294: asanto vayam evātra loke khyātā narādhama || *HV_66.23ab*761:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:10295: yadi saktāḥ parityaktuṃ putra tvāṃ sāṃprataṃ vayam | *HV_66.23ab*761:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:10296: sarvān asmān parityajya gacchasīti na saṃśayaḥ | *HV_66.23ab*761:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:10297: śaṃsanti hīmāni bhayaṃ nimittāny aśubhāni te // HV_66.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:10298: sarpāṇāṃ darśanaṃ tīvraṃ svapnānāṃ ca niśākṣaye /
GE07hv_conpu:10300: eṣa ghoro grahaḥ svātīm ullikhan khe gabhastibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10301: vakram aṅgārakaś cakre vyāharanti kharaṃ dvijāḥ // HV_66.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:10302: [k: N (except Ś1) T1-3 ins. after 25; T4 after 65.46a: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:10303: budhena paścimā saṃdhyā vyāptā ghoreṇa tejasā | *HV_66.25*762:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:10304: vaiśvānarapathe śukro hy aticāraṃ cacāra ha || *HV_66.25*762:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:10308: ubhe saṃdhye purīṃ ghorā paryeti bahu vāśatī // HV_66.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:10310: calaty aparvaṇi mahī girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca // HV_66.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:10311: prāksaṃdhyā parighagras tā bhābhir badhnāti bhāskaram /
GE07hv_conpu:10312: pratilomaṃ ca yānty ete vyāharanto mṛgadvijāḥ // HV_66.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:10313: grastaḥ svarbhānunā sūryo divā naktam ajāyata /
GE07hv_conpu:10316: calitā devatāḥ sthānāt tyajanti vihagā nagān // HV_66.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:10318: tāni sarvāṇi paśyāmo nimittāny aśubhāni vai // HV_66.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:10321: yas tvaṃ devopamaṃ vṛddhaṃ vasudevam dhṛtavratam /
GE07hv_conpu:10322: mohāt kṣipasi durbuddhe kutas te śāntir ātmanaḥ // HV_66.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:10323: tvadgato yo hi naḥ snehas taṃ tyajāmo 'dya vai vayam /
GE07hv_conpu:10324: ahitaṃ svasya vaṃśasya na tvāṃ vayam upāsmahe // HV_66.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:10325: sa hi dānapatir dhanyo yo drakṣyati vanegatam /
GE07hv_conpu:10330: yo hi drakṣyati taṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tasmai bhūyo namo namaḥ || *HV_66.35*763:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:10331: ādyānām ādyam ādiṃ ca sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ hariṃ | *HV_66.35*763:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:10332: yo hi drakṣyati taṃ devaṃ tasmai bhūyo namo namaḥ || *HV_66.35*763:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:10333: vayam eva nirānandās vayā guptā yataḥ sadā | *HV_66.35*763:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:10334: yeṣāṃ tvam īśvaro 'dhanyas teṣāṃ śāntiḥ kuto ratiḥ | *HV_66.35*763:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:10335: chinnamūlo hy ayaṃ vaṃśo yadūnāṃ tvatkṛte kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10336: kṛṣṇo jñātīn samānāyya sa saṃdhānaṃ kariṣyati // HV_66.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:10338: kālasaṃpakvavijñāno brūhi tvaṃ yad yad icchasi // HV_66.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:10340: gaccha kṛṣṇasya nilayaṃ prītis te tena rocatām // HV_66.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:10344: T.3.4 ins. the colophon. While D6,
GE07hv_conpu:10346: anyathā tu gatiḥ kaṃsa tava nāstīti niścayaḥ | *HV_66.38*764 |
GE07hv_conpu:10348: kiṃcid apy abruvan krodhād viveśa svaṃ niveśanam // HV_66.39 //

GE07hv_conpu:10413: rajasā sa hayaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ cakārāruṇamūrdhajam // HV_67.27 //

GE07hv_conpu:10416: sa saṃsaktas tu kṛṣṇena keśī turagasattamaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:10418: punaḥ punaś ca sa balī prāhiṇot pārśvataḥ khurān /
GE07hv_conpu:10422: adaśad bāhuvivaraṃ kṛṣṇasya ruṣito hayaḥ // HV_67.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:10424: rarāja keśī meghena saṃsaktaḥ kha ivāṃśumān // HV_67.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:10425: uraś cāsyorasā hantum iyeṣa balavān hayaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:10429: sa taṃ bāhum aśakto vai khādituṃ bhoktum eva vā /
GE07hv_conpu:10433: daśanair mūlanirmuktaiḥ saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman // HV_67.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:10435: akṣiṇī vikṛte cakre visṛte muktabandhane // HV_67.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:10437: utkarṇo naṣṭacetās tu sa keśī bahvaceṣṭata // HV_67.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:10441: vyābhugna iva gharmānte candrārdhakiraṇair ghanaḥ // HV_67.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:10443: prabhātāvanataś candraḥ śrānto merum ivāśritaḥ // HV_67.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:10447: petuḥ śaradi nistoyāḥ sitābhrāvayavā iva // HV_67.40 //

GE07hv_conpu:10453: sa tu keśī bhṛśaṃ śrāntaḥ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā | *HV_67.40*769:1 |

GE07hv_conpu:10479: aho tāta kṛtaṃ karma hato 'yaṃ lokakaṇṭakaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:10482: ghnatā pāpam imaṃ tāta keśinaṃ hayam āhave // HV_67.48 //

GE07hv_conpu:10485: eṣa saṃvartakaṃ kartum udyataḥ kila pāpakṛt /

GE07hv_conpu:10496: namas te jñānarūpāya keśavāya ca cakriṇe | *HV_67.52*773:3 |

GE07hv_conpu:10505: idaṃ narahayaṃ yuddham darṣṭuṃ svargād ihāgataḥ // HV_67.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:10507: ahaṃ tv anena govinda karmaṇā paritoṣitaḥ // HV_67.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:10509: kurvāṇasya vapur ghoram keśino duṣṭacetasaḥ // HV_67.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:10511: eṣo 'sya mṛtyur antāya vihito viśvayoninā // HV_67.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:10512: yasmāt tvayā hataḥ keśī tasmān macchāsanaṃ śṛṇu /
GE07hv_conpu:10513: keśavo nāma nāmnā tvaṃ khyāto loke bhaviṣyasi // HV_67.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:10514: svasty astu bhavato loke sādhayāmy aham āśugaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:10515: kṛtyaśeṣaṃ ca te kāryaṃ śaktas tvam asi māciram // HV_67.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:10517: viḍambayantaḥ krīḍanti līlāṃ tvadbalam āśritāḥ // HV_67.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:10523: abhitas tan mahadyuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati mahīkṣitām // HV_67.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:10526: tvayi rājāsanasthe hi rājaśrīṃ vahati prabho /

GE07hv_conpu:10633: tathaiva vasudhāṃ jitvā jitapūrvāṃ tribhiḥ kramaiḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:10662: śvaḥ purīṃ mathurāṃ tāta gamiṣyāmaḥ śivāya vai // HV_69.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:10664: kaṃsājñayā samucitaṃ karam ādāya vārṣikam // HV_69.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:10666: vayaṃ caiva pragantāro ratham āsthāya saṃgatāḥ | *HV_69.3*783 |

GE07hv_conpu:10670: dīnaṃ putravadhaśrāntaṃ yuvām atha sameṣyathaḥ // HV_69.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:10672: daśānte śoṣitaṃ vṛddhaṃ duḥkhaiḥ śithilatāṃ gatam // HV_69.6 //

GE07hv_conpu:10675: tāṃ ca drakṣyāmi govinda putrair amṛditastanīm /
GE07hv_conpu:10682: tvatpravṛttena śokena sīdantīṃ vai tapasvinīm // HV_69.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:10685: yadi tvāṃ janayitvā sā kliśyate kṛṣṇa devakī /

GE07hv_conpu:10694: tāṃ śokasalile magnām uttārayitum arhasi // HV_69.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:10695: taṃ ca vṛddhaṃ priyasutaṃ vasudevaṃ mahābalam /
GE07hv_conpu:10696: putrayogena saṃyojya kṛṣṇa dharmam avāpsyasi // HV_69.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:10698: vipulaś ca dhṛtaḥ śailo yathā vai bhūdharas tvayā // HV_69.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:10700: paraprāṇaharaḥ keśī duṣṭātmā ca hatas tvayā // HV_69.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:10702: yathā dharmam avāpnoṣi tat kṛṣṇa paricintyatām // HV_69.21 //

GE07hv_conpu:10710: ṛṇaṃ vai pratikartavyaṃ yathāyogam udāhṛtam // HV_69.24 //

GE07hv_conpu:10712: parityajetāṃ tau śokaṃ syāc ca dharmas tavātulaḥ // HV_69.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:10714: dharmas te vipulo 'nanto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ | *HV_69.25*785 |
GE07hv_conpu:10715: kṛṣṇas tu viditārtho vai tam āhāmitadakṣiṇam /

GE07hv_conpu:11080: evam ājñāpya rājā sa samājavidhim uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:11081: samājavāṭān niṣkramya viveśa svaṃ niveśanam // HV_72.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:11082: āhvānaṃ tatra saṃcakre tasya malladvayasya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:11084: tau tu mallau mahāvīryau balinau yuddhaśālinau /
GE07hv_conpu:11085: kaṃsasyājñāṃ puraskṛtya hṛṣṭau viviśatus tadā // HV_72.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:11086: tau samīpagatau mallau dṛṣṭvā jagati viśrutau /
GE07hv_conpu:11087: uvāca kaṃso nṛpatiḥ sopanyāsam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_72.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11089: pūjitau ca yathānyāyaṃ satkārārhau viśeṣataḥ // HV_72.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:11090: tan matto yadi satkāraḥ smaryate sukṛtāni vā /
GE07hv_conpu:11091: kartavyaṃ me mahat karma bhavadbhyāṃ svena tejasā // HV_72.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:11092: yāv etau mama saṃvṛddhau vraje gopālakāv ubhau /
GE07hv_conpu:11093: saṃkarṣaṇaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca bālāv api jitaśramau // HV_72.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11095: nipātān antaraṃ śīghraṃ hantavyau nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_72.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11096: bālāv imau capalakāv akriyāv iti sarvathā /
GE07hv_conpu:11097: nāvajñā tatra kartavyā kartavyo yatna eva hi // HV_72.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:11099: āyatāṃ ca tadātve ca śreyo mama bhaviṣyati // HV_72.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:11102: yady āvayās tau pramukhe sthāsyete gopakilbiṣau /
GE07hv_conpu:11103: hatāv ity avagantavyau pretarūpau tapasvinau // HV_72.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:11107: hatvā tau goṣu saṃvṛddhau dāsyāvas tava bhūtalam | *HV_72.24*820:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11108: vyapaitu te bhayaṃ rājann āvāṃ mallottamau mṛdhe || *HV_72.24*820:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:11111: evaṃ vāgviṣam utsṛjya tāv ubhau mallapuṃgavau /
GE07hv_conpu:11115: transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_conpu:11116: extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; March 4,
GE07hv_conpu:11123: sa saṃcodayitavyas te tāv uddiśya vanaukasau /
GE07hv_conpu:11124: vasudevasutau nīcau yathā syātāṃ gatāyuṣau // HV_73.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:11125: tvayā caiva gajendreṇa yadi tau goṣu jīvinau /
GE07hv_conpu:11126: bhavetāṃ ghātitau raṅge paśyeyam aham utkaṭau // HV_73.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:11127: tatas tau patitau dṛṣṭvā vasudevaḥ sabāndhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11129: ye ceme yādavā mūrkhāḥ sarve kṛṣṇaparāyaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11130: vinaśiṣyanti chinnāśā dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ nipātitam // HV_73.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:11131: etau hatvā gajendreṇa mallair vā svayam eva vā /
GE07hv_conpu:11132: purīṃ niryādavāṃ kṛtvā vicariṣyāmy ahaṃ sukhī // HV_73.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11134: śeṣāś ca me parityaktā yādavāḥ kṛṣṇapakṣiṇaḥ // HV_73.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:11135: na cāham ugrasenena jātaḥ kila sutārthinā /
GE07hv_conpu:11136: mānuṣeṇālpavīryeṇa yathā mām āha nāradaḥ // HV_73.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:11137: [k: After 9, N(except Ś1 Ñ1) S (except M1-3) ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 14). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11138: suyāmunaṃ nāma giriṃ mama mātā rajasvalā /
GE07hv_conpu:11139: prekṣituṃ saha sā strībhir gatā vanakutūhalāt // HV_73.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:11141: cacāra nagaśṛṅgeṣu kandareṣu nadīṣu ca // HV_73.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:11144: barhiṇānāṃ ca virutaṃ khagānāṃ ca vikūjitam /
GE07hv_conpu:11153: yauvanastheva vanitā khaṃ dadhārārtavaṃ vapuḥ // HV_73.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:11154: atha saubhapatiḥ śrīmān drumilo nāma dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11155: [k: After 18ab, N(except Ś1,Ñ1),S(except M1-3) ins. App. I (No. 15). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11156: ugrasenasya rūpeṇa mātaraṃ me pradharṣayat // HV_73.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11158: śaṅkitā cābhavat paścāt tasya gauravadarśanāt // HV_73.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11159: sā tam āhotthitā bhītā na tvaṃ mama patir dhruvam /
GE07hv_conpu:11160: kaś ca tvaṃ vikṛtākāro yenāsmi malinīkṛtā // HV_73.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:11162: patyur me rūpam āsthāya nīca nīcena karmaṇā // HV_73.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:11163: kiṃ māṃ vakṣyanti ruṣitā bāndhavāḥ kulapāṃsanīm /
GE07hv_conpu:11164: jugupsitā ca vatsyāmi patipakṣair nirākṛtā // HV_73.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:11165: dhik tvām īdṛśam akṣāntaṃ dauṣkulaṃ vyutthitendriyam /
GE07hv_conpu:11167: sa tām āha prasajjantīṃ kṣiptaḥ krodhena dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11168: ahaṃ vai drumilo nāma saubhasya patir ūrjitaḥ // HV_73.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:11169: kiṃ māṃ kṣipasi doṣeṇa mūḍhe paṇḍitamānini /
GE07hv_conpu:11171: vyabhicārān na duṣyanti striyaḥ strīmān agarvite /
GE07hv_conpu:11172: ny hy āsīnn iyatā buddhir mānuṣīṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ // HV_73.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11175: atīva tvaṃ hi loke 'smin patidharmavatī satī /
GE07hv_conpu:11176: śuddhā keśānvidhunvantī bhāṣase yad yad icchasi // HV_73.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:11177: kasya tvam iti yac cāhaṃ tvayokto mattakāśinī /
GE07hv_conpu:11178: kaṃso nāma ripudhvaṃśī tava putro bhaviṣyati // HV_73.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11179: sā saroṣā punar bhūtvā nindatī tasya taṃ varam /
GE07hv_conpu:11180: uvāca vyathitā devī dānavaṃ duṣṭavādinam // HV_73.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:11181: dhik te vṛttaṃ sudurvṛtta yaḥ sarvā nindase striyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11182: santi striyo nīcavṛttāḥ santi caiva pativratāḥ // HV_73.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11184: dhṛtās tābhis trayo lokāḥ sarve vai kulapāṃsana // HV_73.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11185: yas tvayā mama putro vai datto vṛttavināśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11186: na me bahumatas tv eṣa śṛṇu cāpi yad ucyate // HV_73.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11188: bhaviṣyati sa te mṛtyur yaś ca dattas tvayā sutaḥ // HV_73.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:11189: drumilas tv evam uktas tu jagāmākāśam eva tu /
GE07hv_conpu:11190: [k: After 35ab, N(except Ś1,Ñ1), S(except M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11192: jagāma ca purīṃ dīnā mātā tad ahar eva me // HV_73.35 //

GE07hv_conpu:11195: dīpyamānas tapovīryāt sākṣād agnir iva jvalan || *HV_73.35*822:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:11200: ahaṃ balena vīryeṇa nayena vinayena ca | *HV_73.35*822:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:11202: satyena caiva dānena nānyo 'sti sadṛśaḥ pumān | *HV_73.35*822:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:11203: viditvā sarvam ātmānaṃ vacanaṃ śraddadhāmy aham | *HV_73.35*822:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:11204: kṣetrajo 'haṃ sutas tv evam ugrasenasya hastipa /
GE07hv_conpu:11205: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ saṃtyaktaḥ sthāpitaḥ svena tejasā // HV_73.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11206: ubhābhyāṃ cāpi vidviṣṭo bāndhavaiś ca viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11208: tad imau ghātayitvā tu hastinā gopakilbiṣau | *HV_73.37ab*823 |
GE07hv_conpu:11210: badhvā ca pitaraṃ rājye sthito 'smi ca balīyasā | *HV_73.37ab*824 |
GE07hv_conpu:11211: etān api haniṣyami hatvā gopālakāv ubhau // HV_73.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:11213: sthiro bhava mahāmātra samājadvāri mā ciram // HV_73.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:11215: samāgatau ca tau dṛṣṭvā jahi gopālakāv ubhau | *HV_73.38*825 |

GE07hv_conpu:11247: śreṇīnāṃ ca gaṇānāṃ ca mañcā bhānty acalopamāḥ // HV_74.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:11251: rejur javanikākṣepaiḥ sapakṣā iva khe nagāḥ // HV_74.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11252: tatra cāmarahāsaiś ca bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca śiñjitaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11253: maṇīnāṃ ca vicitrāṇāṃ vicitrāś cerur arciṣaḥ // HV_74.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:11257: prakīrṇāś ca kuthāś citrāḥ sapuṣpastabakadrumāḥ // HV_74.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:11258: sauvarṇāḥ pānakumbhāś ca pānabhūmyaś ca śobhitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11259: phalāvadaṃśapūrṇāś ca cāṅger yaḥ pānayojitāḥ // HV_74.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:11261: rejuḥ prastaraśas tatra prakāśā mañcasaṃcayāḥ // HV_74.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:11263: strīnāṃ prekṣāgṛhā bhānti rājahaṃsā ivāmbare // HV_74.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:11274: tiṣṭhatv iti samājñāpya prekṣāgāram athāyayau // HV_74.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:11276: śuśubhe śvetamukuṭaḥ śvetābhra iva candramāḥ // HV_74.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11278: rūpam apratimaṃ dṛṣṭvā paurāḥ procur jayāśiṣaḥ // HV_74.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11280: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ | *HV_74.19*829:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11282: vimānasthās tu te sarve virejuḥ sitacāmarāḥ | *HV_74.19*829:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:11289: nāradād yās tu munayo yuddhaṃ draṣṭuṃ vyavasthitāḥ || *HV_74.19*829:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:11292: raṅgavāṭas tadā caiva janaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāvṛtaḥ | *HV_74.19*829:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:11293: dyauś cāpi devasaṃghaiś ca nibiḍābhūd viyaccaraiḥ | *HV_74.19*829:14 |

GE07hv_conpu:11309: ambaṣṭhāmbaṣṭha mārgaṃ nau dehy apākrama mā ciram | *HV_74.22ab*831:5 |

GE07hv_conpu:11313: tena mattena nāgena codyamānena vai bhṛśam // HV_74.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:11314: sa mattahastī duṣṭātmā kṛtvā kuṇḍalinaṃ karam /
GE07hv_conpu:11315: cakāra codito yatnaṃ nihantuṃ balakeśavau // HV_74.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:11316: tataḥ prahasitaḥ kṛṣṇas trāsyamāno gajena vai /
GE07hv_conpu:11317: kaṃsasyamatsaraṃ caiva jagarhe sa durātmanaḥ // HV_74.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:11320: aho tu kaṃso durmedhāḥ kim ato vismayaḥ paraḥ | *HV_74.24*832:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:11322: tasya tāṃ jagṛhe buddhiṃ balabhadro durātmanaḥ | *HV_74.24*832:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:11324: yo mām anena nāgena pradharṣayitum icchati // HV_74.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:11325: saṃnikṛṣṭe tato nāge garjamāne yathā ghane /
GE07hv_conpu:11326: sahasotpatya govindaś cakre tālasvanaṃ prabhuḥ // HV_74.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11328: karaṃ ca śrīdharas tasya pratijagrāha vakṣasā // HV_74.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:11330: babādhe taṃ gajaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pavanas toyadaṃ yathā // HV_74.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:11331: sa hastāc ca viniṣkrānto viṣāṇāgrāc ca dantinaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11332: vimuktaḥ pādamadhyāc ca kṛṣṇo dvipam amohayat // HV_74.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11333: so 'ntikāyas tu saṃmūḍho hantuṃ kṛṣṇam aśaknuvan /
GE07hv_conpu:11334: gajaḥ sveṣv eva gātreṣu mathyamāno rarāsa ha // HV_74.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:11335: papāta bhūmau jānubhyāṃ daśanābhyāṃ tutoda ha /
GE07hv_conpu:11336: madaṃ susrāva roṣāc ca gharmāpāya yathā ghanaḥ // HV_74.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11337: kṛṣṇas tu tena nāgena krīḍitvā śiśunā yathā /
GE07hv_conpu:11338: nidhanāya matiṃ cakre kaṃsadviṣṭena cetasā // HV_74.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11339: sa tasya pramukhe pādaṃ kṛtvā kumbhād anantaram /
GE07hv_conpu:11340: dorbhyāṃ viṣāṇam utpāṭya tenaiva prāharat tadā // HV_74.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11341: sa tena vajrakalpena svena dantena kuñjaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11342: hanyamānaḥ śakṛnmūtraṃ cakārārto rarāsa ha // HV_74.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:11344: kaṭābhyām atisusrāva vegavad bhūri śoṇitam // HV_74.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:11347: tenaiva gajadantena kṛṣṇo hatvā tu kuñjaram /
GE07hv_conpu:11349: so 'rtanādaṃ mahat kṛtvā vidanto dantināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11351: [k: K,Ñ2.3,V,B,D,S(except M1-3) ins. after 38, Ñ1 after 39ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11352: tatas tau tu gajāṅgāni pragṛhya raṇakarkaśau | *HV_74.38*833:1 |
