GE07hv_conpu:11414: bāṇapakṣaṃ parityaṃ ca yuddhaṃ sāmnā nirīkṣya ca | *HV_75.9*839 |
GE07hv_conpu:11417: adbhiś cāpi śramo nityaṃ vineyaḥ kāladarśibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11418: karīṣeṇa ca mallasya satataṃ prakriyā smṛtā // HV_75.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:11419: sthito bhūmigataś caiva yo yathāmārgataḥ sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11421: sthitau bhūmigatau caiva yathā tau mārgam āsthitau | *HV_75.12ab*840 |
GE07hv_conpu:11422: niyudhyataś ca paryāyaḥ prāśnikaiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // HV_75.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:11423: bālo vā yadi vā madhyaḥ sthaviro vā kṛśo 'pi vā /
GE07hv_conpu:11424: balastho vā sthito raṅge jñeyaḥ kakṣyāntareṇa vai // HV_75.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:11425: balataś ca kriyātaś ca bāhuyuddhavidhir yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:11426: nirghātānantaraṃ kiṃcin na kartavyaṃ vijānatā // HV_75.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:11427: tad idaṃ prastutaṃ raṅge yuddhaṃ kṛṣṇāndhramallayoḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11428: bālaḥ kṛṣṇo mahān andhras tatra na syād vicāraṇā // HV_75.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11430: prāvalgata ca govindo vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // HV_75.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:11431: ahaṃ bālo mahān andhro vapuṣā parvatopamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11432: yuddhaṃ mama sahānena rocate bāhuśālinā // HV_75.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:11434: na hy ahaṃ bāhuyodhānāṃ dūṣayiṣyāmi yan matam // HV_75.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11435: yo 'yaṃ karīṣadharmaś ca toyadharmaś ca raṅgajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11436: kaṣāyasya ca saṃsargaḥ samayo hy eṣa kalpitaḥ // HV_75.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11437: saṃyamaḥ sthiratā śauryaṃ vyāyāmaḥ matkriyā balam /
GE07hv_conpu:11438: reṅge ca niyatā siddhir etad yuddhamukhe vratam // HV_75.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:11439: yad ayaṃ bāhubhir yuddhaṃ savairaṃ kartum udyataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11440: atra vai nigrahaḥ kāryas toṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jagat // HV_75.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:11448: hatasyāpi raṇe sastrair nākapṛṣṭhaṃ vidhīyate // HV_75.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:11449: raṇe hy ubhayataḥ siddhir hatasyāpi ghnato 'pi vā /
GE07hv_conpu:11450: sā hi prāṇāntikā yātrā mahadbhiḥ sādhu pūjitā // HV_75.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11451: ayaṃ tu mārgo balataḥ kriyātaś ca viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11452: mṛtasya raṅge kaḥ svargo jayato vā kuto ratiḥ // HV_75.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:11453: ye tu kecit svadoṣeṇa rājñaḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11455: yotsyāma bālā balibhir bāhubhiḥ saha saṃkaṭe | *HV_75.28ab*841:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11456: evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇaś cāṇūraṃ samapadyata | *HV_75.28ab*841:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:11457: āsphoṭya bāhū rājendra cāṇūraḥ kṛṣṇam abhyayāt || *HV_75.28ab*841:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:11458: tāv ubhau siṃhavikrāntau mattāv iva mahāgajau | *HV_75.28ab*841:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:11460: pratāpārthe hatā mallā mallahantur vadho hi saḥ // HV_75.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:11461: evaṃ saṃjalpatām eva tābhyāṃ yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:11462: ubhābhyām abhavad ghoraṃ vāraṇābhyāṃ yathā vane // HV_75.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11466: tāv ubhāv api saṃśliṣṭau yathā śailamayau tathā | *HV_75.30*842 |
GE07hv_conpu:11468: kīlair vajranipātaiś ca prasṛṣṭābhis tathaiva ca // HV_75.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11471: tad yuddham abhavad ghoram asastraṃ bāhutejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:11474: sādhu vādāṃś ca mañceṣu ghoṣayanty apare janāḥ // HV_75.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:11476: diviṣṭhāś ca tathā devāḥ sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan | *HV_75.34*843 |
GE07hv_conpu:11478: nyavārayata tūryāṇi kaṃsaḥ savyena pāṇinā // HV_75.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:11480: khe saṃgatāny avādyanta devatūryāṇy anekaśaḥ // HV_75.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11482: svayam eva pravādyanta tūryaghoṣāś ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_75.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:11484: cerur vidyādharaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣṇasya jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_75.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:11486: iti saptarṣayaḥ sarve ūcuś caiva nabhogatāḥ // HV_75.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:11489: tataś cacāla vasudhā mañcāś caiva jughūrṇire /
GE07hv_conpu:11490: mukutāc cāpi kaṃsasya papāta maṇir uttamaḥ // HV_75.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:11491: dorbhyām ānamya kṛṣṇas tu cāṇūraṃ pūrṇajīvitam /
GE07hv_conpu:11492: prāharan muṣṭinā mūrdhni vakṣasyāhatya jānunā // HV_75.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:11494: tāpanīye yathā ghaṇṭe vakṣyopari vilambite // HV_75.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:11495: sa papāta ca raṅgasya madhye niḥsṛtalocanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11498: saṃniruddho mahāmārgaḥ sa śaileneva lakṣyate // HV_75.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:11500: ch. 76, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version of March 4, 2002. Not yet proof-read. :h]
GE07hv_conpu:11503: jagrāha muṣṭikaṃ raṅge kṛṣṇas tosalakaṃ punaḥ // HV_76.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:11508: saṃnipāte tu tau mallau prathame krodhamūrcchitau /
GE07hv_conpu:11515: mukhād rudhiram atyartham ājagāma mumūrṣataḥ // HV_76.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:11519: śirasy abhyahanad vīro vajreṇeva mahāgirim // HV_76.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:11521: papātābhimukhas tatra tato nādo mahān abhūt // HV_76.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11525: andhre tadā mahāmalle muṣṭike ca nipātite // HV_76.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:11531: vasudevo jarāṃ tyaktvā snehena taruṇāyate // HV_76.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:11532: vāramukhyāś ca tāḥ sarvāḥ kṛṣṇasya mukhapaṅkajam /
GE07hv_conpu:11537: dīptam antargataṃ tasya hṛdayaṃ mānasāgninā // HV_76.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11542: [k: For 17cd, K,Ñ2.3,V1.3,B,Dn,Ds,D1-5,T3.4 subst.; Ñ1,T1,G4 ins. after 17ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11544: so ājñāpayata saṃkruddhaḥ puruṣān vyāyatān bahūn /
GE07hv_conpu:11545: gopāv etau samājaughān niṣkrāmyetāṃ vanecarau // HV_76.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11546: na caitau draṣṭum icchāmi vikṛtau pāpadarśinau /
GE07hv_conpu:11547: gopānām api me rājye na kaścit sthātum arhati // HV_76.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11548: nandagopaś ca durmedhāḥ pāpeṣv abhirato mama /
GE07hv_conpu:11550: vasudevaś ca durvṛtto nityaṃ chadmacaro mama /
GE07hv_conpu:11551: avṛddhārheṇa daṇḍena kṣipram adyaiva vadhyatām // HV_76.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:11553: eṣāṃ hriyantāṃ gāvaś ca yac cāsti vasu kiṃcana // HV_76.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:11556: kṣipte pitari cukrodha nandagope ca keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11557: jñātīnāṃ ca vyathāṃ dṛṣṭvā visaṃjñāṃ caiva devakīm // HV_76.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:11558: sa siṃha iva vegena kesarī jātavikramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11561: asajjan vāyunā kṣipto yathā vidyud ghanād ghanam // HV_76.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11562: dadṛśur na hi taṃ sarve raṅgamadhyād avaplutam /
GE07hv_conpu:11565: ākāśād iva govindaṃ mene tatrāgataṃ vibhum // HV_76.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:11567: tam āviśantam ālokya mṛtyum ātmana āsanāt | *HV_76.28*847:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11574: kiṃcid dayāparāmṛṣṭo hantuṃ naicchat sa keśavaḥ | *HV_76.28*848:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11578: sthitaḥ kaṃsas tu mañceṣu prasvinnaḥ sarvagātrakaiḥ | *HV_76.28*848:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:11581: jahi kaṃsaṃ yavīyāṃsam āyudhaiś ca vivarjitam || *HV_76.28*848:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:11582: etac chrutvā tu kaṃsaṃ sa sahasotthitavāṃs tataḥ | *HV_76.28*848:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:11583: vadan vākyaṃ janān vīkṣya vepamāno yathā nagaḥ || *HV_76.28*848:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:11585: devam ūrjastaraṃ jñātvā yathā yatno hi pauruṣaḥ || *HV_76.28*848:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:11587: jahi gopa mahābāho prāṇā [hi] tvarayanti mām || *HV_76.28*848:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:11590: mūrdhajeṣu parāmṛṣṭaḥ kaṃso vai raṅgasaṃsadi // HV_76.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11592: sirasas tasya kṛṣṇena parāmṛṣṭasya pāṇinā // HV_76.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:11593: sa hastagrastakeśaś ca kaṃso niryatnatāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11594: tathaiva ca visaṃmūḍho vihvalaḥ samapadyata // HV_76.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11595: nigṛhītaś ca keśeṣu mandāsur iva niḥśvasan /
GE07hv_conpu:11596: na śaśāka mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ kaṃsaḥ kṛṣṇasya vai tadā // HV_76.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11598: pralambābhyāṃ ca bāhubhyāṃ gātrair visṛtabhūṣaṇaiḥ // HV_76.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11600: veṣṭamānaḥ samākṣiptaḥ kaṃsaḥ kṛṣṇena tejasā // HV_76.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:11602: śirasy abhyahanat kṛṣṇo muṣṭinā balavad balī | *HV_76.34*849:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11603: yenaiva muṣṭinā viṣṇur yathā syāt prāṇasaṃśayaḥ | *HV_76.34*849:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:11604: cakarṣa ca mahāraṅge mañcān niṣkramya keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11605: keśeṣu balavad gṛhya kaṃsaṃ kleśārhatāṃ gatam // HV_76.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:11609: samājavāṭe parikhāṃ dehakṛṣṭāṃ cakāra ha // HV_76.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11612: dharaṇyāṃ mṛditaḥ śete tasya dehaḥ sukhocitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11614: tasya tad vadanaṃ śyāvaṃ suptākṣaṃ mukuṭaṃ vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:11615: na vibhāti viparyastaṃ vipalāśaṃ yathāmbujam // HV_76.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:11616: asaṃgrāme hataḥ kaṃsaḥ sa bāṇair aparikṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11622: mātuś ca śirasā pādau nipīḍya yadunandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11625: abhiṣekaṃ tadā cakre devakī kṛṣṇam avyayam | *HV_76.43*851 |
GE07hv_conpu:11626: [k: After *851 G3.5 cont.; D6,T1.2,G1.2.4,M ins. after 43: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11627: ugrasenasya ca tadā vavande śirasā hariḥ | *HV_76.43*852:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11629: yādavāṃś caiva tān sarvān yathāsthānaṃ yathāvayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11630: papraccha kuśalaṃ kṛṣṇo dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā // HV_76.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:11632: bāhubhyām eva tarasā sunāmānam apothayat // HV_76.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:11635: tau jitārī jitakrodhau ciraṃ viproṣitau vraje /
GE07hv_conpu:11636: svapitur bhavanaṃ vīrau jagmatur hṛṣṭamānasau // HV_76.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:11638: te ca devāḥ samunayo hate kaṃse durātmani | *HV_76.46*854:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11639: namaskṛtya jagannāthaṃ svaṃ svaṃ jagmur yathālayam | *HV_76.46*854:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:11642: hatvā pūtānikāṃ vibhajya śakaṭaṃ bhaṅktvārjunau dānavān | *HV_76.46*854A:2 |*
GE07hv_conpu:11644: hatvā keśinam unmadaṃ viṣataruṃ coddhṛtya govardhanaṃ | *HV_76.46*854A:4 |*
GE07hv_conpu:11645: yaḥ kaṃsaṃ sagajendramallam avadhīt tasmai namo viṣṇave || *HV_76.46*854A:5 |*
GE07hv_conpu:11648: iti stutvā bahuvidhaṃ te devā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ | *HV_76.46*854A:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:11655: bhartāraṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣīṇapuṇyam iva graham /
GE07hv_conpu:11656: kaṃsapatnyo hataṃ kaṃsaṃ samantāt paryavārayan // HV_77.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:11658: bhāryāḥ sma dṛṣṭvā śocanti mṛgyo mṛgavadhe yathā // HV_77.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:11659: hā hatāḥ sma mahābāho hatāṣā hatabāndhavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11660: vīraptnyo hate vīre tvayi vīravratapriye // HV_77.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:11661: imām avasthāṃ paśyantyaḥ paścimāṃ tava naiṣṭhikīm /
GE07hv_conpu:11663: chinnamūlāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ parityaktāḥ sma śobhanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11664: tvayi pañcatvam āpanne nāthe 'smākaṃ mahābale // HV_77.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:11666: latā iva viceṣṭantyaḥ śayanīyāni neṣyati // HV_77.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:11668: dahaty arko mukhaṃ kāntaṃ nistoyam iva paṅkajam // HV_77.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11669: imau te śravaṇau śūnyau na śobhete vikuṇḍalau /
GE07hv_conpu:11671: kva te sa mukuṭo vīra sarvaratnavibhūṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11672: atyantaṃ śiraso lakṣmīṃ yo dadhāty arkasaprabhaḥ // HV_77.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:11674: kathaṃ dīnena kartavyaṃ tvayi lokāntaraṃ gate // HV_77.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:11675: nanu nāma striyaḥ sādhvyaḥ priyabhogeṣv avañcitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11676: patīnām aparityajyās tvaṃ tu nas tyajya gacchasi // HV_77.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:11680: kālatulyaḥ sapatnānāṃ tvaṃ kṣipram apanīyase // HV_77.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:11681: vayaṃ duḥkheṣv anucitāḥ sukheṣv eva tu yojitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11682: kathaṃ vatsyāma vidhavā nātha kārpaṇyam āśritāḥ // HV_77.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:11683: strīṇāṃ cāritralubdhānāṃ patir ekaḥ parā gatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11684: tvaṃ hi naḥ sā gatiś chinnā kṛtāntena balīyasā // HV_77.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:11686: [k: Ñ2 V.12 B Ds (D2 after 12) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11688: roditavye dhruve magnāḥ kva gacchāmas tvayā vinā // HV_77.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11689: saha tvayā gataḥ kālas tvadaṅke krīḍitaṃ gatam /
GE07hv_conpu:11690: kṣaṇena ca vihīnāḥ sma anityā hi nṛṇāṃ gatiḥ // HV_77.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:11691: aho bata vipannāḥ sma vipanne tvayi mānada /
GE07hv_conpu:11694: tvayi kāmavaśāḥ sarvāḥ sa nas tyajya kva gacchasi // HV_77.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11695: [k: Ñ3 V2.3 B Dn Ds D4 (V1 after 18ab, D2 after *856) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11696: asmākaṃ tvam anāthānāṃ nātho hy asi suropama | *HV_77.18*857 |
GE07hv_conpu:11698: prativākyaṃ jagannātha dātum arhasi mānada // HV_77.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11700: gamanaṃ te mahārāja dāruṇaṃ pratibhāti naḥ // HV_77.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:11701: nūnaṃ kāntatarāḥ kānta tasmiṃl loke varastriyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11702: tatas tvaṃ prasthito vīra vihāyemaṃ gṛhe janam // HV_77.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:11703: kiṃ nu te karuṇaṃ vīra bhāryāsv etāsu bhūmipa /
GE07hv_conpu:11706: ye parityajya dārān svān nirapekṣā vrajanti ha // HV_77.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:11707: apatitvaṃ striyāḥ śreyo na tu śūraḥ striyāḥ patiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11708: svargastrīṇāṃ priyāḥ śurās teṣām api ca tāḥ priyāḥ // HV_77.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:11709: aho kṣipram adṛśyena nayatā tvayā raṇapriyam /
GE07hv_conpu:11710: prahṛtaṃ naḥ kṛtāntena sarvāsām antarātmasu // HV_77.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:11711: hatvā jarāsaṃdhabalaṃ jitvā yakṣāṃś ca saṃyuge /
GE07hv_conpu:11713: jarāsaṃdhabalaṃ jitvā hatvā rājñāṃ ca saṃyuge | *HV_77.26ab*858 |
GE07hv_conpu:11715: jitvā devagaṇaṃ yuddhe yakṣān api ca saṃyuge | *HV_77.26ab*859 |
GE07hv_conpu:11716: kathaṃ mānuṣamātreṇa hatas tvaṃ jagatīpate // HV_77.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11718: amartyair ajito yuddhe martyenāsi kathaṃ hataḥ // HV_77.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:11722: sāyakair jaladān bhittvā balād varṣaṃ pravartitam // HV_77.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11724: preṣayāṇā varārhāṇi ratnāny ācchādanāni ca // HV_77.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:11726: kathaṃ prāṇāntikaṃ ghoram īdṛśaṃ bhayam āgatam // HV_77.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11727: prāptāḥ smo vidhavāśabdaṃ tvayi nāthe nipātite /
GE07hv_conpu:11728: apramattāḥ pramattāḥ sma kṛtāntena nirākṛtāḥ // HV_77.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11729: yady evaṃ nātha gantavyaṃ yadi vā vismṛtā vayam /
GE07hv_conpu:11730: vākyamātreṇa yāsyeti kartavyo naḥ parigrahaḥ // HV_77.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11731: prasīda nātha bhītāḥ sma pādau te yāma mūrdhabhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11733: aho vīra kathaṃ śeṣe niṣaṇṇas tṛṇapāṃsuṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:11734: śayānasya hi te bhūmau kasmān nodvijate manaḥ // HV_77.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:11736: prahṛtaṃ kena sarvāsu nārīsv evaṃ sudāruṇam // HV_77.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11738: kiṃ vayaṃ sati gantavye saha bhartrā rudāmahe // HV_77.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:11740: kva me vatsaḥ kva me putra iti rorūyate bhṛśam // HV_77.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:11741: sāpaśyat taṃ hataṃ putraṃ nipītaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā /
GE07hv_conpu:11742: hṛdayena vidīrṇena śrāmyamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ // HV_77.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:11744: [k: D6 T1.2 G M subst. for 40ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11745: hā hatāsmīti vāśantī papāta bhuvi duḥkhitā | *HV_77.40ab*860 |
GE07hv_conpu:11746: snuṣāṇām ārtanādena vilalāpa ruroda ca // HV_77.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:11747: sā tasya vadanaṃ dīnam utsaṅge putragṛddhinī /
GE07hv_conpu:11748: kṛtvā putreti karuṇaṃ vilalāpārtayā girā // HV_77.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:11750: kim idaṃ tvaritaṃ tāta prasthānaṃ kṛtavān asi // HV_77.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:11751: prasuptaś cāsi vivṛte kiṃ putra śayanaṃ vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:11752: tāta naivaṃvidhā bhūmau śerate kṛtalakṣaṇāḥ // HV_77.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:11756: bāndhavebhyo bhayaṃ ghoram anivāryaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_77.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:11758: jñātibhyo bhayam utpannaṃ śarīrāntakaraṃ mahat // HV_77.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:11760: vinamrasya hy anaukasya (?) vaktur vigraham ṛcchataḥ | *HV_77.46*861:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11762: sā patiṃ bhūpatiṃ vṛddham ugrasenaṃ vicetasam /
GE07hv_conpu:11763: uvāca rudatī vākyaṃ vivatsā saurabhī yathā // HV_77.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:11764: ehy ehi rājan dharmātman paśya putraṃ janeśvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:11771: pretakāryāṇi kāryāṇi mṛtaḥ kim aparādhyate // HV_77.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:11772: evam uktvā patiṃ bhojaṃ keśān ārujya duḥkhitā /
GE07hv_conpu:11773: putrasya mukham īkṣantī vilalāpaiva sā bhṛśam // HV_77.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:11774: imās te kiṃ kariṣyanti bhāryā rājan sukhocitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11775: tvāṃ patiṃ supatiṃ prāpya yā vipannamanorathāḥ // HV_77.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:11776: imaṃ te pitaraṃ vṛddhaṃ kṛṣṇasya vaśavartinam /
GE07hv_conpu:11777: kathaṃ drakṣyāmi śuṣyantaṃ kāsārasalilaṃ yathā // HV_77.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:11778: ahaṃ te jananī putra kimarthaṃ nābhibhāṣase /
GE07hv_conpu:11779: prasthito dīrgham adhvānaṃ parityajyya priyaṃ janam // HV_77.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:11781: ācchidya mama mandāyā nīyase nayakovida // HV_77.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:11784: nāmāni ca gṛhītāni samyagvṛttāni tair guṇaiḥ | *HV_77.57ab*862 |
GE07hv_conpu:11785: rudanti tava bhṛtyānāṃ kulāni kulayūthapa // HV_77.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:11787: trāhi dīnaṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ puram antaḥpuraṃ tathā // HV_77.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:11796: ugrasenas tu kṛṣṇasya samīpaṃ duḥkhito yayau /
GE07hv_conpu:11798: sa dadarśa gṛhe kṛṣṇaṃ yādavair abhisaṃvṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:11805: vaidhavyaṃ strīsahasrāṇāṃ kaṃsasyāsya kṛte kṛtam // HV_78.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:11807: evam ārtaṃ rudantīṣu mayā bhartari pātite // HV_78.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:11810: kaṃsasya hi vadhaḥ śreyān prāg evābhimato mama /
GE07hv_conpu:11811: sutām udvejanīyasya pāpeṣv abhiratasya ca // HV_78.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11813: akliṣṭaṃ maraṇaṃ śreyo na vidviṣṭasya jīvitam // HV_78.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:11814: kaṃsaḥ pāparatiś caiva sādhūnāṃ cāpy asaṃmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11815: dhikśabdapatitaś caiva jīvite cāsya kā dayā // HV_78.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:11816: svarge tapobhṛtāṃ vāsaḥ phalaṃ puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11817: ihāpi yaśasā yuktas tatrasthair upadhāryate // HV_78.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:11818: yadi syur nirvṛttā lokāḥ syuś ca dharmaparāḥ prajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11819: narā dharmapravṛttāś ca na nṛpo vikṛto bhavet // HV_78.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:11823: kartāraḥ sulabhā loke duṣkṛtasyeha karmaṇaḥ // HV_78.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:11824: hataḥ so 'yaṃ mayā kaṃsaḥ sādhv etad avagamyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:11825: mūlacchedaḥ kṛtas tasya viparītasya karmaṇaḥ // HV_78.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:11827: na ced dhanyāṃ durācāraṃ vinaṅkṣyati tadā jagat | *HV_78.14*864:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11828: kaḥ kuryāt khalv idaṃ kāryaṃ badhvā pitaram ojasā | *HV_78.14*864:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:11829: rājyaṃ sakalasāmantaṃ kariṣyati sadā hi saḥ | *HV_78.14*864:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:11830: tad eṣa sāntvyatāṃ sarvaḥ śokārtaḥ pramadājanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11831: paurāś ca puryāṃ śreṇyaś ca sāntvyatāṃ sarva eva hi // HV_78.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11841: putra niryātitaḥ krodho nīto yāmyāṃ diśaṃ ripuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11842: svadharmādhigatā kīrtir nāma viśrāvitaṃ bhuvi // HV_78.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11843: sthāpitaṃ satsu māhātmyaṃ śaṅkitā ripavaḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11844: sthāpito yādavo vaṃśo garvitāḥ suhṛdaḥ kṛtāḥ // HV_78.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11846: mitrāṇi tvāṃ bhajiṣyanti saṃśrayiṣyanti cārthinaḥ // HV_78.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:11850: pratigṛhāṇa kṛṣṇedaṃ kaṃsasya balam avyayam // HV_78.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:11851: dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ ca yat kiṃcid ratnāny ācchādanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:11852: [k: all mss (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11853: pratīcchantu niyuktā vai tvadīyāḥ kṛṣṇa puruṣāḥ | *HV_78.23ab*867 |
GE07hv_conpu:11854: striyo hiraṇyaṃ vāsāṃsi yac cānyad vasu kiṃcana // HV_78.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:11855: evaṃ hi vihite yoge paryāpte kṛṣṇa vigrahe /
GE07hv_conpu:11857: [k: N (except K4 D2) T1-3 G1-3 M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11858: tvaṃ gatiś cāgatiś caiva yadūnāṃ yadunandana | *HV_78.24*868 |
GE07hv_conpu:11859: śṛṇu tad bruvatāṃ vīra kṛpaṇānām idaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11861: tava prasādād govinde pretakāryaṃ kriyate ha // HV_78.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:11863: sasnuṣo 'haṃ sabhāryaś ca cariṣyāmi mṛgaiḥ saha // HV_78.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11865: ānṛṇyaṃ laukikaṃ kṛṣṇa gataḥ kila bhavāmy aham // HV_78.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:11866: asyāgniṃ paścimaṃ dattvā cittisthāne vidhiṃ vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:11868: etan me kṛṣṇa vijñāpyaṃ sneho 'tra mama yujyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:11869: prāpnotu sugatiṃ tatra kṛpaṇaḥ paścimāṃ kriyām // HV_78.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11870: etac chrutvā vacas tasya kṛṣṇaḥ paramaharṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11871: pratyuvācograsenaṃ vai sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_78.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:11872: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B D T1.2 (second time, first time after 25ab) G M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11873: kālayuktam idaṃ tāta tvayaitad bhāṣitaṃ vacaḥ | *HV_78.30*869 |
GE07hv_conpu:11874: sadṛśaṃ rājaśārdūla vṛttasya ca kulasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:11875: yat tvaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ brūṣe gate 'rthe duratikrame // HV_78.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11876: prāpsyate nṛpa saṃskāraṃ kaṃsaḥ pretagate 'pi san /
GE07hv_conpu:11877: [k: K Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn Ds D1-5 T1.3.4 G4 M1-3 G(ed.)
GE07hv_conpu:11879: D6 T2 G1-3.5 M4 after first occurrence of 32cd,
GE07hv_conpu:11880: V3 after first occurrence of 32ab) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11881: kule mahati te janma vedān viditavān asi | *HV_78.32ab*870:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11882: kathaṃ na jñāyate tāta niyatir duratikramā || *HV_78.32ab*870:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:11883: sthāvarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca pārthiva | *HV_78.32ab*870:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:11891: svayam eva kṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham | *HV_78.32ab*870:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:11892: prāpte kāle tu tat karma dṛśyate sarvadehinām || *HV_78.32ab*870:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:11893: eṣā hy antarhitā māyā durvijñeyā surair api | *HV_78.32ab*870:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:11894: yathāyaṃ muhyate loko hy atra karmaiva kāraṇam || *HV_78.32ab*870:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:11896: na hy ayaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra kālaḥ karma ca kāraṇam || *HV_78.32ab*870:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:11898: kālena nidhanaṃ gatvā kālenaiva ca jāyate | *HV_78.32ab*870:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:11899: kālas tu sarvabhūtānāṃ nigrahe pragrahe rataḥ | *HV_78.32ab*870:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:11900: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni kālasya vaśagāni vai || *HV_78.32ab*870:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:11902: nāhaṃ vai kāraṇaṃ tatra kālas tatra tu kāraṇam || *HV_78.32ab*870:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:11903: atha vāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ | *HV_78.32ab*870:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:11905: kālas tu balavān rājan durvijñeyā hi sā gatiḥ || *HV_78.32ab*870:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:11907: gatiḥ kālasya sā yena sarvaṃ kālasya gocaram | *HV_78.32ab*870:27 |
GE07hv_conpu:11908: bravīmi yad ahaṃ tāta tad anuṣṭhīyatāṃ vacaḥ // HV_78.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11909: na hi rājyena me kāryaṃ nāpy ahaṃ rājyalālasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11910: na cāpi rājyalubdhena mayā kaṃso nipātitaḥ // HV_78.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11911: kiṃ tu lokahitārthāya kīrtyarthaṃ ca sutas tava /
GE07hv_conpu:11913: ahaṃ sa eva gomadhye gopaiḥ saha vanecaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11914: prītimān vicariṣyāmi kāmacārī yathā gajaḥ // HV_78.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:11915: etāvac chataśo 'py evaṃ satyena prabravīmi te /
GE07hv_conpu:11916: na me kāryaṃ nṛpatvena vijñāpyaṃ kriyatām idam // HV_78.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11917: bhavān rājāstu me mānyo yadūnām agraṇīḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11919: yadi te matpriyaṃ kāryaṃ yadi vā nāsti te vyathā /
GE07hv_conpu:11920: mayā nisṛṣṭaṃ rājyaṃ svaṃ cirāya pratigṛhyatām // HV_78.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:11921: [k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2-4.5(marg.).6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11923: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ nottaraṃ pratyabhāṣata | *HV_79.38*871 |
GE07hv_conpu:11927: abhiṣekeṇa govindo yojayām āsa yogavit // HV_78.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:11929: cakāra saha kṛṣṇena kaṃsasya nidhanakriyām // HV_78.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:11930: taṃ sarve yādavā mukhyā rājānaṃ kṛṣṇaśāsanāt /
GE07hv_conpu:11931: anujagmuḥ purīmārge devā iva śatakratum // HV_78.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:11932: rajanyāṃ tu prabhātāyāṃ tataḥ sūrye cirodite /
GE07hv_conpu:11933: paścimaṃ kaṃsasaṃskāraṃ cakrus te yadupuṃgavāḥ // HV_78.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:11935: naiṣṭhikena vidhānena cakrus te tasya satkriyām // HV_78.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:11936: sa nīto yamunātīram uttaraṃ nṛpateḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11937: saṃskṛtaś ca yathānyāyaṃ naidhanena citāgninā // HV_78.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:11939: saṃskāraṃ lambhayām āsuḥ saha kṛṣṇena yādavāḥ // HV_78.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:11941: akṣayaṃ cāpi pretebhyo bhāṣamāṇāḥ pratasthire // HV_78.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:11943: akṣayaṃ bhāṣamāṇaś ca pretebhyaś ca pratasthire | *HV_77.46cd*873 |
GE07hv_conpu:11944: [k: G2 cont., K3 B3 (after second occurrence of 46cd) D4.5(marg.) G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11945: hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya daśa koṭīs tathā hariḥ | *HV_78.46*874:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11948: tayos te salilaṃ dattvā yādavā dīnamānasāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11949: puraskṛtyograsenaṃ vai viviṣur mathurāṃ purīm // HV_78.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:11966: sa kṛṣṇas tatra balavān rauhiṇeyena saṃgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11967: mathurāṃ yādavādhīnāṃ purīṃ tāṃ sukham āvasat // HV_79.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:11968: [k: K2.4 om. the ref. After the ref., D2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11971: pitur yuvābhyāṃ snigdhābhyāṃ poṣitau lalitau bhṛśam | *HV_79.0*876:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:11972: pitror abhyadhikā prītir ātmajeṣv ātmano 'pi hi || *HV_79.0*876:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:11973: sa pitā sā ca jananī yau puṣṇītāṃ svaputravat || *HV_79.0*876:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:11975: yāta yūyaṃ vrajaṃ tāta vayaṃ ca snehaduḥkhitān | *HV_79.0*876:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:11976: jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham || *HV_79.0*876:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:11977: evaṃ sāntvayya bhagavān sa nandavrajam acyutaḥ | *HV_79.0*876:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:11979: ity uktas tau pariṣvajya nandaḥ praṇayavihvalaḥ | *HV_79.0*876:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:11980: pūrayann aśrubhir netre saha gopair vrajaṃ yayau | *HV_79.0*876:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:11983: cakāra mathurāṃ vīrah. sa ratnākarabhūṣaṇām // HV_79.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:11984: kasyacit tv atha kālasya sahitau rāmakeśavau /
GE07hv_conpu:11991: pratijagrāha tāu kāśyo vidyāḥ prādāc ca kevalāḥ // HV_79.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:11992: tau ca śrutidharau vīrau yathāvat pratipadyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:11993: ahorātraiś catuḥṣaṣṭyā sāṅgaṃ vedam adhīyatām // HV_79.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:11994: [k: D6 T1.2 G M subst. for 5cd: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11995: sāṅgaṃ vedam adhīyatāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā dinais tathā | *HV_79.5*878 |
GE07hv_conpu:11998: lekhyaṃ ca gaṇitaṃ cobhau prāpnutāṃ yadunandanau | *HV_79.6ab*879:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:11999: gāndhavavedaṃ kṛtsnaṃ ca tathā lekhyāś ca tāv ubhau | *HV_79.6ab*879:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12001: tāv ubhau jagmatur vīrau guruṃ sāṃdīpaniṃ tataḥ | *HV_79.6ab*879:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12004: tena tau satkṛtau rājan vicarantāv avantiṣu || *HV_79.6ab*879:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:12007: acireṇaiva kālena gurus tāv abhyaṣikṣayat // HV_79.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:12008: atīvamānuṣīṃ medhāṃ tayoś cintya gurus tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:12009: mene tāv āgatau devāv ubhau candradivākarau // HV_79.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12010: dadarśa ca mahātmānāv ubhau tāv api parvasu /
GE07hv_conpu:12011: pūjayantau mahādevaṃ sākṣāt tryakṣam avasthitam // HV_79.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12013: gurvarthaṃ kiṃ dadānīti rāmeṇa saha bhārata // HV_79.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12014: tayoḥ prabhāvaṃ sa jñātvā guruḥ provāca hṛṣṭavat /
GE07hv_conpu:12015: putram icchāmy ahaṃ dattaṃ yo mṛto lavaṇāmbhasi // HV_79.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12016: putra eko hi me jātaḥ sa cāpi timinā hṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12017: prabhāse tīrthayātrāyāṃ taṃ me tvaṃ punar ānaya // HV_79.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12019: gatvā samudraṃ tejasvī viveśāntarjalaṃ hariḥ // HV_79.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:12020: samudraḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā darśayām āsa taṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:12021: tam āha kṛṣṇaḥ kvāsau bhoḥ putraḥ sāṃdīpaner iti // HV_79.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:12022: samudras tam uvācedaṃ daityaḥ pañcajano mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:12023: timirūpeṇa taṃ bālaṃ grastavān iti mādhava // HV_79.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12025: unmathya salilād asmād grastavān iti bhārata | *HV_79.14*880 |
GE07hv_conpu:12027: na cāsasāda taṃ bālaṃ guruputraṃ tadācyutaḥ // HV_79.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12028: sa tu pañcajanaṃ hatvā śaṅkhaṃ lebhe janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12029: yaḥ sa devamanuṣyeṣu pāñcajanya iti śrutaḥ // HV_79.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12032: āsanasthaṃ tato viṣṇuḥ provāca yamam ūrjitam | *HV_79.16*881:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12033: dīyatāṃ putra ity evaṃ kāśyasāṃdīpaner iti || *HV_79.16*881:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12034: tam uvāca tato viṣṇuṃ mṛtyunā cāhṛto hare | *HV_79.16*881:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12036: aho dhārṣṭyaṃ tato mṛtyor ity uktvā dhanur ādade || *HV_79.16*881:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:12037: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ dīyatām iti cābravīt | *HV_79.16*881:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:12038: kruddhaṃ viṣṇuṃ samājñāya dattavān kila bālakam | *HV_79.16*881:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:12040: [k: Ñ1 B1 D8 ins., Ñ2.3 B2.3 after second occurrence of 17ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12041: āsasāda ca taṃ bālaṃ guruputraṃ tadācyutaḥ | *HV_79.17ab*882 |

GE07hv_conpu:12077: sve pure nirbhayāḥ sarve krīḍadhvaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ // HV_79.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:12080: na tatra kaś cid dīno vā malino vā vicetanaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:12084: śivāś ca vātāḥ pravavur virajaskā diśo daśa /

GE07hv_conpu:12086: yāni liṅgāni lokasya babhuḥ kṛtayuge purā /

GE07hv_conpu:12145: jighāṃsur hi yadūn kruddhaḥ kaṃsasyāpacitiṃ caran // HV_80.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12146: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.2.3(second time).4.5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12150: astiḥ prāptiś ca nāmnās tāṃ māgadhasya sute nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:12151: [k: T1(first time) M1-3.4(first time) ins., G3(second time).5 cont. after *897: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12152: te dve ca kaṃsarājāya dadau hṛṣṭaḥ sa māgadhaḥ || *HV_80.3ab*896:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12153: tena te vidhave syātām ubhe kṛṣṇena māgadhe | *HV_80.3ab*896:2 |

GE07hv_conpu:12177: ta enam anvayuḥ sarve sainyaiḥ samuditair vṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12178: [k: T1.3(second time) G3(second time) M ins: :k]

GE07hv_conpu:12182: kārūṣo dantavaktraś ca cedirājaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12183: kaliṅgādhipatiś caiva pauṇḍraś ca balināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12184: āhvṛtiḥ kauśikaś caiva bhīṣmakaś ca narādhipaḥ // HV_80.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12185: putraś ca bhīṣmakasyāpi rukmī mukhyo dhanurbhṛtām /
GE07hv_conpu:12186: vāsudevārjunābhyāṃ yaḥ spardhate sma sadā bale // HV_80.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12187: veṇudāriḥ śrutarvā ca krāthaś caivāṃśumān api /
GE07hv_conpu:12188: aṅgarājaś ca balavān vaṅgānām adhipas tathā // HV_80.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:12190: suhmeśvaraś ca vikrānto videhādhipatis tathā // HV_80.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:12192: sālvarājaś ca vikrānto daradaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_80.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12194: sauvīrarājaḥ śaibyaś ca pāṇḍyaś ca balināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12195: gāndhārarājaḥ subalo nagnajic ca mahābalaḥ // HV_80.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12198: [k: K3 Dn Ds D5 cont., K1.4 Ñ V B D1.3.4.6 T2.3(both times)
GE07hv_conpu:12202: ete cānye ca rājāno balavanto mahārathāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12203: tam anvayur jarāsaṃdhaṃ vidviṣanto janārdanam // HV_80.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12205: ūṣuḥ saṃrudhya mathurāṃ parikṣipya balais tadā // HV_80.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12213: [k: After the ref. D6 T2 G1.4.5 M4 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 16) :k]

GE07hv_conpu:12216: tān āgatān nṛpān rājan māgadhān rājasattamān | *HV_81.1*902 |
GE07hv_conpu:12217: tato hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇo rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:12218: tvarate khalu kāryārtho devatānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // HV_81.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12220: lakṣyante hi dhvajāgrāṇi rathānāṃ vātaraṃhasām // HV_81.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:12222: chatrāṇy ārya virājante procchritāni sitāni ca // HV_81.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12224: abhivartanti naḥ śubhrā yathā khe haṃsapaṅktayaḥ // HV_81.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:12225: kāle khalu nṛpaḥ prāpto jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12228: yuddhārambhaḥ prayoktavyo balaṃ tāvad vimṛśyatām // HV_81.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12229: evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ svasthaḥ saṃgrāmalālasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12231: vīkṣamāṇaś ca tān sarvān nṛpān yaduvaro 'vyayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12232: ātmānam ātmanā vākyam uvāca hṛdi mantravit // HV_81.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12233: ime te pṛthivīpālāḥ pārthive vartmani sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12234: ye vināśam iheṣyanti śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // HV_81.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12235: prokṣitāḥ khalv ime manye mṛtyunā nṛpapuṃgavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12236: svargagāni tathā hy eṣāṃ vapūṃṣi pracakāśire // HV_81.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12250: rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair yuktair asaṅgagatibhiḥ kva cit // HV_81.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12254: vājibhir meghasaṃkāśaiḥ plavadbhir iva pattibhiḥ // HV_81.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12259: sa rathair meghanirghoṣair gajaiś ca madaśiñcitaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12260: heṣamāṇaiś ca turagaiḥ kṣveḍamāṇaiś ca pattibhiḥ // HV_81.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:12261: nādayāno diśaḥ sarvās tasyāḥ puryā vanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:12262: [k: T1.3(second time) G3.5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12264: sa rājā sāgarākāraḥ sasainyaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_81.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:12268: turagaiś ca javopetaiḥ pattibhiḥ khagamair iva // HV_81.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:12273: babhau tasya niviṣṭasya balaśrīḥ śibirasya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:12276: ārohaṇārthaṃ puryās te samīyur yuddhalālasāḥ // HV_81.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:12277: samavāyīkṛtāḥ sarve yamunām anu te nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12280: yugānte bhidyamānānāṃ sāgarāṇāṃ yathā svanaḥ // HV_81.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:12282: cerur mā śabda ity evaṃ bruvanto rājaśasanāt // HV_81.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12286: jarāsaṃdho bṛhad vākyaṃ bṛhaspatir ivādade // HV_81.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:12288: sarvato nagarī ceyaṃ janaughaiḥ parivāryatām // HV_81.33 //

GE07hv_conpu:12291: kāryā bhūmiḥ samā sarvā jalaughaiś ca pariplutā | *HV_81.34ab*906 |

GE07hv_conpu:12293: dāryatāṃ caiva ṭaṅkaughaiḥ khanitraiś ca purī drutam /
GE07hv_conpu:12294: nṛpaś ca yuddhamārgajñā vinyasyantām adūrataḥ // HV_81.35 //

GE07hv_conpu:12301: teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu śīghram āruhyatāṃ purī // HV_81.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:12304: drumaḥ kiṃpuruṣaś caiva pārvatīyaṣ ca dāmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12305: nagaryāḥ paścimaṃ dvāraṃ kṣipram ārohayantv iti // HV_81.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:12306: pauravo veṇudāriś ca vaidarbhaḥ somakas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:12307: rukmī ca bhojādhipatiḥ sūryākṣaś caiva mālavaḥ // HV_81.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:12313: chāgaliḥ purumitraś ca virāṭaś ca mahīpatiḥ // HV_81.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:12315: bhūriśravās trigartaś ca bāṇaḥ pañcanadas tathā // HV_81.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:12318: ulūkaḥ kaitaveyaś ca vīraś cāṃśumataḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12320: uttamaujāś ca śalyaś ca kauravāḥ kaikayās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:12321: vaidiśo vāmadevaś ca sāketaś ca sinīpatiḥ // HV_81.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:12322: pūrvaṃ nagaranirvyūham eteṣv āyattam astu vaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12324: ahaṃ ca daradaś caiva cedirājaś ca saṃgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12326: evam eṣā purī kṣipraṃ samantād veṣṭitā balaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12328: gadino ye gadābhis te parighaiḥ parighāyudhāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12329: apare vividhaiḥ śastrair dārayantu purīm imām // HV_81.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:12331: kāryā bhūmisamā sarvā bhavadbhir vasudhādhipaiḥ // HV_81.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:12335: athābhyayād yadūn kruddhaḥ saha sarvair narādhipaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12336: pratijagmur daśārhās taṃ vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ // HV_81.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:12338: tāv āgatau tadā dṛṣṭvā yādavau sainyam agragau | *HV_81.51*911:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12339: ruṣāha māgadho vīkṣya he kṛṣṇa puruṣādhama | *HV_81.51*911:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12340: na tvayā yoddhum icchāmi bālakeneti lajjayā || *HV_81.51*911:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12341: tava rāma yada śraddhā yuddhe sthairyaṃ samudvaha | *HV_81.51*911:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12342: hato vā maccharaiś channa dehaḥ svar yāhi māṃ jahi || *HV_81.51*911:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:12344: na vai śūrā vikatthante darśayanty eva pauruṣam | *HV_81.51*911:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:12345: na gṛhṇīmo vaco rājan nāturasya mumūrṣataḥ | *HV_81.51*911:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:12347: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ teṣāṃ devāsuropamam /
GE07hv_conpu:12349: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.3.5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12354: rathasthau daṃśitau caiva ceratus tatra yādavau /
GE07hv_conpu:12355: makarāv iva saṃrabdhau samudrakṣobhaṇāv ubhau // HV_81.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:12356: tābhyāṃ mṛdhe prayuktābhyāṃ yādavābhyāṃ matir babhau /
