GE07hv_conpu:12358: tayoḥ prayudhyatoḥ saṃkhye matir āsīd dhṛtātmanoḥ | *HV_81.55ab*913 |
GE07hv_conpu:12360: tataḥ khān nipatanti sma dīptāny āhavasaṃplave /
GE07hv_conpu:12361: lelihānāni divyāni mahānti sudṛḍhāni ca // HV_81.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:12363: tṛṣitāny āhave bhoktuṃ nṛpamāṃsāni vai bhṛśam // HV_81.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:12365: prabhayā bhāsamānāni daṃśitāni diśo daśa // HV_81.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:12366: halaṃ saṃvartakaṃ nāma saunandaṃ musalaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:12367: dhanuṣāṃ pravaraṃ śārṅgaṃ gadā kaumodakī ca ha // HV_81.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:12371: taṃ sarpam iva sarpantaṃ divyamālākulaṃ mṛdhe // HV_81.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:12372: saunandaṃ ca tataḥ śrīmān nirānandakaraṃ dviṣām /
GE07hv_conpu:12373: savyena sātvatāṃ śreṣṭho jagrāha musalottamam // HV_81.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:12375: nāmnā śārṅgam iti khyātaṃ viṣṇur jagrāha vīryavān // HV_81.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:12377: viṣaktā kumudākṣasya nāmnā kaumodakīti sā // HV_81.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:12378: tau sapraharaṇau vīrau sākṣād viṣṇos tanūpamau /
GE07hv_conpu:12379: samare rāmagovindau ripūṃs tān pratyayudhyatām // HV_81.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:12383: [k: N (except Ñ1) T1.2.3(first time).4 G ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12385: halam udyamya rāmas tu sarpendram iva kopitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12386: cacāra samare vīro dviṣatām antako yathā // HV_81.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:12388: cakāra roṣaṃ saphalaṃ nāgeṣu ca hayeṣu ca // HV_81.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:12390: rāmo virājan samare nirmamantha yathācalān // HV_81.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:12394: dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttiṃ vaḥ samare kātarātmanām // HV_81.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:12397: bhītāḥ kasmān nivartadhvaṃ dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttitām /
GE07hv_conpu:12399: [k: N (except Ś1Ñ1 D1) T1.2.3(first time).4 G1.2.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12400: atha vā tiṣṭhata rathaiḥ prekṣakāḥ samavasthitāḥ | *HV_81.73cd*915 |
GE07hv_conpu:12401: yāvad etau raṇe gopau preṣayāmi yamakṣayam // HV_81.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:12403: sthito 'smi yuddhe saṃrabdhaḥ kṣatriyā vijayāya hi | *HV_81.73*916 |
GE07hv_conpu:12404: tatas te kṣatriyāḥ sarve jarāsaṃdhena coditāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12405: sṛjantaḥ śarajālāni hṛṣṭā yoddhuṃ vyavasthitāḥ // HV_81.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:12411: raṇe te 'bhigatā rejuḥ syandanasthā mahīkṣitaḥ // HV_81.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:12412: te yuddharāgā rathino vyagāhanta yudhāṃ varāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12413: gadābhiś caiva gurvībhiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_81.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:12414: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2-5 T3(first time).4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12416: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.3.5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12418: dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahānādaṃ diśaḥ sarvā vinādayan || *HV_81.78*918:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12421: kim u sainyāni sarvāṇi vitrastānīti kā kathā | *HV_81.78*918:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:12422: suparṇadhajam āsthāya kṛṣṇas tu ratham uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:12423: tadābhyayāj jarāsaṃdhaṃ śarair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ // HV_81.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:12424: [k: D6 T1.3(second time) G1.3.5 M ins., T2 cont. after *918, G4 ins. after 79ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12425: so 'pi vidhvāṣṭabhir viṣṇum ugrasenaṃ dadarśa ha | *HV_81.79*919:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12426: pārśvasthaṃ ca harer āha śṛṇu rājan vaco mama || *HV_81.79*919:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12427: tvaṃ kim āsīn nṛpo rānan vṛṣṇīnāṃ sāṃprataṃ vada | *HV_81.79*919:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12428: ajñānām agraṇīḥ sa tvaṃ ko 'nyas tvatsadṛśo bhuvi || *HV_81.79*919:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12429: yat tu dattaṃ kilānena piṇḍam ātmajaghātinā | *HV_81.79*919:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:12430: tad bhuṅkte tad bhavān nityaṃ vadāndha kim ataḥ param || *HV_81.79*919:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:12431: hatvā cāyaṃ sutaṃ śauris tava rājaka nirdayaḥ | *HV_81.79*919:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:12432: tvām eva rājye saṃsthāpya sāṃprataṃ yuddhalālasaḥ || *HV_81.79*919:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:12434: kevalaṃ vayasā vṛddho na tu jñānena rājaka || *HV_81.79*919:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:12436: ito yāhi vṛthāvṛddha tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ nāham utsahe || *HV_81.79*919:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:12437: atha yuddhaṃ samālipsuḥ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha mamāgrataḥ | *HV_81.79*919:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:12438: haniṣye tvāṃ hi sabalaṃ sahariṃ sabalaṃ tathā || *HV_81.79*919:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:12439: ity uktvā dhanur ādāya tasthau tatpuratas tadā || *HV_81.79*919:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:12440: tac chrutva roṣatāmrākṣo babhāṣe māgadhaṃ hariḥ | *HV_81.79*919:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:12442: tvam idānīṃ samāyāsi balaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ | *HV_81.79*919:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:12444: sa evāsmi śiśū rājan bhavān api sa eva hi | *HV_81.79*919:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:12445: naitad yuktaṃ vṛthā rājann ugrasenaṃ prabhāṣitum | *HV_81.79*919:21 |
GE07hv_conpu:12446: mām eva vada rājendra śatrur asmi tava prabho | *HV_81.79*919:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:12447: drakṣyase yat kṛtaṃ rājan mayā sāṃpratam īdṛśam || *HV_81.79*919:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:12448: atha kiṃ bahunoktena śiraś chetsyāmi te nṛpa | *HV_81.79*919:24 |
GE07hv_conpu:12449: na karoṣi yadi tvaṃ hi rājendrādya palāyanam || *HV_81.79*919:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:12450: ity uktvā pañcaviṃśatyā nṛpaṃ vivyādha keśavaḥ | *HV_81.79*919:26 |
GE07hv_conpu:12451: sārathiṃ cāsya vivyādha pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12452: jaghāna turagāṃś cājau yatamānasya vīryavān // HV_81.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:12453: [k: T2 G1.4.5 ins., D6 T1 G3 M after 80ab, T3(second time) after second occurrence of 80ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12455: dhvajaṃ cāsya praciccheda sārathiṃ ca jaghāna ha || *HV_81.80*920:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12457: viratho vidhanuṣkaś ca tasthau bhūtalam āsthitaḥ | *HV_81.80*920:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12459: senānīḥ kauśikaś caiva kṛṣṇaṃ vivyādhatuḥ śaraiḥ // HV_81.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:12460: tribhir vivyādha saṃsaktaṃ baladevaṃ ca kauśikaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12462: javenābhyardayac cāpi tān arīñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // HV_81.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:12463: [k: N (except Ñ1) T3(first time) G ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12465: taṃ citrasenaḥ saṃrabdho vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12466: kauśikaḥ pañcabhiś cāpi jarāsaṃdhaś ca saptabhiḥ // HV_81.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:12467: tribhis tribhiś ca nārācais tān bibheda janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12468: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.4.5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12471: sa śaro 'tha mahārāja rājānaṃ sa vyacūcudat | *HV_81.84ab*922:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12472: pitā kaṃsasya rājendra śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ || *HV_81.84ab*922:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12473: saptatyā ca jarāsaṃdhaṃ punaś ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ | *HV_81.84ab*922:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:12475: śarair daśasahasraiś ca mādhavasya hi paśyataḥ || *HV_81.84ab*922:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:12477: punar ādāya cāpaṃ tu jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān | *HV_81.84ab*922:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:12480: dhanuś cāsya dvidhā rājan muṣṭideśe tathākarot || *HV_81.84ab*922:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:12482: vivyādha rājan rājendro rājānaṃ hṛdaye prabhuḥ || *HV_81.84ab*922:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:12484: rathaṃ cāsya dvidhā cakre dhvajaṃ ca prādunon nṛpaḥ || *HV_81.84ab*922:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:12490: pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiś caiva baladevaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_81.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:12492: baladevo dhanuś cājau bhallenāsya dvidhākarot // HV_81.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:12493: sa cchinnadhanvā viratho gadām ādāya vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12497: gadayā ca jaghānāśvān kopāt sa magadheśvaraḥ // HV_81.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:12498: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-4.8 T2.3(second time).4 G1.2.4.5 ins., K1 after 88, K4 D5 after 87cd: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12501: tayos tu yuddham abhavat parasparavadhaiṣiṇoḥ // HV_81.88 //
GE07hv_conpu:12502: [k: K2-4 Ñ2.3 V B D T2.3(first time).4 G1.2.4.5 ins., K1 cont. after *923: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12503: citrasenas tu saṃsaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇa māgadham | *HV_81.88*924:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12505: tato balena mahatā gajānīkena cāpy atha | *HV_81.88*924:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12510: prādur babhūva tumulaḥ senayor ubhayos tayoḥ // HV_81.90 //
GE07hv_conpu:12512: ubhayoḥ senayo rājan prādur āsīn mahāsvanaḥ // HV_81.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:12517: rathinaḥ sādinaś caiva pattayaś ca sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12518: gajāś cātibalās tatra saṃnipetur abhītavat // HV_81.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:12521: sa saṃprahāras tumulas tyaktvā prāṇān avartata /
GE07hv_conpu:12522: vṛṣṇībhiḥ saha yodhānāṃ jarāsaṃdhasya dāruṇaḥ // HV_81.95 //
GE07hv_conpu:12523: tataḥ śinir anādhṛṣṭir babhrur vipṛthur āhukaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12532: [k: Ś1 K1-3 Ñ2.3 B Dn Ds D2.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12534: prācyaiś ca dākṣiṇātyaiś ca guptavīryabalānvitaiḥ // HV_81.100 //
GE07hv_conpu:12537: sātyakiś citrakaḥ śyāmo yuyudhānaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12538: rājādhidevo mṛduraḥ śvaphalkaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_81.102 //
GE07hv_conpu:12539: satrājic ca prasenaś ca balena mahatā vṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12540: vyūhasya pakṣaṃ te savyaṃ pratīyur dviṣatāṃ mṛdhe // HV_81.103 //
GE07hv_conpu:12545: evaṃ yuddham abhūt teṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanam | *HV_81.104ab*927:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12547: rājabhiś cāpi bahubhir veṇudārimukhaiḥ saha // HV_81.104 //
GE07hv_conpu:12549: [k: Ñ3 V1.2 B2.3 Cal. ed. ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12550: pratīcyaiś ca balodagrair dhārtarāṣṭraiś ca pālitam | *HV_81.104*928 |
GE07hv_conpu:12557: tato yuddhāni vṛṣṇīnāṃ babhūva sumahānty atha /
GE07hv_conpu:12559: [k: T1.3(second time) G3.5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12564: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.3-5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12568: yuddham āsīd dhi sainyānāṃ sainikair bharatarṣabha // HV_82.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:12569: [k: N (except Ś1 K3 Ñ1) T1.2.3(first time).4 G M4 ins., T3(second time) ins. after 3ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12570: ahāni pañca caikaṃ ca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau ca dāruṇam | *HV_82.3*931 |
GE07hv_conpu:12571: gajair gajā hayair aśvāḥ padātāś ca padātibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12572: rathā rathair vimiśraiś ca yodhā yuyudhire nṛpa // HV_82.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12575: [k: after 5, T1.3 G3.5 M ins. a passage given in App.I (No.17) :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12576: [k: Ś1 K Ñ V B Dn Ds D1-4 T4 G1.2 ins., D5 ins. after 4: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12577: avekṣya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo rukmiṇaṃ na vyapothayat || *HV_82.5*932:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12579: vārayām āsa kṛṣṇo vai śarāṃs tasya tu śikṣayā | *HV_82.5*932:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12580: [k: D6 T2 G1.4.5 then ins. a passage given in App.I (No.17): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12586: tasmin vimarde yodhānāṃ saṃkhyāvyaktir na vidyate // HV_82.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12588: āvṛnvann abhyayād vīras taṃ ca rājā sa māgadhaḥ // HV_82.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12589: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T2.3(first time).4 G1.2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12591: anyonyaṃ vividhair astrair vidhvā vidhvā vinedatuḥ | *HV_82.8*934:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12593: gade gṛhītvā vikrāntāv anyonyam abhidhāvatām // HV_82.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12595: dadṛśāte mahātmānau girī saśikharāv ubhau // HV_82.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12598: ubhau tau paramācāryau loke khyātau mahābalau /
GE07hv_conpu:12599: mattāv iva gajau yuddhe anyonyam abhidhāvatām // HV_82.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:12600: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12603: pitāmahaś ca bhagavān yuddhaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ | *HV_82.13*935 |
GE07hv_conpu:12605: śuśubhe 'bhyadhikaṃ rājan divaṃ jyotir gaṇair iva // HV_82.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12607: savyaṃ maṇḍalam āvṛtya baladevas tu dakṣiṇam // HV_82.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12609: dantābhyām iva mātaṅgau nādayantau diśo daśa // HV_82.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12613: gadā gadābhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vindhyaṃ girim ivācalam // HV_82.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:12614: rāmasya tu gadāvegaṃ vīryāt sa magadheśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12615: sehe dhairyeṇa mahatā śikṣayā ca vyapohayat // HV_82.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:12616: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-5 T3(first time).4 G2 ins., D6 T2 G1.4.5 cont. after 82.19*937: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12617: evaṃ tau tatra saṃgrāme vicarantau mahābalau | *HV_82.19*936:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12619: vyāyacchantau ciraṃ kālaṃ pariśrāntau ca tasthatuḥ | *HV_82.19*936:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12620: samāśvāsya muhūrtaṃ tu punar anyonyam āhatām || *HV_82.19*936:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12621: evaṃ tau yodhamukhyau tu samaṃ yuyudhatuś ciram | *HV_82.19*936:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:12622: na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyam ubhāv eva prajagmatuḥ || *HV_82.19*936:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:12624: rāmaḥ kruddho gadāṃ tyaktvā jagrāha musalottamam || *HV_82.19*936:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:12625: tam udyataṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā musalaṃ ghoradarśanam | *HV_82.19*936:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:12627: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.3-5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12628: kruddho 'tha rāmabhadras tu gadayā taṃ jagāma ha | *HV_82.19*937:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12630: prathamas tv atha rāmeṇa gadāpādaḥ samādade | *HV_82.19*937:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12632: caturthaṃ tu jarāsaṃdhaḥ pañcamaṃ tu yadūdvahaḥ || *HV_82.19*937:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:12633: tayoḥ pādaprahāraś ca cālayām āsa medinīm || *HV_82.19*937:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:12634: tato devāḥ sagandharvā yakṣāś ca paramarṣayaḥ | *HV_82.19*937:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:12635: bhītāḥ svastīti caivāhur lokānāṃ brahmaṇaś ca ha || *HV_82.19*937:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:12636: tataḥ kruddho jarāputras tāḍayām āsa vakṣasi | *HV_82.19*937:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:12637: śoṇitaṃ codvaman rāmaḥ śramaṃ ca samavāpa ha || *HV_82.19*937:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:12638: viśramya bhūmau kiṃcit tu punar utthāya yādavaḥ | *HV_82.19*937:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:12640: papāta ca mahīṃ vīro gatāsur iva niḥśvasan | *HV_82.19*937:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:12641: hato hato jarāsaṃdha ity ūcur yādaveśvarāḥ || *HV_82.19*937:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:12643: gadayā ca samājaghne vakṣasy eva halāyudham || *HV_82.19*937:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:12644: mūrcchāṃ caiva samāpede saṃjñāṃ ca pratilabdhavān | *HV_82.19*937:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:12645: tato rudhirarāśis tu babhau jalam ivodgataḥ || *HV_82.19*937:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:12650: dvāv eva mṛtyū rājendra saṃgatāv iva śobhitau || *HV_82.19*937:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:12651: tataḥ kruddho haladharaś chettum aicchaj jarāsutam | *HV_82.19*937:24 |
GE07hv_conpu:12652: ūrū ca pothayām āsa gadayā rājasaṃsadi || *HV_82.19*937:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:12653: ūrvo raktaṃ samāpede majjā samabhavat tataḥ | *HV_82.19*937:26 |
GE07hv_conpu:12654: tato halī jarāsaṃdhaṃ śiraś chettum udaikṣata | *HV_82.19*937:27 |
GE07hv_conpu:12656: [k: Ś1 K2 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn Ds D2.5.6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12658: na tvayā rāma vadhyo 'yam alaṃ khedena mādhava // HV_82.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:12659: vihito 'sya mayā mṛtyus tasmāt sādhu vyupārama /
GE07hv_conpu:12660: acireṇaiva kālena prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati māgadhaḥ // HV_82.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:12661: jarāsaṃdhas tu tac chrutvā vimanāḥ samapadyata /
GE07hv_conpu:12662: na prajahre tatas tasmai punar eva halāyudhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12663: tau vyupāramatāṃ caiva vṛṣṇayas te ca pārthivāḥ // HV_82.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:12664: prasaktam abhavad yuddhaṃ teṣām eva mahātmanām /
GE07hv_conpu:12667: te sarve nirjitā rājan kṛṣṇena ripughātinā | *HV_82.23*939:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12670: astaṃ yāte dinakare nānusasrus tadā niśi // HV_82.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:12675: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T2.3(first time).4 G1.2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12676: khāc cyutāny āyudhāny eva tāny evāntardadhus tadā || *HV_82.25*941:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12678: rājānaś cānugā ye 'sya svarāṣṭrāṇy eva te yayuḥ | *HV_82.25*941:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12679: jarāsaṃdhaṃ tu te jitvā manyante naiva taṃ jitam /
GE07hv_conpu:12680: vṛṣṇayaḥ kuruśārdūla rājā hy atibalaḥ sa vai // HV_82.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:12682: ko nāma hi jarāsaṃdhaṃ raṇe jetuṃ mahīpatiḥ | *HV_82.26*942:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12684: daśa cāṣṭau ca saṃgrāmāñ jarāsaṃdhasya yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12685: dadur na cainaṃ samare hantuṃ śekur mahārathāḥ // HV_82.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:12687: kṛṣṇas tu samare rājañ śaktimān api māgadham | *HV_82.27*943:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12688: anyo mṛtyur iti jñātvā na ca hiṃsitavān prabhuḥ | *HV_82.27*943:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12690: jarāsaṃdhasya nṛpates tadarthaṃ yāḥ samāgatāḥ // HV_82.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:12692: bārhadrathena rājendra rājabhiḥ sahitena vai // HV_82.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:12693: [k: Ñ2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins., K2 after the first occurrence of line 9 of App.I (No. 18): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12695: jitvā tu māgadhaṃ saṃkhye jarāsaṃdhaṃ mahīpatim /
GE07hv_conpu:12696: viharanti sma sukhino vṛṣṇisiṃhā mahārathāḥ // HV_82.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12698: ojas tejo balaṃ dhīr dhṛtir iti mahimā śrīr yaśo rūpam ājñā | *HV_82.30*945:1 |*
GE07hv_conpu:12699: vīryaṃ cetyevamādīn paramaguṇagaṇān ye smaranto labhante | *HV_82.30*945:2 |*
GE07hv_conpu:12700: yad bhaktānāṃ yam ājñāpy akhilajanamanaḥkṣobhaṇī naiti pārśvaṃ | *HV_82.30*945:3 |*
GE07hv_conpu:12701: cetas tvaṃ tasya śaśvac caraṇakamalayor bhṛṅgatāṃ yāhi viṣṇoḥ | *HV_82.30*945:4 |*
GE07hv_conpu:12708: etasminn eva kāle tu smṛtvā gopeṣu yatkṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:12709: jagāmaiko vrajaṃ rāmaḥ kṛṣṇasyānumate svayam // HV_83.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:12710: sa tatra gatvā ramyāṇi dadarśa vipulāni vai /
GE07hv_conpu:12711: bhuktapūrvāṇy araṇyāni sarāṃsi surabhīṇi ca // HV_83.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12712: sa praviṣṭaḥ pravegena taṃ vrajaṃ kṛṣṇapūrvajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12714: sa tān sarvān ābabhāṣe yathāpūrvaṃ yathāvidhi /
GE07hv_conpu:12715: gopaṃs tenaiva vidhinā yathānyāyaṃ yathāvayaḥ // HV_83.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12716: tathaiva prāha tān sarvāṃs tathaiva pariharṣayan /
GE07hv_conpu:12717: tathaiva saha gopībhī rocayan madhurāḥ kathāḥ // HV_83.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:12718: tam ūcuḥ sthavirā gopāḥ priyaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12719: rāmaṃ ramayatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pravāsāt punarāgatam // HV_83.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:12722: jīvitasya phalaṃ prāptam adya te darśanena ca | *HV_83.7ab*946 |
GE07hv_conpu:12723: adya smo nirvṛtās tāta yat tvāṃ paśyāma nirvṛtam // HV_83.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12724: prītāś caiva vayaṃ vīra yat tvaṃ punar ihāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12725: vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu rāmaḥ śatrubhayaṃkaraḥ // HV_83.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12729: [k: B2 inserts *947 after the first occurrence of 9ab :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12731: atha vā prāṇinas tāta ramante janmabhūmiṣu // HV_83.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12733: ye sma dṛṣṭās tvayā tāta kāṅkṣamāṇās tavāgamam // HV_83.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12734: diṣṭyā te nihatā mallāḥ kaṃsaś ca vinipātitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12736: samudre ca śruto 'smābhis timinā saha vigrahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12737: [k: K3 Ñ1 V2 Dn D1 (marg.) T2 G2 M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12740: T2 G2 M4 cont: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B Ds D1 (orig.)
GE07hv_conpu:12742: gomante ca śruto 'smābhiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha vigrahaḥ | *HV_83.12ab*949:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12743: daradasya vadhaś caiva jarāsaṃdhe ca yā matiḥ | *HV_83.12ab*949:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12745: tac cāyudhāvataraṇaṃ śrutaṃ naḥ paramāhave // HV_83.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:12746: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D S ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12748: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B1.2 D2.5 (marg.) G2 cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12752: [k: V2 cont: Ñ2 V3 cont. after *951: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12754: yuddhaṃ sarvair narendraiś ca yādavānāṃ mahātmanām | *HV_83.12*953:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12755: mathurāyāṃ praveśaś ca kīrtanīyaḥ surair api /
GE07hv_conpu:12756: pratiṣṭhitā ca vasudhā śaṅkitāḥ sarvapārthivāḥ // HV_83.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:12757: tava cāgamanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sabhāgyāḥ sma yathā purā /
GE07hv_conpu:12758: tena sma parituṣṭāś ca hṛṣitāś ca sabāndhavāḥ // HV_83.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12759: pratyuvāca tato rāmaḥ sarvāṃs tān abhitaḥ sthitān /
GE07hv_conpu:12760: yādaveṣv api sarveṣu bhavanto mama bāndhavāḥ // HV_83.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12761: sahāsmābhir gataṃ bālyaṃ sahāsmābhī rataṃ vane /
GE07hv_conpu:12762: bhavadbhir vardhitāś caiva kathaṃ yāsyāma vikriyām // HV_83.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12763: gṛheṣu bhavatāṃ bhuktaṃ gāvaś ca parirakṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12764: asmākaṃ bāndhavāḥ sarve bhavanto baddhasauhṛdāḥ // HV_83.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12765: evaṃ bhuvati sattvaṃ vai gopamadhye halāyudhe /
GE07hv_conpu:12768: evaṃ bahuvidhālāpaṃ kṛtvā gopais tu lāṅgalī | *HV_83.18cd*954:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12770: tato vanāntaragato reme rāmo mahābalaḥ // HV_83.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:12775: upajahrus tatas tasmai vanyāni vividhāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:12776: pratyagraramaṇīyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // HV_83.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:12777: medhyāṃś ca vividhān bhakṣān gandhāṃś ca hṛdayaṃ gamān /
GE07hv_conpu:12782: vibabhāv urasā rāmaḥ kailāseneva mandaraḥ // HV_83.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:12784: rarāja vapuṣā śubhraḥ śaśīva ghanamālayā // HV_83.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:12786: tathā bhujāgraśliṣṭena musalena ca bhāsvatā // HV_83.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:12788: śaiśirīṣv iva rātrīṣu yathā khedālasaḥ śaśī // HV_83.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:12789: sa matto yamunām āha snātum icche mahānadi /
GE07hv_conpu:12792: nābhyavartata taṃ deśaṃ strīsvabhāvena mohitā // HV_83.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:12794: cakāra ca halaṃ haste karṣaṇādhomukhaṃ balī // HV_83.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12796: mumucuḥ puṣpakośaiś ca svaṃ rajorañjitaṃ jalam // HV_83.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:12798: cakarṣa yamunāṃ rāmo vyutthitāṃ vanitām iva // HV_83.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:12812: matteva kuṭilā nārī rājamārgeṇa gacchatī // HV_83.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:12814: unmārgānītamārgā sā yena vṛndāvanaṃ vanam // HV_83.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:12815: vṛndāvanasya madhyena sā nītā yamunā nadī /
GE07hv_conpu:12817: sā yadā samatikrāntā nadī vṛndāvanaṃ vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:12818: tataḥ strīvigrahā bhūtvā yamunā rāmam abravīt // HV_83.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:12820: viparītam idaṃ rūpaṃ toyaṃ ca mama jāyate // HV_83.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:12823: rauhiṇeya hasiṣyati māṃ nandaḥ saṃgatā tvayā | *HV_83.43ab*956 |
GE07hv_conpu:12825: prāptāṃ māṃ sāgare nūnaṃ sapatnyo vegagarvitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12827: prasādaṃ kuru me vīra yāce tvāṃ kṛṣṇapūrvaja /
GE07hv_conpu:12828: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D4.6 T3.4 G2 (G(ed.) after 44ab) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12832: mārgam ādiṣṭam icchāmi kva gacchāmi mahābhuja // HV_83.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:12833: tām evaṃ bruvatīṃ drṣṭvā yamunāṃ lāṅgalāyudhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12836: deśam ambupradānena nikhilaṃ bhāvayasva naḥ // HV_83.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:12837: eṣa te subhru saṃdeśaḥ kathitaḥ sāgaraṃgame /
GE07hv_conpu:12838: śāntiṃ vraja mahābhāge gamyatāṃ ca yathāsukham /
GE07hv_conpu:12839: lokā hi yāvat sthāsyanti tāvat sthāsyati me yaśaḥ // HV_83.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:12842: ity uktā sā tathā cakre yamunā rāmaśāsanam | *HV_83.49*958:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12843: anujñātā tu rāmeṇa yathāmārgaṃ jagāma sā | *HV_83.49*958:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12845: sādhu sādhv iti rāmāya praṇāmaṃ cakrire tadā // HV_83.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:12849: tāṃ visṛjya mahāvegāṃ tāṃś ca sarvān vrajaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12850: tataḥ saṃcintya manasā buddhyā niścitya caiva ha /
GE07hv_conpu:12852: sa gatvā mathurāṃ rāmo bhavane madhusūdanam /
GE07hv_conpu:12853: parivartamānaṃ dadṛśe pṛthivyāḥ sāram avyayam // HV_83.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:12856: sa dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam āyāntaṃ rāmaṃ laṅgaladhāriṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:12857: sahasotthāya govindo dadāv āsanam uttamam // HV_83.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:12858: [k: D6 T1-3 G1.3.4 (both times).5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12860: punaḥ praṇāmam akarot svāgataṃ te halāyudha | *HV_83.54*960:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12861: upaviṣṭaṃ tato rāmaṃ papraccha kuśalaṃ vraje /
GE07hv_conpu:12862: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu goṣu caiva janārdanaḥ // HV_83.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:12864: sarvatra kuśalaṃ kṛṣṇa yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // HV_83.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:12865: tatas tayor vicitrāś ca paurāṇyaś ca kathābhavan /
GE07hv_conpu:12873: kasyacit tv atha kālasya sabhāyāṃ yadusaṃsadi /
GE07hv_conpu:12874: babhāṣe puṇḍarīkākṣo hetumad vākyam uttamam // HV_84.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:12876: śrūyatāṃ yādavā vākyaṃ sarve cāvahitā mama | *HV_84.1*961 |
GE07hv_conpu:12878: vayaṃ caiveha saṃbhūtā vraje ca parivardhitāḥ // HV_84.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12879: tad idānīṃ gataṃ duḥkhaṃ śatravaṣ ca parājitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12880: nṛpeṣu janitaṃ vairaṃ jarāsaṃdhe ca vigrahaḥ // HV_84.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:12881: vāhanāni ca naḥ santi pādātaṃ cāpy anantakam /
GE07hv_conpu:12882: ratnāni ca vicitrāṇi mitrāṇi bahulāni ca // HV_84.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12883: iyaṃ ca māthurī bhūmir alpā gamyā parasya naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12884: vṛddhiś cāpi parāsmākaṃ balato mitratas tathā // HV_84.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:12885: kumārakoṭyo yāś cemā gaṇāś caiva padātinām /
GE07hv_conpu:12886: eṣām apīha vasatāṃ saṃmardam upalakṣaye // HV_84.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:12887: tan me na rocate hy atra nivāso yadupuṃgavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12888: purīṃ niveśayiṣyāmi mama tat kṣantum arhatha // HV_84.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12889: etad yady anukūlaṃ vo mamābhiprāyajaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12890: bhavāya bhavatāṃ kāle rocatāṃ yadusaṃsadi // HV_84.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12891: tam ūcur yādavāḥ sarve hṛṣṭena manasā tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:12892: sādhyatāṃ yad abhipretaṃ janasyāsya bhavāya ca // HV_84.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12893: tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsur vṛṣṇayo mantram uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:12895: kṛtaḥ sainyakṣayaś cāpi mahān iha narādhipaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12896: balāni ca sasainyāni hantuṃ varṣaśatair api /
GE07hv_conpu:12897: na śakṣyāmo hy atas teṣām apayāne 'bhavan matiḥ // HV_84.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12898: etasminn antare rājā sa kālayavano mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:12901: te kālayavanaṃ caiva śrutvaivaṃ pratipedire // HV_84.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:12905: adyaiva divasaḥ puṇyo niryāma sapadānugāḥ // HV_84.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12909: susaṃnaddhair gajair mattai rathair aśvaiś ca daṃśitaiḥ // HV_84.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12911: niryayur yādavāḥ sarve mathurām apahāya vai // HV_84.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12915: pratyaṅmukhā yayur hṛṣṭā vṛṣṇayo bharatarṣabha // HV_84.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:12925: mumudur yādavāḥ sarve devāḥ svargagatā iva // HV_84.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:12926: puravāstu vicinvan sa kṛṣṇas tu paravīrahā /
GE07hv_conpu:12939: niveśaṃ tatra sainyānāṃ rocayanti sma yādavāḥ // HV_84.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12945: dhruvāya tatra nyavasat keśavaḥ saha yādavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12946: deśe puraniveśāya sa yadupravaro vibhuḥ // HV_84.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:12947: tasyāstu vidhivan nāma vāstūni ca gadāgrajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12949: evaṃ dvāravatīṃ caiva purīṃ prāpya sabāndhavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12950: sukhino nyavasan rājan svarge devagaṇā iva // HV_84.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:12952: jarāsaṃdhabhayāc cāpi purīṃ dvāravatīṃ yayau // HV_84.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:12962: madhyadeśasya kakudaṃ dhāma lakṣmyāś ca kevalam // HV_85.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12966: sa kālayavanaś cāpi kṛṣṇe kiṃ pratyapadyata // HV_85.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12968: kiṃ cakāra mahābāhur mahāyogī mahāmanāḥ // HV_85.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:12969: kiṃvīryaḥ kālayavanaḥ kena jātaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12970: yam asahyaṃ samālakṣya vyapayāto janārdanaḥ // HV_85.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:12972: vṛṣṇīnām andhakānāṃ ca gurur gārgyo mahātapāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12973: brahmacārī purā bhūtvā na sma dārān sa vindati // HV_85.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12974: tathā hi vartamānaṃ taṃ ūrdhvaretasam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:12976: gārgyaṃ goṣṭhe dvijaṃ syālaḥ ṣaṇḍham ity uktavān dvijaḥ | *HV_85.8ab*965:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12977: yadūnāṃ saṃnidhau sarve jahasur yādavās tataḥ || *HV_85.8ab*965:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12980: syālo 'bhiśaptavān gārgyam apumān iti bhūpate // HV_85.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12981: so 'bhiśaptas tadā rājan nagare tv amitaṃjaye /
GE07hv_conpu:12982: lipsuḥ putraṃ tato gatvā tapas tepe sudāruṇam // HV_85.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12983: tato dvādaśa varṣāṇi so 'yaś cūrṇam abhakṣayat /
GE07hv_conpu:12985: rudras tasmai varaṃ prādāt samarthaṃ yudhi nigrahe /
GE07hv_conpu:12986: vṛṣṇīnām andhakānāṃ ca sarvatejomayaṃ sutam // HV_85.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12987: tataḥ śuśrāva taṃ rājā yavanādhipatir varam /
GE07hv_conpu:12989: tam upānāyya sa nṛpaḥ sāntvayitvā dvijottamam /
GE07hv_conpu:12992: dhārayām āsa gārgyasya garbhaṃ durdharam acyutam // HV_85.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12994: sa kālayavano nāma jajñe śūro mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12995: aputrasyātha rājñas tu vavṛdhe 'ntaḥpure śiśuḥ // HV_85.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12996: tasminn uparate rājan sa kālayavano nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12998: vṛṣṇyandhakakulaṃ tasya nārado vai nyavedayat // HV_85.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12999: jñātvā tu varadānaṃ tan nāradān madhusūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13000: upapraikṣata tejasvī vardhantaṃ yavaneṣu tam // HV_85.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13001: sa vivṛddho yadā rājā yavanānāṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13002: tata enaṃ nṛpā mlecchāḥ saṃśrityānuyayus tadā // HV_85.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13003: śakās tuṣārā daradāḥ pāradās taṅgaṇāḥ khaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13004: pahlavāḥ śataśaś cānye mlecchā haimavatās tathā // HV_85.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13005: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā dasyubhiḥ śalabhair iva /
GE07hv_conpu:13008: pṛthivīṃ kampayām āsa sainyena mahatā tadā // HV_85.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:13010: mūtreṇa śakṛtā caiva sainyena sasṛje nadīm // HV_85.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13012: tato 'śvaśakṛd ityeva nāma nadyā babhūva ha // HV_85.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13013: tat sainyaṃ mahad āyād vai śrutvā vṛṣṇyandhakāgraṇīḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13014: vāsudevaḥ samānāyya jñātīn idam uvāca ha // HV_85.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:13016: avadhyaś cāpi naḥ śatrur varadānāt pinākinaḥ // HV_85.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13018: matto madabalābhyāṃ ca yuddham eva cikīrṣati /
GE07hv_conpu:13019: etāvān iha vāsaś ca kathito nāradena me // HV_85.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:13020: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Ds D3.5.6 G2 ins. (Dn after 27ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13021: etāvati ca vaktavyaṃ sāmaiva paramaṃ matam | *HV_85.26*966 |
GE07hv_conpu:13022: jarāsaṃdhaś ca no rājā nityam eva na mṛṣyate /
GE07hv_conpu:13024: kecit kaṃsavadhāc cāpi viraktās tadgatā nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13025: samāśritya jarāsaṃdham asmān icchanti bādhitum // HV_85.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13026: bahavo jñātayaś caiva yadūnāṃ nihatā nṛpaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13027: vivardhituṃ na śakṣyāmaḥ pure 'sminn iti keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13031: kṛtvā ca niścayaṃ sarve palāyanam arocayan || *HV_85.29cd*967:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13034: apayāne matiṃ kṛtvā dūtaṃ tasmai sasarja ha // HV_85.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13036: ghoram āśīviṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prākṣepayat tadā // HV_85.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13037: tatas taṃ mudrayitvā tu svena dūtena hārayat /
GE07hv_conpu:13038: nidarśanārthaṃ govindo bhīṣayāṇaś ca taṃ nṛpam /
GE07hv_conpu:13039: sa dūtaḥ kālayavanaṃ darśayām āsa taṃ ghaṭam // HV_85.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:13041: idaṃ covāca rājānaṃ rājñāṃ samsadi dūtakaḥ | *HV_85.31*968:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13042: bho rājann āha kṛṣṇas tvāṃ kim ebhiḥ śalabhais tava | *HV_85.31*968:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13043: aham ekas tavaiteṣāṃ samartho vāraṇe prabhuḥ || *HV_85.31*968:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13044: tvāṃ ca hatvā nṛpaśreṣṭha sabalaṃ sasuhṛdgaṇam | *HV_85.31*968:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13045: idaṃ tava balaṃ rājan grahīṣyāmīti niścitam || *HV_85.31*968:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13046: anyathā gaccha rājaṃs tvaṃ balenānena saṃyutaḥ | *HV_85.31*968:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:13047: ity uktvā darśayām āsa ghaṭaṃ kṛṣṇapracoditam | *HV_85.31*968:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:13049: tat kālayavano budhvā trāsanaṃ yādavaiḥ kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:13050: pipīlikānāṃ caṇḍānāṃ pūrayām āsa taṃ ghaṭam // HV_85.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13052: ślokam ekaṃ likhitvā tu ghaṭamadhye 'kṣipat tadā | *HV_85.32*969 |
GE07hv_conpu:13053: sa sarpo bahubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvatas taiḥ pipīlikaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13056: preṣayām āsa kṛṣṇāya bāhulyam upavarṇayan // HV_85.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13058: dūtānītaṃ harir dṛṣṭvā patraṃ tad vācayaṃs tadā | *HV_85.34*970:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13060: sphuran tam api nāgendraṃ bhakṣayiṣyanti kīṭikāḥ | *HV_85.34*970:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13061: vāsudevas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā yogaṃ vihitam ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13062: utsṛjya mathurām āśu dvārakām abhijagmivān // HV_85.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13064: niveśya dvārakāṃ rājan vṛṣṇīn āśvāsya caiva ha // HV_85.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:13067: taṃ dṛṣṭvā niryayau hṛṣṭaḥ sa kālayavano ruṣā /
GE07hv_conpu:13068: prekṣāpūrvaṃ ca kṛṣṇo 'pi niścakrāma mahābalaḥ // HV_85.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:13070: na cainam aśakad rājā grahītuṃ yogadharmiṇam // HV_85.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:13072: hastaprāptam ivātmānaṃ hariṇā sa pade pade | *HV_85.39*971:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13079: ko hi nāma jagannāthaṃ balād yātuṃ priyād ṛte | *HV_85.39*972:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13081: māndhātus tu suto rājā mucukundo mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13083: yatra tiṣṭhati rājendras tatra cāśu viveśa vai | *HV_35.40ab*973 |
GE07hv_conpu:13084: purā devāsure yuddhe kṛtakarmā mahābalaḥ // HV_85.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:13085: vareṇa cchandito devair nidrām eva gṛhītavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13086: śrāntasya tasya vāg evaṃ tadā prādur abhūt kila // HV_85.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:13087: prasuptam bodhayed yo māṃ taṃ daheyam ahaṃ surāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13088: cakṣuṣā krodhadīptena evam āha punaḥ punaḥ // HV_85.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:13089: evam astv iti śakras tam uvāca tridaśaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_conpu:13090: sa surair abhyanujñāto lokaṃ mānuṣam āgamat // HV_85.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:13092: suṣvāpa kālam etaṃ vai yāvat kṛṣṇasya darśanam // HV_85.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:13094: varadānaṃ ca devebhyas tejas tasya ca bhūpateḥ // HV_85.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:13095: anugamyamānaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca tena mlecchena śatruṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:13096: tāṃ guhāṃ mucukundasya praviveśa vinītavat // HV_85.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:13098: pītāmbareṇa svīyena tam ācchādya sa bhūpatim | *HV_85.46*974 |
GE07hv_conpu:13100: saṃdarśanapathaṃ tyaktvā tasthau buddhimatāṃ varaḥ // HV_85.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:13103: vāsudevaṃ tu taṃ matvā ghaṭṭayām āsa pārthivam /
GE07hv_conpu:13106: cukopa nicrācchedena pādasparśena tena ca // HV_85.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:13107: saṃsmṛtya ca varaṃ śakrād avaikṣata tamagrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13108: sa dṛṣṭamātraḥ kruddhena saṃprajajvāla sarvataḥ // HV_85.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:13109: dadāha pāvakas taṃ tu śuṣkaṃ vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13112: kṛtakāryo 'bravīd dhīmān idaṃ vacanam uttamam // HV_85.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:13114: kṛtaṃ me sumahat kāryaṃ svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham // HV_85.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:13116: parivṛttaṃ yugaṃ mene kālena mahatā tataḥ // HV_85.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:13125: śaṅkitaḥ śanakaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ durdharṣam iva tejasā | *HV_85.55*975:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13126: uvāca rājā govindaṃ ko bhavān kim ihāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13127: kaś ca kālaḥ prasuptasya yadi jānāsi kathyatām // HV_85.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:13131: kiṃ svit tejasvināṃ tejo bhagavāṃs tvaṃ vibhāvasuḥ | *HV_85.56*976:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13132: sūryaḥ somo mahendro vā lokapālo 'paro 'pi vā || *HV_85.56*976:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13134: yad bādhase guhādhvāntaṃ pradīpaḥ prabhayā yathā || *HV_85.56*976:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:13136: svaṃ janma karma gotraṃ vā kathyatāṃ yadi rocate | *HV_85.56*976:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13139: tasya putro yadur jyeṣṭhaś catvāro 'nye yavīyasaḥ // HV_85.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:13141: vāsudevaṃ vijānīhi nṛpate mām ihāgatam // HV_85.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:13143: idaṃ kaliyugaṃ viddhi kim anyat karavāṇi te // HV_85.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:13144: mama śatrus tvayā dagdho devadattavaro nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:13145: avadhyo yo mayā saṃkhye bhaved varṣaśatair api // HV_85.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:13155: evaṃ stutas tadā viṣṇur mucukundena dhīmatā | *HV_85.60*977:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:13156: vareṇa cchandayām āsa bhagavān acyutas tadā || *HV_85.60*977:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13157: punar apy abravīt kṛṣṇo mucukundaṃ mahābhujam | *HV_85.60*977:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:13159: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te yathākāmaṃ caratv iha | *HV_85.60*977:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:13160: ityuktaḥ sa tu kṛṣṇena nirjagāma guhāmukhāt /
GE07hv_conpu:13163: tato dadarśa pṛthivīm āvṛtāṃ hrasvakair naraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13165: pareṇādhiṣṭhitaṃ caiva rājyaṃ kevalam ātmanaḥ // HV_85.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:13167: yat syāt tvaddarśane puṇyaṃ tan me kṛṣṇa bhaved iti | *HV_85.62*978 |
GE07hv_conpu:13169: himavantam agād rājā tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ // HV_85.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:13170: tataḥ sa tapa āsthāya vinirmucya kalevaram /
GE07hv_conpu:13171: āruroha divaṃ rājā karmabhiḥ svair jitaṃ śubhaiḥ // HV_85.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:13173: ghātayitvātmanaḥ śatruṃ tat sainyaṃ pratyapadyata // HV_85.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:13178: ādāyopayayau dhīmāṃs tat sainyaṃ nihateśvaram // HV_85.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:13179: nivedayām āsa tato narādhipe tad ugrasene pratipūrṇamānasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13180: janārdano dvāravatīṃ ca tāṃ purīm aśobhayat tena dhanena bhūriṇā // HV_85.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:13187: kṛṣṇāya ca namas tubhyaṃ rāmarāmāya te namaḥ | *HV_86.0*980:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13188: vāmanāya namas tubhyaṃ kapilāya namo 'stu te || *HV_86.0*980:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13189: nānārūpa namas tubhyaṃ namas te karmasākṣiṇe | *HV_86.0*980:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13190: viśvarūpa namas tubhyaṃ hṛṣīkeśāya te namaḥ || *HV_86.0*980:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13192: uttarāṃ diśam āśritya tapam ācara sāttvikam | *HV_86.0*980:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:13195: kṛtajapyo hṛṣīkeśo vanānte niṣasāda ha // HV_86.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13198: rohiṇyām ahani śreṣṭhe svasti vācya dvijottamān /
GE07hv_conpu:13201: provāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho devān vṛtraripur yathā // HV_86.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:13203: nāma cāsyāḥ kṛtaṃ puryāḥ khyātiṃ yad upayāsyati // HV_86.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:13204: iyaṃ dvāravatī nāma pṛthivyāṃ nirmitā mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:13206: tāny evāsyāḥ kārayiṣye cihnāny āyatanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13209: catvarān rājamārgāṃś ca samān antaḥpurāṇi ca // HV_86.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:13213: mīyantāṃ rājamārgāś ca prākārasya ca yā gatiḥ // HV_86.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13215: niyujyantāṃ ca deśeṣu preṣyakarmakarā janāḥ // HV_86.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13219: puṇye 'hani mahārāja dvijātīn abhipūjya ca // HV_86.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13221: sthapatīn atha govindas tatrovāca mahāmatiḥ // HV_86.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13224: te tatheti mahābāhum uktvā sthapatayas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13227: sthānāni vidadhuś cātra brahmādīnāṃ yathākramam // HV_86.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13229: caturdaivāni catvāri dvārāṇi vidadhuś ca te /
GE07hv_conpu:13232: puryāḥ kṣipraṃ niveṣārthaṃ cintayām āsa mādhavaḥ // HV_86.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13233: tasya daivī sthitā buddhiś capalā kṣiprakāriṇī /
GE07hv_conpu:13234: purī sā vai priyakarī yadūnām abhivardhanī // HV_86.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13236: viśvakarmā svamatyā vai purīṃ saṃsthāpayiśyati // HV_86.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:13239: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle śilpācāryo mahāmatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13240: viśvakarmā suraśreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇasya pramukhe sthitaḥ // HV_86.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13242: daivena manasā kśipraṃ tava viṣṇo dhṛtavrata /
GE07hv_conpu:13243: kiṃkaraḥ samanuprāptaḥ śādhi māṃ kiṃ karomi te // HV_86.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13244: yathā syād devadeveśas tryambakaś ca yathāvyayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13245: tathā tvaṃ deva mānyo 'si viśeṣo nāsti me prabho // HV_86.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:13247: eṣo 'smi paridṛṣṭārthaḥ kiṃ karomi praśādhi mām // HV_86.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13249: pratyuvāca yaduśreṣṭhaḥ kaṃsārir atulaṃ vacaḥ // HV_86.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:13250: śrutārtho devaguhyasya bhavāny atra vayaṃ sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13251: avaśyaṃ tv iha kartavyaṃ sadanaṃ me surottama // HV_86.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:13252: tad iyaṃ bhūḥ prakāśārthaṃ niveśyā mayi suvrata /
GE07hv_conpu:13253: matprabhāvānurūpaiś ca gṛhaiś ceyaṃ samantataḥ // HV_86.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13254: uttamā ca pṛthivyāṃ vai yathā svarge 'marāvatī /
GE07hv_conpu:13255: tatheyaṃ hi tvayā kāryā śakto hy asi mahāmate // HV_86.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13256: mama sthānam idaṃ kāryaṃ yathā vai tridive tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13257: martyāḥ paśyantu me lakṣmīṃ puryā yadukulasya ca // HV_86.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13258: evam uktas tataḥ prāha viśvakarmā matīśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13260: sarvam etat kariṣyāmi yat tvayābhihitaṃ prabho /
GE07hv_conpu:13261: purī tv iyaṃ janasyāsya na paryāptā bhaviṣyati // HV_86.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13262: bhaviṣyati ca vistīrṇā vṛddhir asyās tu śobhanā /
GE07hv_conpu:13263: catvāraḥ sāgarā hy asyāṃ vicariṣyanti rūpiṇaḥ // HV_86.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:13264: yadīcchet sāgaraḥ kiṃcid utsraṣṭum iha toyarāṭ /
GE07hv_conpu:13265: tataḥ svāyatalakṣaṇyā purī syāt puruṣottama // HV_86.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13266: evam uktas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prāg eva kṛtabuddhimān /
GE07hv_conpu:13267: sāgaraṃ saritāṃ nātham uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_86.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13268: samudra daśa ca dve ca yojanāni jalāśaye /
GE07hv_conpu:13269: pratisaṃhriyatām ātmā yady asti mayi mānyatā // HV_86.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:13270: avakāśe tvayā datte purīyaṃ māmakaṃ balam /
GE07hv_conpu:13274: viśvakarmā tataḥ prītaḥ puryāḥ saṃdṛśya vāstu tat /
GE07hv_conpu:13275: govinde caiva saṃmānaṃ sāgaraḥ kṛtavāṃs tadā // HV_86.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:13278: manasā nirmitā ceyaṃ mayā pūḥpravarā vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:13283: cakāra tasyāṃ puryāṃ vai deśe tridaśapūjite // HV_86.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:13284: tataḥ sā nirmitā kāntā purī dvāravatī tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13286: [k: Ś1 K1.2.4 Ñ V B D T1.4 G2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13290: nānāpaṇyasamākīrṇā khecarīva ca gāṃ gatā // HV_86.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:13294: [k: N T4 G2 ins. (T1 cont. after *982): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13296: bhūṣayantī samudraṃ sā svargam indrapurī yathā || *HV_86.47ab*983:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13303: satārakā dyaur iva sā dvārakā pratyarājata // HV_86.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:13309: abhipretajanākīrṇāṃ somaḥ kham iva bhāsayan // HV_86.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:13312: viśvakarmā ca tāṃ kṛtvā purīṃ śakrapurīm iva /
GE07hv_conpu:13314: bhūyas tu buddhir abhavat kṛṣṇasya viditātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13315: janān imān dhanaughais tu tarpayeyam ahaṃ yadi // HV_86.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:13317: śaṅkham āhvayatopendro niśi svabhavane vibhuḥ // HV_86.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:13318: sa śaṅkhaḥ keśavāhvānaṃ jñātvā guhyakarāṭ svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:13319: ājagāma samīpaṃ vai tasya dvāravatīpateḥ // HV_86.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:13320: sa śaṅkhaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vinayādavaniṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13321: kṛṣṇaṃ vijñāpayām āsa yathā vaiśravaṇaṃ tathā // HV_86.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:13322: bhagavan kiṃ mayā kāryaṃ surāṇāṃ vittarakṣiṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:13324: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ śaṅkhaṃ guhyakam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:13325: janā ye 'smin kṛśadhanās tān dhanenābhipūraya // HV_86.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:13326: necchāmy anāśitaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṛśaṃ malinam eva vā /
GE07hv_conpu:13327: dehīti cābhibhāṣantaṃ nagaryāṃ nirdhanaṃ naram // HV_86.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:13328: śirasā śāsanaṃ gṛhya nidhīnaḥ keśavasya saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13330: ghanaughair abhivarṣadhvaṃ cakruḥ sarve tathā ca te // HV_86.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:13331: nādhano vidyate tatra hīnabhāgyo 'pi vā naraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13332: [k: K3. 4 Ñ V B D T4 G2 subst. for 62cd: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13334: kṛśo vā malino vāpi dvāravatyāṃ gṛhe gṛhe // HV_86.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:13335: cakāra vāyor āhvānaṃ bhūyaś ca puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13336: tatrastha eva bhagavān yādavānāṃ priyaṃkaraḥ // HV_86.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:13343: yathaiva dūto devānāṃ tathaivāsmi tavānagha // HV_86.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:13344: tam uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇo rahasyaṃ puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13345: mārutaṃ jagataḥ prāṇaṃ rūpiṇaṃ samupasthitam // HV_86.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:13347: sabhāṃ sudharmām ādāya devebhyas tvam ihānaya // HV_86.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:13349: tasyāṃ viśeyur ete hi na tu yā kṛtrimā bhavet // HV_86.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:13350: sā hy akṣayā sabhā vāyo kāmagā kāmarūpiṇī /
GE07hv_conpu:13351: sā yadūn dhārayet sarvān yathaiva tridaśāṃs tathā // HV_86.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:13354: so 'numānya surān sarvān kṛṣṇavākyaṃ nivedya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13355: sabhāṃ sudharmām ādāya punar āyān mahītalam // HV_86.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:13357: devo devasabhāṃ dattvā vāyur antaradhīyata // HV_86.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:13359: na bhayaṃ vidyate yatra sabhā sā dharmavatsalā | *HV_86.72*987 |
GE07hv_conpu:13360: dvāravatyās tu sā madhye keśavena niveśitā /
GE07hv_conpu:13361: sudharmā yadumukhyānāṃ devānāṃ tridive yathā // HV_86.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:13362: evaṃ sa divyair bhaumaiś ca jalajaiś cāvyayo hariḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13363: dravyairalaṃkaroti sma purīṃ svāṃ pramadām iva // HV_86.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:13367: [k: after 74 Ś1 D2 repeat 73ab. After the repetition of 73ab Ś1 D2 ins. *988 :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13368: maryādāś caiva saṃcakre śreṇīḥ prakṛtayas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13369: balādhyakṣāṃś ca yuktāṃś ca prakṛtīśāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_86.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:13372: yādavānāṃ kulakarān sthavirān daśa tatra vai /
GE07hv_conpu:13374: uddhavo vasudevaś ca kaṅko vipṛthur eva ca | *HV_86.77ab*989:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13375: śvaphalkaś citrakaś caiva gadaḥ satyaka eva ca | *HV_86.77ab*989:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13376: baladevaḥ pṛthuś caivaṃ matreśv abhyantarā daśa | *HV_86.77ab*989:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13377: sthāpayām āsa matimān sarvakāryeṣv anantarān // HV_86.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:13378: ratheṣv atiratho yantā dārukaḥ keśavasya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:13379: yodhamukhyaś ca yodhānāṃ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ // HV_86.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:13383: vidhānam evaṃ kṛtvā sa kṛṣṇaḥ puryām aninditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13384: mumude yadubhiḥ sārdhaṃ lokasraṣṭā mahītale // HV_86.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:13386: prāptavān baladevas tu kṛṣṇasyānumate tadā // HV_86.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:13398: etasminn eva kāle tu jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13401: yathārhaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ praśrayaṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ | *HV_87.1*992:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13403: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ caiva vivāhe utsukaṃ kila | *HV_87.1*992:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13404: śvobhūte tu vivāhasya caidyasyeti ca bhūmipāḥ | *HV_87.1*992:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13410: śiśupālasya nṛpater vivāho bhavitā kila // HV_87.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:13412: sahasrākṣasamaṃ yuddhe māyāsu ca viśāradam // HV_87.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:13416: putraṃ ca pāṇḍyarājasya kaliṅgādhipatiṃ tathā // HV_87.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:13418: aṃśumantaṃ tathā krāthaṃ śrutarvāṇaṃ ca bhārata // HV_87.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:13420: paṭuśaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ kāśyādhipatim eva ca // HV_87.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:13421: [k: Ds2 D5.6 ins. (Dn after the second occurrence of 7cd): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13424: saṃśaptakās tu te sarve āsyandā yavanās tathā | *HV_87.7*993:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13425: yavanasya sutaś cāpi ārṣāyaṇas tathā śakāḥ || *HV_87.7*993:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13428: [k: Dn Ds2 D5.6 Bom. Poona eds cont.; Ds1 G2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13434: kasmin deśe nṛpo jajñe rukmī vedavidāṃ vara /
GE07hv_conpu:13437: rājarṣer yādavasyāsīd vidarbho nāma vai sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13438: vindhyasya dakṣiṇe pārśve vidarbhān yo nyaveśayat // HV_87.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13440: babhūvur vīryasaṃpannāḥ pṛthag vaṃśakarā nṛpāḥ // HV_87.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13442: krathasya tv aṃśumāṇ vaṃśe kaiśikasya tu bhīṣmakaḥ // HV_87.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:13445: rukmī tasyābhavat putro rukmiṇī ca viśāṃ pate // HV_87.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13446: rukmī cāstrāṇi divyāni drumāt prāpa mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13447: jāmadagnyāt tatha rāmād brāhmam astram avāptavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13448: prāspardhat saha kṛṣṇena nityam adbhutakarmaṇā // HV_87.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13449: rukmiṇī tv abhavad rājan rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:13450: cakame vāsudevas tāṃ śravād eva mahādyutiḥ // HV_87.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:13451: sa cābhilaṣitas tasyāḥ śravād eva janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13452: tejovīryabalopetaḥ sa me bhartā bhaved iti // HV_87.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:13453: tāṃ dadau na tu kṛṣṇāya rukmī dveṣān mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13456: yācamānāya kaṃsasya preṣyo 'sāv iti cintayan // HV_87.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13458: varayām āsa tāṃ rājā bhīṣmakaṃ bhīmavikramam // HV_87.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13459: cedirājasya hi vasor āsīt putro bṛhadrathaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13460: magadheṣu purā yena nirmitaṃ tad girivrajam // HV_87.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13462: vasor eva tadā vaṃśe damaghoṣo 'pi cedirāṭ // HV_87.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13472: jarāsaṃdhaḥ svasutavad dadarśainaṃ jugopa ca // HV_87.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13474: kṛtāny āgāṃsi caidyena vṛṣṇīnāṃ tatpriyaiṣiṇā // HV_87.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13475: jāmātā tv abhavat tasya kaṃsas tasmin hate yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:13478: tāṃ dadau bhīṣmakaś cāpi śiśupālāya vīryavān // HV_87.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13480: yayau vidarbhān sahito dantavaktreṇa yāyinā // HV_87.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:13483: mānayiṣyaṃś ca tān rukmī pratyudgamya narādhipān /
GE07hv_conpu:13484: parayā pūjayopetān ānināya purīṃ prati // HV_87.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13485: pitṛṣv asuḥ priyārthaṃ ca rāmakṛṣṇāv ubhāv api /
GE07hv_conpu:13486: prayayur vṛṣṇayaś cānye rathais tatra balānvitāḥ // HV_87.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13490: pūjayām āsa pūjārhān nyavasanta bahiś ca te // HV_87.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13492: nyaveśayac ca tān sarvān bhīṣmako nagarād bahiḥ || *HV_87.30*999:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13493: sthite tasmiñ jarāsaṃdhe ripau teṣāṃ mahātmani | *HV_87.30*999:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13495: śaṅkhāś ca paṭahāś caiva sasvanāḥ sarvatas tadā | *HV_87.30*999:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13496: brāhmaṇāś ca samāyātā nānādigbhyas tathaiva ca | *HV_87.30*999:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13497: utthitāś caiva sarvatra dhvajāś ca samalaṃkṛtāḥ | *HV_87.30*999:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:13498: śvobhāvini vivāhe tu rukmiṇī niryayau bahiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13504: dīpyamānena vapuṣā balena mahatā vṛtā // HV_87.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13506: keśavo me bhaved bhartā nānyaḥ kaścid bhaved iti | *HV_87.32*1001:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13508: tāṃ dadarśa tataḥ kṛṣṇo lakṣmīṃ sākṣād iva sthitām /
GE07hv_conpu:13510: vahner iva śikhāṃ dīptāṃ māyāṃ bhūmigatām iva /
GE07hv_conpu:13511: pṛthivīm iva gambhīrām utthitāṃ pṛthivītalāt // HV_87.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13512: marīcim iva somasya saumyāṃ strīvigrahāṃ bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:13514: kṛṣṇena manasā dṛṣṭāṃ durnirīkśyāṃ surair api // HV_87.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13521: tīkṣṇaśuklaiḥ samair dantaiḥ prabhāsadbhir alaṃkṛtā // HV_87.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:13522: ananyā pramadā loke rūpeṇa yaśasā śriyā /
GE07hv_conpu:13524: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛdhe kāmaḥ kṛṣṇasya śubhadarśanām /
GE07hv_conpu:13527: rukmiṇī ca tadā devī dadṛśe kṛṣṇam īśvaram || *HV_87.39*1003:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13528: acintayac ca sā devī dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam avasthitam | *HV_87.39*1003:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13529: so 'yam viṣṇur jagannāthaḥ sākṣād rāmānujaḥ kṛtī || *HV_87.39*1003:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13530: asya cakraṃ sadā śaṅkhaṃ bhujayor ubhayorapi | *HV_87.39*1003:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13533: sadā bhāti mahac cāpaṃ loke khyātataraṃ hareḥ || *HV_87.39*1003:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:13534: yamāśritya gadā devī sadā kaumodakīti sā | *HV_87.39*1003:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13537: ripūn hanti mahāvīryān asahyān daivatair api || *HV_87.39*1003:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:13538: asya syād vāhanaṃ viṣṇor garutmān pakṣipuṃgavaḥ | *HV_87.39*1003:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:13539: śakrādīṃś ca surāñ jitvā jahārāmṛtam uttamam || *HV_87.39*1003:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:13540: so 'yam viṣṇur guruḥ sākṣād gopaveṣeṇa bhūṣitaḥ | *HV_87.39*1003:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:13542: yo nanarta hrade tasyā yamunāyās tadā hariḥ | *HV_87.39*1003:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:13544: ayaṃ govardhanaṃ śailaṃ dadhāv ekena bāhunā | *HV_87.39*1003:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:13545: līlayā sa jagannātho kolakaṃ bālako yathā || *HV_87.39*1003:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:13546: ayaṃ sa puṇḍarīkākṣo yo hayaṃ prajaghāna ha || *HV_87.39*1003:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:13547: yaś cāṇūraṃ mṛdhe hatvā kaṃsaṃ caiva mahābalam | *HV_87.39*1003:21 |
GE07hv_conpu:13548: nanarta raṅge govindo gopaiḥ sārdhaṃ sayādavaiḥ || *HV_87.39*1003:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:13552: so 'yam adya jagannāthaḥ prāpto mām iha yādavaḥ || *HV_87.39*1003:26 |
GE07hv_conpu:13553: amuṣya pādayoḥ padmam udvahāmi na saṃśayaḥ | *HV_87.39*1003:27 |
GE07hv_conpu:13555: evaṃ vicintayitvā sā vavande tāṃ śacīṃ tadā | *HV_87.39*1003:29 |
GE07hv_conpu:13557: tatpramāthe 'karod buddhiṃ vṛṣṇibhyaḥ praṇidhāya ca // HV_87.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:13559: unmathya sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ svaṃ nināya rathottamam // HV_87.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:13561: samanahyanta dāśārhās tadājñāya tu sarvaśaḥ // HV_87.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:13563: vājibhir vāraṇaiś cāpi parivavrur halāyudham // HV_87.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:13564: ādāya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo jagāmāśu purīṃ prati /
GE07hv_conpu:13565: rāme cāsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yuyudhāne ca vīryavān // HV_87.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:13566: akrūre vipṛthau cāpi gade ca kṛtavarmaṇi /
GE07hv_conpu:13567: cakradeve sunakṣatre sāraṇe ca mahābale // HV_87.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:13569: ugrasenātmaje kaṅke śatadyumne ca keśavaḥ // HV_87.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:13571: atidānte bṛhaddurge śvaphalke citrake pṛthau // HV_87.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:13573: gurum āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ prati // HV_87.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:13575: tataś ca yādavāḥ sarve yuddhāya samupasthitāḥ | *HV_87.48*1004 |
GE07hv_conpu:13578: saṃnaddhā niryayuḥ kruddhā jighāṃsanto janārdanam // HV_87.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:13579: aṅgavaṅgakaliṅgaiś ca sārdhaṃ pauṇḍraiś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13580: niryayau cedirājaḥ sa bhrātṛbhiḥ sumahārathaiḥ // HV_87.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:13585: kuto nu vīro yudhi sātyakiḥ kila || *HV_87.50*1005:4 |*
GE07hv_conpu:13594: yādavāś ca mahārāja śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak || *HV_87.50*1005:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:13595: bherīṇāṃ ca mṛdaṅgānāṃ jharjharīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ | *HV_87.50*1005:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:13597: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat senayor ubhayor api | *HV_87.50*1005:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:13600: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtya vāsavaṃ maruto yathā // HV_87.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:13602: ṣaḍbhir vivyādha nārācair yuyudhāno mahāmṛdhe // HV_87.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:13603: akrūro dantavaktraṃ tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13604: taṃ pratyavidhyat kārūṣo bāṇair daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_87.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:13605: vipṛthuḥ śiśupālaṃ tu śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13606: aṣṭabhiḥ pratyavidhyat taṃ śiśupālaḥ pratāpavāṇ // HV_87.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:13607: gaveśaṇo 'pi caidyaṃ tu ṣaḍbhir vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13608: anirdāntas tathāṣṭābhir bṛhaddurgaś ca pañcabhiḥ // HV_87.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:13609: prativivyādha tāṃś caidyaḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13610: jaghāna cāśvāṃś caturaś caturbhir vipṛthoḥ śaraiḥ // HV_87.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:13613: hatāśvaṃ sa rathaṃ tyakvā vipṛthus tu mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13614: āruroha rathaṃ kṣipraṃ bṛhaddurgasya vīryavān // HV_87.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:13616: āruhya javanān aśvān niyantum upacakrame // HV_87.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:13620: paṭuśaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā vivyādha yudhi mārgaṇaiḥ // HV_87.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:13621: tābhyāṃ sa viddho daśabhir bāṇair marmātigaiḥ śitaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13622: tato balī cakradevaṃ bibheda daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_87.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:13624: vidūratho 'pi taṃ ṣaḍbhir vivyādhājau śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_87.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:13627: triṃśatā pratyavidhyat taṃ balī bāṇair mahābalam /
GE07hv_conpu:13628: kṛtavarmā bibhedājau rājaputraṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_87.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:13629: nyahanat sārathiṃ cāsya dhvajaṃ ciccheda cocchritam /
GE07hv_conpu:13630: prativivyādha taṃ kruddhaḥ pauṇḍraḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // HV_87.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:13634: gajenāsādya kaṅkas tu gajam aṅgasya vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13635: tomareṇa bibhedāṅgaṃ bibhedāṅgaś ca taṃ śaraiḥ // HV_87.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:13636: citrakaś ca śvaphalkaś ca satyakaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13637: kaliṅgasya tathānīkaṃ nārācair bibhiduḥ śitaiḥ // HV_87.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:13639: jaghāna rāmaḥ samkruddho vaṅgarājaṃ ca saṃyuge // HV_87.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:13640: taṃ hatvā ratham āruhya dhanur ādāya vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13641: saṃkarṣaṇo jaghānograir nārācaiḥ kaiśikān bahūn // HV_87.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:13642: ṣaḍbhir nihatya kārūṣān maheṣvāsān sa vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13644: nihatya tān mahābāhur jarāsaṃdhaṃ tato 'bhyayāt // HV_87.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:13645: tam āpatantaṃ vivyādha nārācair māgadhas tribhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13647: ciccheda cāsya bhallena dhvajaṃ ratnavibhūṣitam // HV_87.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:13649: cāpaṃ ca mahad āyattaṃ śarair eva halāyudhaḥ | *HV_87.72*1007:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13650: rathaṃ cāsya mahārāja tilaśaś ca samāhanat || *HV_87.72*1007:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13652: bibheda balabhadraṃ tu jaghāna ca punaḥ punaḥ || *HV_87.72*1007:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13653: rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa gadayāsya sa māgadhaḥ || *HV_87.72*1007:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13655: sātyakes tu rathaṃ prāyāt sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ || *HV_87.72*1007:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:13656: sātyakis tu mahārāja śarair vivyādha māgadham || *HV_87.72*1007:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13658: jaghāna māgadhaṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva giriṃ hariḥ | *HV_87.72*1007:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:13659: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ teṣāṃ devāsuropamam /
GE07hv_conpu:13663: gajair gajā hi saṃkruddhāḥ saṃnipetuḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13664: rathai rathāś ca saṃrabdhāḥ sādibhiś cāpi sādinaḥ // HV_87.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:13666: chindantaś cottamāṅgāni vicerur yudhi te pṛthak // HV_87.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:13668: śarāṇāṃ patatāṃ śabdaḥ pakṣiṇām iva śuśruve // HV_87.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:13670: jugūha ghoṣaḥ śastrāṇāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca mahātmanāṃ // HV_87.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:13672: taṃ prāvidhyata saptatyā bāṇair gāḍhaṃ janārdanaḥ | *HV_87.77*1009:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13673: yatamānaś ca ciccheda dhvajaṃ cāsya mahābalaḥ | *HV_87.77*1009:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13674: jahāra ca śiraḥ kāyāt sārathes tasya vīryavān || *HV_87.77*1009:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13676: dākṣiṇātyā jighāṃsanto rājānaḥ sarva eva te || *HV_87.77*1009:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13677: tam aṃśumān mahābāhur vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ | *HV_87.77*1009:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:13678: śrutarvā pañcabhiḥ kruddho veṇudāriś ca saptabhiḥ || *HV_87.77*1009:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:13682: veṇudārir dhvajaṃ chittvā bhujaṃ vivyādha dakṣiṇam || *HV_87.77*1009:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:13683: tathaiva ca śrutarvāṇaṃ śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ | *HV_87.77*1009:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:13684: śiśriye ca dhvajaṃ śrānto nyaṣīdac ca vyathānvitaḥ || *HV_87.77*1009:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:13687: bāṇān bāṇaiś ca ciccheda teṣāṃ yudhi janārdanaḥ | *HV_87.77*1009:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:13688: jaghāna caiṣāṃ saṃrabdho yatamānān yatān bahūn || *HV_87.77*1009:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:13689: punar anyāṃś catuḥṣaṣṭyā nijaghāna śitaiḥ śaraiḥ | *HV_87.77*1009:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:13690: kruddhān āpatato vīro prādravat tadbalaṃ tataḥ | *HV_87.77*1009:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:13694: mūrchāṃ jagāma rājā tu nipapāta ca bhūtale || *HV_87.77*1010:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13695: sātyakir vaṅgarājaṃ tu jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ | *HV_87.77*1010:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13696: tat sainyaṃ vimukhaṃ cāsīj jarāsaṃdhe pataty api || *HV_87.77*1010:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13697: sātyakir balabhadraś ca jitvā yodhān sahasraśaḥ | *HV_87.77*1010:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:13698: śaṅkhaṃ dadhmatū rājānau sarveṣām agrataḥ sthitau | *HV_87.77*1010:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:13699: tataś ca vidrute sainye jarāsaṃdhe parājite | *HV_87.77*1010:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13700: tayoḥ śaṅkhadhvaniṃ śrutvā gacchann eva janārdanaḥ | *HV_87.77*1010:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:13702: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān | *HV_87.77*1010:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:13710: kṛṣṇena hriyamāṇāṃ tu rukmī śrutvā tu rukmiṇīm /
GE07hv_conpu:13711: pratijñām akarot kruddhaḥ samakṣaṃ bhīṣmakasya ha // HV_88.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13712: ahatvā yudhi govindam anānīya ca rukmiṇīm /
GE07hv_conpu:13713: kuṇḍinaṃ na pravekṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_88.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:13715: javena prayayau kruddho balena mahatā vṛtaḥ // HV_88.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:13717: krātho 'ṃśumāñ śrutarvā ca veṇudāriśca vīryavān // HV_88.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:13718: bhīṣmakasya sutaś cāpi rathena rathināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13720: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ saritaṃ narmadām anu /
GE07hv_conpu:13721: govindaṃ dadṛśuḥ kruddhāḥ sahaiva priyayā sthitam // HV_88.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:13722: avasthāpya ca tat sainyaṃ rukmī balamadānvitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13726: vimucyatām iyaṃ bālā sthātavyaṃ ca kṣaṇāntaram | *HV_88.7ab*1011:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13727: śiraśchetsyāmi te bāṇaiḥ sthito 'si yadi matpuraḥ | *HV_88.7ab*1011:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13728: ityuktvā niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ saṃdadhe dhanuṣi prabho | *HV_88.7ab*1011:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13729: cikīrṣur dvairathaṃ yuddham abhyayān madhusūdanam // HV_88.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:13730: sa vivyādha catuḥṣaṣṭyā govindaṃ niśitaiḥ śraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13731: taṃ pratyavidhyat saptatyā bāṇair yudhi janārdanaḥ // HV_88.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:13733: jahāra ca śiraḥ kāyāt sāratheś cāsya vīryavān // HV_88.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13735: dākṣiṇātyā jighāṃsanto rājānaḥ sarva eva te // HV_88.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13736: tam aṃśumān mahābāhur vivyādha daśabhiḥ śraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13737: śrutarvā pañcabhiḥ kruddho veṇudāriś ca saptabhiḥ // HV_88.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:13739: niṣasāda rathopasthe vyathitaḥ sa narādhipaḥ // HV_88.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13741: veṇudārer dhvajaṃ chittvā bhujaṃ vivyādha dakṣiṇam // HV_88.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13742: tathaiva ca śrutarvāṇaṃ śarair vivyādha pañcabhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13743: śiśriye sa dhvajaṃ klānto nyaṣīdacca vyathānvitaḥ // HV_88.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:13746: bāṇair bāṇāṃś ca ciccheda teṣāṃ yudhi janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13747: jaghāna caiṣāṃ saṃrabdho yatamānāṃś ca tāñ śarān // HV_88.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13748: punar anyāṃś catuḥṣaṣṭyā jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13749: kruddhān ādravato vīrān ādravat sa mahābalaḥ // HV_88.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13750: vidrutaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā rukmī krodhavaśaṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13751: pañcabhir niśitair bāṇair vivyādhorasi keśavam // HV_88.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13752: sārathiṃ cāsya vivyādha sāyakair niśitais tribhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13753: ājaghāna dhvajaṃ cāsya śareṇa nataparvaṇā // HV_88.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13754: keśavaś cāpi taṃ ṣaṣṭyā kruddho vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13755: dhanuś ciccheda cāpy asya yatamānasya rukmiṇaḥ // HV_88.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:13757: prāduś cakāra divyāni dīptāny astrāṇi vīryavān // HV_88.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:13759: vāyavyaṃ vāruṇaṃ caiva māhendram atha nairṛtam | *HV_88.21*1012:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13760: paiśācaṃ rākṣasaṃ caiva raudraṃ māheśvaraṃ tathā || *HV_88.21*1012:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13762: tair eva tāni govindo nijaghāna janārdanaḥ | *HV_88.21*1012:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13763: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya tasya kṛṣṇo mhābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13764: punaś ciccheda taṃ cāpaṃ ratheṣāṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_88.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13765: sa cchinnadhanvā virathaḥ khaḍgam ādāya carma ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13766: utpapāta rathād vīro garutmān iva vīryavān // HV_88.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13768: nārācaiś ca tribhiḥ kruddho bibhedainam athorasi // HV_88.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:13770: kruddho bibhedainam atho śarair urasi pañcabhiḥ | *HV_88.24cd*1013 |
GE07hv_conpu:13772: visaṃjño mūrchito rājā vajreṇeva hato giriḥ // HV_88.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13773: tāṃś ca rājñaḥ śaraiḥ sarvān punarvivyādha keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13776: rukmiṇaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyadravanta narādhipāḥ // HV_88.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:13779: viveṣṭamānaṃ bhūmau taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya rukmiṇī /
GE07hv_conpu:13780: pādayor nyapatad bhartur bhrātur jīvitakāṅkṣiṇī // HV_88.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:13782: abhayaṃ rukmiṇe dattvā prayayau svāṃ purīṃ tataḥ // HV_88.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13783: vṛṣṇayo 'pi jarāsaṃdhaṃ bhaṅktvā tāṃś cāpi pārthivān /
GE07hv_conpu:13787: te 'pi vīrā yathāyogaṃ jitvā tān yādavottamāḥ | *HV_88.29ab*1016:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13788: prayayur dvārakāṃ hṛṣṭāḥ puraskṛtya halāyudham // HV_88.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13790: rukmiṇaṃ ratham āropya prayayau svapuraṃ tataḥ // HV_88.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13792: hīnapratijño naicchat sa praveṣṭuṃ kuṇḍinaṃ puram // HV_88.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:13793: vidarbheṣu ca vāsārthaṃ nirmame 'nyat puraṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:13794: tadbhojakaṭam ity eva babhūva bhuvi viśrutam // HV_88.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13797: tacchaśāsa mahāvīryo rukmī jīvati tatra vai | *HV_88.32*1017:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13799: bhīṣmakaḥ kuṇḍine caiva rājovāsa mahāmanāḥ // HV_88.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:13801: jarāsaṃdho 'pi saṃprāpya saṃjñāṃ prāpa svakaṃ puram | *HV_88.33*1018:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13805: idānīm anyathā vṛttaḥ svāṃ purī niryayau bahiḥ || *HV_88.33*1018:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13806: ko nu nāma samartho 'tra kṛṣṇe jīvati sāṃpratam | *HV_88.33*1018:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:13808: iti paurāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā sunīthaṃ mandavikramam | *HV_88.33*1018:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13809: āhuḥ parasparaṃ sarve gacchantaṃ svapuraṃ nṛpam | *HV_88.33*1018:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:13811: rukmiṇyāḥ keśavaḥ pāṇiṃ jagrāha vidhivat prabhuḥ // HV_88.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13812: [k: after 88.34, D6 S (except G2) ins. a passage given in App I (No. 23) :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13813: tataḥ saha tayā reme priyayā prīyamāṇayā /
GE07hv_conpu:13814: sītayeva purā rāmaḥ paulomy eva puraṃdaraḥ // HV_88.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13817: sā hi tasyābhavaj jyeṣṭhā patnī kṛṣṇasya bhāminī /
GE07hv_conpu:13820: cārudeṣṇaṃ sudeṣṇaṃ ca pradyumnaṃ ca mahābalam // HV_88.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:13821: suṣeṇaṃ cāruguptaṃ ca cārubāhuṃ ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13822: cāruvindaṃ sucāruṃ ca bhadracāruṃ tathaiva ca // HV_88.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:13823: cāruṃ ca balināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sutāṃ cārumatīṃ tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13824: dharmārthakuśalās te tu kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ // HV_88.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:13827: kālindīṃ mitravindāṃ ca satyāṃ nāgnajitīm api /
GE07hv_conpu:13828: sutāṃ jāmbavataś cāpi rohiṇīṃ kāmarūpiṇīm // HV_88.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:13831: śaibyāṃ sudattāṃ rūpeṇa śriyā hy apsarasopamām // HV_88.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:13833: upayeme hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvā bheje sa tāḥ samam /
GE07hv_conpu:13835: jajñire tasya putrāś ca tāsu vīrāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13842: kṛtvā tu rāmeṇa ca yādavaiḥ saha | *HV_88.44*1021:2 |*
GE07hv_conpu:13845: [k: after 88.34, D6 S (except G2) ins. a passage given in App I (No. 23) :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13846: [h: HV (CE) Chapter 89 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March 5, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:13848: tataḥ kāle vyatīte tu rukmī mahati vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13849: duhituḥ kārayām āsa svayaṃvaram ariṃdamaḥ // HV_89.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13850: tatrāhūtāś ca rājāno rājaputrāś ca rukmiṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:13852: jagāma tatra pradyumnaḥ kumārair aparair vṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13853: sā hi taṃ cakame kanyā sa ca tāṃ śubhalocanām // HV_89.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:13855: pṛthivyām abhavat khyātā rukmiṇas tanayā tadā // HV_89.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:13857: vaidarbhī varayām āsa pradyumnam arisūdanam // HV_89.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:13861: nārāyaṇī candrasenā jātakāmā ca taṃ prati // HV_89.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:13862: vṛtte svayaṃvare jagmū rājānaḥ svapurāṇi te /
GE07hv_conpu:13863: upādāya tu vaidarbhīṃ pradyumno dvārakāṃ yayau // HV_89.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:13865: reme saha tayā vīro damayantyā nalo yathā | *HV_89.8*1022 |
GE07hv_conpu:13866: sa tasyāṃ janayām āsa devagarbhopamaṃ sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:13868: dhanurvede ca vede ca nītiśāstre ca pāragam // HV_89.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13869: abhavat sa yadā rājann aniruddho vayonvitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13871: patnyarthaṃ varayām āsa nāmnā rukmavatīti sā // HV_89.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13872: aniruddhaṃ guṇair dātuṃ kṛtabuddhir nṛpas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13873: prītyā ca raukmiṇeyasya rukmiṇyāś cāpy upagrahāt // HV_89.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:13874: vispardhann api kṛṣṇena vairaṃ tad apahāya saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13875: dadānīty abravīd rājā prītimāñ janamejaya // HV_89.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13876: keśavaḥ saha rukmiṇyā putraiḥ saṃkarṣaṇena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13877: anyaiś ca vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ vidarbhān sabalo yayau // HV_89.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13878: saṃyuktā jñātayaś caiva rukmiṇaḥ suhṛdaś ca ye /
GE07hv_conpu:13879: āhūtā rukmiṇā te 'pi tatrājagmur narādhipāḥ // HV_89.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:13882: pāṇau gṛhīte vaidarbhyās tv aniruddhena bhārata /
GE07hv_conpu:13883: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V B1.2 Dn Ds D1.2.4-6 T4 G2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13885: remire vṛṣṇayas tatra pūjyamānā yathāmarāḥ // HV_89.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13887: akṣaḥ śrutarvā cāṇūraḥ krāthaś caivāṃśumān api // HV_89.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13889: pāṇḍyaś ca nṛpatiḥ śrīmān ṛṣīkādhipatis tathā // HV_89.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13891: abhigamyābruvan sarve rukmiṇaṃ rahasi prabhum // HV_89.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13892: bhavān akṣeṣu kuśalo vayaṃ cāpi riraṃsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13893: priyadyūtaś ca rāmo 'sāv akṣeṣv anipuṇo 'pi ca // HV_89.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:13894: te bhavantaṃ puraskṛtya jetum icchāma taṃ vayam /
GE07hv_conpu:13895: ity ukto rocayām āsa dyūtaṃ rukmī mahārathaḥ // HV_89.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:13897: sabhām āviviśur hṛṣṭāḥ siktāṃ candanavāriṇā // HV_89.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13899: sauvarṇeṣv āsaneṣv āsāṃ cakrire vijigīṣavaḥ // HV_89.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13901: bāḍham ity abravīdd hṛṣṭaḥ saha dīvyāma paṇyatām // HV_89.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:13903: maṇimuktāḥ suvarṇaṃ ca tatrāninyuḥ sahasraśaḥ // HV_89.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13907: rukmiṇā saha saṃpāte baladevo glahaṃ dadau // HV_89.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:13908: taṃ jigāya tato rukmī yatamānaṃ mahāratham /
GE07hv_conpu:13909: tāvad evāparaṃ bhūyo baladevaṃ jigāya saḥ // HV_89.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13911: suvarṇakoṭiṃ jagrāha glahaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_89.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13912: jitam ity eva hṛṣṭo 'tha tam āhvṛtir abhāṣata /
GE07hv_conpu:13913: ślāghamānaś ca cikṣepa prahasan musalāyudham // HV_89.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13914: avidyo durbalaḥ śrīmān hiraṇyam amitaṃ mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:13916: kaliṅgarājas tac chrutvā prajahāsa bhṛśaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13917: dantān vidarśayan hṛṣṭas tatrākrudhyadd halāyudhaḥ // HV_89.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13920: roṣam āhārayām āsa jitaroṣo 'pi dharmavit // HV_89.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:13922: dhairyān manaḥ saṃniyamya tato vacanam abravīt // HV_89.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13925: kṛṣṇākṣāṃl lohitākṣāṃś ca deśe 'smiṃs tvam apāṃsule // HV_89.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13926: ity evam āhvayām āsa rukmiṇaṃ rohiṇīsutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13927: anuktvā vacanaṃ kiṃcid bāḍham ity abravīt punaḥ // HV_89.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:13928: akṣān rukmī tato hṛṣṭaḥ pātayām āsa pārthivaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13929: cāturakṣe nivṛtte tu nirjitaḥ sa narādhipaḥ // HV_89.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:13930: baladevena dharmeṇa nety uvāca tato balam /
GE07hv_conpu:13931: dhairyān manaḥ saṃniyamya sa na kiṃcid uvāca ha /
GE07hv_conpu:13933: ete bruvantu rājāno ye tathyavacanā iha | *HV_89.38cd*1024 |
GE07hv_conpu:13934: baladevaṃ tato rukmī mayā jitam iti smayan // HV_89.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:13935: baladevas tu tac chrutvā jihmaṃ vākyaṃ narādhipāt /
GE07hv_conpu:13936: bhūyaḥ krodhasamāviṣṭo nottaraṃ vyājahāra ha // HV_89.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:13939: satyam āha balaḥ śrīmān dharmeṇaiṣa parājitaḥ // HV_89.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:13940: anuktvā vacanaṃ kiṃcit prāpto bhavati karmaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:13941: manasā samanujñātaṃ tat syād ity avagamyatām // HV_89.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:13942: iti śrutvā vacas tathyam antarikṣāt subhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:13948: akṣaiḥ krīḍanti rājāno bāṇaiś ca na bhavādṛśāḥ || *HV_89.42ab*1025:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13950: rukmiṇyā bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ niṣpipeṣa mahītale // HV_89.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:13954: dantān babhañja saṃrambhād unnanāda ca siṃhavat /
GE07hv_conpu:13955: khaḍgam udyamya tāṃś cāpi trāsayām āsa pārthivān // HV_89.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:13958: stambhaṃ sabhāyāḥ sauvarṇam utpāṭya balināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13959: gajendra iva taṃ stambhaṃ karṣan samkarṣaṇas tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13963: [k: T1.3.4 G1.3.5 M (T2 G4 after 45cd) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13964: keśeṣu rukmiṇaṃ gṛhya cakarṣa ca punaḥ punaḥ | *HV_89.45*1028:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13965: tam ādāya sabhādvārāc charapātaṃ sasarja ha | *HV_89.45*1028:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13967: vitrāsya dviṣataḥ sarvān siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgān iva // HV_89.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:13968: jagāma śibiraṃ rāmaḥ svam eva svajanāvṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13969: nyavedayata kṛṣṇāya tac ca sarvaṃ yathābhavat // HV_89.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:13970: novāca sa tadā kiṃcit kṛṣṇo rāmaṃ mahādyutim /
GE07hv_conpu:13971: [k: Ñ2 V2 B2 Dn Ds D6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13972: rukmiṇī tu tataḥ śrutvā nihataṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam | *HV_89.48ab*1029 |
GE07hv_conpu:13973: nigṛhya ca tadātmānaṃ krodhād aśrūṇy avartayat // HV_89.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:13974: na hato vāsudevena yaḥ pūrvaṃ paravīrahā /
GE07hv_conpu:13982: vṛṣṇayaś cāndhakāś caiva sarve vimanaso 'bhavan // HV_89.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:13985: rukmiṇī ca mahābhāgā vilapanty ārtayā girā | *HV_89.51*1031:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13986: vilapantīṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā sāntvayām āsa keśavaḥ | *HV_89.51*1031:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13987: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ rukmiṇo nidhanaṃ yathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13988: vairasya ca samutthānaṃ vṛṣṇibhir bharatarṣabha // HV_89.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:13990: rāmakṛṣṇau samāśritya yayur dvāravatīṃ purīm // HV_89.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:13991: [k: After 89.53, V1.3 Ds D6 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 24) :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13992: [h: HV (CE) Chapter 90 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March 5, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:13994: bhūya eva tu viprarṣe baladevasya dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13995: māhātmyaṃ śrotum icchāmi śeṣasya dharaṇībhṛtaḥ // HV_90.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13997: kathayanti mahātmānaṃ ye purāṇavido janāḥ // HV_90.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:13998: tasya karmāṇy ahaṃ vipra śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13999: anantaṃ yaṃ vidur nāgam ādidevaṃ mahaujasam // HV_90.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:14002: śeṣas tejonidhiḥ śrīmān akampyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // HV_90.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14004: jarāsaṃdhaṃ gadāyuddhe jitavān yo na cāvadhīt // HV_90.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14006: anvayur māgadhaṃ saṃkhye te cāpi vijitā raṇe // HV_90.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14011: [k: K1 (marg.).2 Ñ2.3 V B Ds D2-6 T G M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14012: rājabhiḥ sarvato ruddho haramāṇo balāt kila | *HV_90.8*1032 |
GE07hv_conpu:14014: rāmas tasya vimokṣārtham āgato nālabhac ca tam /
GE07hv_conpu:14015: tataś cukrodha balavān adbhutaṃ cākaron mahat // HV_90.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:14016: anivāryam abhedyaṃ ca divyam apratimaṃ balī /
GE07hv_conpu:14019: prakṣeptum aicchad gaṅgāyāṃ nagaraṃ kauravasya tat // HV_90.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:14020: tad āghūrṇitam ālakṣya puraṃ duryodhano nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14021: sāmbaṃ niryātayām āsa sabhāryaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // HV_90.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:14023: gadāyuddhe kurupatiḥ pratijagrāha taṃ ca saḥ // HV_90.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:14024: tataḥ prabhṛti rājendra puram etad vighūrṇitaṃ /
GE07hv_conpu:14025: āvarjitam ivābhāti gaṅgām abhimukhaṃ nṛpa // HV_90.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:14026: idam atyadbhutaṃ karma rāmasya prathitaṃ bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:14027: bhāṇḍīre kathyate rājan yat kṛtaṃ śauriṇā purā // HV_90.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:14029: dhenukaṃ ca mahākāyaṃ cikṣepa nagamūrdhani // HV_90.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14030: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14033: nagaram abhimukhā yad āhṛtā halavidhṛtā yamunā yamasvasā // HV_90.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14034: baladevasya māhātmyam etat te kathitaṃ mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:14036: iti puruṣavarasya lāṅgaler bahuvidham uttamam anyad eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14037: yad akathitam ihādya karma te tad upalabhasva purāṇavistarāt // HV_90.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:14041: [h: HV (CE) Chapter 91 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March 5, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:14043: pratyetya dvārakāṃ viṣṇur hate rukmiṇi vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:14044: akarod yan mahābāhus tan me vada mahāmune // HV_91.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:14046: sa tair vṛtaḥ purīṃ gatvā sarvayādavanandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14047: dvārakāṃ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ pratyavaikṣata vīryavān // HV_91.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:14050: tatra vighnaṃ caranti sma daiteyāḥ saha dānavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14051: tāñ jaghāna mahābāhur varadattān mahāsurān // HV_91.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14052: vighnaṃ tatrākarot tasya narako nāma dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14055: [k: After 6ab, D6 S ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 25). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14056: ṛṣīṇāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca pratīpam akarot tadā // HV_91.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14057: tvaṣṭur duhitaraṃ bhaumaḥ kaśerum agamat tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:14059: pramathya ca varārohāṃ narako vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:14062: bibharti ca mahī kṛtsnā sāgareṣu ca yad vasu // HV_91.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:14064: mamaivopahariṣyanti daityāś ca saha dānavaiḥ // HV_91.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:14066: saṃjahāra tadā bhaumas tac ca nādhicacāra saḥ // HV_91.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:14067: gandharvāṇāṃ ca yāḥ kanyā jahāra narako balī /
GE07hv_conpu:14068: yāś ca devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sapta cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ // HV_91.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:14070: ekaveṇīdharāḥ sarvāḥ satāṃ mārgam anuvratāḥ // HV_91.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:14072: alakāyām adīnātmā murasya viṣayaṃ prati // HV_91.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:14073: tāś ca prāgjyotiṣapatir muroś caiva daśātmajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14074: nairṛtāś ca yathāmukhyāḥ pālayanta upāsate // HV_91.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:14075: sa eṣa tamasaḥ pāre varadatto mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14076: aditiṃ dharṣayām āsa kuṇḍalārthe mahāsuraḥ // HV_91.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14078: ye hi devamanuṣyeṣu kuṇḍale te śubhe ubhe | *HV_91.16*1035 |
GE07hv_conpu:14079: na cāsuragaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaiḥ karma tat purā /
GE07hv_conpu:14080: kṛtapūrvaṃ tadā ghoraṃ yad akārṣīn mahāsuraḥ // HV_91.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14081: yaṃ mahī suṣuve devī yasya prāgjyotiṣaṃ puram /
GE07hv_conpu:14083: hayagrīvo nisundaś ca vīraḥ pañcajanas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:14084: muruḥ putrasahasraiś ca varadatto mahāsuraḥ // HV_91.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:14088: vitrāsanaḥ sukṛtināṃ virūpai rākṣasaiḥ saha // HV_91.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:14090: jāto vṛṣṇiṣu devakyāṃ vasudevāj janārdanaḥ // HV_91.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:14091: [k: After 21, D6 S(except G2) ins. an addl. colophon :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14092: [k: After the addl. colophon, D6 S(except G2) ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 26) :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14094: nivāso dhārakā devair upāyād upapāditā // HV_91.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:14095: atīva hi purī ramyā dvārakā vāsavakṣayāt /
GE07hv_conpu:14101: [k: After 24, D6 S(except G2) ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 27) :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14103: lokayātrām imāṃ kṛtsnāṃ parirakṣanta āsate // HV_91.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14107: divyagandho vavau vāyuḥ puṣpavarṣaṃ papāta ha // HV_91.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:14109: muhūrtam antarikṣe 'bhūt tato bhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_91.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14110: madhye tu tejasas tasya pāṇḍuraṃ gajam āsthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14111: vṛto devagaṇaiḥ sarvair vāsavaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_91.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14112: [k: D6 T G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14115: hananaṃ ca tathā viṣṇor narakasya durātmanaḥ || *HV_91.28*1039:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:14117: rāmakṛṣṇai ca rājā ca vṛṣṇyandhakagaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_conpu:14120: sasvaje baladevaṃ ca taṃ ca rājānam āhukam /
GE07hv_conpu:14122: pradyumnam atha deveśas tatputraṃ ca mahādyutim | *HV_91.30cd*1040 |
GE07hv_conpu:14123: vṛṣṇīn anyān sasvaje ca yathā sthānaṃ yathā vayaḥ // HV_91.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:14125: tatrāsanam alaṃkṛtya sabhām tāṃ sa sureśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14131: sāntvapūrvaṃ kareṇāsya saṃspṛṣan vadanaṃ śubham // HV_91.32 //

GE07hv_conpu:14142: tava caivāntaraprekṣī jahi taṃ pāpapūruṣam // HV_91.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:14143: ayaṃ tvāṃ garuḍas tatra prāpayiṣyati kāmagaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14146: niṣūdayitvā taṃ pāpaṃ kṣipram āgantum arhasi // HV_91.37 //

GE07hv_conpu:14222: rodhayām āsa tan mārgaṃ svasainyena mahābalaḥ || *HV_91.45cd*1051:2 |
