GE07hv_conpu:14390: [k: K2 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D1.2.4.5 G2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14395: taṃ hatvā narakaṃ bhaumaṃ viṣṇur yādavanandanaḥ | *HV_91.57*1062:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:14397: bhūmis tu patitaṃ putraṃ nirīkṣyādāya kuṇḍale /
GE07hv_conpu:14398: upātiṣṭhata govindaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_91.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:14400: [k: After 59ab, K Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-5 G2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14401: yathecchasi tathā krīḍa bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva | *HV_91.59ab*1063 |
GE07hv_conpu:14402: ime te kuṇḍale deva prajās tasyānupālaya // HV_91.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:14403: [k: After 59, D6 T1-3 G1.3-5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14405: prajāś carantu sukhinas tava deva prapālanāt | *HV_91.59*1064:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:14406: nirvighnaṃ brāhmaṇā deva bhūyāsus tava śāsanāt | *HV_91.59*1064:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:14407: ityuktvā sā dadau tasmai kuṇḍale lokaviśrute | *HV_91.59*1064:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:14409: [h: HV (CE) chapter 92, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of march 19, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:14414: dadarśa dhanam akṣayyaṃ ratnāni vividhāni ca // HV_92.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:14419: śayanāni mahārhāṇi tathā siṃhāsanāni ca // HV_92.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14421: dadarśa ca mahac chatraṃ varṣamāṇam ivāmbudam // HV_92.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14423: varuṇād āhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ narakeṇeti naḥ śrutam // HV_92.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14424: yādṛśaṃ tu gṛhe dṛṣṭaṃ narakasya dhanaṃ bahu /
GE07hv_conpu:14425: na vai rājñā kubereṇa na śakreṇa yamena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14426: ratnasaṃnicyas tādṛg dṛṣṭapūrvo na ca śrutaḥ // HV_92.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:14427: hate bhaume nisunde ca hayagrīve ca dānave /
GE07hv_conpu:14428: upaninyus tatas tāni ratnāny antaḥpurāṇi ca // HV_92.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:14430: keśavāya mahārhāṇi yāny arhati janārdanaḥ // HV_92.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:14435: rucirābhiḥ patākābhir vasānā vividhāḥ kuthāḥ // HV_92.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:14437: aṣṭau śatasahasrāṇi deśajāś cottamā hayāḥ // HV_92.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:14438: goṣu cāpi kṛto yāvat kāmas tava janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14440: āvikāni ca sūkṣmāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14443: vasu yat triṣu lokeṣu dharmeṇādhigataṃ tvayā /
GE07hv_conpu:14446: tāni santīha sarvāṇi narakasya niveśane // HV_92.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14448: iti vijñāpitas tais tu dānavaiś ca janārdanaḥ | *HV_92.16*1065 |
GE07hv_conpu:14449: [k: N2 ins. after 16 an addl. colophon. :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14450: sa tat sarvaṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pratigṛhya parīkṣya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14451: sarvam āhārayāmāsa dānavair dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_92.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14452: tatas tad vāruṇaṃ chatraṃ svayam utkṣipya mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14456: tatra puṇyā vavur vātā hy abhavaṃś cāmalāḥ prabhāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14467: nivasantyo yathā devyaḥ sukhinyaḥ kāmavarjitāḥ // HV_92.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14469: sarvāḥ kāṣāyavāsinyaḥ sarvāś ca niyatendriyāḥ // HV_92.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:14471: sametya yadusiṃhasya sarvāś cakruḥ striyo 'ñjalīn // HV_92.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14472: narakaṃ nihataṃ jñātvā muraṃ caiva mahāsuram /
GE07hv_conpu:14473: hayagrīvaṃ nisundaṃ ca tāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ paryavārayan // HV_92.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14474: te cāsāṃ rakṣiṇo vṛddhā dānavā yadunandanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14477: sarvāsām eva saṃkalpaḥ patitvenābhavat tataḥ // HV_92.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:14479: saṃprahṛṣṭā mahābāhum idaṃ vacanam abruvan // HV_92.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:14480: satyaṃ bata purā vāyur ihāsmān vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:14481: sarvabhūtarutajñaś ca devarṣir api nāradaḥ // HV_92.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:14483: sa bhaumaṃ narakaṃ hatvā bhartā ca bhavitā hi saḥ // HV_92.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:14485: darśanena kṛtārthā hi vayam adya mahātmanaḥ // HV_92.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:14487: sarvāḥ kamalapatrākṣīr dṛṣṭyā vācā ca mādhavaḥ // HV_92.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:14491: śibikāṃ vahatāṃ tatra nirghoṣaḥ sumahān abhūt // HV_92.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:14496: nyaṅkubhiś ca varāhaiś ca rurubhiś ca niṣevitam /
GE07hv_conpu:14499: jīvaṃjīvakasaṃghaiś ca barhibhiś ca nināditam // HV_92.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:14500: tad apy atibalo viṣṇur dorbhyām utpāṭya bhāsvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:14501: āropayāmāsa tadā garuḍe pakṣiṇāṃ vare // HV_92.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:14503: uvāha līlayā pakṣī garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ // HV_92.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:14505: dikṣu sarvāsu saṃhrādaṃ janayāmāsa pakṣirāṭ // HV_92.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:14507: saṃjahāra mahābhrāṇi vijahāra ca kānicit // HV_92.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:14509: yayau vātajavaḥ pakṣī janārdanavaśe sthitaḥ // HV_92.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:14512: viśveṣāṃ marutāṃ caiva sādhyānāṃ ca narādhipa /
GE07hv_conpu:14513: bhrājamānāny atikrāmad aśvinoś ca paraṃtapaḥ // HV_92.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:14516: avatīrya sa tārkṣyāt tu dadarśa vibudhādhipam /
GE07hv_conpu:14517: prītaś caivābhyanandat taṃ devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ // HV_92.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:14518: pradāya kuṇḍale divye vavande taṃ tadācyutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14521: satyabhāmā ca paulomyā yathāvad abhinanditā // HV_92.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:14525: prītāsmi darśanād devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ karavāṇi te | *HV_92.52*1066:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:14526: diṣṭyā hato bhavatyā tu narako duṣṭacetanaḥ | *HV_92.52*1066:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:14527: ity uktā sā tadā devī kṛtam ity abravīc ca tām | *HV_92.52*1066:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:14528: vāsavo vāsudevaś ca sahitau jagmatus tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14529: adityā bhavanaṃ puṇyaṃ devamātur maharddhimat // HV_92.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:14532: tatas te kuṇḍale dattvā vavande tāṃ śacīpatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14533: janārdanaṃ puraskṛtya kama caiva śaśaṃśa tat // HV_92.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:14534: [k: For 55b, K2-4 N2.3 V B2 Dn Ds D1-5 T G M4 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14536: vavande tāṃ śacībhartā mātaraṃ svāṃ puraṃdaraḥ | *HV_92.55*1067:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:14537: aditis tau sutau prītyā pariṣvajyābhinandya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14538: āśirbhir anurūpābhir ubhāv abhyavadat tadā // HV_92.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:14539: paulomī satyabhāmā ca prītyā paramayā yute /
GE07hv_conpu:14540: agṛhṇītāṃ varārhāyā devyāś ca caraṇau śubhau // HV_92.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:14541: te cāpy abhyavadat premṇā devamātā yaśasvinī /
GE07hv_conpu:14542: yathāvad abravīc caiva janārdanam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_92.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:14545: [k: K2.4 N2.3 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14547: tava ceyaṃ varārohā nityaṃ ca priyadarśanā | *HV_92.59*1068:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:14552: jarāṃ na yāsyati vadhūr yāvat tvaṃ kṛṣṇa mānuṣaḥ // HV_92.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:14557: sa dadarśa mahābāhur ākrīḍe vāsavasya ha /
GE07hv_conpu:14558: divyam abhyarcitaṃ caityaṃ pārijātaṃ mahādrumam // HV_92.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:14560: yam āsādya janaḥ sarvo jātiṃ smarati paurvikīm // HV_92.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:14562: utpāṭyāropayāmāsa viṣṇus taṃ vai mahādrumam // HV_92.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:14563: so 'paśyat satyabhāmāṃ ca divyām apsarasaṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14564: [k: K2 N2.3 V1.2 B Ds D2.4-6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14566: tataḥ prāyād dvāravatīṃ vāyujuṣṭena vai pathā // HV_92.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:14567: śrutvā tad devarājas tu karma kṛṣṇasya vai tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:14568: anumene mahābāhuḥ kṛtaṃ karmeti cābravīt // HV_92.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:14570: pratasthe dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇo devalokād ariṃdamaḥ // HV_92.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:14574: pūjito devarājena dadṛśe yādavīṃ purīm // HV_92.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:14576: hatvā tu narakaṃ bhaumaṃ dattvā kuṇḍalam uttamam | *HV_92.69*1072:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:14577: hṛtvā taṃ pārijātaṃ ca praṇamya suramātaram | *HV_92.69*1072:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:14578: tathā karma mahat kṛtvā bhagavān vāsavānujaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14579: upāyād dvārakāṃ viṣṇuḥ śrīmān garuḍavāhanaḥ // HV_92.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:14580: [k: After this adhy. All Mss. (except S1 M1-3) ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 29). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14587: dadarśātha purīṃ kṛṣṇo dvārakāṃ garuḍe sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14590: [k: After 2a, Ñ2 V B Ds D5.6 T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14592: [k: Ñ2 V1 B DS D6 ins. (Dn D2.3.5 after the first occurrence of 8cd): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14594: [k: Ñ2 V1 B Dn Ds D5.6 ins. (T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 after 1073): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14597: priyam icchasi cet kartuṃ mahyaṃ śilpavatāṃ vara /
GE07hv_conpu:14598: kṛṣṇapriyārthaṃ bhūyas tvaṃ kariṣyasi manoharām // HV_93.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:14600: kuruṣva vibudhaśreṣṭha yathā mama purī tathā // HV_93.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14601: yat kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu ratnabhūtaṃ prapaśyasi /
GE07hv_conpu:14602: tena saṃyujyatāṃ kṣipraṃ purī dvāravatī tvayā // HV_93.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14604: saṃgrāmān ghorarūpāṃś ca vigāhati mahābalaḥ // HV_93.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14605: tām indravacanād gatvā viśvakarmā purīṃ tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14609: tāṃ purīṃ dvārakāṃ dṛṣṭvā vibhunārāyaṇo hariḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14612: dvārakāṃ prati dāśārhaś citritāṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:14618: babhau cāruparikṣiptā dvārakā dyaur ivāmbubhiḥ // HV_93.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:14628: sarvartukavanaṃ caiva bhāti raivatakaṃ prati // HV_93.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14630: bhāti bhārgavanaṃ caiva puṣpakaṃ ca mahad vanam // HV_93.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:14633: bhāti caitrarathaṃ caiva nandanaṃ ca mahad vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14634: ramaṇaṃ bhāvanaṃ caiva veṇumad vai samantataḥ // HV_93.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:14636: bhāti puṣkariṇī ramyā pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhārata // HV_93.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:14644: āyasaiś ca mahācakrair dadṛśe dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_93.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14648: dviguṇopaniveśāṃ ca dadṛśe dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_93.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14651: striyo 'pi yasyāṃ yudhyeran kim u vṛṣṇimahārathāḥ // HV_93.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14652: vyūhānām uttamā mārgāḥ sapta caiva mahāpathāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14653: tatra vai vihitāḥ sākṣād vividhā viśvakarmaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:14662: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14671: dadṛśe dvārakā cāru meghair dyaur iva saṃvṛtā /
GE07hv_conpu:14672: sākṣād bhagavato veśma vihitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:14674: tāvad eva ca vistīrṇam aprameyaṃ mahādhanaiḥ // HV_93.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:14676: yaś cakāra mahābhāgas tvaṣṭā vāsavacoditaḥ // HV_93.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:14678: meror iva gireḥ śṛṅgam ucchritaṃ kāñcanaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:14679: rukmiṇyāḥ pravaraṃ vāsaṃ vihitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:14684: sa ca prāsādamukhyo yo jāmbavatyā vibhūṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14685: prabhayābhyabhavat sarvāṃs tān anyān bhāskaro yathā // HV_93.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:14689: sāgarapratimas tiṣṭhan merur ity abhiviśrutaḥ // HV_93.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:14697: yaṃ viduḥ sarvabhūtāni param ity eva bhārata // HV_93.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:14699: mahiṣyā vāsudevasya bhūṣaṇaṃ teṣu veśmasu // HV_93.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:14701: atīva saumyaḥ so 'py āsīd viṣṭhitaḥ parvato yathā // HV_93.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:14703: mahiṣyā vāsudevasya ketumān iti viśrutaḥ // HV_93.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:14704: tatra prāsādamukhyo vai yaṃ tvaṣṭā vidadhe svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:14706: sa śrīmān virajo nāma vyarājat tatra suprabhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14710: ratnajālāni tatraiva tatra tatra niveśitāḥ // HV_93.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:14716: ādityapathagaṃ yat tu meroḥ śikharam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:14718: tad apy utpāṭya kṛṣṇārtham ānītaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:14721: pārijātas tu tatraiva keśavenāhṛtaḥ svayam // HV_93.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:14723: kṛṣṇasya yo 'bhyarakṣaṃs taṃ devāḥ pādapam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:14724: puṇḍarīkaśatair juṣṭaṃ vimānaiś ca hiraṇmayaiḥ // HV_93.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:14729: sālās tālāḥ kadambāś ca śataśākhāś ca rohiṇāḥ // HV_93.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:14730: ye ca haimavatā vṛkṣā ye ca meruruhās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:14735: tasmin puravare nadyaḥ prasannasalilā hradāḥ // HV_93.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:14742: bahūvuḥ paramopetās tasyāṃ puryāṃ tu pādapāḥ // HV_93.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:14744: nivāsaś ca kṛtas tatra varāhamṛgapakṣiṇām // HV_93.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:14745: puryāṃ tasyāṃ tu ramyāyāṃ prākāro vai hiraṇmayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14747: tena te ca mahāśailāḥ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14748: parikṣiptāni bhaumena vanāny upavanāni ca // HV_93.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:14770: babhūvuḥ paramopetā vāpyaś ca vikacotpalāḥ // HV_94.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14775: tatas taṃ pāṇḍuraṃ śaurir mūrdhni tiṣṭhan garutmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14776: prītaḥ śaṅkham upādhmāsīd dviṣatāṃ lomaharṣaṇam // HV_94.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:14777: tasya śaṅkhasya śabdena sāgaraś cukṣubhe bhṛśam /
GE07hv_conpu:14778: rarāsa ca nabhaḥ kṛtsnaṃ tac citram abhacat tadā // HV_94.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:14780: viśokāḥ samapadyanta garuḍasya ca darśanāt // HV_94.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:14783: tatas tūryapraṇādaś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14784: siṃhanādaś ca saṃjajñe sarveṣāṃ puravāsinām // HV_94.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:14785: tataḥ sarve daśārhāś ca sarve ca kukurāndhakāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14790: rohiṇī ca yathoddeśam āhukasya ca yāḥ striyaḥ // HV_94.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:14791: tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ suparṇena svaṃ niveśanam abhyayāt /
GE07hv_conpu:14792: cacāra ca yathoddeśam īśvarānucaro hariḥ // HV_94.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14794: yathārhaṃ pūjayām āsa yādavān yādavarṣabhaḥ // HV_94.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14796: praviveśa gṛhaṃ śaurir ādāya maṇiparvatam // HV_94.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:14797: taṃ ca śakrasya dayitaṃ pārijātaṃ mahādrumam /
GE07hv_conpu:14798: praveśayām āsa gṛhaṃ pradyumno rukmiṇīsutaḥ // HV_94.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:14802: praviveśa gṛhaṃ śrīmān vihitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_94.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:14805: taṃ ca divyaṃ drumaśreṣṭhaṃ pārijātam amitrajit /
GE07hv_conpu:14806: arcyam arcitam avyagram iṣṭe deśe nyaveśayat // HV_94.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:14808: tāḥ striyaḥ pūjayām āsa saṃkṣiptā narakeṇa yāḥ // HV_94.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:14810: hāraiś candrāṃśusaṃkāśair maṇibhiś ca mahāprabhaiḥ // HV_94.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14814: pūrvam abhyarcitāś caiva vasudevena tāḥ striyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14815: vedakyā saha rohiṇyā revatyā cāhukena ca // HV_94.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:14817: kuṭumbasyeśvarī tv āsīd rukmiṇī bhīṣmakātmajā // HV_94.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14821: ādideśa gṛhān kṛṣṇaḥ paribarhāṃś ca puṣkalān // HV_94.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14823: satyabhāmā sadā viṣṇoḥ pārśvasthā saṃsadi priyā | *HV_94.28*1082 |
GE07hv_conpu:14831: sakhivac copagṛhyainam anujajñe gṛhaṃ prati // HV_95.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:14832: so 'nujñāto hi satkṛtya praṇamya ca janārdanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14833: ūrdhvam ācakrame pakṣī yatheṣṭaṃ gaganecaraḥ // HV_95.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:14835: kṛtvā vegena mahatā yayau pūrvaṃ mahodadhim // HV_95.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:14836: kṛtyakāla upasthāsya ity uktvā garuḍe gate /
GE07hv_conpu:14837: kṛṣṇo dadarśa pitaraṃ vṛddham ānakaduṃdubhim // HV_95.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14838: ugrasenaṃ ca rājānaṃ baladevaṃ ca mādhavaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:14845: prītāś ca munayaḥ sarve rakṣitā yadusattamāḥ | *HV_95.7*1083:1 |

GE07hv_conpu:14855: vavande saha rāmeṇa pitaraṃ vāsavānujaḥ // HV_95.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:14856: tataḥ śeṣān abhikramya satkṛtya ca yathārhataḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:14860: tatas tad dhanam akṣayyaṃ kiṃkarair yat samāhṛtam /

GE07hv_conpu:14862: tataḥ sa mānayām āsa dāśārhān yadusattamān /
GE07hv_conpu:14866: tataḥ puruṣasiṃhaiḥ sā yadubhiḥ sarvato vṛtā /
GE07hv_conpu:14869: śuśubhe 'bhyadhikaṃ śubhrā siṃhair giriguhā yathā // HV_95.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14870: rāmeṇa saha govindaḥ kāñcanaṃ mahad āsanam /

GE07hv_conpu:14888: ūcuś cainaṃ nṛvīrās te kṛtāñjalipuṭās tataḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:14890: yat kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma devair api suduṣkaram /
GE07hv_conpu:14891: lālayeḥ svajanaṃ bhogai ratnaiś ca svayam arjitaiḥ // HV_96.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14892: tataḥ sarvadaśārhāṇām āhukasya ca yāḥ striyaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:14896: tau tu pūrvam atikramya rohiṇīm abhivādya ca /

GE07hv_conpu:14900: tataḥ prāptau narāgryau tu tasyā duhitaraṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:14901: ekānaṃśeti yām āhur narā vai kāmarūpiṇīm // HV_96.11 //

GE07hv_conpu:14904: sā kanyā vavṛdhe tatra vṛṣṇisadmani pūjitā /

GE07hv_conpu:14906: tām ekām āhur utpannām ekānaṃśeti mānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14908: ekānaṃśeti yām āhur utpannāṃ mānavā bhuvi | *HV_96.14ab*1086 |
GE07hv_conpu:14909: yogakanyāṃ durādharṣāṃ rakṣārthaṃ keśavasya ca // HV_96.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:14910: tāṃ vai sarve sumanasaḥ pūjayanti sma yādavāḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:14912: tāṃ ca tatropasaṃgamya priyām iva sakhīṃ sakhā /

GE07hv_conpu:14916: dadṛśus tāṃ priyāṃ madhye bhaginīṃ rāmakṛṣṇayoḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14919: avakīrya ca lājais tāṃ striyo jagmur yathāgatam // HV_96.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:14920: tatas te yādavāḥ sarve pūjayanto janārdanam /

GE07hv_conpu:14926: so 'tha saṃpūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ śūrais tair yadupuṃgavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14927: kare saṃspṛśya govindaṃ viveśa mahad āsanam // HV_96.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:14929: tataḥ prāha mahābāhur āhuko nṛpatir munim | *HV_96.23*1087:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:14930: mune vācaya kiṃ cid vai purāṇaṃ paramottamam || *HV_96.23*1087:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:14933: śrotavyo 'py uddhavaś cāśu bhūtvā maunam upāśritaḥ | *HV_96.23*1087:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:14935: sukhopaviṣṭas tān vṛṣṇīn upaviṣṭān uvāca ha /

GE07hv_conpu:14938: yāni karmāṇi kṛtavān bālyāt prabhṛti keśavaḥ // HV_96.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14940: rājyaṃ jagrāha durbuddhir badhvā pitaram āhukam // HV_96.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:14947: sa gopaiḥ saha dharmātmā mathuropavane vasan /
GE07hv_conpu:14952: pūtanā nāma ghorā sā mahākāyā mahābalā /
GE07hv_conpu:14953: viṣadigdhaṃ stanaṃ kṣudrā prayacchantī mahātmane // HV_96.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:14954: dadṛśus tāṃ vinihatāṃ rākṣasīṃ te vanecarāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14955: [k: Ñ2 V2 B1 Dn Ds D1 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14957: punarjāto 'yam ity āhur uktas tasmād adhokṣajaḥ // HV_96.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:14958: atyadbhutam idaṃ cāsīd yac chiśuḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14960: [k: T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 ins. (T4 M1-3 cont. after 1091*): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14961: bhakṣayan dadhi govindaḥ payaḥpānaṃ ca sāgrajaḥ | *HV_96.33*1090 |
GE07hv_conpu:14965: dāmodara iti khyāto vasudevasutas tataḥ // HV_96.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:14966: [k: K V B Dn Ds D1.4-6 G2 subst. for 34cd (T1-3 G1.3.5 M4 ins. after 34ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14970: akrūrasya ca pratyakṣaṃ yan nāgabhavane prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14971: pūjyamānas tadā nāgair divyaṃ vapur adhārayat // HV_96.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:14972: śītavātārditā gāś ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇena dhīmatā /
GE07hv_conpu:14974: śiśunā vāsudevena gavāṃ trāṇārtham icchatā // HV_96.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:14978: nihato vāsudevena gavāṃ trāṇāya durmatiḥ // HV_96.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:14980: vṛkair vidrāvayām āsa grahītuṃ samupāgatam // HV_96.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:14991: yadā tv imau naraśreṣṭhau sthitau yauvanagau mukhe /
GE07hv_conpu:14992: siṃhaśāvāv ivodīrṇau mattau haimavatau yathā // HV_96.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:14995: naitau jave vā yuddhe vā krīḍāsu vividhāsu vā /
GE07hv_conpu:14998: śrutvemau vyathitaḥ kaṃso mantribhiḥ sahito 'bhavat // HV_96.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:14999: nāśakac ca yadā kaṃso grahītuṃ balakeśavau /
GE07hv_conpu:15000: nijagrāha tataḥ krodhād vasudevaṃ sabāndhavam // HV_96.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:15002: kālaṃ mahāntam avasat kṛcchram ānakaduṃdubhiḥ // HV_96.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:15003: kaṃsas tu pitaraṃ badhvā śūrasenā? śaśāsa ha /
GE07hv_conpu:15005: kasyacit tv atha kālasya mathurāyāṃ mahotsavam /
GE07hv_conpu:15006: pinākinaṃ samuddiśya kaṃsaś cakre narādhipaḥ // HV_96.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:15007: tatra mallāḥ samāpetur nānādeśyā viśāṃ pate /

GE07hv_conpu:15010: kuśalaiḥ kārayām āsa śilpibhiḥ sādhuniṣṭhitaiḥ // HV_96.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:15012: samākīrṇāny adṛśyanta jyotirbhir gaganaṃ yathā // HV_96.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:15014: aruroha tataḥ kaṃso vimānaṃ sukṛtī yathā // HV_96.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:15016: śūrair adhiṣṭhitaṃ kaṃsaḥ sthāpayām āsa vīryavān // HV_96.58 //

GE07hv_conpu:15025: avamṛdya durādharṣau raṅgaṃ viviśatus tadā // HV_96.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:15027: augraseniḥ sa duṣṭātmā sānujo vinipātitaḥ // HV_96.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:15028: yat kṛtaṃ yadusiṃhena devair api suduḥsaham /

GE07hv_conpu:15031: tad idaṃ śauriṇā cittaṃ prāpitaṃ bhavatām iha // HV_96.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:15032: etena muram ākramya daityaṃ pañcajanaṃ tathā /

GE07hv_conpu:15034: narakaś ca hato bhaumaḥ kuṇḍale cāhṛte śubhe /

GE07hv_conpu:15070: jārūthyām āhvṛtiḥ krāthaḥ śiśupālaś ca nirjitaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:15077: jaghāna yo naravyāghro rāvaṇasyābhitaś carau // HV_97.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15079: gopatis tālaketuś ca nihatau śārṅgadhanvanā // HV_97.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:15080: akṣaprapatane caiva nimir haṃsaś ca dānavau /

GE07hv_conpu:15083: sānubandhaḥ sarāṣṭraś ca kāśīnām adhipo hataḥ // HV_97.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15084: vijitya ca yamaḥ saṃkhye śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:15090: pāṇḍyaṃ pauṇḍraṃ ca matsyaṃ ca kaliṅgaṃ ca janārdanaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:15095: jigāya bharata śreṣṭhaṃ kuntyāḥ pramukhato vibhuḥ // HV_97.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15096: droṇaṃ drauṇiṃ kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ bhīmasenaṃ suyodhanam /

GE07hv_conpu:15103: pūrvadehe jahārāyaṃ bales tribhuvanaṃ hariḥ // HV_97.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15105: yasya nādhigato mṛtyuḥ puraṃ prāgjyotiṣaṃ prati // HV_97.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15106: abhibhūtaś ca kṛṣṇena sagaṇaḥ sa mahābalaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:15113: jambham airāvataṃ cāpi virūpaṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:15116: nirjitya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ preṣayām āsa sāgaram // HV_97.26 //

GE07hv_conpu:15120: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.3-6 T G ins. (D2 cont. after 1098*): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15121: devāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś caiva ye dviṣanti sadā nṛpa | *HV_97.28*1097 |
GE07hv_conpu:15125: devamātur dadau cāpi prītyarthaṃ vajrapāṇinaḥ // HV_97.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:15127: prāptaṃ ca divi deveṣu keśavena mahad yaśaḥ | *HV_97.29*1099 |
GE07hv_conpu:15128: evaṃ sa devadaityānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15131: kṛtvā devārtham amitaṃ svasthānaṃ pratipatsyate // HV_97.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:15139: ya imām āvaset kaścid anyatra madhusūdanāt // HV_97.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:15140: evam eṣa daśārhāṇāṃ vidhāya vidhinā vidhim /

GE07hv_conpu:15143: modaty eṣa sadā bhūtair bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva // HV_97.37 //

GE07hv_conpu:15147: yato 'yaṃ devadeveśo na pramāṇe pramā bhavet | *HV_97.38ab*1100:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15148: paraṃ hy aparam etasmād viśvarūpān na vidyate // HV_97.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:15150: anto hi karmaṇām asya dṛṣṭapūrvo na kenacit // HV_97.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:15151: evam etāni karmāṇi śiśur madhyavayās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:15153: ity uvāca purā vyāsas tapodīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā /
GE07hv_conpu:15156: yadubhiḥ pūjitaḥ sarvair nāradas tridivaṃ gataḥ // HV_97.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:15161: yādavāś ca dhanaṃ prāpya vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15162: yajñair iṣṭvā mahātmāno dvārakām āvasan purīm // HV_97.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:15170: tāsām apatyān yaṣṭānāṃ bhagavān prabravītu me // HV_98.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15172: aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ putriṇya iti prādhānyataḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15173: sarvā vīraprajāyinyas tāsv apatyāni me śṛṇu // HV_98.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:15174: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca devī nagnajitī tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:15175: sudattā ca tathā śaibyā lakṣmaṇā cāruhāsinī // HV_98.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:15176: mitravindā ca kālindī jāmbavaty atha pauravī /
GE07hv_conpu:15177: subhīmā ca tathā mādrī raukmiṇeyān imāñ śṛṇu // HV_98.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15179: dvitīyaś cārudeṣṇaś ca vṛṣṇisiṃho mahārathaḥ // HV_98.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15180: cārubhadro bhadracāruḥ sudaṃṣṭro druma eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:15181: suṣeṇaś cāruguptaś ca cāruvindaś ca cārumān /
GE07hv_conpu:15182: cārubāhuḥ kaniṣṭhaś ca kanyā cārumatī tathā // HV_98.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15185: catasro jajñire teṣāṃ svasāro garuḍadhvajāt // HV_98.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15186: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D S (except m1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15191: mitravān mitravindaś ca mitravaty api cāṅganā // HV_98.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15192: mitravāhaḥ sunīthaś ca nagnajityāḥ prajāḥ śṛṇu /
GE07hv_conpu:15193: bhadrakāro bhadravindaḥ kanyā bhadravatī tathā // HV_98.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:15195: satyajit senajic caiva tathā śūraḥ sapatnajit // HV_98.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15197: kumāro vṛkadīptiś ca lakṣmaṇāyāḥ prajāḥ śṛṇu // HV_98.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15198: gātravān gātraguptaś ca gātravindaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:15199: jajñire gātravanty ete bhaginyānujayā saha // HV_98.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:15200: aśrutaś ca suto jajñe kālindyāḥ śrutasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15202: taṃ pradāya hṛṣīkeśas tāṃ bhāryāṃ mudito 'bravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:15203: eṣa vām ubhayor astu dāyādaḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ // HV_98.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15204: bṛhatyāṃ tu gadasyāhuḥ śaibyāyām aṅgadaṃ sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:15205: utpannaṃ kumudaṃ caiva śvetaṃ śvetāṃ tathāṅganām // HV_98.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15206: agāvahaḥ sumitraś ca śuciś citrarathas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:15207: citrasenaḥ sute cāsya citrā citravatī tathā // HV_98.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:15208: vanustambasya jajñāte stambaḥ stambavanaś ca ha /
GE07hv_conpu:15209: [k: Ñ3 V B Dn D5.6 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15211: upāsaṅgasya tu sutau vajraḥ sukṣipra eva ca // HV_98.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15213: kāpālī garuḍaś caiva jajñāte citrayodhinau // HV_98.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:15214: [k: K1.3 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15216: ayutaṃ tu samākhyātaṃ vāsudevasya te sutāḥ || *HV_98.18*1105:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15219: pradyumnasya suto yas tu vaidarbhyāṃ rājasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15220: aniruddho raṇe yoddhā jajñe sa mṛgaketanaḥ // HV_98.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:15223: sutanuś ca narācī ca śaurer āstāṃ parigrahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15224: pauṇḍraś ca kapilaś caiva vāsudevasya tau sutau // HV_98.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15225: narācyāṃ kapilo jajñe pauṇḍraś ca sutanoḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15226: tayor nṛpo 'bhavat pauṇḍraḥ kapilaś ca vanaṃ yayau // HV_98.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15228: samādhisthaḥ sa bhūteṣu dayāṃ kurvan mahāmatiḥ | *HV_98.22*1106:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15231: jarā nāma niṣādānāṃ prabhuḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām // HV_98.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15232: kāśyā supārśvaṃ tanayaṃ lebhe sāmbāt tarasvinam /
GE07hv_conpu:15236: sānor vajro 'niruddhasya vajras tv ādāv ajāyata // HV_98.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:15237: vajrāj jajñe prativahaḥ sucārus tasya cātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15238: anamitrāc chinir jajñe kaniṣṭhād vṛṣṇinandanāt // HV_98.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15239: śines tu satyavāg jajñe satyakaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15240: satyakasyātmajaḥ śūro yuyudhānas tv ajāyata // HV_98.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15242: bhūmer yugaṃdharaḥ putra iti vaṃśaḥ samāpyate // HV_98.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15244: chapter 99, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by André Couture, version of June 29 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:15246: ya eṣa bhavatā pūrvaṃ śambaraghnety udāhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15247: pradyumnaḥ sa kathaṃ jaghne śambaraṃ tad bravīhi me // HV_99.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15254: jahāra kṛṣṇasya sutaṃ śiśuṃ vai kālaśambaraḥ // HV_99.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:15256: tato na nigṛhītaḥ sa dānavo yuddhadurmadaḥ // HV_99.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15258: dorbhyām utkṣipya nagaraṃ svaṃ jagāma mahāsuraḥ // HV_99.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15260: nāmnā māyāvatī nāma māyeva śubhadarśana // HV_99.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15261: dadau taṃ vāsudevasya putraṃ putram ivātmajam /
GE07hv_conpu:15262: tasyā mahiṣyā nāthinyā dānavaḥ kālacoditaḥ // HV_99.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15263: [k: All Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15265: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktā punaḥ punar udaikṣata || *HV_99.7*1109:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15266: atha tasyā nirīkṣantyāḥ smṛtiḥ prādurbabhūva ha | *HV_99.7*1109:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15267: ayaṃ sa mama kānto 'bhūt smṛtvaivaṃ cānvacintayat || *HV_99.7*1109:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15268: ayaṃ sa nātho bhartā me yasyārthaṃ hi divāniśam | *HV_99.7*1109:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:15269: cintāśokahrade magnā na vindāmi ratiṃ kvacit || *HV_99.7*1109:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:15272: katham asya stanaṃ dāsye mātṛbhāvena jānatī | *HV_99.7*1109:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15273: bhartur bhāryā tv ahaṃ bhūtvā vakṣye vā putra ity uta || *HV_99.7*1109:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:15274: evaṃ saṃcintya manasā dhātryās taṃ sā samarpayat | *HV_99.7*1109:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:15276: dhātryāḥ sakāśāt sa ca tāṃ śṛṇvan rukmiṇinandanaḥ | *HV_99.7*1109:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:15277: māyāvatīm avijñānān mene svām eva mātaram | *HV_99.7*1109:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:15278: sā taṃ saṃvardhayām āsa kārṣṇiṃ kamalalocanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15279: māyāś cāsmai dadau sarvā dānavīḥ kāmamohitā // HV_99.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15280: sa yadā yauvanasthas tu pradyumnaḥ kāmadarśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15282: taṃ sā māyāvatī kāntaṃ kāmayām āsa kāminī /
GE07hv_conpu:15283: iṅgitaiś cāpi vīkṣantī prālobhayata sasmitā // HV_99.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15284: prasajjantīṃ tu tāṃ devīṃ babhāṣe cāruhāsinīm /
GE07hv_conpu:15285: mātṛbhāvaṃ parityajya kim evaṃ vartase 'nyathā // HV_99.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15287: yā putrabhāvam utsṛjya mayi kāmāt pravartase // HV_99.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:15288: nanu te 'haṃ sutaḥ saumye ko 'yaṃ śīlavyatikramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15289: tat tvam icchāmy ahaṃ devi kathitaṃ kas tv ayaṃ vidhiḥ // HV_99.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:15291: yā nareṣu prasajjante nagāgreṣu ghanā iva // HV_99.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15292: yadi te 'haṃ sutaḥ saumye yadi vā nātmajaḥ śubhe /
GE07hv_conpu:15293: kathitaṃ tat tvam icchāmi kim idaṃ te cikīrṣitam // HV_99.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15294: evam uktā tu sā bhīruḥ kāmena vyathitendriyā /
GE07hv_conpu:15295: priyaṃ provāca vacanaṃ vivikte keśavātmajam // HV_99.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:15296: na tvaṃ mama sutaḥ saumya nāpi te śambaraḥ pitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15297: rūpavān asi vikrāntas tvaṃ jātyā vṛṣṇinandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15298: putras tvaṃ vāsudevasya rukmiṇyā nandivardhanaḥ // HV_99.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15302: pitus te vāsudevasya dharṣayitvā gṛhaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:15303: pākaśāsanakalpasya hṛtas tvaṃ śambareṇa ha // HV_99.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:15304: sā ca te karuṇaṃ mātā tvāṃ bālam anuśocatī /
GE07hv_conpu:15305: atyarthaṃ śrāmyate vīra vivatsā saurabhī yathā // HV_99.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:15306: sa hi śakrād api mahān pitā te garuḍadhvajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15307: iha tvāṃ nābhijānāti bālam evāpavāhitam // HV_99.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15308: kānta vṛṣṇikumāras tvaṃ na hi tvaṃ śambarātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15309: vīra naivaṃvidhān putrān dānavā janayanti hi // HV_99.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15310: tato 'haṃ kāmayāmi tvāṃ na hi tvaṃ janito mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:15311: rūpaṃ te saumya paśyantī sīdāmi hṛdi durbalā // HV_99.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15312: yan me vyavasitaṃ kānta yac ca me hṛdi vartate /
GE07hv_conpu:15313: tanme manasi vārṣṇeya pratisaṃdhātum arhasi // HV_99.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:15314: eṣa te kathitaḥ saumya sadbhāvas tvayi yo mama /
GE07hv_conpu:15315: yathā na mama putras tvaṃ na putraḥ śambarasya ca // HV_99.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15317: kāmadevaś ca vīra tvaṃ ratiṃ māṃ viddhi vai prabho | *HV_99.25*1110:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15318: śaṃkarasya ca śāpena tvam anaṅgagatiḥ purā || *HV_99.25*1110:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15319: tat kālamāyayā rūpaṃ kṛtvā daityasya veśmani | *HV_99.25*1110:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15320: viśīrṇā sāham uṣitā daityasyāsya ca veśmani | *HV_99.25*1110:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15322: cakrāyudhātmajaḥ kruddhaḥ śambaraṃ sa samāhvayat // HV_99.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15324: aṣṭamyāṃ nihato yuddhe māyayā kālaśambaraḥ // HV_99.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15326: gṛhya māyāvatīṃ devīṃ svām agacchat purīṃ pituḥ // HV_99.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:15328: ājagāma purīṃ ramyāṃ rakṣitāṃ tejasā pituḥ // HV_99.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:15330: māyāvatyā saha tayā rūpavān iva manmathaḥ // HV_99.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:15332: vismitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhīrāś caivābhavaṃs tadā // HV_99.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:15333: tatas taṃ kāmasaṃkāśaṃ kāntayā saha saṃgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:15335: taṃ vrīḍitamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sajjamānaṃ pade pade /
GE07hv_conpu:15337: rukmiṇī tv eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā śokārtā putragṛddhinī /
GE07hv_conpu:15339: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.3.5(marg.).6 T1.2.4 G M4 ins. (K1 D4 after 40): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15340: yādṛk svapno mayā dṛṣṭo niśāyā yauvane gate | *HV_99.34*1111:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15346: tayā punar ahaṃ gṛhya snāpitā rucirāmbunā || *HV_99.34*1111:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15348: mama mūrdhany upāghrāya dattā srak sā tayā mama || *HV_99.34*1111:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15350: sakhījanavṛtā devī kumāraṃ vīkṣya taṃ muhuḥ | *HV_99.34*1111:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:15352: ity ato 'nantaraṃ tatra abravīd vākyam eva tat | *HV_99.34*1112 |
GE07hv_conpu:15353: dhanyāyāḥ khalv ayaṃ putro dīrghāyuḥ priyadarśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15354: idṛśaḥ kāmasaṃkāśo yauvane prathame sthitaḥ // HV_99.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:15355: jīvaputrā tvayā putra kā sā bhāgyavibhūṣitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15356: kim arthaṃ cāmbudaśyāma sabhāryas tvam ihāgataḥ // HV_99.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:15357: asmin vayasi suvyaktaṃ pradyumno mama putrakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15358: bhaved yadi na nītaḥ syāt kṛtāntena balīyasā // HV_99.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:15359: vyaktaṃ vṛṣṇikumāro 'yaṃ na mithyā mama tarkitam /
GE07hv_conpu:15360: vijñāto 'si mayā cihnair vinā cakraṃ janārdanaḥ // HV_99.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:15361: mukhaṃ nārāyaṇasyeva keśāḥ keśānta eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:15362: mūrdhavakṣobhujais tulyo halinaḥ śvaśurasya me // HV_99.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:15363: kas tvaṃ vṛṣṇikulaṃ sarvaṃ vapuṣā dyotayan sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15364: aho janārdanasyāsya divyā tvam aparā tanuḥ // HV_99.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:15365: etasminn antare kṛṣṇaḥ sahasā praviveśa ha /
GE07hv_conpu:15366: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā śambarasya vadhaṃ prati // HV_99.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:15367: so 'paśyat taṃ sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ siddhaṃ manmathalakṣaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15368: snuṣāṃ māyāvatīṃ caiva hṛṣṭacetā janārdanaḥ // HV_99.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:15369: so 'bravīt sahasā devīṃ rukmiṇīṃ devatām iva /
GE07hv_conpu:15370: ayaṃ te devi saṃprāptaḥ putraś cāpadharaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_99.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:15372: hatā māyāś ca tāḥ sarvā yābhir devān abādhata // HV_99.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:15373: satī ceyaṃ śubhā sādhvī bhāryā vai tanayasya te /
GE07hv_conpu:15375: mā ca te śambarasyeyaṃ patnīty evaṃ vyathā bhavet // HV_99.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:15376: manmathe tu gate nāśaṃ gate cānaṅgatāṃ purā /
GE07hv_conpu:15379: kāmapatnī hi kanyaiṣā kāmakāmā ratiḥ śubhā /
GE07hv_conpu:15380: māyārūpeṇa taṃ daityaṃ mohayaty asakṛc chubhā // HV_99.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:15381: na caiṣā tasya kaumāre vaśe tiṣṭhati śobhanā /
GE07hv_conpu:15382: atmamāyāmayaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā śambaram āviśat // HV_99.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:15383: patny eṣā mama putrasya snuṣā tava varāṅganā /
GE07hv_conpu:15385: praveśayaināṃ bhavanaṃ pūjyā hy eṣā snuṣā mama /
GE07hv_conpu:15386: cirapranaṣṭaṃ ca sutaṃ bhajasya punarāgatam // HV_99.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:15387: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-3.5(marg.).6 T2.4 G M4 ins. (T1 after 49a): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15389: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ devī kṛṣṇenodāhṛtaṃ tadā | *HV_99.49*1114:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15390: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe rukmiṇī vākyam abravīt || *HV_99.49*1114:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15392: adya me saphalaḥ kāmaḥ pūrṇaś cādya manorathaḥ | *HV_99.49*1114:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15394: āgaccha putra bhavanaṃ viśasva saha bhāryayā || *HV_99.49*1114:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:15395: tato 'bhivādya caraṇau govindaṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ | *HV_99.49*1114:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15396: pradyumnaḥ pūjayām āsa halinaṃ ca mahābalam || *HV_99.49*1114:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:15397: utthāpya taṃ pariṣvajya mūrdhny upāghrāya vīryavān | *HV_99.49*1114:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15399: snuṣāṃ cotthāpya tāṃ devīṃ rukmiṇī rukmabhūṣaṇāṃ | *HV_99.49*1114:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:15401: sametaṃ bhavanaṃ patnyā śacyendram aditir yathā | *HV_99.49*1114:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:15402: praveśayām āsa tadā rukmiṇī sutam āgatam | *HV_99.49*1114:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:15404: evam uktā tu kṛṣṇena rukmiṇī yoṣitāṃ varā | *HV_99.49*1115:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15405: putraṃ prītyā pariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya tāṃ snuṣām | *HV_99.49*1115:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15406: gṛhaṃ praveśayām āsa snuṣayā saha bhāminī | *HV_99.49*1115:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15408: chapter 100, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by André Couture, version of July 7 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:15411: tam eva māsaṃ sāmbas tu jāmbavatyām ajāyata // HV_100.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15413: rāmād anantaraṃ caiva mānitaḥ sarvavṛṣṇibhiḥ // HV_100.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:15415: rāmasyaiva priyasutaḥ so 'bhavaj jyeṣṭha ity api | *HV_100.2*1116 |
GE07hv_conpu:15416: jātamātre tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śubhaṃ tat puram āviśat /
GE07hv_conpu:15418: yādavīṃ ca śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāṃ śriyaṃ dveṣṭi vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15419: janārdanabhayāc caiva na śāntiṃ lebhire nṛpāḥ // HV_100.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15420: kasyacit tv atha kālasya pure vāraṇasāhvaye /
GE07hv_conpu:15421: duryodhanasya yajñe vai sameyuḥ sarvapārthivāḥ // HV_100.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15422: tāṃ śrutvā mādhavīṃ lakṣmīṃ saputraṃ ca janārdanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15423: purīṃ dvārāvatīṃ caiva niviṣṭāṃ sāgarāntare // HV_100.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15425: śriyaṃ draṣṭuṃ hṛṣīkeśam ājagmuḥ kṛṣṇamandiram // HV_100.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15429: akṣauhiṇīḥ prakarṣanto daśa cāṣṭau ca bhūmipāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15432: viviśur yojanāḍhyāsu svāsu svāsv avanīṣv atha // HV_100.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15436: śārṅgaṃ ca dhanur ādāya kiṃ syād iti vicintayan | *HV_100.10*1117:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15442: kṛtvā siṃhāsane kṛṣṇaḥ kāñcane niṣasāda ha // HV_100.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:15444: siṃhāsaneṣu citreṣu pīṭheṣu ca janādhipāḥ // HV_100.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15446: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca sadane brahmaṇo yathā // HV_100.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15448: idaṃ provāca bhagavān kṣatriyān draṣṭum āgatān | *HV_100.15*1118:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15450: yad asmākaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭhās tulyaṃ tad bhavatāṃ sadā | *HV_100.15*1118:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15451: gṛhyatāṃ vasu yad divyaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nṛpasattamāḥ || *HV_100.15*1118:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15453: teṣāṃ citrāḥ kathās tatra pravṛttās tatsamāgame /
GE07hv_conpu:15456: taṃ dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ prahṛṣṭāḥ kṣatriyās tadā | *HV_100.16*1119 |
GE07hv_conpu:15458: tumulaṃ durdinaṃ cāsīt savidyut stanayitnumat // HV_100.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15462: gāyann eva harīṃ sāmnā vasantaṃ yadusaṃsadi | *HV_100.16*1120 |
GE07hv_conpu:15468: āsanasthaṃ yaduśreṣṭam uvāca munir avyayaḥ // HV_100.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15469: āścaryaṃ khalu devānām ekas tvaṃ puruṣottama /
GE07hv_conpu:15470: dhanyaś cāsi mahābāho loke nānyo 'sti kaś cana // HV_100.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15471: evam uktaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā pratyuvāca muniṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15472: āścaryaś caiva dhanyaś ca dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety aham // HV_100.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15473: evam ukto muniśreṣṭhaḥ prāha madhye mahīkṣitām /
GE07hv_conpu:15475: taṃ prasthitam abhiprekṣya pārthivāḥ prāhur īśvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:15476: guhyaṃ mantram ajānanto vacanaṃ nāraderitam // HV_100.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15477: āścarya ity abhihito dhanyo 'sīti ca mādhava /
GE07hv_conpu:15478: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ pratyukte 'pi ca nārade // HV_100.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15479: kim etan nābhijānīmo divyaṃ mantrapadaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:15480: yadi śrāvyam idaṃ kṛṣṇa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_100.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15481: tān uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sarvān pārthivapuṃgavān /
GE07hv_conpu:15482: śrotavyaṃ nāradas tv eṣa dvijo vaḥ kathayiṣyati // HV_100.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:15484: yat tvayābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ mayā ca pratibhāṣitam // HV_100.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:15485: sa pīṭhe kāñcane śubhre sūpaviṣṭaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15486: prabhavaṃ tasya vākyasya pravaktum upacakrame // HV_100.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:15487: śruyatāṃ bho nṛpaśreṣṭhā yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15488: asya praśnasya mahato yathā pāram ahaṃ gataḥ // HV_100.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:15490: carāmy ekaḥ kṣapāpāye saṃdṛśyati divākare // HV_100.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:15495: so 'haṃ taṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā proktavāñ jalacāriṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:15496: tvam āścaryaśarīro 'si kūrma dhanyaś ca me mataḥ // HV_100.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:15497: yas tvam evam abhedyābhyāṃ kapālābhyāṃ samāvṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15498: toye carasi niḥśaṅkaḥ kiṃ cid apy avicintayan // HV_100.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:15499: sa mām uvācāmbucaraḥ kūrmo mānuṣavat svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:15500: kim āścaryaṃ mayi mune dhanyaś cāhaṃ kathaṃ vibho // HV_100.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:15501: gaṅgeyaṃ nimnagā dhanyā kim āścaryam ataḥ param /
GE07hv_conpu:15502: yatrāham iva sattvāni caranty ayutaśo jale // HV_100.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:15504: dhanyāsi tvaṃ nadīśreṣṭhe nityam āścaryadarśane // HV_100.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:15505: yā tvam evaṃ mahādehaiḥ śvāpadair upaśobhitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15506: hradinī sāgaraṃ yāsi rakṣantī tāpasālayān // HV_100.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:15507: evam uktā tato gaṅgā rūpiṇī pratyabhāṣata /
GE07hv_conpu:15508: nāradaṃ devagandharvaṃ śakrasya dayitaṃ dvijam // HV_100.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:15510: tava satye niviṣṭasya vākyaṃ māṃ pratibādhate // HV_100.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:15512: yatrāham iva vistīrṇāḥ śataśo yānti nimnagāḥ // HV_100.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:15514: āścaryaḥ khalu lokānāṃ dhanyaś cāsi mahārṇava /
GE07hv_conpu:15515: tena khalv asi yonis tvam ambhasāṃ salileśvaraḥ // HV_100.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:15518: samudras tv evam uktas tu tato mām abravīd vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15519: svaṃ jalaughatalaṃ bhittvā vyutthitaḥ pavaneritaḥ // HV_100.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:15520: mā maivaṃ devagandharva nāsmy āś caryo dvijottama /
GE07hv_conpu:15521: vasudheyaṃ mune dhanyā yatrāham upari sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15522: ṛte tu pṛthivīṃ loke kim āścaryam ataḥ param // HV_100.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:15524: kautūhalasam āviṣṭo hy abruvaṃ jagato gatim // HV_100.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:15525: dharitri dehināṃ yonir dhanyā khalv asi śobhane /
GE07hv_conpu:15526: āścaryā cāsi bhūteṣu mahatyā kṣamayā yute // HV_100.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:15527: tena khalv asi lokānāṃ dharaṇī manujāraṇiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15528: kṣamā tvattaḥ prasūtā ca karma cāmbaragāminām // HV_100.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:15529: tato bhūḥ stutivākyena sā mayoktena lajjitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15530: vihāya sahajaṃ dhairyam atha māṃ pratyabhāṣata // HV_100.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:15532: nāsmi dhanyā na cāścaryā pārakyeyaṃ dhṛtir mama // HV_100.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:15533: ete dhanyā dvijaśrestha parvatā dhārayanti mām /
GE07hv_conpu:15534: eṣv āścaryāṇi dṛśyante ete lokasya setavaḥ // HV_100.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:15536: dhanyā bhanto dṛśyante bahvāścaryāś ca bhūdharāḥ // HV_100.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:15538: tena ratnākarāḥ sarve bhavanto bhuvi śāśvatāḥ // HV_100.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:15539: mama tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā parvatās tasthuṣāṃ varāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15540: ūcur māṃ sāntvayuktāni vacāṃsi vanaśobhitāḥ // HV_100.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:15541: brahmarṣe na vayaṃ dhanyā nāpy āścaryāṇi santi naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15544: nāś caryo vāpi dhanyo vā tasmāt parataro bhuvi || *HV_100.57ab*1121:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15545: vihāya taṃ mahādevaṃ nāsmān stotum ihārhasi || *HV_100.57ab*1121:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15546: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kailāsam aham āgataḥ | *HV_100.57ab*1121:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15547: dṛṣṭvā taṃ pārvatīśānam abruvaṃ vacanaṃ tadā || *HV_100.57ab*1121:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:15549: āścaryo 'si bhavān eko dhanyas tvaṃ jagatīpate | *HV_100.57ab*1121:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15550: tvattaḥ parataro nāsti devo jagati kaś cana || *HV_100.57ab*1121:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:15551: yad idaṃ dṛśyate deva bhuvanaṃ sacarācaram | *HV_100.57ab*1121:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15553: atha mām abravīd devo virūpākṣas trilocanaḥ | *HV_100.57ab*1121:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:15554: nāhaṃ dhanyo na cāścaryo naivaṃ māṃ vaktum arhasi | *HV_100.57ab*1121:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:15555: mattaḥ parataro jñeyo jagat sraṣṭā dvijottama | *HV_100.57ab*1121:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:15556: brahmā prajāpatir dhanyaḥ sa cāścaryaḥ sureṣv api // HV_100.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:15558: tasya vākyasya paryāyaṃ paryāptam iva lakṣaye // HV_100.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:15562: āścaryo bhagavān eko dhanyaś ca jagato guruḥ // HV_100.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:15563: na kiṃ cid anyat paśyāmi bhūtaṃ yad bhavatā samam /
GE07hv_conpu:15564: tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ jātaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam // HV_100.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:15566: bhavanti sarvadeveśa dṛśyaṃ sarvam idaṃ vapuḥ // HV_100.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:15567: tena khalv asi devānāṃ devadevaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15568: teṣāmevāsi yat sraṣṭā lokānām api saṃbhavaḥ // HV_100.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:15569: tato mām āha bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15570: dhanyāścaryāśritair vākyaiḥ kiṃ māṃ nārada bhāṣase // HV_100.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:15571: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ devā dhanyā devāś ca nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:15572: ye lokān dhārayanti sma devās tattvārthadarśinaḥ // HV_100.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:15573: ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ satyam atharvaṇi ca yan matam /
GE07hv_conpu:15574: tanmayaṃ viddhi māṃ vipra dhṛto 'haṃ tair mayā ca te // HV_100.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:15579: dhanyā bhavantaḥ puṇyāś ca nityam āścaryaviśrutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15580: ādhārāś caiva viprāṇām evam āha prajāpatiḥ // HV_100.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:15582: yuṣmat parataraṃ nāsti śrutyā vā tapasāpi vā // HV_100.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:15583: pratūcus te tato vākyaṃ devā mām abhitaḥ sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15584: āścaryāś caiva dhanyāś ca yajñāś cātmaparāyaṇāḥ // HV_100.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:15585: yajñārthe tu vayaṃ sṛṣṭāḥ sṛṣṭā yena sma nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:15586: tad asmākaṃ parā yajñā na vayaṃ svavaśe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15587: svayaṃbhuvo 'pīha parā vedānāṃ ca parā gatiḥ // HV_100.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:15589: bho yajñāḥ paramaṃ tejo yuṣmāsu khalu lakṣyate /
GE07hv_conpu:15590: brahmaṇābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ yan me vedair iheritam // HV_100.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:15592: dhanyāḥ khalu bhavanto ye dvijātīnāṃ svavaṃśinaḥ // HV_100.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:15593: tena khalv agnayas tṛptiṃ puṣmābhir yānti tarpitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15594: bhāgaiś ca tridaśāḥ sarve mantraiś caiva maharṣayaḥ // HV_100.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:15596: pratyūcur māṃ paraṃ vākyaṃ sarve yūpadhvajāḥ sthitāḥ // HV_100.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:15598: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇuḥ sa hy asmākaṃ parā gatiḥ // HV_100.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:15599: yad ājyaṃ vayam aśnīmo hutam agniṣu pāvanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15600: tat sarvaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo lokamūrtiḥ prayacchati // HV_100.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:15604: so 'haṃ viṣṇor gatiṃ prepsur iha saṃpatito bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:15605: dṛṣṭaś cāyaṃ mayā viṣṇur bhavadbhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ // HV_100.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:15606: yan mayābhihito hy eṣa tvam āścaryaṃ janārdana /
GE07hv_conpu:15607: dhanyaś cāsīti bhavatāṃ madhyastho hy atra pārthivāḥ // HV_100.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:15609: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ paryāptaṃ vacanaṃ mama // HV_100.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:15610: yajñānāṃ hi gatir viṣṇuḥ sarveṣāṃ sahadakṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15611: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ praśno mama samāptavān // HV_100.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:15613: sadakṣiṇe 'smin puruṣe tad vākyaṃ paryayāgatam // HV_100.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:15614: yan māṃ bhavantaḥ pṛcchanti vākyasyāsya vinirṇayam /
GE07hv_conpu:15615: tad etat sarvam ākhyātaṃ sādhayāmi yathāgatam // HV_100.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:15619: na ca nārāyaṇād anyat triṣu lokeṣu vidyate | *HV_100.85*1123:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15624: ity evam uktvā sa divaṃ jagāma ha | *HV_100.85*1123:8 |*
GE07hv_conpu:15625: nārade tu gate svargaṃ sarve te pṛthivīkṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15626: vismitāḥ svāni rāṣṭrāṇi jagmuḥ sabalavāhanāḥ // HV_100.86 //
GE07hv_conpu:15627: [k: T1.2.4 G1.3.5 M (G4 cont. after *1123) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15631: dhanyo 'yaṃ nārado yasmād dṛṣṭaḥ sākṣād dhariḥ svayam || *HV_100.86*1124:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15634: ko nāma viṣṇur ity evam anye mūḍhā narādhamāḥ | *HV_100.86*1124:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15636: iti tattvena vijñāya nṛpā nārāyaṇaṃ param | *HV_100.86*1124:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15637: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ | *HV_100.86*1124:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:15639: svam eva bhavanaṃ vīro viveśa yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_100.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:15641: chapter 101, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by André Couture, version of July 13 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:15646: jātā hi vayam adyaiva tatkathāśravaṇād dvija | *HV_101.1*1125:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15648: ity uktaḥ sa smitaṃ kṛtvā praṇamya munipuṃgavam | *HV_101.1*1125A |
GE07hv_conpu:15649: māhātmyaṃ śrotum icchāmi paramaṃ dvijasattama // HV_101.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15650: na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvatas tasya dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15653: nāntaḥ śakyaṃ prabhāvasya vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api /
GE07hv_conpu:15654: govindasya mahārāja śrūyatām idam uttamam // HV_101.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:15656: gāṇḍīvadhanvā bībhatsur māhātmyaṃ keśavasya yat // HV_101.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15657: rājñāṃ madhye mahārāja jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:15658: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ jitāmitram iti tac chṛṇu kaurava // HV_101.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15665: kṛṣṇaṃ vijñāpayām āsa paritrāhīti cābravīt // HV_101.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15668: caturthāṃśaṃ hi dharmasya rakṣitā labhate phalam // HV_101.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:15670: na bhetavyaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha rakṣāmi tvāṃ kuto 'nagha /
GE07hv_conpu:15671: brūhi tattvena bhadraṃ te yady api syāt suduṣkaram // HV_101.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15673: jāto jāto mahābāho putro me hriyate vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:15674: trayo hṛtāś caturthaṃ tvaṃ kṛṣṇa rakṣitum arhasi // HV_101.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15676: yathā dhriyed apatyaṃ me tathā kuru janārdana // HV_101.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:15678: tato mām āha govindo dīkṣito 'smi kratāv iti /
GE07hv_conpu:15679: rakṣā ca brāhmaṇe kāryā sarvāvasthāgatair api // HV_101.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:15681: māṃ niyojaya govinda rakṣiṣyāmi dvijaṃ bhayāt // HV_101.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15682: ity uktaḥ sa smitaṃ kṛtvā mām uvāca janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15683: rakṣyasīty evam uktas tu vrīḍito 'smi narādhipa // HV_101.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15684: tato māṃ vrīḍitaṃ jñātvā punar āha janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15685: gamyatāṃ kauravaśreṣṭha śakyate yadi rakṣitum // HV_101.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:15687: ṛte rāmaṃ mahābāhuḥ pradyumnaṃ ca mahābalam // HV_101.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15689: tam agrato dvijaṃ kṛtvā prayātaḥ saha senayā // HV_101.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:15691: chapter 102, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by André Couture, version of July 13 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:15693: sumuhūrtena tu vayaṃ taṃ grāmaṃ prāpya bhārata /
GE07hv_conpu:15697: tataḥ śakunayo dīptā mṛgāś ca krūrabhāṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15698: dīptāyāṃ diśi vāśanto bhayam āvedayanti me // HV_102.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:15700: papāta mahatī colkā pṛthivī cāpy akampata // HV_102.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15704: sarve yuktarathāḥ sajjāḥ svayaṃ cāhaṃ tathābhavam // HV_102.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15706: upāgamya bhayād asmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_102.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15708: yattā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu na bhaved vañcanā yathā // HV_102.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15710: tasya viprasya bhavane hriyate hriyate iti // HV_102.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:15711: athākāśe punar vācam aśrauṣaṃ bālakasya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:15712: hāheti hriyamāṇasya na ca paśyāmi rākṣasam // HV_102.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15714: viṣṭambhitā diśaḥ sarvā hṛta eva sa bālakaḥ // HV_102.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15716: vācaḥ sa paruṣās tīvrāḥ śrāvayām āsa māṃ tadā // HV_102.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:15718: mām eva hi viśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇaḥ paryabhāṣata // HV_102.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:15719: rakṣiṣyāmīti coktaṃ te na ca rakṣasi me sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:15720: śṛṇu vākyam idaṃ śeṣaṃ yat tvam arhasi durmate // HV_102.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15722: yadi syād iha govindo naitad atyāhitaṃ bhavet // HV_102.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15723: yathā caturthaṃ dharmasya rakṣitā labhate phalam /
GE07hv_conpu:15724: pāpasyāpi tathā mūḍha bhāgaṃ prāpnoty arakṣitā // HV_102.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:15725: rakṣiṣyāmīti coktaṃ te na ca śaknoṣi rakṣitum /
GE07hv_conpu:15726: moghaṃ gāṇḍīvam etat te moghaṃ vīryaṃ yaśaś ca te // HV_102.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15728: arjuno 'smīti yā buddhiḥ sā vṛthā satyam ity uta | *HV_102.17a*1126 |
GE07hv_conpu:15729: akiṃcid uktvā taṃ vipraṃ tato 'haṃ prasthitas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:15730: saha vṛṣṇyandhakasutair yatra kṛṣṇo mahādyutiḥ // HV_102.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:15733: sa tu māṃ vrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā samāśvasya ca mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15734: [k: After 20a, K1 (marg. sec. m.) D1.2.5 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15736: mauḍhyaṃ paśyata me yo 'haṃ śraddadhe klībakatthanam || *HV_102.20a*1127:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15737: na pradyumno nāniruddho na rāmo na ca keśavaḥ | *HV_102.20a*1127:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15739: dhig arjunaṃ vṛthāvādaṃ dhig ātmaślāghino dhanuḥ || *HV_102.20a*1127:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:15740: daivopasṛṣṭo yo maurkhyād āgacchati ca durmatiḥ || *HV_102.20a*1127:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:15741: evaṃ śapati viprarṣau vidyām āsthāya vaiṣṇavīm | *HV_102.20a*1127:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15742: yayau saṃyaminīṃ vīro yatrāste bhagavān yamaḥ || *HV_102.20a*1127:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:15743: viprāpatyam acakṣāṇas tata aindrīm agāt purīm | *HV_102.20a*1127:9 |

GE07hv_conpu:16014: yathā bāṇasya tad yuddhaṃ jīvan mukto yathā ca saḥ | *HV_106.6*1148:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16015: yathā ca devadevasya putratvaṃ so 'suro gataḥ | *HV_106.6*1148:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16016: yadarthaṃ ca mahad yuddhaṃ tat sarvam akhilaṃ śṛṇu || *HV_106.6*1148:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16019: tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā tapaś cartuṃ sudāruṇam | *HV_106.6*1148:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16022: devaś ca paramaṃ toṣaṃ jagāma ca sahomayā || *HV_106.6*1148:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16023: nīlakaṇṭhaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ gatvā cāsuram abravīt | *HV_106.6*1148:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:16024: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yat te manasi vartate || *HV_106.6*1148:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:16026: devyāḥ putratvam icchāmi tvayā dattaṃ trilocana || *HV_106.6*1148:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:16027: śaṃkaraś ca tathety uktvā rudrāṇīm idam abravīt | *HV_106.6*1148:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:16030: tatroddeśe puraṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || *HV_106.6*1148:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:16033: tataḥ sa nivasan bāṇaḥ pure śoṇitasāhvaye | *HV_106.6*1148:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:16037: dhvajaṃ cāsya dadau prītaḥ kumāro hy agnitejasam | *HV_106.6*1148:24 |
GE07hv_conpu:16039: na devā na ca gandharvā na yakṣā na ca pannagāḥ | *HV_106.6*1148:26 |
GE07hv_conpu:16043: [k: After line 8 of *1148, D6 T1.2 G M Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16047: tuṣṭāva devam īśānaṃ vareṣyaṃ varadaṃ śivam || *HV_106.6*1148A:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16049: namas te bhasmadigdhāṅga śūline te namo namaḥ | *HV_106.6*1148A:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16053: namas tuṇḍāya devāya nagnāya vikaṭāya ca | *HV_106.6*1148A:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16056: namo ghorāya ghorāya ghoraghorāya te namaḥ || *HV_106.6*1148A:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:16066: [k: After line 13 of *1148, Ñ2 Ds2 M2.3 (first time) repeat 6cd. While Ds1 (marg.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16067: dehi bāhusahasraṃ me devebhyaś cāpy avadhyatām | *HV_106.6*1148B |
GE07hv_conpu:16069: balisūnur idaṃ vākyaṃ papraccha vṛṣabhadhvajam // HV_106.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:16072: [k: K1.4 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B D (except D6) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16073: imaṃ deśaṃ samāgamya vasanti sma pure sukham | *HV_106.8*1149 |
GE07hv_conpu:16076: so 'haṃ nirāśo yuddhasya jīvitaṃ nādya kāmaye /
GE07hv_conpu:16077: ayudhyato vṛthā hy eṣāṃ bāhūnāṃ dhāraṇaṃ mama // HV_106.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:16078: tad brūhi mama yuddhasya kaccid āgamanaṃ bhavet /
GE07hv_conpu:16079: na me yuddhaṃ vinā deva ratir asti prasīda me // HV_106.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:16081: bhavitā bāṇa yuddhaṃ te tathā tac chṛṇu dānava // HV_106.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:16082: dhvajasyāsya yadā bhaṅgas tava tāta bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:16083: svasthāne sthāpitasyātha tadā yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_106.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:16084: ity evam uktaḥ prahasan bāṇaḥ subahuśo mudā /
GE07hv_conpu:16086: diṣṭyā bāhusahasrasya na vṛthā dhāraṇaṃ mama /
GE07hv_conpu:16087: diṣṭā sahasrākṣam ahaṃ vijetā punar āhave // HV_106.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:16089: pañcāñjaliśatair devaṃ pūjayan patito bhuvi // HV_106.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:16092: sadṛśaṃ prātsyase vīre yuddham apratimaṃ raṇe // HV_106.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:16093: evam uktas tato bāṇas tryambakena mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:16094: harṣeṇābhyutthitaḥ śīghraṃ natvā sa vṛṣabhadhvajam // HV_106.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:16096: yayau svabhavanaṃ yena yatra dhvajagṛhaṃ mahat // HV_106.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:16100: yenāham iha saṃprāptaḥ kumbhāṇḍa śṛṇu me vacaḥ | *HV_106.20*1150 |
GE07hv_conpu:16101: ity evam uktaḥ prahasan bāṇam apratimaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:16102: provāca rājan kiṃ tv etad vaktukāmo 'si matpriyam /
GE07hv_conpu:16103: vismayot phullanayanaḥ praharṣād iva sattama // HV_106.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:16105: tvattas tac chrotum icchāmi varaṃ kiṃ labdhavān asi | *HV_106.21*1151 |
GE07hv_conpu:16106: [k: Ñ V B2 Ds2 D2.6 T4 G5 cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16108: īpsitaṃ kiṃ tvayā prāptaṃ tan me brūhi mahāsura | *HV_106.21*1152:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16110: kaccin trailokyarājyaṃ te vyādiṣṭaṃ śṛlapāṇinā // HV_106.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:16111: kaccid indras tava bhayāt pātālam upayāsyati /
GE07hv_conpu:16112: kaccid viṣṇuparitrāsaṃ vimokṣyanti diteḥ sutāḥ // HV_106.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:16115: na viṣṇor bhayasaṃtrāsāt prayāsyanti diśo 'surāḥ // HV_106.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:16118: balir viṣṇubalākrānto baddhas tava pitā nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:16119: salilaughād viniḥsṛtya kaccid rājyam avāpsyati // HV_106.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:16121: kaccid vairocaniṃ tāta drakṣyāmaḥ pitaraṃ tava // HV_106.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:16122: kaccintrabhiḥ kramaiḥ pūrvaṃ hṛtāṃl lokān imān prabho /
GE07hv_conpu:16123: punaḥ pratyānayiṣyāmo jitvā sarvān divaukasaḥ // HV_106.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:16125: kaccin nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ jeṣyāmaḥ samitiṃjayam // HV_106.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:16127: yathā te hṛdayotkampaḥ sāśrubinduḥ pravartate // HV_106.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:16129: prāptavān asi sarveṣām asmākaṃ pārthivaṃ padam // HV_106.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:16131: bāṇo vācam asaṃsaktāṃ provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_106.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:16132: [k: Ś1 B1 D6 T4 ins. after 32 and T1.2 g M ins. after *1153 ad additionnal colophon,
GE07hv_conpu:16136: cirāt prabhṛti kumbhāṇḍa na yuddhaṃ prāpyate mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:16137: tadā mayā mudā pṛṣṭaḥ śitikaṇṭhaḥ pratāpavān // HV_106.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:16141: api prāpsyāmy ahaṃ yuddhaṃ manasas tuṣṭikārakam // HV_106.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:16143: vijñaptaḥ sa mayā deva prāha māṃ vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ | *HV_106.34*1155 |
GE07hv_conpu:16145: prahasya suciraṃ kālam ukto 'dya vacanaṃ priyam // HV_106.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:16146: prāpsyase sumahad yuddhaṃ tvaṃ bāṇāpratimaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:16148: [k: N(except Ś1 K2 D3) T1.2.4 G ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16149: tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase yuddhaṃ sumahad ditinandana | *HV_106.36*1156 |
GE07hv_conpu:16151: praṇamya śirasā devaṃ tavāntikam upāgataḥ // HV_106.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:16152: ity evam uktaḥ kumbhāṇḍaḥ provāca nṛpatiṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16153: aho na śobhanaṃ rājan yad evaṃ bhāṣase vacaḥ // HV_106.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:16154: evaṃ kathayator eva tayor anyonyam ucchritaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16156: taṃ tathā patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā so 'suro dhvajam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:16157: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mene cāhavam āgatam // HV_106.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:16159: nanādāntarhito bhūmau vṛṣadaṃśo jagarja ca // HV_106.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:16160: devānām api yo devaḥ so 'py avarṣata vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16161: śoṇitaṃ śoṇitapure sarvataḥ puram antikāt // HV_106.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:16162: sūryaṃ bhittvā maholkā ca papāta dharaṇītale /
GE07hv_conpu:16163: svapakṣe coditaḥ sūryo bharaṇīṃ samapīḍayat // HV_106.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:16165: śoṇitasyāsravan ghorā nipetus tārakā bhṛśam // HV_106.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:16166: rāhur agrasad ādityam aparvaṇi viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_conpu:16167: lokakṣayakare kāle nirghātaś cābhavan mahān // HV_106.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:16169: aniśaṃ cāpy avicchinnā vavur vātāḥ sudāruṇāḥ // HV_106.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:16171: trivarṇaḥ parigho bhānoḥ saṃdhyārāgam athāvṛṇot // HV_106.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:16173: bāṇasya janmanakṣatraṃ bhartsayann iva sarvaśaḥ // HV_106.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:16178: vicetās tv abhavat prājñaḥ kumbhāṇḍas tattvadarśivān /
GE07hv_conpu:16179: bāṇasya sacivas tatra kīrtayan bahu kilbiṣam // HV_106.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:16180: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T1.2.4 G ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16181: utpātā hy atra dṛśyante kathayanto naśobhanam | *HV_106.51*1157:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16183: vayaṃ cānye ca sacivā bhṛtyā ye ca tavānugāḥ | *HV_106.51*1157:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16184: kṣayaṃ yāsyanti nacirāt sarve pārthiva durnayāt || *HV_106.51*1157:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16186: raṇam ākāṅkṣato mohāt tathā bāṇasya nardataḥ || *HV_106.51*1157:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16188: utsekād dṛśyate nāśo yuddhākāṅkṣī nanarda ha | *HV_106.51*1157:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:16189: bāṇaḥ prītamanās tv eva papau pānam anuttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:16192: acintayac ca tattvārthaṃ tais tair utpātadarśanaiḥ // HV_106.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:16194: yuddham evābhilaṣate na doṣān paśyate madāt // HV_106.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:16195: mahotpātabhayaṃ caiva na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:16196: apīdānīṃ bhaven mithyā sarvam utpātadarśanam // HV_106.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:16197: iha tv āste trinayanaḥ kārttikeyaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:16198: tenotpanno 'pi doṣo naḥ kaccid gacchet parābhavam // HV_106.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:16200: doṣāṇāṃ na bhaven nāśa iti me dhīyate matiḥ // HV_106.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:16201: niyataṃ doṣa evāyaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16202: daurātmyān nṛpater asya doṣabhūtā hi dānavāḥ // HV_106.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:16204: sa bhavaḥ kārttikeyaś ca kṛtavāso hi naḥ pure // HV_106.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:16205: prāṇaiḥ priyataro nityaṃ bhavasya tu guhaḥ sadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16206: tad viśiṣṭaś ca bāṇo 'pi bhavasya satataṃ priyaḥ // HV_106.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:16207: [k: K1.2 Ñ V B Ds D2.4.5 (marg.).6 T1.2.4 G1.3.4 ins. (G2 after 60ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16208: darpotsekāt tu nāśāya varaṃ yācitavān bhavam | *HV_106.60*1158:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16209: yuddhahetoḥ sa lubdhas tu sarvathā na bhaviṣyati || *HV_106.60*1158:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16211: bhavitā hy abhayat prāptir bhavahastāt kṛtā bhavet | *HV_106.60*1158:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16212: etayoś ca hi ko yuddhaṃ kumārabhavayor iha /
GE07hv_conpu:16214: [k: N (except Ś1) T1.2.4 G1.3.4 ins. (G5 after 58ab; G2 cont. after *1158): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16215: na ca devavaco mithyā bhaviṣyati kathaṃcana | *HV_106.61*1159:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16218: svastipraṇihitāṃ buddhiṃ cakāra sa mahāsuraḥ // HV_106.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:16219: ye hi devair virudhyante puṇyakarmabhir āhave /
GE07hv_conpu:16220: yathā balir niyamitas tathā te yānti saṃkṣayam // HV_106.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:16228: devyā saha nadītīre ramye śrīmati sa prabhuḥ // HV_107.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:16232: gandhoddāmam ivākāśaṃ nadītīraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_107.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:16234: vādyamānaiḥ sa śuśrāva gītam apsarasāṃ tadā // HV_107.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:16237: [k: Ñ2 V1.2 B Ds D1.5.6 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16239: tatas tu devyā rūpeṇa vikralekhā varāpsarāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16240: bhavaṃ prasādayām āsa devī ca prāhasat tadā // HV_107.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:16244: devyā hy anujñayā sarve krīḍante tatra tatra ha || *HV_107.6*1161:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16245: atha te pārṣadās tatra rahasye suvipaścitaḥ | *HV_107.6*1161:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16246: mahādevasya rūpeṇa tac cihnaṃ rūpam āsthitāḥ | *HV_107.6*1161:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16249: tato devyās tu rūpeṇa līlayā vadanena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:16250: devī prahāsaṃ mumuce tāś caivāpsarasas tadā // HV_107.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:16252: praharṣam atulaṃ cāpi lebhe prītamanā bhavaḥ // HV_107.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:16253: bāṇasya duhitā kanyā tatroṣā nāma bhāminī /
GE07hv_conpu:16254: devaṃ prakrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā devyā saha nadīgatam // HV_107.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:16255: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T1.2.4 G ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16258: uṣā manorathaṃ cakre pārvatyāḥ saṃnidhau tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16259: dhanyā hi bhartṛsahitā ramyanty evaṃ samāgatāḥ // HV_107.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:16260: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1 D3) T1.2.4 G ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16261: manasā tv atha saṃkalpam uṣayā bhāṣitaṃ tathā | *HV_107.10*1164 |
GE07hv_conpu:16263: prāha devī tato vākyam uṣāṃ harṣayatī śanaiḥ // HV_107.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:16264: uṣe śīghraṃ tvam apy evaṃ bhartrā saha ramiṣyasi /
GE07hv_conpu:16265: yathā devo mayā sārdhaṃ śaṃkaraḥ śatrusūdanaḥ // HV_107.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:16266: evam ukte tadā devyā vākye cintāvilekṣaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:16267: uṣā bhāvaṃ hṛdā cakre bhartrā raṃsye kadā saha // HV_107.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:16269: uṣe śṛṇuṣva kalyāṇi yadā saṃyogam eṣyasi // HV_107.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:16270: vaiśākhe māsi harmyasthāṃ dvādaśyāṃ tvāṃ dinakṣaye /
GE07hv_conpu:16271: dharṣayiṣyati yaḥ svapne sa te bhartā bhaviṣyati // HV_107.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:16274: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ1.2 V B D T1.2.4 G ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16279: uktā ca tatra tābhiḥ sā bhartā tava varānane | *HV_107.16*1165:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16281: na hi devyā vaco mithyā bhaviṣyati kadācana | *HV_107.16*1165:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16283: uṣā sakhīnāṃ tad vākyaṃ pratipūjya yathāvidhi | *HV_107.16*1165:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16290: gate 'hani punaḥ sarvās tā nāryo jagmur adbhutāḥ // HV_107.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:16291: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 D6; Ñ1 om.) T1.2.4 G ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16292: yayuḥ svān ālayān sarvā devī cādarśaṇaṃ gatā | *HV_107.17*1168 |
GE07hv_conpu:16293: kāś cid aśvais tathā yānair gajair anyās tathā rathaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16294: puraṃ praviviśur hṛṣṭāḥ kāścid ākāśam āsthitāḥ // HV_107.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:16295: tato harmye śayānāṃ tu vaiśākhe māsi bhāminīm /
GE07hv_conpu:16297: yathoktaḥ puruṣaḥ svapne dharṣayām āsa tām uṣām /
GE07hv_conpu:16299: sā svapne dharṣitā tena strībhāvaṃ cāpi lambhitā /
GE07hv_conpu:16301: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā sakhī bhayasamanvitām /
GE07hv_conpu:16302: citralekhā vacaḥ snigdham uvāca param ādbhutam // HV_107.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:16303: uṣe mā bhaiḥ kim evaṃ tvaṃ rudatī paritapyase /
GE07hv_conpu:16304: baleḥ sutasutā ca tvaṃ prakhyātā kiṃ bhayānvitā // HV_107.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:16305: na bhayaṃ vidyate loke tava subhru viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16306: bhayadas tava vāmoru pitā devāntako raṇe // HV_107.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:16307: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ śubhe /
GE07hv_conpu:16308: naivaṃvidheṣu vāseṣu bhayam asti varānane // HV_107.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:16310: aprāpta eva nagaraṃ pitrā te mṛdito raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:16311: ayaṃ devasamūhasya bhayadas te pitā raṇe // HV_107.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:16312: [k: After 107.26cd, D6 T1 G1.2.4.5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16313: airāvataḥ sa mṛdito gadayā cāsya bhāmini | *HV_107.26*1169:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16315: [k: After 107.26, N (except Ś1) T4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16320: evaṃ saṃdūṣitā sādhvī kathaṃ jīvitum utsahe /
GE07hv_conpu:16321: pitaraṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi devaśatrum ariṃdamam // HV_107.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:16323: śreyo hi maraṇaṃ manye na me śreyo 'dya jīvitam // HV_107.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:16324: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B D T4 G1.2.5 G (ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16325: īpsito vā yatha ko 'pi puruṣo 'dhigato hi me | *HV_107.28*1171:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16326: jāgratīva yathāhaṃ syām avastheyaṃ kṛtā mama | *HV_107.28*1171:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16327: niśāyāṃ jāgratī vāhaṃ nītā kena daśām imām | *HV_107.28*1171:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16328: katham evaṃ kṛtā nāma kanyā jīvitum utsahe /
GE07hv_conpu:16330: jīvituṃ spṛhayen nārī sādhvīnām agrataḥ sthitā // HV_107.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:16332: vilalāpa ciraṃ kālam uṣā kamalalocanā // HV_107.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:16334: ūcur aśruparītākṣya uṣāṃ sarvāḥ samāgatāḥ // HV_107.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:16335: duṣṭena manasā devi śubhaṃ yadi vāsubham /
GE07hv_conpu:16336: kriyate na ca te subhru kaccid duṣṭaṃ manas tava // HV_107.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:16338: prasabhaṃ devi saṃyogād yadi bhuktāsi bhāmini | *HV_107.32*1172 |
GE07hv_conpu:16340: vyabhicāreṇa te devi nāsti kaścid vyatikramaḥ // HV_107.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:16342: na ca svapnakṛto doṣo martyaloke 'sti sundari | *HV_107.33*1173:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16343: evaṃ viprarṣayo devi dharmajñāḥ kathayanti vai | *HV_107.33*1173:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16344: manasā caiva vācā ca karmaṇā ca viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16345: duṣṭā yā tribhir etais tu pāpā sā procyate bhuvi // HV_107.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:16346: na va te duṣyate bhīru manaḥ prajavitaṃ sadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16347: kathaṃ tvaṃ doṣaduṣṭā vai niyatā brahmacāriṇī // HV_107.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:16348: yadi suptā satī sādhvī śuddhabhāvā manasvinī /
GE07hv_conpu:16349: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ naiva dharmo vilupyate // HV_107.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:16350: yasyā duṣṭaṃ manaḥ pūrvaṃ karmaṇā copapāditam /
GE07hv_conpu:16351: tām āhur asatīṃ nāma satī tvam asi bhāmini // HV_107.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:16353: imām avasthāṃ nītāsi kālo hi duratikramaḥ // HV_107.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:16355: kumbhāṇḍaduhitā vākyaṃ paramaṃ tv idam abravīt // HV_107.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:16357: tyaja śokaṃ viśālākṣi apāpā tvaṃ varānane | *HV_107.39*1174:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16358: smṛtaṃ me yad idaṃ vākyaṃ yāthātathyena tac chṛṇu | *HV_107.39*1174:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16359: uṣe yad uktā devyāsi bhartāraṃ dhyāyatī tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16360: samīpe devadevasya smara bhāmini tad vacaḥ // HV_107.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:16361: dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya vaiśākhe māsi yo niśi /
GE07hv_conpu:16362: harmye śayānāṃ rudatīṃ strībhāvam upaneṣyati // HV_107.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:16363: bhavitā sa hi te bhartā śūraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16364: ity uvāca tato hṛṣṭā devī tava manogatam // HV_107.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:16365: na hi tad vacanaṃ mithyā pārvatyā yad udāhṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:16366: tattvaṃ kim idam atyarthaṃ rodiṣīndunibhānane // HV_107.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:16367: ity evam uktā vacanaṃ smṛtvā devīvacas tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16368: abhavan naṣṭaśokā sā bāṇaputrī śubhekṣaṇā // HV_107.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:16370: smṛtvā tu vacanaṃ devyāḥ pratyuvāca sakhīṃ tadā | *HV_107.44*1175 |
GE07hv_conpu:16372: smarāmi bhāmini vaco devyāḥ krīḍāgate bhave /
GE07hv_conpu:16373: yathoktaṃ sarvam akhilaṃ prāptaṃ harmyatale mayā // HV_107.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:16374: bhartā tu mama yady eṣa lokanāthasya bhāryayā /
GE07hv_conpu:16375: vyādiṣṭaḥ sa kathaṃ jñeyas tatra kāryaṃ vidhīyatām // HV_107.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:16376: ity evam ukte vacane kumbhāṇḍaduhitā punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16378: na hi tasya kulaṃ devi na kīrtir nāpi pauruṣam /
GE07hv_conpu:16379: kaścij jānāti tattvena kim idaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase // HV_107.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:16380: adṛṣṭaś cāśrutaś caiva dṛṣṭaḥ svapne tvayānaghe /
GE07hv_conpu:16381: kathaṃ jñeyo bhaved bhīru so 'smābhī ratitaskaraḥ // HV_107.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:16383: rudatī prasabhaṃ bhuktā praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ sakhi // HV_107.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:16384: na hy ayaṃ prākṛtaḥ kaścid yaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prasahya naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16386: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahaujasau /
GE07hv_conpu:16387: na śaktāḥ śoṇitapuraṃ praveṣṭuṃ bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_107.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:16389: purīṃ śāsati bāṇe tu jitvā śakraṃ śacīpatim | *HV_107.52*1176 |
GE07hv_conpu:16391: praviṣṭaḥ śoṇitapuraṃ bāṇam ākramya mūrdhani // HV_107.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:16393: ko nu nāma jagaty asmin manaḥ kartuṃ mahāsure | *HV_107.53*1177:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16394: śāsaty etat puraṃ devi manuṣyo jīvitaspṛhaḥ | *HV_107.53*1177:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16395: praviśet tam avajñāya bāṇaṃ kiṃ vāpi dharṣaṇam | *HV_107.53*1177:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16397: kas tasyā jīvitenārtho bhogair vā syāc chubhekṣaṇe // HV_107.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:16398: dhanyāsy anugṛhītāsi yasyās te patir īdṛśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16399: prāpto devyāḥ prasādena pārvatyā mattakāśini // HV_107.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:16400: idaṃ tu te kāryatamaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vai mayeritam /
GE07hv_conpu:16401: vijñeyo yasya putras tu yan nāmā yat kulaś ca saḥ // HV_107.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:16402: ity evam ukte vacane tatroṣā kāmamohitā /
GE07hv_conpu:16406: uvāca kumbhāṇḍasutāṃ kathaṃ jñāsyāmahe sakhi // HV_107.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:16408: tvam eva cintaya sakhi nottaraṃ pratibhāti me | *HV_107.57*1179:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16409: svakārye muhyate loko yathā jīvaṃ labhāmy aham || *HV_107.57*1179:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16410: uṣāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmā vākyam idaṃ punaḥ | *HV_107.57*1179:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16413: apsarā citralekhā vai kṣipraṃ vijñāpyatāṃ sakhi || *HV_107.57*1179:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16414: asyāḥ sarvam aśeṣeṇa trailokyaṃ viditaṃ sadā || *HV_107.57*1179:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16416: tām apsarasam ānāyya citralekhāṃ sakhīṃ priyām | *HV_107.57*1179:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16419: sā tac chrutvā tu vacanam uṣāyāḥ parikīrtitam | *HV_107.57*1180:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16421: tataḥ sā cintayāviṣṭā vacanaṃ prāha durvacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16422: citralekhām apsarasaṃ praṇayāt tāṃ sakhīṃ sakhī // HV_107.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:16423: paramaṃ śṛṇu me vākyaṃ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi bhāmini /
GE07hv_conpu:16424: bhartāraṃ yadi me 'dya tvaṃ nānayiṣyasi matpriyam // HV_107.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:16426: tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ priyān prāṇāṃs tataḥ kamalalocane // HV_107.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:16427: vikralekhābravīd vākyam uṣāṃ tāṃ hasatī śanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16428: naiṣo 'rthaḥ śakyate 'smābhir vettuṃ bhāmini suvrate // HV_107.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:16430: na kulena na varṇena na śīlena na rūpataḥ | *HV_107.61*1181:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16431: na deśataś ca vijñātaḥ sa hi coro mayā sakhi | *HV_107.61*1181:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16432: kiṃ tu śakyam idaṃ kāryaṃ buddhipūrvaṃ mayā sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16433: prāptuṃ tac chṛṇu me vākyaṃ yathā kāmam avāpsyasi // HV_107.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:16438: ye viśiṣṭāḥ prabhāvena rūpeṇābhijanena ca // HV_107.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:16439: yathāpradhānāṃs tān sarvān ālikhiṣyāmy ahaṃ sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16440: manuṣyaloke ye cāpi pravarā lokaviśrutāḥ // HV_107.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:16441: saptarātreṇa te bhīru darśayiṣyāmi tān aham /
GE07hv_conpu:16442: tato vijñāya paṭṭasthaṃ bhartāraṃ pratilapsyase // HV_107.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:16444: na darśaye yadi sakhi tarhi vahnim ahaṃ viśe | *HV_107.65*1183 |
GE07hv_conpu:16445: [k: Ds1 cont: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds2 D1-6 T4 G1.2.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16447: kriyatām evam ity āha citralekhāṃ sakhīṃ priyām || *HV_107.65*1184:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16449: ity uktvā saptarātreṇa kṛtvālekhyagatāṃs tu tān /
GE07hv_conpu:16450: citrapaṭṭagatān mukhyān ānayām āsa śobhanā // HV_107.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:16451: tataḥ prāstīrya paṭṭaṃ sā citralekhā svayaṃkṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:16454: uṣāyā darśayām āsa sakhīnāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:16455: ete deveṣu ye mukhyās tathā dānavavaṃśajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16456: kiṃ naroragayakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_107.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:16457: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B D G1.2.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16459: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ye viśiṣṭatamā narāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16460: tad etān paśya sarvāṃs tvaṃ yathābhilikhitān mayā // HV_107.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:16461: yas te bhartā yathārūpo yathābhilaṣitaḥ sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16462: taṃ tvaṃ pratyabhijānīhi svapne yaṃ dṛṣṭavaty asi // HV_107.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:16463: tataḥ krameṇa sarvāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā sā mattakāśinī /
GE07hv_conpu:16466: atītya ca yadūn sarvān dadarśa yadunandanam // HV_107.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:16468: balabhadram atho dṛṣṭvā pradyumnam atha sātyakim | *HV_107.71*1188:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16469: dadarśa yadusiṃhaṃ taṃ pautraṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ | *HV_107.71*1188:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16470: aniruddhaṃ raṇe ruddhaṃ pañcabāṇam iva sthitam || *HV_107.71*1188:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16471: paṭe sthitaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā vīraṃ citrātmanā yadum | *HV_107.71*1188:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16473: abravīc citralekhāṃ tām ayaṃ coraḥ sa vai sakhi // HV_107.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:16474: yenāhaṃ dūṣitā pūrvaṃ svapne harmyagatā satī /
GE07hv_conpu:16475: so 'yaṃ vijñātarūpo me kutastyas taskaraḥ śubhe // HV_107.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:16477: guṇaśīlābhijanato nāma kiṃ cāsya bhāmini // HV_107.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:16482: [k: T1 G M G(ed.) ins. after the ref., T2 after 74: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16484: dānavānāṃ raṇe hantā viṣṇur jiṣṇur jagatpatiḥ || *HV_107.75*1190:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16490: bhartā tava viśālākṣi prādyumnir bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_107.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:16491: na hy asya triṣu lokeṣu sadṛśo 'sti parākrame /
GE07hv_conpu:16492: utpāṭya parvatān eṣa parvatair eva śātayet // HV_107.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:16494: tryakṣapatnyā samādiṣṭaḥ sadṛśaḥ sajjanaḥ patiḥ // HV_107.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:16496: yady enaṃ me viśālākṣi bhartāram amaropamam /
GE07hv_conpu:16497: [k: After the ref.,K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B D T4 G1.2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16498: tvam evātra viśālākṣi yogyā bhava varānane | *HV_107.78*1192:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16499: aśakyā hi gatiś cānyā agatyā me gatir bhava || *HV_107.78*1192:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16502: upāyaś cintyatāṃ bhīru apratarkyaṃ priye sukham | *HV_107.78*1192:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16504: bhaved āpatsu yan mitraṃ tan mitraṃ śasyate budhaiḥ | *HV_107.78*1192:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16505: kāmārtā cāsmi suśroṇi bhava me prāṇadhāriṇī | *HV_107.78*1192:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:16506: adya nānayasi kṣipraṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ śubhe // HV_107.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:16508: śrotum arhasi kalyāṇi vacanaṃ me śucismite // HV_107.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:16509: yathā bāṇasya nagaraṃ rakṣyate devi sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16510: dvārakāpi tathā bhīru durādharṣā viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:16511: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16518: na ca śakyam avijñātaiḥ praveṣṭuṃ dvārakāṃ purīm /
GE07hv_conpu:16520: nānuyokṣyasi māṃ devi sāhase 'smiṃs tu karmaṇi | *HV_107.81ab*1194:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16521: tato virama buddhiṃ tvaṃ duḥprāpāt svapnavastunaḥ | *HV_107.81ab*1194:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16522: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva pitaraṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:16525: [k: Ś1 M4 om. the ref. After the ref. Ñ (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G1.2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16527: kiṃ me bahuvilāpena śrūyatāṃ sakhi kāraṇam | *HV_107.82*1195:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16528: yady ahaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yāsyāmi yamasādanam // HV_107.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:16529: [k: N(except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16530: dūtam āsādya kāryāṇāṃ siddhir bhavati bhāmini | *HV_107.82*1196:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16531: tasmād dautyena me gaccha jīvantīṃ māṃ yadīcchasi | *HV_107.82*1196:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16532: yadi tvaṃ me vijānāsi sakhyaṃ premṇā ca bhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:16533: kṣipram ānaya me kāntaṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi vā priyān // HV_107.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:16534: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16535: jīvitasya hi saṃdehaṃ kṣayaṃ caiva kulasya ca | *HV_107.83*1197:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16536: kāmārtā hi na paśyanti dūṣaṇaṃ vai kulasya ca || *HV_107.83*1197:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16538: tvaṃ ca śaktā viśālākṣi dvārakāyāḥ praveśane | *HV_107.83*1197:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16539: saṃstutāsi mayā bhīru kuru me priyadarśanam | *HV_107.83*1197:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16541: eṣā gacchāmy ahaṃ bhīru praviśya dvārakāṃ purīm /
GE07hv_conpu:16542: [k: K1 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-3.5 T4 G2.4.5 ins. after the ref.; D4 cont. after 1197*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16544: kāritā ca samudyogaṃ priyaiḥ kāntaiś ca bhāṣitaiḥ | *HV_107.84*1198:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16545: bhartāram ānayāmy adya tava vṛṣṇikulodvaham // HV_107.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:16546: [k: N (except Ś1 K1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16548: sā vacas tathyam aśivaṃ dānavānāṃ bhayāvaham /
GE07hv_conpu:16551: uktvā cāntarhitā kṣipraṃ citralekhā manojavā // HV_107.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:16552: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16553: sakhībhiḥ sahitā hy ūṣā cintayantī sthitā tu sā | *HV_197.85*1201 |
GE07hv_conpu:16554: tṛtīye tu muhūrte sā naṣṭā bāṇapurāt tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16555: [k: Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D2.6 T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16559: dadarśa dvārakāṃ caiva divi tāreva saṃsthitām // HV_107.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:16565: [k: After the ref., all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 33). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16568: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D1-5 ins. after App. I (No. 33); D6 after 1ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16575: dadarśa bhavanaṃ yatra prādyumnir avasat sukham // HV_108.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:16577: tataḥ praviśya sahasā bhavanaṃ tasya tan mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:16578: [k: K1.3.4 V B D S (T3 missing) ins. (Ñ2 after the first occurence of 2ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16580: dadarśa madhye nārīṇāṃ tārāpatim ivoditam // HV_108.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:16582: pibantaṃ madhu mādhvīkaṃ śriyā paramayā yutam /
GE07hv_conpu:16584: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D (except D3) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16585: vādyate samatālaṃ ca gīyate madhuraṃ tathā | *HV_108.3*1205:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16586: na ca tasya manas tatra tam evārtham acintayat || *HV_108.3*1205:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16587: striyaḥ sarvaguṇopetā nṛtyante tatra tatra vai | *HV_108.3*1205:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16588: na cāsya manasas tuṣṭiṃ citralekhā prapaśyati | *HV_108.3*1205:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16589: na cābhiramate bhogair na cāpi madhu sevate | *HV_108.3*1205:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16590: vyaktam asya hi tat svapnaṃ hṛdaye parivartate | *HV_108.3*1205:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16591: iti tatraiva buddhyā ca niścitā gatasādhvasā | *HV_108.3*1205:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16593: [k: After line 3, K1 Ñ2 B1 D6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16596: kathaṃ kāryam idaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ svasti bhaven mama // HV_108.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:16598: tāmasyā chādayām āsa vidyayā śubhalocanā // HV_108.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:16600: utpapāta gṛhītvā sā prādyumniṃ yuddhadurmadam // HV_108.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:16603: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G2.4.5 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16608: [k: G2.4.5 cont. (T1.2 G1.3 M ins. after 7; T4 after line 2 of *1206): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16609: tṛtīye tu muhūrte sā prāptā bāṇapuraṃ tadā | *HV_108.7*1207:1 |

GE07hv_conpu:16611: evam uktā tadā kanyā bāṇasya duhitā tataḥ | *HV_108.7*1207:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16613: praveśayām āsa tadā saṃprāptaṃ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ // HV_108.8 //

GE07hv_conpu:16619: sā harmyasthā tam arghyeṇa yādavaṃ samapūjayat | *HV_108.9ab*1209:1 |
