GE07hv_conpu:16622: sakhīdaṃ vai kathaṃ guhyaṃ kāryaṃ kāryaviśārade /
GE07hv_conpu:16623: guhye kṛte bhavet svasti prakāśe jīvitakṣayaḥ // HV_108.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:16625: T4 ins. an addl. colophon mentioning adhy. no. 218. T4 ins. after the addl. colophon:
GE07hv_conpu:16626: K Ñ3 V1.2 B Ds2 D1-5 G2.4.5 (Ñ2 V3 Dn Ds1 D6 after the first occurrence of 11abcd) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16627: citralekhābravīd vākyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ niścayaṃ sakhi | *HV_108.10*1210:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16628: kṛtaṃ puruṣakāraṃ hi daivaṃ nāśayate sakhi || *HV_108.10*1210:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16629: na vai devyāḥ prasādas te anukūlo bhaviṣyati | *HV_108.10*1210:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16630: apramādāt kṛtaṃ guhyaṃ na kaścij jñāsyate naraḥ || *HV_108.10*1210:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16631: sakhyā vai evam uktā sā paryavasthitacetanā | *HV_108.10*1210:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16632: evam etad iti prāha sāniruddham idaṃ vacaḥ || *HV_108.10*1210:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16633: diṣṭyā svapnagataś coro dṛśyate subhago janaḥ | *HV_108.10*1210:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16636: hṛdayaṃ hi mṛdu strīṇāṃ tena pṛcchāmy ahaṃ tava || *HV_108.10*1210:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:16637: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā uṣāyāḥ ślakṣṇam arthavat | *HV_108.10*1210:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:16642: tvatprasādena me devi priyam āvedayāmi te || *HV_108.10*1210:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:16644: niśi svapne mayā dṛṣṭaṃ sakṛt kanyāpuraṃ mahat || *HV_108.10*1210:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:16645: evam evam ahaṃ bhīru tvatprasādād ihāgataḥ | *HV_108.10*1210:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:16646: na ca tad rudrapatnyā vai mithyā vākyaṃ bhaviṣyati || *HV_108.10*1210:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:16647: devyās tu prītim ājñāya tvatpriyārthaṃ ca bhāvini | *HV_108.10*1210:21 |
GE07hv_conpu:16650: D6 ins. an addl. colophon mentioning adhy. name bāṇayuddham. B1.2 Ds2 D2 T4 G2.4.5 cont. (Ds1 ins. after second occurrence of 11cd): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16651: ity uktvā ramayām āsa so 'niruddho mahāyaśāḥ | *HV_108.10*1211 |
GE07hv_conpu:16652: ity uktvā tvaramāṇā sā guhyadeśe svalaṃkṛtā /
GE07hv_conpu:16653: kāntena saha saṃyuktā sthitā vai bhītabhītavat /
GE07hv_conpu:16655: ins. after 11cd; Ñ2 V3 Dn D6 after second occurrence of 11cd; Ds1 after *1211: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16657: anyonyaṃ rematus tau tu cakravākau yathā divā || *HV_108.11cd*1212:2 |

GE07hv_conpu:16661: [k: D6 T2.4 G1.3-5 G(ed.) cont.; T1 G2 M ins. after 11cd: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16664: papau tasya mukhaṃ sādhvī samāliṅgya yathākramam | *HV_108.11cd*1214:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16665: netre cucumba sā devī bāṇasya duhitā yadum || *HV_108.11cd*1214:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16667: na tṛptim āyayau sā tu samāliṅgya yadūttamam || *HV_108.11cd*1214:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16670: tāmasyā vidyayā yuktaḥ prādyumnir atha tatkṣaṇāt | *HV_108.11cd*1214:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16671: cintayām āsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhe strījanam adbhutam || *HV_108.11cd*1214:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:16672: ko 'yaṃ vidhir mama mahān na jāne tv asya kāraṇam | *HV_108.11cd*1214:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16673: svapno 'yaṃ kiṃ mayā dṛṣṭa utāho vibhramo mama || *HV_108.11cd*1214:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:16674: jāgarmy ahaṃ na me svapno na ca ma vibhramo mahān | *HV_108.11cd*1214:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:16675: keyam agre sthitā subhrūr lateva ca supuṣpitā || *HV_108.11cd*1214:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:16680: kim idaṃ nātra jānāmi kenedaṃ pratipāditam || *HV_108.11cd*1214:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:16681: dṛṣṭvāsya vavṛdhe kāmas tām uṣāṃ madamohitām | *HV_108.11cd*1214:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:16682: sā ca tatpurataḥ sākṣāt pānaṃ kartuṃ samudyatā || *HV_108.11cd*1214:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:16683: atha tām iṅgitair jñātvā śrutvā caiva yathārthataḥ | *HV_108.11cd*1214:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:16684: ramayām āsa ramaṇīṃ kāmatas tāṃ manoramām || *HV_108.11cd*1214:21 |
GE07hv_conpu:16689: [k: After line of *1214, T1.2 G1 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16691: [k: After the ref. before line 7, T2 G3.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16692: tato niruddhaḥ svapne tu svapurāc citralekhayā | *HV_108.11cd*1214B:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16693: nīto bāṇapuraṃ sadyaḥ saṃgataś coṣayā saha || *HV_108.11cd*1214B:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16695: [k: After line 20a of *1214, T2 G1.3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16697: sa tataś citralekhāṃ tām avekṣyovāca yādavaḥ | *HV_108.11cd*1214C:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16699: bāṇasya nagaraṃ prāpya saṃgato 'smy uṣayā rahaḥ | *HV_108.11cd*1214C:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16701: ko 'yaṃ vidhir mamāyātaḥ kā tvaṃ kaiṣā ca bhāminī | *HV_108.11cd*1214C:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16702: keyaṃ purī gṛhaṃ kasya tat tvam ākhyātum arhasi || *HV_108.11cd*1214C:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16703: iti bruvantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā citralekhā vaco 'bravīt | *HV_108.11cd*1214C:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:16704: api te kuśalaṃ vīra sarvatra yadunandana | *HV_108.11cd*1214C:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16705: ramamāṇāniruddhena avijñātā tu sā tadā // HV_108.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:16706: [k: After 11, T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16707: papau cāsyā mukhaṃ kāmī samāliṅgya dṛḍhaṃ yaduḥ | *HV_108.11*1215:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16709: tayodyatāṃ tato mādhvīṃ papau śiṣṭām apāyayat | *HV_108.11*1215:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16710: tayor evaṃ tadā kāmo vavṛdhe janasaṃsadi || *HV_108.11*1215:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16711: citralekhā tataḥ sādhvī bhūṣayām āsa bhūṣaṇaiḥ | *HV_108.11*1215:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16712: vastrair ābharaṇaiś citrair mālyaiś ca bahugandhibhiḥ || *HV_108.11*1215:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16713: rarāja yaduvīras tu rohiṇyā candramā yathā | *HV_108.11*1215:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16714: saudhamārge tatas tau tu daṃpatī rematuś ciram | *HV_108.11*1215:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:16715: tāṃ tathā ramayām āsa yatheṣṭaṃ yadunandanaḥ | *HV_108.11*1215:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16718: [k: After line 6 of *1215, T2 G1.3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16719: alaṃkṛtas tayā tatra saṃgataś coṣayā rahaḥ | *HV_108.11*1215B |
GE07hv_conpu:16720: [k: T2 G1 cont. after line 9 of *1215: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16721: papau tasya mukhaṃ sādhvī samāliṅgya yathākramam | *HV_108.11*1216:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16722: netre ca cumbito devī bāṇasya duhitā sakhī | *HV_108.11*1216:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16723: tasminn eva kṣaṇe prāpte yadūnām ṛṣabho hi saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16725: uṣayā saha saṃyukto vijñāto bāṇarakṣibhiḥ // HV_108.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:16726: [k: After 12e T1.2 G M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16728: vijahāra yathākāmaṃ ramayaṃs tām uṣāṃ śubhām || *HV_108.12e*1217:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16733: aniruddhaṃ tato jñātvā sārdhaṃ kanyāpure sthitam | *HV_108.12e*1217:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16735: rakṣiṇaḥ sahasā gatvā bhītā bāṇāntikaṃ tadā || *HV_108.12e*1217:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16737: te bhītāḥ kathayām āsur aniruddhasya ceṣṭitam || *HV_108.12e*1217:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16738: eṣa kaścin mahārāja uṣayā saha saṃgataḥ | *HV_108.12e*1217:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:16739: sthitaḥ kanyāpure rājan kaś cāsau kuta ity api || *HV_108.12e*1217:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:16740: āyātaḥ sahasā rājan na vidmo 'sya gatiṃ vibho || *HV_108.12e*1217:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:16741: śrutvaitad roṣayuktas tu balaṃ bāṇo nirīkṣya tat | *HV_108.12e*1217:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:16746: gacchadhvaṃ sahitāḥ sarve hanyatām eṣa durmatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16747: yena naḥ kulacāritraṃ dūṣitaṃ dūṣitātmanā // HV_108.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:16748: uṣāyāṃ dharṣitāyāṃ hi kulaṃ no dharṣitaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:16750: aho vīryamaho dhairyam aho dhārṣṭyaṃ ca durmateḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16751: yaḥ puraṃ bhavanaṃ cedaṃ praviṣṭo naḥ subāliśaḥ // HV_108.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:16752: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16753: evam uktvā punas tāṃs tu kiṃkarāṃś codayad bhṛśam || *HV_108.17*1218:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16754: te tasyājñām atho gṛhya susaṃnaddhā viniryayuḥ | *HV_108.17*1218:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16758: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T2.4 G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16761: tatas tu rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tām uṣāṃ mṛgalocanām | *HV_108.18*1219:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16763: abhayaṃ te 'stu saśroṇi mā bhais tvaṃ hi mayi sthite | *HV_108.18*1219:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16764: saṃprāpto harṣakālas te na te 'sti bhayakāraṇam || *HV_108.18*1219:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16766: āgaccheta na me cintā bhīru paśyādya vikramam || *HV_108.18*1219:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:16768: sahasaivotthitaḥ śrīmān prādyumniḥ kim iti bruvan || *HV_108.18*1219:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:16770: sthitaṃ samantatas tatra parivārya gṛhaṃ mahat || *HV_108.18*1219:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:16771: tato 'bhyagacchat tvarito yatra tad veṣṭitaṃ balam | *HV_108.18*1219:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:16773: tato yuddham apoḍhānāṃ bāṇeyānāṃ niśamya tu | *HV_108.18*1219:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:16778: mā bhayaṃ svasti te vīra prāpto 'smy abhimatas tava || *HV_108.18*1219:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:16779: tataś ca nāradaṃ dṛṣṭvā so 'bhivādya mahābalaḥ | *HV_108.18*1219:21 |
GE07hv_conpu:16782: vadhyatāṃ vadhyatām eṣa gṛhyatāṃ gṛhyatām ayam | *HV_108.18*1220:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16783: hanyatāṃ hanyatāṃ kṣipram ity ūcur dānavās tada | *HV_108.18*1220:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16784: tatas teṣāṃ svanaṃ śrutvā sarveṣām eva garjatām /
GE07hv_conpu:16785: sahasaivotthitaḥ śūras totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // HV_108.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:16788: bhītayā bhīta evāsau dhāvati sma tathāsurān | *HV_108.19*1221:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16796: te sarve bāṇavarṣaiś ca gadābhis tomarais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:16797: asibhiḥ śaktibhiḥ śūlair nijaghnū raṇagocaram // HV_108.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:16798: sa hanyamāno nārācaiḥ parighaiś ca samantataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16799: [k: K1 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.4-6 T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16801: nākṣubhyat sarvabhūtātmā nadan megha ivoṣṇage // HV_108.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:16802: āvidhya parighaṃ ghoraṃ teṣāṃ madhye vyavasthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16803: sūryo divicaranmadhye meghānām iva sarvataḥ // HV_108.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:16804: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G2-5 (T2 after 25, G1 after 28) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16806: sādhu sādhv iti vai tatra so 'niruddham abhāṣata | *HV_108.24*1224:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16808: prādravanta bhayāt sarve megho vāteritā yathā // HV_108.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:16812: gharmānte toyado vyomni nadann iva mahāsvanaḥ // HV_108.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:16815: tena te samare sarve hanyamānā mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:16816: yato bāṇas tato bhītā yayur yuddhaparāṅmukhāḥ // HV_108.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:16818: na śarma lebhire daityā bhayaviklavalocanāḥ // HV_108.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:16819: mā bhaiṣṭa mā bhaiṣṭa iti rājñā te tena coditāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16820: trāsaṃ visṛjya caikasthā yudhyadhvaṃ dānavarṣabhāḥ // HV_108.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:16821: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16823: kim idaṃ lokavikhyātaṃ yaśa utsṛjya dūrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16824: bhavanto yānti vaiklavyaṃ klībā iva vicetasaḥ // HV_108.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:16825: ko 'yaṃ yasya bhayatrastā bhavanto yānty anekaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16827: bhavadbhir na hi me yuddhe kāryaṃ sāhāyyam adya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:16828: abravīd dhvaṃsatety evaṃ matsamīpāc ca naśyata // HV_108.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:16829: atha tān vāgbhir ugrābhis trāsayan bahudhā balī /
GE07hv_conpu:16830: vyādideśa raṇe śūrān sarvān ayutaśaḥ punaḥ // HV_108.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:16835: kecit kṣitisthāḥ prākrośan gajā iva samantataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16836: athāntarikṣe vyanadan gharmānteṣv iva toyadāḥ // HV_108.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:16837: tatas tat sumahad yuddhaṃ sametam abhavat punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16838: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti ca tadā vāco 'śrūyanta sarvaśaḥ // HV_108.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:16839: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16840: aniruddho raṇe vīraḥ sa ca tān abhyavartata | *HV_108.38*1227 |
GE07hv_conpu:16841: tad āścaryaṃ samabhavad yad ekas taiḥ samāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16842: ayudhyata mahāvīryair dānavaiḥ saha saṃyuge // HV_108.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:16843: teṣām eva ca jagrāha parighāṃs tomarān api /
GE07hv_conpu:16844: tair eva ca mahāyuddhe nijaghāna mahābalaḥ // HV_108.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:16846: parigṛhya ca tān eva cāyudhair ahanad raṇe | *HV_108.40*1228 |
GE07hv_conpu:16847: punaḥ sa parighaṃ ghoraṃ pragṛhya raṇamūrdhani /
GE07hv_conpu:16848: sa daityasaṃghān samare nijaghāna mahābalān // HV_108.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:16851: jaghāna samare caikaḥ sākṣāt pautras tu śārṅgiṇaḥ | *HV_108.41*1229:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16852: nanāda vividhaṃ nādaṃ rodasī ca sa kampayan | *HV_108.41*1229:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16854: sa tena vyacaran mārgān ekaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ // HV_108.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:16855: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ plutam /
GE07hv_conpu:16856: iti prakārān dvātriṃśad vicarann abhyadṛśyata // HV_108.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:16858: krīḍantaṃ bahudhā yuddhe vyāditāsyam ivāntakam // HV_108.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:16860: punar bhagnāḥ prādravanta yatra bāṇaḥ sthito raṇe // HV_108.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:16862: kṛtvā cārtasvaraṃ ghoraṃ diśo jagmur hataujasaḥ // HV_108.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:16864: evaṃ bhayam abhūt teṣāṃ dānavānāṃ mahāraṇe | *HV_108.46*1230 |
GE07hv_conpu:16866: vamantaḥ śoṇitaṃ jagmur viṣādād vimukhā raṇe // HV_108.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:16867: na babhūva bhayaṃ tādṛg gānavānāṃ purā raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:16872: tādṛśaṃ na bhayaṃ teṣām abhavad devasaṃyuge | *HV_108.48*1232 |
GE07hv_conpu:16877: te bāṇam utsṛjya raṇe jagmur bhayasamākulāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16878: viśālam ākāśatalaṃ dānavā nirjitās tadā // HV_108.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:16879: niḥsaṅgabhagnāṃ mahatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ vāhinīṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16880: bāṇaḥ krodhāt prajajvāla samiddho 'gnir ivādhvare // HV_108.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:16881: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins. (T2 G3 after 68): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16883: nārado nṛtyati prīto hy aniruddhasya saṃyuge || *HV_108.51*1234:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16886: yayau yatrāniruddho vai so 'sim udyamya dāruṇam // HV_108.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:16894: abhyadravac ca vegena prādyumnir yatra saṃsthitaḥ | *HV_108.55ab*1235:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16897: bāṇasya vadataḥ saṃkhye udaikṣata tato 'hasat // HV_108.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:16907: tasya vājisahasraṃ tu rathe yuktaṃ mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:16908: [k: N (except Ś1 K2) T2.4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16911: saṃprahṛṣṭas tato yuddhe tejasā cāpy apūryata || *HV_108.58ab*1238:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16917: khaḍgacarmadharaṃ taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā bāṇaḥ padātinam /
GE07hv_conpu:16919: tanutreṇa vihīnaś ca khaḍgapāṇiś ca yādavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16920: ajeyaś ceti matvā taṃ yuddhāyābhimukhe sthitam // HV_108.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:16921: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16923: vācaṃ covāca saṃkruddho gṛhyatāṃ hanyatām iti || *HV_108.60*1240:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16924: vācaṃ ca bruvatas tasya śrutvā prādyumnir āhave | *HV_108.60*1240:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16927: aniruddhaḥ prahasyātha samāśvāsya ca tāṃ sthitām || *HV_108.60*1240:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16930: aniruddhas tu ciccheda kāṅkṣaṃs tasya parājayam | *HV_108.60*1240:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16932: bāṇo'niruddhaśirasi kāṅkṣaṃs tasya raṇe vadham // HV_108.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:16934: babhau pramukhatas tasya sthitaḥ sūrya ivodaye // HV_108.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:16936: siṃhaḥ pramukhato dṛṣṭvā gajam ekaṃ yathā vane // HV_108.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:16938: vivyādha niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ prādyumnim aparājitam // HV_108.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:16940: tato vivyādha niśitair bāṇaiḥ prādyumnim āsthitaḥ | *HV_108.64cd*1241 |
GE07hv_conpu:16941: [k: B2 D5 T4 G2.4.5 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16943: [k: B2 D5 T4 G2.4.5 cont.; K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B Ds2 D1.4.6 ins. after 64 (Dn1 after 67ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16944: tam āpatantaṃ niśitair abhyaghnan sāyakais tadā | *HV_108.64*1243 |
GE07hv_conpu:16948: abhibhūtaḥ susaṃkruddho yayau bāṇarathaṃ prati // HV_108.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:16949: asibhir musalaiḥ śūlaiḥ paṭṭisais tomarais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:16950: so 'tividdhaḥ śaraughais tu prādyumnir nābhyakampata // HV_108.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:16951: āplutya sahasā kruddho ratheṣāṃ tasya so 'cchinat /
GE07hv_conpu:16952: jaghānāśvāṃś ca khaḍgena bāṇasya rathamūrdhani // HV_108.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:16953: taṃ punaḥ śaravarṣeṇa tomaraiḥ paṭṭisais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:16955: hato 'yam iti vijñāya prāṇadan nairṛtā gaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16957: śaktiṃ bāṇas tataḥ kruddho ghorarūpāṃ bhayāvahām /
GE07hv_conpu:16958: jagrāha jvalitāṃ dīptāṃ ghaṇṭāmālākulāṃ raṇe // HV_108.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:16963: prāhiṇot tām asaṅgena maholkāṃ jvalitām iva // HV_108.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:16966: so 'bhiplutya tadā śaktiṃ jagrāha puruṣottamaḥ // HV_108.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:16968: sā bhittvā tasya dehaṃ tu jagāma vasudhātalam // HV_108.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:16969: [k: After an addl. colophon, M3 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16973: [k: N (except Ś1) T4 G2.4.5 ins. after 74: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16975: tato mūrchābhibhūtaṃ taṃ kumbhāṇḍo vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:16976: upekṣase dānavendra kim evaṃ śatrum udyatam // HV_108.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:16977: labdhalakṣyo hy ayaṃ vīro nirvikāro 'dya dṛśyate /
GE07hv_conpu:16978: māyām āśritya yudhyasva nāyaṃ vadhyo 'nyathā bhavet // HV_108.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:16979: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva pramādāt kim upekṣase /
GE07hv_conpu:16980: vadhyatām ayam adyaiva na naḥ sarvān vināśayet // HV_108.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:16982: anyāṃś ca śataśo hatvā uṣāṃ nītvā vrajiṣyati | *HV_108.77*1248 |
GE07hv_conpu:16984: vācaṃ rūkṣām abhikruddhaḥ provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_108.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:16985: eṣo 'ham asya vidadhe mṛtyuṃ prāṇaharaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:16986: ādāsyāmy aham enaṃ vai garutmān iva pannagam // HV_108.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:16987: ity evam uktvā sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ sadhvajasārathiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16990: pauruṣeṇa samāyuktaḥ sa praikṣata diśo daśa // HV_108.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:16991: āsthāya tāmasīṃ vidyāṃ tadā kruddho baleḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16992: mumoca viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇāṃś channo māyādharo balī // HV_108.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:16994: veṣṭito bahudhā tasya dehaḥ pannagarāśibhiḥ // HV_108.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:16997: sa tu veṣṭitasarvāṅgo baddhaḥ prādyumnir āhave /
GE07hv_conpu:16998: niṣprayatnaḥ sthitaḥ svastho maināka iva parvataḥ // HV_108.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:17000: abhītaḥ parvatākāraḥ prādyumnir abhavad raṇe // HV_108.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:17002: na vivyathe sa bhūtātmā sarvataḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ // HV_108.86 //
GE07hv_conpu:17003: tatas taṃ vāgbhir ugrābhiḥ saṃrabdhaḥ samatarjayat /
GE07hv_conpu:17004: bāṇo dhvajaṃ samāśritya provācāmarṣito vacaḥ // HV_108.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:17005: kumbhāṇḍa vadhyatāṃ śīghram ayaṃ vai kulapāṃsanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17006: cāritraṃ yena me loke dūṣitaṃ dūṣitātmanā // HV_108.88 //
GE07hv_conpu:17007: ity evam ukte vacane kumbhāṇḍo vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:17008: rājan vakṣyāmy ahaṃ kiṃcit tan me śṛṇu yadīcchasi // HV_108.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:17009: ayaṃ vijñāyatāṃ kasya kuto vāyam ihāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17012: mayāyaṃ bahuśo yuddhe dṛṣṭo rājan mahāraṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:17013: krīḍann iva ca yuddheṣu dṛśyate devasūnuvat // HV_108.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:17019: vijñāya ca vadhaṃ vāsya pūjāṃ vāpi kariṣyasi // HV_108.92 //
GE07hv_conpu:17020: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T2.4 G2.3 ins. (G4 after 92ab; G5 after first occurrence of 92cd): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17022: adeyā hy apratigrāhyā ataś cintya vadhaṃ kuru | *HV_108.92*1251:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17023: vadhe hy asya mahān doṣo rakṣaṇe sumahān guṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17024: ayaṃ hi puruṣotkarṣaḥ sarvathā mānam arhati // HV_108.93 //
GE07hv_conpu:17025: sarvato veṣṭitatanur na vyathaty eṣa bhogibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17026: [k: K1 Ñ2.3 V B Ds D1.4-6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17029: na no gaṇayate sarvān vadhaṃ prāpto 'py ayaṃ balī // HV_108.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:17030: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B Dn (both second time)
GE07hv_conpu:17032: T2 G2-5 ins. after 94 (Dn D6 (all first time) after 77ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17033: yadi māyāprabhāvena nātra baddho bhaved ayam | *HV_108.94*1253:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17037: triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā na cintayati naḥ sthitān // HV_108.95 //
GE07hv_conpu:17039: na cintayati rājaṃs tvāṃ vīryavān ko 'py asau yuvā // HV_108.96 //
GE07hv_conpu:17041: rucitaṃ yadi te rājañ jñeyo vīryabalānvitaḥ // HV_108.97 // [k:
GE07hv_conpu:17042: K2 V2.3 D2-4.6 G3 ins. (K1.4 Ñ2.3 V1 B Dn Ds D1.5 T4 G2.4.5 after second occurrence of 97cd): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17043: kanyā ceyaṃ na cānyasya niryātyānena saṃgatā || *HV_108.97*1254:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17044: yadi ceṣṭatamaḥ kaścid ayaṃ vaṃśe mahātmanaḥ | *HV_108.97*1254:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17045: tataḥ pūjām ayaṃ vīraḥ prāpsyaty evāsurottamaḥ || *HV_108.97*1254:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17046: rakṣyatām iti coktvaiva tathāstv iti ca tasthivān | *HV_108.97*1254:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17047: [k: G3-5 cont., T1 M ins. after 97 (T2 after 95ab; G1 after 68a): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17048: bāḍham ity abravīd bāṇo hantuṃ vyavasitaḥ kila | *HV_108.97*1255:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17049: uṣāṃ babandha nigaḍair dṛḍhaiḥ pāśaiś ca saṃyataiḥ || *HV_108.97*1255:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17050: vyādideśa tato bāṇo rakṣiṇaḥ kiṃkarān bahūn | *HV_108.97*1255:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17051: rakṣyatām eṣa duṣṭātmā sā ca rakṣyā kulādhamā || *HV_108.97*1255:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17053: kumbhāṇḍena yayau sārdhaṃ svam eva bhavanaṃ balī | *HV_108.97*1255:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17054: kumbhāṇḍasya vacaḥ śrutvā śuddhānte pannagair bhṛśam /
GE07hv_conpu:17055: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T.4 G4.5 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17056: evam ukte tu vacane kumbhāṇḍena mahātmanā | *HV_108.98ab*1256 |
GE07hv_conpu:17057: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B D T4 M4 cont., G2 M4 ins. after 98ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17058: tathety āha ca kumbhāṇḍaṃ bāṇaḥ śatruniṣūdanaḥ || *HV_108.98*1257:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17060: aniruddhaṃ yodhayitvā bāṇaḥ svagṛham āviśat // HV_108.98 //
GE07hv_conpu:17061: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B D T4 G2 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17062: yayau svam eva bhavanaṃ baleḥ putro mahāsuraḥ | *HV_108.98cd*1258 |
GE07hv_conpu:17063: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B D T4 G2 cont., Ñ3 ins. after 98 (T2 G1.3 cont. after 1255*: G4.5 after 1257*): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17066: tato hy ākāśamārgeṇa munir dvāravatīṃ gataḥ || *HV_108.98*1259:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17068: naṣṭo 'yaṃ dānavaḥ krūro yuddhaṃ prāpya na saṃśayaḥ || *HV_108.98*1259:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17070: jñāpayiṣyati tattvena imam arthaṃ yathaiva tat || *HV_108.98*1259:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:17071: nāgair viveṣṭitaṃ dṛṣṭvā uṣā prādyumnim āturā | *HV_108.98*1259:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:17072: ruroda bāṣparaktākṣī tām āha rudatīṃ punaḥ || *HV_108.98*1259:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:17073: kim idaṃ rudyeta bhīru mā bhais tvaṃ śubhalocane | *HV_108.98*1259:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:17075: yasya śaṅkhadhvaniṃ śrutvā bāhuśabdaṃ balasya ca | *HV_108.98*1259:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:17078: evam uktā niruddhena uṣā viśrambham āgatā | *HV_108.98*1259:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:17079: nṛśaṃsaṃ cāpi pitaraṃ śocate sā sumadhyamā | *HV_108.98*1259:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:17080: [k: After line 3, Ñ2 V2 B2 Ds1 D2.6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17091: priyaṃ nātham apaśyantyaḥ kiṃnarya iva saṃghaśaḥ // HV_109.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:17092: aho dhik kim idaṃ loke nāthe kṛṣṇe vyavasthite /
GE07hv_conpu:17093: anāthā iva saṃtrastā rudimo bhayamohitāḥ // HV_109.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:17095: bāhucchāyāṃ samāśritya vasanti divi devatāḥ // HV_109.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:17097: yasyāniruddhaḥ pautraḥ sa vīraḥ kenāpi no hṛtaḥ // HV_108.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:17098: aho nāsti bhayaṃ nūnaṃ tasya loke sudurmateḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17099: vāsudevasya yaḥ krodhaṃ prajvālayati duḥsaham // HV_109.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:17104: sa vāsudevaṃ samare mohāt pratyudiyād ripuḥ // HV_109.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:17106: kathaṃ jīvan vimucyeta sākṣād api śatakratuḥ // HV_109.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:17107: kṛtāgā na sa śocyas tu vayaṃ tv adya vinākṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17109: ity evaṃ tā rudantyaś ca vadantyaś ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17110: netrajaṃ vāri mumucur aśivaṃ paramāṅganāḥ // HV_109.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:17117: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoram apūrvaṃ bhayam āgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:17118: utpetuḥ sahasā khebhyo gṛhebhyaḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ // HV_109.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:17120: gṛhe kṛṣṇābhiguptānāṃ kuto no bhayam āgatam // HV_109.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:17122: pradharṣitā yathā siṃhā guhābhya iva niḥsṛtāḥ // HV_109.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:17124: tasyāḥ śabdena te sarve sabhām āgamya viṣṭhitāḥ // HV_109.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:17125: kim etad iti cānyonyaṃ samapṛcchanta yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17126: anyonyasya hi te sarve yathānyāyam avedayan // HV_109.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:17132: kṛṣṇaṃ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ // HV_109.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:17133: kim evaṃ cintayāviṣṭaḥ puruṣendra bhavān iha /
GE07hv_conpu:17135: bhavantam āśritāḥ kṛṣṇa saṃvibhaktāś ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_109.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:17136: tathaiva balahā śakras tvayy āveśya jayājayau /
GE07hv_conpu:17137: sukhaṃ svapiti niścintaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ cintayānvitaḥ // HV_109.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:17138: śokasāgaram akṣobhyaṃ sarve te jñātayo gatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17139: tān majjamānān ekas tvaṃ samuddhara mahābhuja // HV_109.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:17140: kim evaṃ cintayāviṣṭo na kiṃcid api bhāṣase /
GE07hv_conpu:17141: cintāṃ kartuṃ vṛthā deva na tvam arhasi mādhava // HV_109.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:17142: ity evam uktaḥ kṛṣṇas tu niḥśvasya suciraṃ punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17143: prāha vākyaṃ sa vākyajño bṛhaspatir iva svayam // HV_109.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:17145: [k: Ś1 K1 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D1.2.4-6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17146: vicintayaṃs tv ahaṃ cāsya kāryasya na labhe gatim | *HV_109.25ab*1262 |
GE07hv_conpu:17147: tathāhaṃ bhavatāpy ukto nottaraṃ vidadhe kvacit // HV_109.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:17149: śṛṇudhvaṃ yādavāḥ sarve yathā cintānvito hy aham // HV_109.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:17151: aśaktān iva manyante sarvān asmān sabāndhavān // HV_109.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:17152: āhukaś caiva no rājā hṛtaḥ sālvena vai purā /
GE07hv_conpu:17153: pratyānītas tato 'smābhir yuddhaṃ kṛtvā sudāruṇam // HV_109.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:17154: pradyumnaś cāpi no bālye śambareṇa hṛto hy abhūt /
GE07hv_conpu:17155: sa taṃ nihatya samare prāpto rukmiṇinandanaḥ // HV_09.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:17156: idaṃ tu sumahatkaṣṭaṃ prādyumniḥ kva pravāsitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17157: naivaṃvidham ahaṃ doṣaṃ smarāmi manujarṣabhāḥ // HV_109.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:17158: bhasmanā guṇṭhitaḥ pādo yena me mūrdhni pātitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17160: mama netraṃ durāsrāvam andhatāṃ ko 'nayad balāt | *HV_109.31ab*1263:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17161: ko vā jaḍamatiḥ satyaṃ ratnaṃ me makuṭād dharet || *HV_109.31ab*1263:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17162: ko vā balaṃ durādharṣam avamatyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ | *HV_109.31ab*1263:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17163: ko nu vā śiniputrasya cāpaṃ na smarati prabho | *HV_109.31ab*1263:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17164: sānubandhasya tasyāhaṃ hariṣye jīvitaṃ raṇe // HV_109.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:17165: ity evam ukte kṛṣṇena sātyakir vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:17166: carāḥ kṛṣṇa prayujyantām aniruddhasya mārgaṇe // HV_109.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:17167: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D5(marg.).6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17170: atraiva prāyaśas tatra yadi syāt kenacid dhṛtaḥ | *HV_109.32*1265:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17171: jñāte pratikariṣyāmi yat tu prāptam anantaram | *HV_109.32*1265:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17172: āhukaṃ prāha kṛṣṇas tu smitaṃ kṛtvā vacas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:17173: ābhyantarāś ca bāhyāś ca vyādiśyantāṃ carā nṛpa // HV_109.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:17174: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D1.3-6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17178: tataś carās tu vyādiṣṭāḥ pārthivena yaśasvinā /
GE07hv_conpu:17179: abhyantaraṃ ca mārgadhvaṃ bāhyataś ca samantataḥ // HV_109.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:17180: [k: K Ñ2 Dn D1-5 T4 ins. (V B Ds D6 after 34ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17181: hayā rathāś ca vyādiṣṭāḥ pārthivena mahātmanā | *HV_109.34*1267 |
GE07hv_conpu:17183: ṛkṣavantaṃ giriṃ caiva mārgadhvaṃ tvaritā hayaiḥ // HV_109.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:17185: gantavyaṃ cāpi niḥsaṅgam udyāneṣu samantataḥ // HV_109.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:17186: hayānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi rathānāṃ cāpy anekaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17187: āruhya tvaritāḥ sarve mārgadhvaṃ yadunandanam // HV_109.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:17190: śṛṇu kṛṣṇa vaco mahyaṃ yadi te rocate vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:17191: cirāt prabhṛti me vaktuṃ bhavantaṃ jāyate matiḥ // HV_109.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:17193: saubhaḥ sālvaś ca nihatau maindo dvivida eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:17194: hayagrīvaś ca sumahān sānubandhas tvayā hataḥ // HV_109.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:17196: kaṃsaś ca nihataḥ kṛṣṇa narakaś ca nipātitaḥ | *HV_109.40*1268:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17197: anye ca bahavas tatra sainyāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ | *HV_109.40*1268:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17199: sarvāṇy etāni karmāṇi niḥśeṣāṇi raṇe raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:17200: kṛtavān asi govinda pārṣṇigrāhaś ca nāsti te // HV_109.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:17201: idaṃ karma tvayā kṛṣṇa sānubandhaṃ kṛtaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:17202: pārijātasya haraṇe yat kṛtaṃ karma duṣkaraṃ // HV_109.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:17205: tena vairaṃ tvayā sārdhaṃ kartavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17206: tatrānubandhaś ca mahāṃs tena kāryas tvayā saha // HV_109.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:17208: na hy anyasya bhavec chaktir vairaniryātanaṃ prati // HV_109.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:17209: ity evam ukte vacane kṛṣṇo nāga iva śvasan /
GE07hv_conpu:17210: uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān anādhṛṣṭiṃ mahābalam // HV_109.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:17211: senānīs tāta mā maivaṃ na devāḥ kṣudrakarmiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17212: nākṛtajñā na vā klībā nāvaliptā na bāliśāḥ // HV_109.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:17213: devatārthaṃ ca me yatno mahān dānavasaṃkṣaye /
GE07hv_conpu:17214: teṣāṃ priyārthaṃ ca raṇe hanmi dṛptān mahāsurān // HV_109.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:17215: tatparas tanmanāś cāsmi tadbhaktas tatpriye rataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17216: kathaṃ pāpaṃ kariṣyanti vijñāyaivaṃvidhaṃ hi mām // HV_109.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:17218: na teṣu pāpaṃ vijñeyaṃ bāliśa tvaṃ prabhāṣase // HV_109.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:17219: [k: Ñ2 V2 B Ds D1.2.4.5. (D6 after 1270*, T1.2 G1.3-5 after 54ab) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17220: kadācid iha puṃścalyā aniruddho hṛto bhavet | *HV_109.50*1269:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17225: na vaktavyam idaṃ pāpaṃ tvadvidhena yadūttama | *HV_109.50*1270 |
GE07hv_conpu:17228: yac chakrasya prabhoḥ kāryaṃ tad asmākaṃ viniścitam /
GE07hv_conpu:17229: asmākaṃ cāpi yat kāryaṃ tac ca kāryaṃ śacīpateḥ // HV_109.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:17230: saṃrakṣyāś ca vayaṃ devair asmābhiś cāpi devatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17231: devatārthe vayaṃ cāpi mānuṣatvam upāgatāḥ // HV_109.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:17236: nāyaṃ devair na gandharvair nāpi yakṣair na rākṣasaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17237: pradyumnaputro 'pahṛtaḥ puṃścalyā tu hṛtaḥ striyā // HV_109.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:17239: tābhir hṛto na saṃdeho nānyato vidyate bhayam // HV_109.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:17241: [k: After 57a, K Ñ2 V B D T4 G2.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17246: madhuraḥ śrūyate śabdo mādhavasya niveśane // HV_109.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:17247: te carāḥ sarvataḥ sarve sabhādvāram upāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17248: śanair gadgadayā vācā idaṃ vacanam abruvan // HV_109.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:17249: udyānāni śilāḥ śailā guhā nadyaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GE07hv_conpu:17250: ekaikaṃ śataśo rājan mārgitaṃ na ca dṛśyeta // HV_109.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:17252: anye kṛṣṇaṃ carā rājann upāgamya tadābruvan | *HV_109.59*1273:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17253: sarve no viditā deśāḥ prādyumnir na ca dṛśyate | *HV_109.59*1273:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17255: te 'pi śāntimanaskā hi gamayeyuḥ kathaṃ ca naḥ | *HV_109.59*1274 |
GE07hv_conpu:17257: tadājñāpaya naḥ kṣipram aniruddhasya mārgaṇe // HV_109.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:17259: anyonyam abhyabhāṣanta kim ataḥ kāryam uttaram // HV_109.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:17261: kecic cācintañ śūrā āsthāya bhrukuṭiṃ narāḥ // HV_109.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:17265: [k: Ñ2 V2.3 B Ds D2.3.6 T4 cont. (G2 ins. after 62ab, G4.5 after 62): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17266: aniruddhaḥ kutaś ceti saṃbhramaḥ sumahān abhūt | *HV_109.62*1276 |
GE07hv_conpu:17267: [k: Ñ2 V2.3 B Ds D2.3.6 cont. (K Ñ1 V1 Dn D1.4.5 cont. after 1275): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17269: tāṃ niśāṃ vimanaskās te gamayeyuḥ kathaṃcana || *HV_109.62*1277:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17270: aniruddho hṛtaś ceti punaḥ punar ariṃdama | *HV_109.62*1277:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17271: evaṃ ca bruvatāṃ teṣāṃ prabhātā rajanī tadā | *HV_109.62*1277:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17272: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca śaṅkhānāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17276: kiṃ mayā kāryam ity eva kuto nu bhayam āgatam | *HV_109.63*1278:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17277: sarvathā yatnam āsthāya yatiṣye kāryam uttaram || *HV_109.63*1278:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17279: yatrāsau sthitavān pautro gamiṣyāmy aham adya vai || *HV_109.63*1278:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17280: prathamaṃ kāṃ diśaṃ yāsye kena syāc chrūyate 'khilam | *HV_109.63*1278:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17281: yadi kaścid vijānīyāt tadā tu sukṛtaṃ bhavet | *HV_109.63*1278:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:17284: praviveśa sabhām eko nāradaḥ prahasann iva // HV_109.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:17286: dṛṣṭvā tu yādavān sarvān kṛṣṇena saha saṃgatān | *HV_109.64*1279 |
GE07hv_conpu:17287: [k: Ñ2 B Dn Ds D1.5.6 cont., K Ñ3 V D2-4 T4 G4.5 ins. after 64: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17291: madhuparkaṃ ca gāṃ caiva nāradāya dadau prabhuḥ // HV_109.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:17295: utsāhanāśāt sarve vai klībā iva vicetasaḥ // HV_109.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:17296: [k: T1.2 G1.3 M1-3 (G2.5 M4 after 70) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17297: atīte divase vīre yādavā adbhutaṃ mahat | *HV_109.67*1281 |
GE07hv_conpu:17298: evam ukte tu vacane nāradena mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:17299: vāsudevo 'bravīd vākyaṃ śrūyatāṃ bhagavann idam // HV_109.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:17300: aniruddho hṛto brahman kenāpi niśi suvrata /
GE07hv_conpu:17302: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 (G2.4.5 after 67) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17303: eṣa te yadi vṛttāntaḥ śruto dṛṣṭo 'pi vā mune || *HV_109.69*1282:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17304: bhagavan kathyatāṃ sādhu priyam etan mamānagha | *HV_109.69*1282:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17305: ity evam ukte vacane keśavena mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:17306: prahasya nāradaḥ prāha śrūyatāṃ madhusūdana // HV_109.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:17308: aniruddhasya caikasya bāṇasya ca mahāmṛdhe // HV_109.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:17310: tasyārthe citralekhā vai jahārāśu tam apsarāḥ // HV_109.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:17311: ubhayor api tatrāsīn mahad yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:17313: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17314: asmābhiś cāpi tad yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sumahad adbhutam | *HV_109.73*1283 |
GE07hv_conpu:17316: baṇena māyām āsthāya baddho nāgair mahābalaḥ // HV_109.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:17318: hatvā dānavasaṃghāṃś ca koṭiśaḥ śataśas tathā | *HV_109.74*1284:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17319: dṛṣṭam etan mayā viṣṇo prādyumner yuddham īdṛśam | *HV_109.74*1284:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17320: [k: T2 G2.4 cont. (K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 ins. after 74): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17321: vyādiṣṭas tu vadhas tasya bāṇena garuḍadhvaja | *HV_109.74*1285:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17322: taṃ nivāritavān mantrī kumbhāṇḍo nāma tasya ha | *HV_109.74*1285:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17323: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G4.5 cont. (Ś1 Ñ1 ins. after 74): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17325: bāṇena māyām āsthāya sarpair niyamanaṃ kṛtam | *HV_109.74*1286:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17326: uttiṣṭhatu bhavāñ śīghraṃ yaśase vijayāya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:17327: nāyaṃ saṃrakṣituṃ kālaḥ prāṇāṃs tāta jayaiṣiṇām // HV_109.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:17328: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17329: prāṇaiḥ kiṃcid gatair vīro dhairyam ālambya tiṣṭhati | *HV_109.75*1287 |
GE07hv_conpu:17330: ity evam ukte vacane vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_conpu:17331: prāyātrikān vai saṃbhārān ājñāpayata vīryavān // HV_109.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:17334: tataś candanacūrṇaiś ca lājaiś cāpi samantataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17335: niryayau sa mahābāhuḥ kīryamāṇo janārdanaḥ // HV_109.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:17337: gantum aichaj jagannātho bāṇaṃ hantuṃ mahāsuram | *HV_109.77*1289 |
GE07hv_conpu:17339: smaraṇaṃ vainateyasya kṛṣṇa tvaṃ kartum arhasi /
GE07hv_conpu:17340: na hy anyena tam adhvānaṃ gantuṃ śakyaṃ mahābhuja // HV_109.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:17341: [k: K Ñ2 V B D G2.4.5 G (ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17342: śrūyatāṃ ca tad adhvānaṃ gantavyam atidurjayam | *HV_109.78*1290 |
GE07hv_conpu:17344: taditaḥ śoṇitapuraṃ prādyumnir yatra sāṃpratam // HV_109.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:17346: [k: Ñ2 V B2 Dn (B1 (marg.) D2.3 after 80) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17347: samāhvayasva govinda sa hi tvāṃ tatra neṣyati | *HV_109.80ab*1291 |
GE07hv_conpu:17348: ekena sa muhūrtena bāṇaṃ saṃdarśayiṣyati // HV_109.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:17349: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prādhyāyad garuḍaṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17351: kṛṣṇakeśaḥ pravalayo jiṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaś ca varṇataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17357: sahasram iva sūryāṇāṃ dīpyamānaḥ prakāśate // HV_109.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:17358: yaḥ prabhur bhāti bhūtātmā bhūtānāṃ bhāvanaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17359: yasyāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ dadau prītaḥ prajāpatiḥ // HV_109.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:17366: gamanāya matiṃ cakre vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_109.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:17367: āsthito garuḍaṃ devas tasya cānu halāyudhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17371: jaya bāṇaṃ mahābāho ye cāsyānucarā raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:17372: na hi te pramukhe sthātuṃ kaścic chakto mahāmṛdhe // HV_109.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:17373: prasāde te dhruvā lakṣmīr vijayaś ca parākrame /
GE07hv_conpu:17374: vijeṣyasi raṇe śatruṃ daityendraṃ sahasainikam // HV_109.90 //
GE07hv_conpu:17376: śṛṇvan vāco 'ntarikṣasthaḥ prayayau keśavo raṇe // HV_109.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:17379: , adhyāya 110, transliterated from the critical ed. (P. L. Vaidya, Poona 1969)
GE07hv_conpu:17381: ; proof-read by Peter Bisschop. This is the version of April 5, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:17383: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca śaṅkhānāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17385: [k: M ins. after 1: D6 after *1293: T4 after 109.87: G2.4 (first time) after 109.88: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17392: jaya yajñapate deva jaya viśvaguro hare | *HV_110.1*1294:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:17399: jaya viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa jaya bāṇaṃ mahāsura | *HV_110.1*1294:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:17400: sa tūnmukhair jayāśīrbhiḥ stūyamāno hi mānavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17401: babhāra rūpaṃ somārka+ +śakrāṇāṃ sadṛśaṃ hariḥ // HV_110.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:17403: vainateyasya bhadraṃ te bṛṃhitaṃ haritejasā // HV_110.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:17404: [k: T1.2 G1.4.5 M ins. after 3: G(ed.) after 4: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17406: tṛptiṃ nādyāpi govinda prāpnuyāmo hareḥ sadā | *HV_110.3*1295:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17410: carma śārṅgaṃ tathā cāpaṃ śaṅkhaṃ caivāsya vāmataḥ // HV_110.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:17411: śīrṣāṇāṃ vai sahasraṃ tu vihitaṃ śārṅgadhanvanā /
GE07hv_conpu:17412: sahasraṃ caiva kāyānāṃ vahan saṃkarṣaṇas tadā // HV_110.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:17414: āsthito garuḍaṃ rāma udyann iva niśākaraḥ // HV_110.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:17418: jagāma mārgaṃ balavān vātasya pratiṣedhayan // HV_110.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:17419: ati vāyor atha gatim āsthāya garuḍas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:17421: atha rāmo 'bravīd vākyaṃ kṛṣṇam apratimam raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:17422: svābhiḥ prabhābhir hīnāḥ smaḥ kṛṣṇa kasmād apūrvavat // HV_110.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:17423: sarve kanakavarṇābhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ sma na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17424: kim idaṃ brūhi nas tattvaṃ kiṃ meroḥ pārśvagā vayam // HV_110.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:17426: [k: Ñ2.3 V B1.2 Dn Ds D1.2.5(marg.).6 ins. after the ref.; D3 after 12: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17428: rakṣārthaṃ tasya niyato vahnir eṣa sthito jvalan | *HV_110.13*1296:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17430: tena no varṇavairūpyam idaṃ jātaṃ halāyudha // HV_110.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:17432: yadi sma saṃnikarṣasthā yadi niṣprabhatāṃ gatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17433: tad vidhatsva svayaṃ buddhyā yad atrānantaraṃ hitam // HV_110.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:17435: kuruṣva vainateya tvaṃ yan naḥ kāryam anantaram /
GE07hv_conpu:17436: tvayā vidhāne vihite kariṣyāmy aham uttaram // HV_110.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:17437: etac chrutvā tadā vākyaṃ keśavasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17438: [k: For 16ab, K Ñ2.3 V B D G2 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17439: etac chrutvā tu garuḍo vāsudevasya bhāṣitam | *HV_110.16ab*1297 |
GE07hv_conpu:17440: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D G2 cont.; G5 M4 ins. after 16ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17442: gaṅgām upāgamat tūrṇaṃ vainateyas tato balī // HV_110.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:17443: [k: K Ñ V B D G2.5 ins. after 16; G4 after 14: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17448: sa pakṣābhyām upādāya vavarṣa salilaṃ bahu | *HV_110.16*1299A |
GE07hv_conpu:17449: gṛhītvā salilaṃ tatra tam agnim abhiṣecayat /
GE07hv_conpu:17450: agnir āhavanīyas tu tataḥ śāntim upāgamat // HV_110.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:17451: [k: After 17, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17453: paramaṃ vismayaṃ gatvā suparṇo vākyam abravīt || *HV_110.17*1300:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17454: aho vīryam athāgnes tu yo dahed yugasaṃkṣaye | *HV_110.17*1300:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17455: [k: Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn1 Ds D6 cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17456: tad eva varṇavairūpyaṃ cakre kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ | *HV_110.17*1301 |
GE07hv_conpu:17457: trayas trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ paryāptā iti me matiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17458: kṛṣṇaḥ saṃkarṣaṇaś caiva pradyumnaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_110.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:17459: tataḥ praśānte dahane saṃpratasthe sa pakṣirāṭ /
GE07hv_conpu:17462: [k: After 20ab, T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17463: niyuktāḥ śūlinā pūrvaṃ rakṣaṇe nagarasya hi | *HV_110.20ab*1302:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17465: āsthitā garuḍaṃ hy ete nānārūpā bhayāvāhāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17466: kim artham iha saṃprāptāḥ ke vāpīme janās trayaḥ // HV_110.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:17468: prāvartayaṃś ca saṃgrāmaṃ tais tribhiḥ saha yādavaiḥ // HV_110.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:17469: [k: After 22 (=21?), N (except Ś1; Ñ1 om.) T4 G2.4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17470: teṣāṃ yuddhe prasaktānāṃ saṃnādaḥ sumahān abhūt || *HV_110.21*1303:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17471: taṃ ca śrutvā mahānādaṃ siṃhānām iva garjatām | *HV_110.21*1303:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17473: yatra tad vartate yuddhaṃ tatra gacchasva māciram | *HV_110.21*1303:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17475: athājñaptas tu bāṇena puruṣo vai manojavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17476: dṛṣṭvā tat sarvam āgacche+ +tyuktaḥ prahvas tatas tvaran // HV_110.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:17477: tathety uktvā sa tad yuddhaṃ vartamānam avaikṣata /
GE07hv_conpu:17479: te jātavedasaḥ sarve kalmāṣaḥ khasṛmas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:17480: dahanaḥ śoṣaṇaś caiva tapanaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17481: svadhākārasya viṣaye prakhyātāḥ pañca vahnayaḥ // HV_110.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:17485: paṭaraḥ patagaḥ svarṇo agādho bhrāja eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:17486: svāhākārāśrayā pañca ayudhyaṃs te 'pi cāgnayaḥ // HV_110.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:17489: tayor madhye 'ṅgirāś caiva maharṣir vibabhau prabhuḥ // HV_110.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:17490: [k: After 26cd, Ñ2.3 B Dn D6 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17491: āgneyaṃ ratham āsthāya śūlam udyamya bhāsvaram | *HV_110.26*1305 |
GE07hv_conpu:17493: kṛṣṇaḥ provāca vacanaṃ smayann iva punaḥ punaḥ // HV_110.27 //

GE07hv_conpu:17504: śeṣās tato 'gnayaḥ sarve catvāro brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:17531: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 ins. after the addl. colophon: G(ed.) after 35: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17533: tato bāṇapuraṃ prāpya śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau janārdanaḥ | *HV_110.35*1310:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17534: tato hi balabhadras tu dadhmau śaṅkham anuttamam || *HV_110.35*1310:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17535: pradyumnaś cāpi saṃkruddho dadhmau śaṅkham anuttamam | *HV_110.35*1310:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17537: caturṇāṃ ca mahārāja sāgarāṇāṃ yathā svanaḥ | *HV_110.35*1310:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17538: prādur babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo bāṇapuraṃ prati | *HV_110.35*1310:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17541: tataḥ kiṃkarasainyaṃ tad abhyāgāt samare mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:17542: koṭiśaś cāpi bahudhā dīptapraharaṇaṃ tadā // HV_110.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:17548: [k: After 40ab, Ñ2.3 V1.3 B Dn D4-6 T1 G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17550: āpīyata tadā raktaṃ caturṇām api saṃyuge // HV_110.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:17551: tato rāmo mahābāhuḥ keśavaṃ vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:17552: [k: For 41ab, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G(ed.) subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17555: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahābāho vidhatsvaiṣāṃ mahad bhayam // HV_110.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:17560: prayayau tvarayā yukto yato 'dṛśyata tadbalam // HV_110.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:17562: pramāthagaṇabhūyiṣṭhaṃ balaṃ tad abhavat kṣitau // HV_110.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:17564: [k: After 45ab, T2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17565: vetāḷaiś ca piśācaiś ca bhakṣayadbhiś ca māṃsakam | *HV_110.45ab*1313 |
GE07hv_conpu:17567: vātoddhūtair iva ghanair viprakīrṇair ivācalaiḥ // HV_110.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:17568: [k: After 45, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17570: musalair asibhiḥ śūlair gadābhiḥ parighais tathā || *HV_110.45*1314:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17571: adhāvat tad asaṃkhyeyaṃ śuśubhe sarvato balam | *HV_110.45*1314:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17573: vainateyagato rāmas tān dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:17574: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahābāho yad etad dṛśyate balam /
GE07hv_conpu:17575: etaiḥ saha raṇe yoddhum icchāmi puruṣottama // HV_110.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:17577: iti bruvāṇaṃ rāmaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇo vacanam abravīt | *HV_110.46*1315 |
GE07hv_conpu:17578: mamāpy eṣaiva saṃjātā buddhir ity abravīc ca tam /
GE07hv_conpu:17580: eṣo 'bhilaṣitaḥ kāmaḥ prāg eva hi mamābhavat | *HV_110.47ab*1316 |
GE07hv_conpu:17581: ebhiḥ saha samāgantum iccheyaṃ yuddhadurmadaiḥ // HV_110.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:17583: savye pārśve ca pradyumnas tathā me dakṣiṇe bhavān // HV_110.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:17585: evaṃ bruvantas te 'nyonyam adhirūḍhāḥ khagottamam // HV_110.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:17586: [k: After 49, S (except T4; T3 G2 missing) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17587: tato yuddhaṃ mahac cakre lāṅgalenātha lāṅgalī | *HV_110.49*1317:1 |

GE07hv_conpu:17597: pradhmāpya bahuśaḥ śaṅkham ayudhyata janārdanaḥ // HV_110.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:17599: akarot samare śatrūn vainateyaḥ pratāpavān // HV_110.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:17600: [k: K Ñ2.3 V1.2 B2.3 Dn D1-5 T4 G5 subst. for 54cd: Ds1 ins. after 54: Ds2 after 54ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17609: etasminn antare rājan nāradaḥ prayayau raṇāt | *HV_110.56ab*1320:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17611: pṛṣṭaḥ kim iha devarṣe saṃprāptas tad vadasva me || *HV_110.56ab*1320:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17612: tataḥ prahasya devarṣiḥ prāha rudraṃ mahīpate | *HV_110.56ab*1320:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17614: bāṇaḥ saṃhanyate deva kṛṣṇena halinā kila | *HV_110.56ab*1320:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17615: tasya sarvam anīkaṃ tu bhagnaṃ tan nāvatiṣṭhati || *HV_110.56ab*1320:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17616: kiṃ vartase 'dya niścinto bhartas te pīḍyate kila | *HV_110.56ab*1320:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:17617: kuruṣva tasya sāhāyyaṃ bhaktādhīno bhavān iti || *HV_110.56ab*1320:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:17620: niśvāsaṃ mumuce rājann astaḥ kaś cid vinirgataḥ || *HV_110.56ab*1320:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:17621: taṃ kiṃ karomīti haraṃ pṛcchantaṃ prāha bhūtapaḥ | *HV_110.56ab*1320:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:17623: tathety antardadhe so 'pi yayau yatra harir halī | *HV_110.56ab*1320:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:17624: pramathān āha rudras tu sajjā bhavata sattamāḥ || *HV_110.56ab*1320:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:17626: gaccha nārada tatra tvaṃ bāṇam āśvāsaya prabho || *HV_110.56ab*1320:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:17627: eṣa mām āgataṃ paśya tvatkṛte daityasattama | *HV_110.56ab*1320:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:17628: ghātayāmi yaduśreṣṭhau prāptau yāv iha mandadhīḥ || *HV_110.56ab*1320:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:17630: punar yayau kṛṣṇapārśvaṃ khecaro vā garutmani || *HV_110.56ab*1320:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:17631: kārayām āsa rudras tu prayānodyogam uttamam || *HV_110.56ab*1320:21 |
GE07hv_conpu:17632: jvaras tu raṇam āgatya dadarśa halinaṃ raṇe | *HV_110.56ab*1320:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:17633: ghnantaṃ dānavadaiteyāṃs taṃ hantuṃ sa samāgataḥ | *HV_110.56ab*1320:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:17634: jvaras tripādas triśirās tadā samaradurjayaḥ // HV_110.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:17639: kiṃ māṃ yudhyasi durbuddhe balavantaṃ mahāsvanam | *HV_110.58ab*1321 |
GE07hv_conpu:17640: kim evaṃ balamatto 'si na māṃ paśyasi saṃyuge /
GE07hv_conpu:17641: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me jīvan mokṣyase raṇamūrdhani // HV_110.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:17642: ity evam uktvā prahasan halāyudham abhidravat /
GE07hv_conpu:17643: yugāntāgninibhair ghorair muṣṭibhir janayan bhayam // HV_110.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:17646: [k: After 60, D6 T1.4 G1.3-5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17649: śaighryāl lakṣye nipatitaṃ śarīre parvatopame // HV_110.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:17650: tad bhasma vakṣasas tasya meroḥ śikharam āgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:17651: pradīptaṃ patitaṃ tat tu giriśṛṅgaṃ vyadārayat // HV_110.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:17653: niḥśvasañ jṛmbhamāṇaś ca nidrānvitatanur muhuḥ // HV_110.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:17654: netrayor ākulatvaṃ ca muhuḥ kurvan bhramaṃs tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:17655: saṃhṛṣṭalomā glānākṣaḥ kṣiptacitta iva śvasan // HV_110.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:17656: tato haladharo mattaḥ kṛṣṇam āha vicetanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17658: dahyāmi sarvatas tāta kathaṃ śāntir bhaven mama // HV_110.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:17659: ity evam ukte vacane pariṣvakto halāyudhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17660: [k: After 66a, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17662: prahasya vacanaṃ prāha kṛṣṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ | *HV_110.66a*1323:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17664: kṛṣṇena paramasnehāt tato dāhāt pramucyata // HV_110.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:17665: [k: For 66cd, Ś1 Ñ1 T1.2 G M subst: :k]

GE07hv_conpu:17668: mokṣayitvā balaṃ tatra dāhāt tu madhusūdanaḥ | *HV_110.66*1325 |
GE07hv_conpu:17670: [k: T1.2 G1.3.4 M subst. for 67ab: G5 ins. after 67ab: G(ed.) after 1325*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17671: balabhadro hṛṣīkeśāc chāntiṃ prāptas tadā raṇe || *HV_110.67ab*1326:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17672: tayor antaram āsādya tasthau yuddhāya keśavaḥ | *HV_110.67ab*1326:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17673: vyāvidhya sahasā bāhuṃ jvaram etad uvāca ha | *HV_110.67ab*1326:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17674: ehy ehi jvara yudhyasva yā te śaktir mahāmṛdhe /
GE07hv_conpu:17675: tāṃ darśayasva samare mayi yuddhaviśārada // HV_110.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:17676: [k: For 67ef, N (except Ś1) G5 G(ed.) subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17677: yac ca te pauruṣaṃ sarvaṃ tad darśayatu no bhavān | *HV_110.67ef*1327 |
GE07hv_conpu:17678: [k: G5 G(ed.) cont: T1.2 G1.3.4 M ins. after 67: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17679: tataḥ kruddho jvaro rājan duḥkhānām agraṇīr harim | *HV_110.67*1328 |
GE07hv_conpu:17680: savyetarābhyāṃ bāhubhyām evam ukto jvaras tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:17681: cikṣepa cainaṃ tad bhasma jvālāgarbhaṃ mahāgadaḥ // HV_110.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:17684: tataḥ pradīptas tu vibhur muhūrtam abhavat tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:17685: kṛṣṇaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śamaṃ cāgnir gataḥ punaḥ // HV_110.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:17686: tatas tair bhujagākārair bāhubhis tu tribhis tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:17687: jaghāna kṛṣṇaṃ grīvāyāṃ muṣṭinaikena corasi // HV_110.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:17688: [k: After 70, D6 S (T3 G2 missing) G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17689: tataḥ kruddho hṛṣīkeśo muṣṭinā nijaghāna tam | *HV_110.70*1330:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17690: vakṣaḥsthale sa bhūtātmā mūrdhni caiva punaḥ punaḥ || *HV_110.70*1330:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17692: tābhyāṃ vakṣaḥ samāhatya dadaṃśa ca yadūttamam || *HV_110.70*1330:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17695: jvarasya ca mahān āsīt kṛṣṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17696: parvateṣu patantīnām aśanīnām iva svanaḥ // HV_110.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:17697: [k: After 71, T1.2 G1.3.5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17698: aṣṭābhiś ca tribhiś caiva bāhubhiś ca tadā raṇam | *HV_110.71*1331:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17701: naivam evaṃ prahartavyam iti tatrābhavat svanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17702: muhūrtam abhavad yuddham anyonyaṃ sumahātmanoḥ // HV_110.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:17704: hantum aicchat tadā viṣṇur jvaraṃ lokabhayaṃkaram | *HV_110.72*1332 |
GE07hv_conpu:17705: tato jvaraṃ kanakavicitrabhūṣaṇaṃ nyapīḍayad bhujavalayena saṃyuge /
GE07hv_conpu:17706: yam akṣayaṃ samupanayañ jagatpatiḥ śarīradhṛg gaganacaraṃ mahāmṛdhe // HV_110.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:17708: , adhyāya 111, transliterated from the critical ed. (P. L. Vaidya, Poona 1969)
GE07hv_conpu:17710: ; proof-read by Arlo Griffiths. This is the version of April 5, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:17713: kṛṣṇo bhujabalābhyāṃ taṃ cikṣepātha mahītale // HV_111.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:17714: muktamātras tu bāhubhyāṃ kṛṣṇadehaṃ viveśa saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17716: [k: T1.2 G1.3.4 M subst. for 2cd: G5 ins. after 1: G(ed.) after 2: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17718: sa hy āviṣṭas tadā tena jvareṇāpratimaujasā /
GE07hv_conpu:17719: kṛṣṇaḥ skhalann iva muhuḥ kṣitau samabhivartata // HV_111.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:17720: jṛmbhate ca tadā kṛṣṇaḥ punaś ca skhalate bhṛśam /
GE07hv_conpu:17721: romāñ cotthitagātras tu nidrayā cābhibhūyate // HV_111.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:17722: [k: N (except Ś1 K3 Ñ1) T4 G4 ins. after 4: G5 after 5ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17726: so 'sṛjaj jvaram anyaṃ tu pūrvajvaravināśanam // HV_111.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:17728: sa vaiṣṇavajvaro gṛhya taṃ ca vai jvaram ojasā | *HV_111.5*1335:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17729: kṛṣṇāya na (?) saṃprayacchaṃs taṃ jagrāha punar hariḥ | *HV_111.5*1335:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17730: [k: While Ñ2.3 V B1.3 Dn Ds D1.5 G(ed.) ins. after 5: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17733: [k: Ñ2.3 V B1.3 Dn Ds D1.5 G(ed.)
GE07hv_conpu:17734: cont: K Ñ1 B2 D2-4.6 T4 G4.5 ins. after 5: Ś1 cont. after 1335*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17735: jvaraḥ kṛṣṇavisṛṣṭas tu gṛhītvā taṃ jvaraṃ balāt | *HV_111.5*1337:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17736: kṛṣṇāya hṛṣṭaḥ prāyacchat taṃ jagrāha tato hariḥ || *HV_111.5*1337:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17739: āvidhya bhūtale cainaṃ śatadhā kartum udyataḥ | *HV_111.5*1337:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17740: vyāghoṣayaj jvaras tatra bhoḥ paritrātum arhasi | *HV_111.5*1337:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17742: māheśvaro vaiṣṇavaś ca yuyudhāte jvarāv ubhau | *HV_111.5*1337A:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17744: [k: G4.5 cont: T1.2 G1.3 M G(ed.) ins. after 5: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17745: kṛṣṇajvaro jvaraṃ pūrvaṃ gṛhītvā svena tejasā | *HV_111.5*1338:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17748: tayos tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ jvarayor bāhuśālinoḥ || *HV_111.5*1338:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17750: dadṛśuś ca mahad yuddhaṃ bhūtāni ca samantataḥ | *HV_111.5*1338:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17751: tato māheśvaro yuddhe tāḍayām āsa vaiṣṇavam | *HV_111.5*1338:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:17753: sa gato vaiṣṇavaṃ rājan raudraṃ bhasmāyudhaṃ raṇe | *HV_111.5*1338:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:17754: dvābhyām atha ca bāhubhyāṃ gṛhītvātāḍayad balī || *HV_111.5*1338:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:17757: tato raudro jvaro rājan muṣṭinātha jaghāna tam | *HV_111.5*1338:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:17758: dadaṃśa dantair bahudhā jvaraṃ keśavam āhave || *HV_111.5*1338:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:17759: bāhubhyām eva tau rājan yuyudhāte mahāgadau | *HV_111.5*1338:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:17761: cakratuś ca mahānādaṃ jvarau tau lokaviśrutau | *HV_111.5*1338:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:17763: yatate bahudhā tatra muṣṭinātha jaghāna tam | *HV_111.5*1338:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:17764: āhatya bāhunā bhūyo niṣpipeṣa punaḥ punaḥ || *HV_111.5*1338:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:17767: gṛhītvā tu balād raudram ākṛṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ | *HV_111.5*1338:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:17768: kṛṣnāya hṛṣtaḥ prāyacchat kiṃ kariṣyāmy ataḥ param || *HV_111.5*1338:24 |
GE07hv_conpu:17771: utthāya ca hṛṣīkeśo jvaraṃ māheśvaraṃ raṇe | *HV_111.5*1338:27 |
GE07hv_conpu:17772: hantum aicchat tadā loko nirjvaro 'stv iti keśavaḥ | *HV_111.5*1338:28 |
GE07hv_conpu:17774: aśarīrā tato vāṇī tam uvācāntarikṣagā // HV_111.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:17776: mā vadhīr jvaram etaṃ vai rakṣaṇīyas tvayānagha /
GE07hv_conpu:17777: ity evam ukte vacane taṃ mumoca hariḥ svayam // HV_111.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:17778: [k: After 7, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G4.5 M4 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17780: evam ukto hṛṣīkeśaṃ jvaro vākyam athābravīt | *HV_111.7*1339:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17781: kṛṣṇasya pādayor mūrdhnā śaraṇaṃ so 'gamaj jvaraḥ || *HV_111.7*1339:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17783: yo me manorathā deva taṃ tvaṃ kuru mahābhuja | *HV_111.7*1339:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17784: [k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.3 M1-3 ins. after 7: D6 after line 2 of 1339*: G4.5 M4 G(ed.)
GE07hv_conpu:17786: tam uvāca jvaro bhūyaḥ sākṣād viṣṇur iva svayam | *HV_111.7*1340:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17794: namas te cakriṇe nityam asihastāya te namaḥ || *HV_111.7*1340:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:17796: namas te devadeveśa tubhyaṃ deva kapardine || *HV_111.7*1340:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:17803: namaḥ sarvātmane deva sarvakartre namo namaḥ || *HV_111.7*1340:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:17806: viṣṇo tvāṃ sakaleśeśa tvāṃ gadādharam avyayam || *HV_111.7*1340:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:17808: iti stutvā jagannāthaṃ nṛtyann iva tadā jvaraḥ | *HV_111.7*1340:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:17811: tam uvāca jvaro bhūyas tv aham eko jvaro bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:17812: [k: For 8ab, K Ñ2.3 V B D T1.2.4 G1.3-5 M subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17813: aham eko jvaras tāta nānyo loke jvaro bhavet | *HV_111.8ab*1341 |
GE07hv_conpu:17814: tava prasādān nānyaḥ syāj jvaraḥ samitiśobhana // HV_111.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:17815: [k: After 8, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17817: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te yathā tvaṃ jvara kāṅkṣase | *HV_111.8*1342:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17818: varārthināṃ varo deyo bhavāṃś ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ | *HV_111.8*1342:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17820: eka eva jvaro loke bhavān astu yathāsukham /
GE07hv_conpu:17821: [k: Some Mss. om. the ref. T1 G3 śrīkṛṣṇaḥ (for bhagavān)
GE07hv_conpu:17822: . After the ref., T1.2 G1.3.4 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17824: prītimāṃś cābhavat kṛṣṇo raudrajvaram uvāca ha | *HV_111.9*1343:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17827: yo 'yaṃ mayā jvaro sṛṣṭo mayy evaiṣa pralīyatām // HV_111.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:17829: [k: After 9, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G5 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17831: evam ukte tu vacane jvaraṃ prati mahāyaśāḥ | *HV_111.9*1345:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17832: kṛṣṇaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ punar vākyam uvāca ha || *HV_111.9*1345:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17833: śṛṇuṣva jvara saṃdeśaṃ yathā loke cariṣyasi | *HV_111.9*1345:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17835: tridhā vibhajya cātmānaṃ matpriyaṃ yadi kāṅkṣase | *HV_111.9*1345:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17837: tṛtīyo yaś ca te bhāgo mānuṣeṣūpapatsyate | *HV_111.9*1345:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:17838: tridhābhūtaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā pakṣiṣu tvaṃ bhava jvara || *HV_111.9*1345:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:17839: caturdhā yas tṛtīyasya bhaviṣyati ca te dhruvam | *HV_111.9*1345:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:17841: mānuṣeṣv atha bhedane vasa tvaṃ pravibhajya vai | *HV_111.9*1345:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:17842: jātiṣv athāvaśeṣāsu nivasa tvaṃ śṛṇuṣva me || *HV_111.9*1345:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:17844: pāṇḍupatraś ca vikhyātaḥ phaleṣv āturyam eva ca || *HV_111.9*1345:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:17845: apāṃ tu nīlikāṃ vidyāc chikhodbhedaś ca barhiṇām | *HV_111.9*1345:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:17846: padminīṣu himo bhūtvā pṛthivyām api coṣaraḥ || *HV_111.9*1345:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:17848: goṣv apasmārako bhūtvā khorakaś ca bhaviṣyasi || *HV_111.9*1345:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:17850: darśanāt sparśanāc cāpi prāṇināṃ vadham eṣyasi | *HV_111.9*1345:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:17854: kṛṣṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā jvaro hṛṣṭamanā hy abhūt | *HV_111.9*1345:22 |
GE07hv_conpu:17857: bhūyaś ca te vacaḥ kartum icchāmi puruṣarṣabha | *HV_111.9*1345:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:17858: tad ājñāpaya govinda kiṃ karomi mahābhuja | *HV_111.9*1345:26 |
GE07hv_conpu:17861: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te yathā tvaṃ jvara kākṣase | *HV_111.9*1345A |
GE07hv_conpu:17862: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D G5 cont: T1.2 G1 M ins. after 9: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17869: abhisaṃdhiṃ śṛṇuṣvādya yat tvā vakṣyāmi niścayāt | *HV_111.9*1346:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17871: yuvāṃ jvarau ca bhavatāṃ pīḍāyāṃ maraṇe tathā | *HV_111.9*1347:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17872: pīḍāyāṃ ca bhavān svāmī maraṇe māmakas tathā || *HV_111.9*1347:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17873: ihaiva līyatāṃ tāvaj jvaro māmaka eva hi | *HV_111.9*1347:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17875: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yat tvayā matpriyaṃ krṭaṃ /
GE07hv_conpu:17876: ājñāpaya priaṃ kiṃ te cakrāyudha karomy aham // HV_111.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:17877: [k: M1-3 ins. after 10: T2 G1 M4 after line 4 of 1346*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17880: na tasya jvarasaṃjātā pīḍā bhuvi bhaviṣyati | *HV_111.10*1348:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17882: mahāmṛdhe tava mama ca dvayor imaṃ parākramaṃ bhujabalakevalāstrayoḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17883: praṇamya mām ekamanāḥ paṭhet tu yaḥ sa vai bhavej jvara vigatajvaro naraḥ // HV_111.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:17884: [k: After 11, Ś1 K1.3 Ds1(marg.) D4.5(marg.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17886: sa me prītaḥ sukhaṃ dadyāt sarvāmayapatir jvaraḥ || *HV_111.11*1349:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17891: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena jvaraḥ sākṣān mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:17892: [k: After 12ab, K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G5 M4 G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17894: varaṃ labdhvā jvaro hṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇāc ca samayaṃ punaḥ | *HV_111.12ab*1350:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17895: [k: While T.1.2 G.1.3.4 M1-3 ins. after 12ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17896: evam astv iti govindaṃ babhāṣe keśavaṃ tadā | *HV_111.12ab*1351 |
GE07hv_conpu:17897: praṇamya śirasā kṛṣṇam apakrāntas tato raṇāt // HV_111.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:17902: , adhyāya 112, transliterated from the critical ed. (P. L. Vaidya, Poona 1969)
GE07hv_conpu:17904: ; proof-read by Arlo Griffiths. This is the version of April 5, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:17906: tatas te sahitāḥ sarve trayastraya ivāgnayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17907: vainateyaṃ samāruhya yudhyamānā raṇe sthitāḥ // HV_112.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:17918: lakṣaṃ ca rathavṛndaṃ tu hataṃ keśavasāyakaiḥ || *HV_112.5*1353:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17922: senāṃ bāṇaḥ samāsādya vārayan vākyam abravīt // HV_112.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:17927: svajātiṃ caiva vāsaṃ ca harasaṃsargam eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:17928: mānayadbhir na gantavyam eṣo hy aham avasthitaḥ // HV_112.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:17929: evam uccāritāṃ vācaṃ śṛṇvantas tām acintya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:17930: apakrāmanta te sarve dānavā bhayapīḍitāḥ // HV_112.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:17932: bhagnāvaśeṣaṃ yuddhāya manaś cakre punas tadā // HV_112.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:17933: kumbhāṇḍo nāma bāṇastha sakhāmātyaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:17934: balaṃ bhagnaṃ samālokya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_112.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:17935: eṣa bāṇaḥ sthito yuddhe śaṃkaro 'yaṃ guhas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:17936: kimarthaṃ yuddham utsṛjya bhavanto bhayamohitāḥ // HV_112.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:17937: [k: After 13, Ñ2 B Dn Ds D5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17938: prāṇāṃs tyaktvā ca yudhyadhvaṃ sarve dānavapuṃgavāḥ | *HV_112.13*1354 |
GE07hv_conpu:17942: [k: B1.2 cont: Ñ2 B3 Dn Ds D5 cont. after 1354*: K V D2-6 T4 G(ed.) ins. after 13: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17948: devaḥ kumāraś ca tathā rathenāgninibhena vai | *HV_112.13*1356:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17949: [k: While after 13, T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. an addl. colophon (...) and cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17951: tataḥ kruddho haraḥ sākṣād nadī khaṅgī paraśvadhī | *HV_112.13*1357:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17952: śūlī niṣaṅgī kavacī bāṇī kārmukavāñ śivaḥ | *HV_112.13*1357:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17954: saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭo rudraḥ pradhāvati yato hariḥ // HV_112.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:17959: ratho bhāti ghanonmuktaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ yathā śaśī // HV_112.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:17960: [k: After 15, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17962: nadadbhir vividhān nādān ratho devasya so 'bhayāt || *HV_112.15*1359:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17963: ke cit siṃhamukhās tatra tathā vyāghramukhāś ca ha | *HV_112.15*1359:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17965: vyālayajñopavītāś ca ke cit tatra mahābalāḥ || *HV_112.15*1359:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17970: ke cit saumyamukhās tatra divyaiḥ śastrair alaṃkṛtāḥ || *HV_112.15*1359:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:17977: kṛṣṇo garuḍam āsthāya yayau rudrāya saṃyuge | *HV_112.15*1359:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:17979: [k: After 16ab, T1.3 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17981: bhagavān api govindaḥ smayann iva ca saṃsthitaḥ | *HV_112.16ab*1360:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17982: sthito 'smi tava saṃgrāme yatheṣṭaṃ kriyatām iti | *HV_112.16ab*1360:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17983: hariṃ vivyādha kupito nārācānāṃ śatena saḥ // HV_112.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:17985: harir jagrāha kupito hy āstraṃ pārjanyam uttamam // HV_112.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:17986: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G(ed.) ins. after: T2 G1.4.5 after the first occurrence of 18: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17990: ke cin mumucire tatra śikharāṇi samantataḥ | *HV_112.17*1361:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17991: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva bhūmir ākāśam eva ca || *HV_112.17*1361:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17995: vāsavaś cānadad ghoraṃ rudhiraṃ cāpy avarṣata || *HV_112.17*1361:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:17996: ulkā ca bāṇasainyasya mukhāny āvṛtya tiṣṭhati | *HV_112.17*1361:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:17997: na vavau mārutaś cāpi jyotīṃṣy ākulatām iyuḥ | *HV_112.17*1361:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:17998: prabhāhīnāś ca oṣadhyo na caranty antarikṣagāḥ || *HV_112.17*1361:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:17999: etasminn antare brahmā sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ | *HV_112.17*1361:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:18003: tataḥ pārjanyam astraṃ tat kṣiptaṃ rudrāya viṣṇunā | *HV_112.17*1361:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:18004: yayau jvalann atha tadā yato rudro rathe sthitaḥ | *HV_112.17*1361:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:18006: niṣpetuḥ sarvato digbhyo yato haratanus tataḥ // HV_112.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:18008: mumoca ruṣito rudras tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_112.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:18009: [k: After 19, K Ñ2.3 V B D S ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18012: nādṛśyanta śaraiś channā dahyamānāś ca vahninā // HV_112.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:18014: tato bhūtāni vitresur devāś ca bhayaviklavāḥ | *HV_112.20*1363 |
GE07hv_conpu:18016: hato 'yam iti vijñāya āgneyāntarhite harau // HV_112.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:18017: tatas tad viṣahitvājau hy astram astravidāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18021: jagrāha vāruṇaṃ so 'straṃ vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_112.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:18023: [k: For 22ab (= 23ab?), K1.3 Ñ2.3 V B D T4 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18025: āgneyaṃ praśamaṃ yātam astraṃ vāruṇatejasā // HV_112.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:18026: [k: After 23, N (except ś 1 Ñ1) T4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18027: tasmin pratihate hy astre vāsudevena saṃyuge | *HV_112.23*1366 |
GE07hv_conpu:18028: paiśācaṃ rākṣasaṃ caiva raudram āṅgirasaṃ bhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18030: [k: After 24, K1.2 Ñ2 B2 D1.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18032: vāyavyam atha sāvitraṃ vāsavaṃ mohanaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:18033: atrāṇāṃ vāruṇārthāya vāsudevo mumoca ha // HV_112.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:18034: astraiś caturbhiś catvāri vārayitvā ca keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18037: [k: After 27ab, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.2.4 G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18040: [k: After 27, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18048: sa tatra vastrāṇi śubhāś ca gāvaḥ | *HV_112.27*1369:7 |*
GE07hv_conpu:18071: na nandī nāpi ca ratho na rudraḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_112.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:18072: dviguṇaṃ dīptadehas tu roṣeṇa ca balena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:18073: [k: After 29ab, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18075: jagrāha śūlī bhūtātmā devānām atha paśyatām || *HV_112.29ab*1370:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18077: vimuktaṃ tena tac cāstraṃ jagāma ca samīpataḥ || *HV_112.29ab*1370:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18078: śaṃkarasya tad astraṃ tu prahasan keśavas tadā | *HV_112.29ab*1370:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18079: jagrāha līlayā viṣṇus tūṇau tac ca vyanikṣipat || *HV_112.29ab*1370:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:18084: tac ca śūlaṃ harir dṛṣṭvā nijaśaktyā nyavārayat || *HV_112.29ab*1370:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:18086: astraṃ pāśupataṃ yat tu loke khyātaṃ svavīryavat | *HV_112.29ab*1370:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:18088: vijñāyātha tadā viṣṇus tad evāstraṃ samādade || *HV_112.29ab*1370:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:18089: dve hy astre praśamaṃ yāte dvābhyāṃ saṃdhārite tadā | *HV_112.29ab*1370:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:18090: tripurāntakaraṃ bāṇaṃ jagrāha ca caturmukhaḥ // HV_112.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:18097: [k: After 30, T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18098: bāṇenānena bhūteśo māṃ hantuṃ kila niścitaḥ | *HV_112.30*1372:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18099: iti matvā tadā kṛṣṇaḥ pratikāraṃ samārabhat | *HV_112.30*1372:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18100: jṛmbhaṇaṃ nām so 'py astraṃ jagrāha puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18103: haraṃ saṃjṛmbhayām āsa kṣiprakārī mahābalaḥ // HV_112.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:18105: vijṛmbhaṇaṃ nāma tataḥ so 'straṃ jagrāha keśavaḥ | *HV_112.31*1374:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18107: [k: K Ñ V B Dn Ds D1.3-6 T4 ins. after 31: D2 after 30: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18108: saśaraḥ sadhanuś caiva haras tenāśu jṛmbhitaḥ | *HV_112.31*1375:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18111: [k: After the above, K1 D1-3 read lines 22-24 of the App. I (No. 37)
GE07hv_conpu:18112: repeating them in their proper place. :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18113: [k: K1 D1-3 ins. after the first occurrence of line 24 of App. I (No. 37)
GE07hv_conpu:18114: : Ñ2 V2.3 B Ds D6 T4 cont. after *1375: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18117: śaktim anyāṃ sṛjann eva tadā darpavivṛddhaye | *HV_112.31*1376:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18118: [k: K1 Ñ2 V2.3 B Ds D1-3.6 T4 cont: K2-4 Ñ1 V1 Dn D4.5 cont. after 1375*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18120: pradhmāpayām āsa tadā kṛṣṇaḥ śaṅkhaṃ mahābalaḥ | *HV_112.31*1377:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18121: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. after 31: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18122: jṛmbhite ca hare tasmiñ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau sa keśavaḥ | *HV_112.31*1378:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18124: śārṅgaṃ ca kūjayām āsa siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat || *HV_112.31*1378:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18127: devaṃ vijṛmbhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvabhūtāni tatrasuḥ // HV_112.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:18128: [k: After 32, T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18129: dānavāś ca tathā yānti diśo 'tha vidiśo 'pi ca | *HV_112.32*1379:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18130: bāṇaś cāpi tadā rājan bhītabhītaḥ samāśvasat || *HV_112.32*1379:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18131: tato hāhākṛtaṃ sainyaṃ paśyataḥ śūlinas tadā | *HV_112.32*1379:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18132: kiṃ kurmaḥ kva gamiṣyāma iti dānavasattamāḥ | *HV_112.32*1379:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18133: sthitāś ca vimukhā rājan kartavye mūḍhacetasaḥ || *HV_112.32*1379:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18139: yadi dharmo bhavej jyāyān yuktaṃ madapasarpaṇam | *HV_112.32*1379:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:18140: iti dhyātvā haraḥ śīghraṃ tasmād deśād apākramat | *HV_112.32*1379:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:18142: T4 ins. after 32 a passage given in App. I (No. 37)
GE07hv_conpu:18146: apayāte tato deve kṛṣṇe caiva mahātmani | *HV_112.32*1380:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18147: punaś cāsīt kathaṃ yuddhaṃ pareṣāṃ lomaharṣaṇam | *HV_112.32*1380:2 |
