GE07hv_conpu:18459: [k: After 93, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18460: atha tad durlabhaṃ dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ paramadāruṇam | *HV_112.93*1435:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18462: nirjitāś ca gaṇāḥ sarve pradyumnena mahātmanā | *HV_112.93*1435:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18464: tataś cakraṃ sahasrāraṃ nadan megha ivoṣṇage /
GE07hv_conpu:18466: jyotiṣmataḥ pataṃgasya śaśinaś caiva yat tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:18467: [k: For 95ab, K Ñ2.3 V B D T1 (second time).4 G4.5 (last two second time) subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18468: tejo yaj jyotiṣāṃ caiva tejo vajrāśanes tathā | *HV_112.95ab*1436 |
GE07hv_conpu:18469: prājāpatyaṃ ca yat tejas tac cakre paryavasthitam // HV_112.95 //
GE07hv_conpu:18470: [k: After 95, N 9except Ś1 Ñ1 V2) T1.4 G4.5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18471: tretāgneś caiva yat tejo yac cāgner brahmacāriṇaḥ | *HV_112.95*1437:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18472: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca tapo jñānaṃ tac cakre paryavasthitam || *HV_112.95*1437:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18473: pativratānāṃ yat tejaḥ prāṇaṃ ca mṛgapakṣiṇām | *HV_112.95*1437:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18474: yac ca cakradhareṣv asti tac cakre saṃniveśitam || *HV_112.95*1437:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18476: trailokyasya ca yat tejaḥ sarvaṃ cakre vyavasthitam | *HV_112.95*1437:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:18477: [k: T1 G5 cont: T2 G1.3 M ins. after 95: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18478: yac ca tejas tathā śaṃbhor yamasya varuṇasya ca | *HV_112.95*1438 |
GE07hv_conpu:18480: vapuṣā teja ādatte bāṇasya pramukhe sthitam // HV_112.96 //
GE07hv_conpu:18481: [k: K B2.3 Dn D1-5 T4 ins. after 96: Ñ2.3 V B1 Ds D6 T1 G5 after 97ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18483: aprameyaṃ hy avihitaṃ rudrāṇīm abravīc chivaḥ || *HV_112.96*1439:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18484: ajeyam etat trailokye cakraṃ kṛṣṇena dhāryate | *HV_112.96*1439:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18485: bāṇaṃ trāyasva devi tvaṃ yāvac cakraṃ na muñcati || *HV_112.96*1439:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18486: tatas tryakṣavacaḥ śrutvā devī lambām athābravīt | *HV_112.96*1439:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18487: gachaihi lambe tvaṃ śīghraṃ bāṇasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ prati || *HV_112.96*1439:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:18491: pramukhe vāsudevasya digvāsāḥ koṭavī sthitā // HV_112.97 //
GE07hv_conpu:18492: [k: After 97, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18493: tāṃ dṛṣṭvātha punaḥ prāptāṃ devīṃ rudrasya saṃgatām | *HV_112.97*1440:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18495: antarghānam upāgamya tyaktvā sā vāsasī punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18499: [k: After 99a, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18505: [k: After 99ab, N (except Ś1) T1.2.4 G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18509: [k: T2 G1.3-5 cont: M1-3 ins. after 99ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18511: nārhase deva hantuṃ vai bāṇam apratimaṃ raṇe // HV_112.99 //
GE07hv_conpu:18512: [k: After 99, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18513: prayaccha hy abhayaṃ bāṇe jīvaputrītvam eva ca || *HV_112.99*1445:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18514: mayā dattavaro hy eṣa bhūyaś ca parirakṣyate | *HV_112.99*1445:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18515: na me mithyā samudyogaṃ kartum arhasi mādhava || *HV_112.99*1445:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18516: evam ukte tu vacane kṛṣṇaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ | *HV_112.99*1445:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18517: kruddhaḥ prabhāṣate vākyaṃ śṛṇu satyaṃ tu bhāminī || *HV_112.99*1445:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18519: eteṣāṃ chedanaṃ tv adya kartavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ || *HV_112.99*1445:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:18521: saṃtyajya cāsuraṃ darpaṃ na ca māṃ saṃśrayiṣyati || *HV_112.99*1445:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:18523: provāca devī bāṇo 'yaṃ devadevo bhaved iti || *HV_112.99*1445:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:18524: atha tāṃ kārttikeyasya mātaraṃ so 'bhibhāṣya vai | *HV_112.99*1445:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:18525: [k: While T2 G1.3.4 M ins. after 99: T1 G5 after line 4 of 1145*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18526: dhig dhig ity abravīt tāṃ tu duṣṭe dhvaṃseti keśavaḥ | *HV_112.99*1446 |
GE07hv_conpu:18527: tataḥ kruddho mahābāhuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18528: provāca bāṇaṃ samare bhrāmayaṃś cakram uttamam // HV_112.100 //
GE07hv_conpu:18531: yudhyatāṃ yudhyatāṃ saṃkhye bhavatāṃ koṭavī sthitā /
GE07hv_conpu:18532: aśaktānām iva raṇe dhigbāṇa tava pauruṣam // HV_112.101 //
GE07hv_conpu:18533: evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇas tac cakraṃ paramāstravit /
GE07hv_conpu:18534: nimīlitākṣo vyasṛjad bāṇaṃ prati mahābalaḥ // HV_112.102 //
GE07hv_conpu:18535: [k: After 102, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18537: kravyādāni ca bhūtāni tṛptiṃ yānti mahāmṛdhe || *HV_112.102*1448:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18540: sa muṣṇan dānavaṃ tejaḥ samare svena tejasā | *HV_112.102*1448:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18545: [k: Ds cont: Ñ2 V2.3 B Ds ins. after 103ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18546: bāṇasya rathamārge ca dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ | *HV_112.103ab*1450 |
GE07hv_conpu:18547: viṣṇor astraṃ sunābhaṃ vai śaighryayogān na dṛśyate // HV_112.103 //
GE07hv_conpu:18549: bāṇasya chedanaṃ cakre tac cakraṃ raṇamūrdhani // HV_112.104 //
GE07hv_conpu:18550: [k: After 104, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18551: kṛtvā dvibāhuṃ taṃ bāṇaṃ chinnaśākham iva drumam | *HV_112.104*1451:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18552: punaḥ karāgraṃ kṛṣṇasya cakraṃ prāptaṃ sudarśanam || *HV_112.104*1451:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18554: kṛtakṛte tu saṃprāpte cakre daitye vipātite | *HV_112.104*1451:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18557: [k: T1 G3-5 M ins. after 105: T2 after 103ab: G1 after 104: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18558: chinnaśākho yathā vṛkṣaś chinnapakṣo yathā khagaḥ || *HV_112.105*1452:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18559: chittvā bāhusahasraṃ tu bāṇasya ca sudarśanam | *HV_112.105*1452:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18563: tataḥ kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśas tad ādatte sudarśanam | *HV_112.105*1452:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:18564: [k: T1 G5 cont: K Ñ1.2 V B D T4 ins. after 105: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18565: asṛṅmattaś ca vividhān nādān muñcan yathā ghanaḥ || *HV_112.105*1453:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18568: vyāvidhya sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ śiraś chettuṃ samārabhat | *HV_112.105*1454 |
GE07hv_conpu:18570: [k: T4 M4 subst. for 106ab: T1 G5 cont. after 1453*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18574: sahomayā haro devo jvareṇa ca samanvitaḥ | *HV_112.106*1456 |
GE07hv_conpu:18575: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahādeva jāne tvāṃ puruṣottamam /
GE07hv_conpu:18577: na hy enaṃ vadhakāmas tvaṃ yad icchet pārvatīhitam || *HV_112.107ab*1457:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18581: prahrādāya varo dattaś caiṣāṃ madhye varāthine | *HV_112.107ab*1457:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18582: avyadhyas tava vaṃśo 'stu daityaughāḥ satataṃ mayā || *HV_112.107ab*1457:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18587: lokānāṃ tvaṃ gatir deva tvatprasūtam idaṃ jagat /
GE07hv_conpu:18588: ajeyas tvaṃ tribhir lokaiḥ sadevāsuramānuṣaiḥ // HV_112.108 //
GE07hv_conpu:18591: [k: While T1 G1.3-5 M ins. after 108: T2 after 107: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18592: vande 'haṃ tvāṃ jagannāthaṃ jagatām īśvaraṃ harim || *HV_112.107*1460:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18593: namāmi nirguṇaṃ viṣṇo tvām ādyam akhilaṃ raṇe | *HV_112.107*1460:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18594: niṣkalaṃ tvāṃ hare devaṃ namāmi puruṣottamam || *HV_112.107*1460:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18596: ajeyo 'si sadā viṣṇo yāce tvāṃ nityam avyayam | *HV_112.107*1460:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18597: tasmāt saṃhara divyaṃ tvam idaṃ cakraṃ samudyatam /
GE07hv_conpu:18600: ye tvā deva prapadyante na te suvyaktimānavāḥ | *HV_112.109*1461:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18601: bhaye mahati magnānāṃ trātā nityaṃ janārdanaḥ || *HV_112.109*1461:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18602: ye cāpy asmatkṛtaṃ stotram abhidhāsyanti bhaktitaḥ | *HV_112.109*1461:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18604: nāthas tvaṃ sarvalokānāṃ viśeṣeṇa mama prabho | *HV_112.109*1461:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18607: tan me na syān mṛṣā vākyam atas tvāṃ kṣamayāmy aham // HV_112.110 //
GE07hv_conpu:18609: na hy enaṃ vadhakāmasya yadīcchet pārvatīhitam | *HV_112.110*1462 |
GE07hv_conpu:18610: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-4 M ins. after 110: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18611: kṣantavyaṃ bhavatā bhūyo yat kṛtaṃ bhaktavatsala | *HV_112.110*1463 |
GE07hv_conpu:18613: jīvatāṃ deva bāṇo 'yam etac cakraṃ nivartitam /
GE07hv_conpu:18614: mānyas tvaṃ deva devānām asurāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_112.111 //
GE07hv_conpu:18617: yasmān mānyaḥ sadā deva tasmāj jīvatu bāṇakaḥ | *HV_112.11*1464:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18618: namas te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yat kāryaṃ tan maheśvara /
GE07hv_conpu:18619: na tāvat kriyate tasmān mām anujñātum arhasi // HV_112.112 //
GE07hv_conpu:18620: evam uktvā mahādevaṃ kṛṣṇas tūrṇaṃ garutmatā /
GE07hv_conpu:18621: jagāma tatra yatrāste prādyumniḥ sāyakaiś citaḥ // HV_112.113 //
GE07hv_conpu:18622: gate kṛṣṇe tato nandī bāṇam āha śubhaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18623: [k: After 114ab, K3.4 Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D2.3.5.6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18625: tac chrutvā nandivākyaṃ tu bāṇo 'gacchata śīghragaḥ | *HV_112.114ab*1465:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18626: [k: K3.4 Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D2.3.5.6 cont: K1.2 Ñ3 V1 D1.4 T1.4 G5 ins. after 114ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18627: chinnabāhuṃ tato bāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandī pratāpavān | *HV_112.114ab*1466:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18628: apavāhya rathenaiva yato devas tato yayau || *HV_112.114ab*1466:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18629: tato nandī punar bāṇaṃ prāg uvācottaraṃ vacaḥ | *HV_112.114ab*1466:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18630: bāṇa bāṇa pranṛtyasva śreyas tava bhaviṣyati // HV_112.114 //
GE07hv_conpu:18632: kṛttabāṇa mahādaitya tataḥ śreyas tvam āpsyasi | *HV_112.114cd*1467 |
GE07hv_conpu:18633: [k: Ñ2 B Dn Ds D6 T1 G3 ins. after 114: V2 cont. after 1466*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18636: jīvitārthī tato bāṇaḥ pramukhe śaṃkarasya vai // HV_112.115 //
GE07hv_conpu:18638: etac chrutvā vaco nandeḥ śoṇitāṅgaḥ sa dānavaḥ | *HV_112.115*1469:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18640: prānṛtyata bhaye jāte dānavaḥ sa vicetanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18641: [k: After 116ab, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18649: tataḥ pranṛttaṃ bāṇaṃ ca cakram apratimaṃ raṇe | *HV_112.116*1471:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18650: bāṇaṃ dvibāhuṃ kṛtvā tu svām eva prakṛtiṃ gatam | *HV_112.116*1471:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18651: [k: K1.2 D4 cont: K3.4 Dn D1-3.5 ins. after 116ab: Ñ2.3 V B Ds T1.4 G3.5 after 116: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18652: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pranṛtyantaṃ bhayodvignaṃ punaḥ punaḥ | *HV_112.116*1472:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18655: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-5 M1.3.4 ins. after 116: M2 after the first occurrence of 116cd: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18656: prānṛtyad bahuśo rājan yathā prīto bhaved bhava | *HV_112.116*1473 |
GE07hv_conpu:18657: [k: T2 G1.3.4 M cont: T1 G5 ins. after line 2 of 1472*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18658: tataḥ prīto 'bhavad rājan bāṇasyāsya sa līlayā | *HV_112.116*1474 |
GE07hv_conpu:18660: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bāṇa tvaṃ yat te manasi vartate /
GE07hv_conpu:18663: yat prārthyase varaṃ bāṇa cirāya manasepsitam | *HV_112.117*1475:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18664: tat te 'haṃ tvāṃ pradāsyāmi tridaśair api durlabham | *HV_112.117*1475:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18666: rudravākyaṃ tataḥ śrutvā bāṇo manasi harṣitaḥ | *HV_112.117*1476:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18669: ajaraś cāmaraś caiva bhaveyaṃ satataṃ vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:18670: eṣa me prathamo deva varo 'stu yadi manyase // HV_112.118 //
GE07hv_conpu:18672: tulyo 'si daivatair bāṇa na mṛtyus tava vidyate /
GE07hv_conpu:18673: anyaṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣvādya anugrāhyo 'si me sadā // HV_112.119 //
GE07hv_conpu:18676: bhaktānāṃ nṛtyatām evaṃ putrajanma bheved bhava // HV_112.120 //
GE07hv_conpu:18679: madbhaktā ye hi nṛtyanti teṣām evaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_112.121 //
GE07hv_conpu:18681: Ñ2 repeats 119cd and G3 repeats 120. K V B D T1.4 G5 ins. after 121:
GE07hv_conpu:18683: tṛtīyaṃ tvam atho bāṇa varaṃ vara manogatam | *HV_112.121*1477:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18684: tad vidhāsyāmi te putra saphalo 'stu bhavān iha | *HV_112.121*1477:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18686: cakrapāṭanajā ghorā rujā tīvrā hi yā mama /
GE07hv_conpu:18687: vareṇa sā tṛtīyena śāntiṃ gacchatu me bhava // HV_112.122 //
GE07hv_conpu:18689: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te na rujā prabhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:18690: akṣataṃ tava gātraṃ ca svasthāvasthaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_112.123 //
GE07hv_conpu:18691: [k: For 123, Ś1 Ñ2 V3 B3 T4 subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18694: na bhaviṣyati gātreṣu balavāṃś ca bhaviṣyasi | *HV_112.123*1478:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18695: caturthaṃ te varaṃ dadmi vṛṇīṣvāsura kāṅkṣitaṃ /
GE07hv_conpu:18696: na te 'haṃ vimukhas tāta prasādasumukho hy aham // HV_112.124 //
GE07hv_conpu:18699: mahākāla iti khyātaḥ khyātiṃ gaccheyam īśvara // HV_112.125 //
GE07hv_conpu:18700: [k: After 125, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.4 G5 M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18702: evaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha devo bāṇaṃ mahādyutiḥ | *HV_112.125*1479:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18708: evaṃ bhaviṣyaty avaśyaṃ yaṃ varaṃ tvam ihecchasi | *HV_112.126ab*1480 |
GE07hv_conpu:18710: taṃ taṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yad icchasi mahāsura // HV_112.126 //
GE07hv_conpu:18712: vairūpyam aṅgajaṃ kiṃ cin mā bhūn me devasattama /
GE07hv_conpu:18713: dvibāhutve 'pi me deho na virūpo bhaved bhava // HV_112.127 //
GE07hv_conpu:18714: [k: N (except Ñ1 Dn1) T1.4 Cal. ed. ins. after 127: G5 after 128ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18716: bhavitā sarvam etat te yathecchasi mahāsura | *HV_112.127*1481:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18717: bhaktas tvaṃ me na cādeyaṃ bhaktānāṃ vidyate mama | *HV_112.127*1481:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18719: evaṃ bhaviṣyate bāṇa yat tvayā samudāhṛtam // HV_112.128 //
GE07hv_conpu:18720: [k: T2 G1.3.4 M4 ins. after the repetition of 128ab: M1-3 after 128: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18721: tyaja mūḍhāṃ matiṃ bāṇa mā mohavaśago bhava | *HV_112.128ab*1482 |
GE07hv_conpu:18725: , adhyāya 113, transliterated from the critical ed. (P. L. Vaidya, Poona 1969)
GE07hv_conpu:18727: ; proof-read by Arlo Griffiths. This is the version of April 5, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:18730: D2 om. the ref. N T4 ins. and T2 G1.4 repeat after the ref:
GE07hv_conpu:18731: T1.2 G1.3-5 M (T2 G1.4 for the first time)
GE07hv_conpu:18733: evaṃ varān bahūṃl labdhvā bāṇaḥ prītimān abhavat | *HV_113.1*1483 |
GE07hv_conpu:18734: [k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V2.3 B Dn Ds D1.4.5 cont: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18736: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V2.3 B Dn Ds D1.4.5 cont:
GE07hv_conpu:18742: śrotum icchāmi tattvena snehaklinnaṃ hi me manaḥ || *HV_113.1*1485:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18743: aniruddhe hṛte vīre kṣubhitā dvārakā purī | *HV_113.1*1485:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18744: śīghraṃ taṃ mokṣayiṣyāmi yad arthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ || *HV_113.1*1485:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18745: adya taṃ naṣṭaśatruṃ vai draṣṭum icchāmahe vayam | *HV_113.1*1485:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:18746: sa pradeśas tu bhagavan viditas tava suvrata || *HV_113.1*1485:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:18747: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena nāradaḥ pratyabhāṣata | *HV_113.1*1485:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:18748: kanyāpure kumāro 'sau baddho nāgaiś ca mādhava || *HV_113.1*1485:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:18749: etasminn antare śīghraṃ citralekhā hy upasthitā | *HV_113.1*1485:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:18752: tataḥ praviṣṭās te sarve aniruddhasya mokṣaṇe | *HV_113.1*1485:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:18753: balaḥ suparṇaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca pradyumno nāradas tathā | *HV_113.1*1485:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:18756: śararūpā mahāsarpā veṣṭayitvā tanuṃ sthitāḥ // HV_113.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:18757: te sarve sahasā dehāt tasya niḥsṛtya bhoginaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18759: dṛṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭaś ca kṛṣṇena so 'niruddho mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:18760: sthitiḥ prītimanā bhūtvā prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // HV_113.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:18761: devadeva sadā yudhe jetā tvam asi kas tava /
GE07hv_conpu:18762: śakto vai pramukhe sthātuṃ sākṣād api śatakratuḥ // HV_113.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:18764: āroha garuḍaṃ tūrṇaṃ gacchāma dvārakāṃ purīm /
GE07hv_conpu:18765: ityuktaḥ so 'dhirūḍhas tu saha dānavakanyayā // HV_113.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:18767: gurubhiḥ samanujñātās tatas te prayayus tadā | *HV_113.4*1487 |
GE07hv_conpu:18768: [k: While K Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D3-6 G4.5 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 38)
GE07hv_conpu:18769: after 5; Ñ3 D1.2 T1.2 G1.3 ins. it after 3c; V1 after 3; T4 after 3ab; On the other hand,
GE07hv_conpu:18772: tatas te dīrgham adhvānaṃ prayayuḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18780: āruhya garuḍaṃ sarve jitvā bāṇaṃ mahāsuram // HV_113.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:18782: [k: After 7ab, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.2.4 G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18785: [k: After 7, N (except Ś1 Ñ1 D3) T1.2.4 G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18788: niśamya bāṇagāvas tu tāsu cakre manas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:18789: āsthito garuḍaṃ devaḥ sarvalokādir avyayaḥ // HV_113.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:18790: [k: After 8, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.2.4 G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18792: garuḍa prayāhi tatra tvaṃ yatra bāṇasya godhanam | *HV_113.8*1492:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18794: yāsāṃ pītvā kila kṣīram amṛtatvam avāpnuyāt | *HV_113.8*1492:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18795: āha māṃ satyabhāmā ca bāṇagāvo mamānaya /
GE07hv_conpu:18796: yāsāṃ pītvā kila kṣīraṃ na jīryanti mahāsurāḥ // HV_113.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:18797: [k: Ñ2 V3 B2.3 Dn Ds D3.5.6 T2 ins. after 9: Ñ2 (error for other siglum?) after 9ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18798: vijarāś ca jarāṃ tyaktvā bhavanti kila jantavaḥ | *HV_113.9*1493 |
GE07hv_conpu:18799: tā mamānaya bhadraṃ te yadi kāryaṃ na lupyate /
GE07hv_conpu:18800: atha kāryanirodhaḥ syān naiva tāsu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // HV_113.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:18801: [k: After 10, K Ñ2 V B D T4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18802: iti mām abravīt satyā tāś caitā viditā mama | *HV_113.10*1494 |
GE07hv_conpu:18803: dṛśyante gāva etās tā māṃ dṛṣṭvā varuṇālayam /
GE07hv_conpu:18804: viśanti sahitāḥ sarvāḥ kāryam atra vidhīyatām // HV_113.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:18805: tathety uktvā tu garuḍaḥ pakṣavātena sāgaram /
GE07hv_conpu:18806: so 'vagāḍho hi sahasā varuṇālayam antikāt // HV_113.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:18807: [k: After 12, K Ñ2.3 B D T4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18808: dṛṣṭvā javena garuḍaṃ prāptaṃ vai varuṇālayam | *HV_113.12*1495:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18809: vāruṇāś ca gaṇāḥ sarve vibhrāntāḥ prācalaṃs tadā | *HV_113.12*1495:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18810: tatas tu vāruṇaṃ sainyam abhiyātaṃ sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:18812: [k: K Ñ1.3 V B2.3 Dn Ds D1-5 T1.4 ins. after 13: B1 D6 cont. after 1497*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18813: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ vāruṇaiḥ pannagāriṇā | *HV_113.13*1496 |
GE07hv_conpu:18815: tatas tu tasya pramukhe vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ | *HV_113.13*1497 |
GE07hv_conpu:18817: [k: T1.2 G1.5 M ins. after 14ab: G4 cont. after 1499*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18818: dehā vidyotayanti sma kṛtsnaṃ vai varuṇālayam | *HV_113.14ab*1498:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18819: cakreṇa bhagavāñ śauriś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat | *HV_113.14ab*1498:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18820: [k: T1 G5 M4 cont: K Ñ V B D T4 G4 ins. after 14ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18822: te bhagnāḥ sahasā yānti tam eva varuṇālayam // HV_113.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:18826: tāny ayudhyanta kṛṣṇena pradyumnena balena ca | *HV_113.15*1500:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18827: tāni sarvāṇi sahasā nijaghāna raṇe hariḥ | *HV_113.15*1500:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18829: bhagnaṃ varuṇam āśritya naiva sthānam avindata // HV_113.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:18830: [k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V2.3 B1.3 Dn Ds D4.6 T1 G4.5 ins. after 16: K3.4 V1 B2 D1-3.5 T4 after 15: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18835: varuṇas tv atha saṃkruddho niryayau yatra keśavaḥ | *HV_113.16*1501:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18839: salilasrāviṇā śreṣṭhaṃ cāpam udyamya viṣṭhitaḥ // HV_113.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:18841: āhvayann iva yuddhe sa visphāritamahādhanuḥ // HV_113.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:18842: sa tu pradhmāpayañ śaṅkhaṃ varuṇaḥ samadhāvata /
GE07hv_conpu:18843: hariṃ hara iva krodhād bāṇajālaiḥ samāvṛṇot // HV_113.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:18845: bāṇavarṣākulāḥ sarvā diśaś cakre janārdanaḥ // HV_113.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:18846: tataḥ śaraughair bahudhā varuṇaḥ pīḍito raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:18847: smayann iva tadā kṛṣṇaṃ varuṇaḥ pratyayudhyata // HV_113.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:18849: vāsudevo 'bravīd vākyaṃ pramukhe tasya saṃsthitaḥ // HV_113.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:18851: mayodyataṃ vadhārthaṃ te tiṣṭhedānīṃ sthiro bhava // HV_113.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:18852: tatas tad varuṇo devo hy astraṃ vaiṣṇavam udyatam /
GE07hv_conpu:18853: vāruṇāstreṇa saṃyojya nanāda sa mahābalaḥ // HV_113.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:18856: [k: After 26, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18857: āpas tu vāruṇās tatra kṣiptāḥ kṣiptā jvalanti vai | *HV_113.26*1502 |
GE07hv_conpu:18862: dahyante vāruṇāḥ sarve tato 'stre jvalite punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18863: vaiṣṇave tu mahāvīrye diśo bhītāḥ pradudruvuḥ // HV_113.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:18864: tāṃs tu prajvalato dṛṣṭvā varuṇo vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:18865: smara tāṃ prakṛtiṃ pūrvām avyaktāṃ vyaktalakṣaṇāṃ /
GE07hv_conpu:18866: tamo jahi mahābhāga rajasā muhyase katham // HV_113.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:18867: sattvastho nityam āsīt tvaṃ yogīśvara mahāmate /
GE07hv_conpu:18868: pañcabhūtāśrayān doṣān ahaṃkāraṃ ca saṃtyaja // HV_113.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:18869: yeyaṃ te vaiṣṇavī mūrtis tasyā jyeṣṭho hy ahaṃ tava /
GE07hv_conpu:18870: jyeṣṭhabhāvena mānyas te kiṃ māṃ dagdhum icchasi // HV_113.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:18871: nāgnir vikramate hy agnau tyaja kopaṃ yudhāṃ vara /
GE07hv_conpu:18872: tvayi na prabhaviṣyanti jagataḥ prabhavo hy asi // HV_113.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:18873: pūrvaṃ hi yā tvayā sṛṣṭā prakṛtir vikṛtātmikā /
GE07hv_conpu:18875: āgneyaṃ caiva saumyaṃ ca prakṛtyaivedam āditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18876: tvayā sṛṣṭaṃ jagad idaṃ sa kathaṃ manyase mayi // HV_113.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:18878: akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva bhavān eva mahādyute // HV_113.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:18879: rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo 'haṃ tvayānagha namo 'stu te /
GE07hv_conpu:18881: kiṃ krīḍasi mahādeva bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva /
GE07hv_conpu:18882: na hy ahaṃ prakṛtidveṣī nāhaṃ prakṛtidūṣakaḥ // HV_113.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:18884: tasyā vikāraśamane vartase tvaṃ yathāvidhi // HV_113.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:18886: tān adharmavido mandān bhavān vikurute sadā // HV_113.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:18887: iyaṃ hi prakṛtir doṣais tamasā yujyate sadā /
GE07hv_conpu:18888: rajasā vāpi saṃduṣṭā tato mohaḥ pravartate // HV_113.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:18890: kiṃ mohayasi naḥ sarvān prajāpatir iva svayam // HV_113.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:18891: [k: After 40, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18893: bhāvajñaḥ sarvavidvīras tataḥ prītimanā hy abhūt | *HV_113.40*1504:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18895: gāḥ saṃprayaccha me deva śāntyarthaṃ bhīmavikrama // HV_113.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:18896: [k: After 41, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18898: varuṇo hy abravīd būyaḥ śṛṇu me madhusūdana | *HV_113.41*1505:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18900: bāṇena sārdhaṃ samayo mayā deva purā kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18901: kathaṃ ca samayaṃ kṛtvā kuryāṃ viphalam anyathā // HV_113.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:18902: [k: After 42, K Ñ2.3 V B D t1.4 G5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18903: tvam eva deva sarvasya yathā samayabhedakaḥ | *HV_113.42*1506:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18904: cāritraṃ duṣyate tāta na ca sadbhiḥ praśasyate || *HV_113.42*1506:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18906: na ca lokān avāpnoti pāpaḥ samayabhedakaḥ || *HV_113.42*1506:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18907: prasīda dharmalopaś ca mā bhūn me madhusūdana | *HV_113.42*1506:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18908: na māṃ samayabhedena yoktum arhasi mādhava | *HV_113.42*1506:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:18909: jīvan nāhaṃ pradāsyāmi gāvo vai vṛṣabhekṣaṇa /
GE07hv_conpu:18910: hatvā māṃ naya gāvas tvam eṣa me samayaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_113.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:18911: [k: After 43, Ñ1 ins. an additional colophon mentioning adhy. name bāṇayuddham. :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18912: [k: While K Ñ2.3 V B D ins. after 43: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18913: etac ca me samākhyātaṃ samayaṃ madhusūdana | *HV_113.43*1507:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18914: satyam eva mahābāho na mithyā tu sureśvara || *HV_113.43*1507:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18915: yady evāham anugrāhyo rakṣa māṃ madhusūdana | *HV_113.43*1507:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18916: atha vā goṣu nirbandho hatvā naya mahābhuja | *HV_113.43*1507:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18919: satyaṃ prabhāṣase yat tvaṃ tasmān madbhāvabhāvitaḥ || *HV_113.43*1508:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18923: varuṇena gṛhītvā tu yayau dvāravatīṃ hariḥ | *HV_113.43*1509:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18926: eṣa te bāṇaviṣayaḥ proktas te janamejaya | *HV_113.43*1509:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:18927: pṛcchato bhavato rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi | *HV_113.43*1509:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:18928: varuṇenaivam uktas tu muktvā gā vai mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18930: evam ukto 'tha bāṇasya gāvo muktvā mahāyaśāḥ | *HV_113.44ab*1510 |
GE07hv_conpu:18931: [k: While K Ñ2.3 V B D ins. after 44ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18932: abhedyaṃ samayaṃ matvā nyastavādo gavāṃ prati | *HV_113.44ab*1511 |
GE07hv_conpu:18933: prahasya varuṇaṃ devaṃ mānayām āsa mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18934: [k: For 44cd, K Ñ V B D T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 Bom. Poona eds. subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18937: mānayan varuṇaṃ devo gā bāṇasya vyamuñcata | *HV_113.44cd*1513 |
GE07hv_conpu:18938: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D Bom. Poona eds. cont. after 1512*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18939: tasmān mukto 'si yady evaṃ bāṇena samayaḥ kṛtaḥ | *HV_113.44cd*1514:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18941: kathaṃ pāpaṃ kariṣyāmi varuṇa tvayy ahaṃ prabho | *HV_113.44cd*1514:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:18942: gaccha mukto 'si varuṇa satyasaṃdho 'stu no bhavān | *HV_113.44cd*1514:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18943: tvatpriyārthaṃ mayā muktā bāṇagāvo na saṃśayaḥ || *HV_113.44cd*1514:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18944: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ | *HV_113.44cd*1514:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:18947: balaṃ pūjayate devaḥ kuśalī ca samāhitaḥ || *HV_113.44cd*1514:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:18949: [k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 cont. after 1512*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18950: tvadarthaṃ dhenavo muktā bāṇasya tu durātmanaḥ | *HV_113.44cd*1512:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18951: ity uktvā varuṇaṃ devo gā bāṇasya vimuñcata | *HV_113.44cd*1512:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18952: prayayau dvārakāṃ cāpi śakrādyair amarair vṛtaḥ // HV_113.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:18953: [k: For 44ef, N (except Ś1) T1.2 G1.3-5 M subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18956: [k: After 45ab, K Ñ1.3 V B D (except D1) T2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18958: [k: While, T1 G1.3-5 M ins. after 45ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18961: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahābalau /
GE07hv_conpu:18962: [k: After 46ab, K Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2-4.6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18964: āyāntam anugacchanti yaśasā vijayena ca // HV_113.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:18965: [k: After 46, K Ñ2.3 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18966: nāradaś ca mahābhāgaḥ prasthito dvārakāṃ prati | *HV_113.46*1520:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:18967: tuṣṭo bāṇajayaṃ dṛṣṭvā varuṇaṃ ca kṛtapriyam || *HV_113.46*1520:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18969: durād eva tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dvārakāṃ dvāramālinīm /
GE07hv_conpu:18971: [k: After 47, Ś1 K Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2-6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18973: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. after 47: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18976: śrutvā dvāravatī sarvā praharṣam atulaṃ gatā // HV_113.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:18977: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B2.3 D ins. after 48: B1 after the first occurrence of 49: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18982: jayaśabdaiś ca vividhaiḥ pūjayanti sma mādhavam | *HV_113.48*1523:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:18984: avandanyādavāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ śriyā paramayā yutam // HV_113.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:18985: [k: After 49, K Ñ2.3 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18991: [k: After 51ab, K Ñ2.3 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18992: praharṣam atulaṃ prāptā dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ mahābhujam | *HV_113.51ab*1525 |
GE07hv_conpu:18993: bāṇaṃ jitvā mahādevam āyāntaṃ puruṣottamam // HV_113.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:18995: prāpte kṛṣṇe mahābhāge sātvatānāṃ mahārathe // HV_113.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:18996: [k: After 52, K Ñ2.3 V B D T2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18997: gatvā ca dūram adhvānaṃ suparṇo drutam āgataḥ | *HV_113.52*1526 |
GE07hv_conpu:18998: dhanyāḥ smo 'nugṛhītāḥ smo yeṣāṃ no jagataḥ patiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18999: rakṣitā cāpi goptā ca dīrghabāhur janārdanaḥ // HV_113.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:19001: prāpto 'yaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo manāṃsy āhlādayann iva // HV_113.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:19003: vāsudevagṛhaṃ devā viviśus te mahārathāḥ // HV_113.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:19004: [k: After 55, K Ñ2.3 V B Dn D2-6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19005: avatīrya suparṇāt tu vāsudevo balas tadā | *HV_113.55*1527:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19006: pradyumnaś cāniruddhaś ca gṛhān praviviśus tadā | *HV_113.55*1527:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19007: tāni teṣāṃ vimānāni divi saṃcaratāṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:19008: sthitāny eva pradṛśyante nānārūpāṇi sarvaśaḥ // HV_113.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:19010: bhāsvanti tāni dṛśyante vimānāni sahasraśaḥ // HV_113.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:19011: [k: After 57, K Ñ2.3 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19012: atha kṛṣṇo 'bravīd vākyaṃ kumārāṃs tān sahasraśaḥ | *HV_113.57*1528:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19013: pradyumnādīn samastāṃs tu ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā | *HV_113.57*1528:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19015: sādhyā devās tathānye cāpy avandaṃs tān yathākramam // HV_113.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:19016: [k: After 58, K Ñ2.3 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19020: ṛṣayaś ca mahātmāno vandadhvaṃ ca yathāsukham || *HV_113.58*1529:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:19021: ete cakradharāś caiva etān vadanta sarvaśaḥ | *HV_113.58*1529:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:19022: sāgarāś ca hradāś caiva matpriyārtham ihāgatāḥ | *HV_113.58*1529:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:19023: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva vandadhvaṃ ca yathākramam || *HV_113.58*1529:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:19025: gāvaś ca matpriyārthaṃ vai vandadhvaṃ ca yathākramam || *HV_113.58*1529:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:19027: āgatā matpriyārthaṃ vai vandadhvaṃ ca yathākramam || *HV_113.58*1529:11 |

GE07hv_conpu:19033: prāpyate yad ihāsmābhir iti vācaś caranti hi // HV_113.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:19034: tataś candanacūrṇaiś ca puṣpavarṣaiś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19035: kiranti paurāḥ sarvāṃs tān pūjayanto divaukasaḥ // HV_113.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:19036: lājaiḥ praṇāmair dhūpaiś ca vāgbuddhiniyatās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:19038: āhukaṃ vasudevaṃ ca sāmbaṃ ca yadunandanam /
GE07hv_conpu:19039: sātyakiṃ colmukaṃ caiva vipṛthuṃ ca mahābalam // HV_113.62 //

GE07hv_conpu:19041: akrūraṃ ca mahābhāgaṃ tathā niṣadham eva ca | *HV_113.62*1530 |

GE07hv_conpu:19043: K V1 B2 Dn Ds D1.3-5 ins. after 63ab:
GE07hv_conpu:19048: andhakaṃ ca śubhākṣaṃ ca tato vacanam abravīt // HV_113.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:19049: vāsavaḥ sātvatān sarvān eṣa vo yadunandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19050: yojayitvā raṇe caiva yaśasā pauruṣeṇa ca // HV_113.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:19053: mahādevasya miṣato guhasya ca tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19054: eṣa bāṇaṃ raṇe jitvā dvārakāṃ punar āgatāḥ // HV_113.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:19056: sthāpayitvā dvibāhutve prāpto 'yaṃ svapurīṃ hariḥ // HV_113.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:19058: tad apy avasitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ naṣṭaśokā vayaṃ kṛtāḥ // HV_113.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:19060: kālo yāsyaty avirataṃ viṣayeṣv eva sajjatām // HV_113.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:19061: bāhūnāṃ saṃśrayāt sarve vayam asya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19062: pranaṣṭaśokā raṃsyāmaḥ sarva evāmarāḥ sukham // HV_113.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:19064: [k: For 70ab, K Ñ1.2 V B D subst: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19066: āpṛcchya taṃ mahābhāgaḥ sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ || *HV_113.70ab*1533:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19069: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-5 M subst. for 70ab: :k]

GE07hv_conpu:19073: K Ñ2.3 V2.3 B D T1 G5 ins. after 70cd:
GE07hv_conpu:19080: gacchanti kaumudīṃ draṣṭuṃ so 'naghaḥ priyayā saha | *HV_113.70cd*1535:6 |

GE07hv_conpu:19082: [k: After 70, Ś1 K Ñ2 V B D M4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19086: etaiś ca kāraṇaiḥ śrīmān vasudevakule prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19087: jāto vṛṣṇiṣu devakyāṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // HV_113.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:19089: uktās te vistarāḥ sarve pūrvaṃ ye janamejaya // HV_113.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:19090: viṣṇos tu māthure kalpe yatra te saṃśayo mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:19091: vāsudevagatiś caiva sā mayā samudāhṛtā // HV_113.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:19093: sarveṣv āścaryakalpeṣu nāsty āścaryam avaiṣṇavam // HV_113.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:19094: sa eva dhanyo dhanināṃ dhanyakṛd dhanyabhāvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19095: deveṣv api sadaityeṣu nāsti dhanyataro 'cyutāt // HV_113.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:19096: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau marutas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:19097: gaganaṃ bhūr diśaś caiva salilaṃ jyotir eva ca // HV_113.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:19099: sarvam etaj jagaddhātā viṣṇur eva na cāparaḥ | *HV_113.77*1537 |
GE07hv_conpu:19100: eṣa dhātā vidhātā ca saṃhartā kāla eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19101: satyaṃ dharmas tapaś caiva brahma caiva sanātanam /
GE07hv_conpu:19102: [k: Ś1 Ñ2 B1.2 D2.4.5 ins. after 78cd: Dn Ds after 78: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19103: anantaś caiva nāgānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ śaṃkaraḥ smṛtaḥ | *HV_113.78cd*1538:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19105: etasmāc ca jagat sarvaṃ prasūyeta janārdanāt | *HV_113.78cd*1538:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:19106: jagac ca sarvaṃ deveśas taṃ namas kuru bhārata // HV_113.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:19107: [k: Ś1 K Ñ V B D1-5 ins. after 78: X Dn Ds cont. after 1538*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19108: pūjyaś ca satataṃ sarvair devair eṣa sanātanaḥ | *HV_113.78*1539 |
GE07hv_conpu:19109: [k: While D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. after 78: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19111: ijyaś ca devadeveśas taṃ namaskuru bhārata || *HV_113.78*1540:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19112: ādikartā ca bhoktā ca bhūtādir bhūtir eva ca | *HV_113.78*1540:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:19113: namaskuru jagannāthaṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ prabho nṛpa || *HV_113.78*1540:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:19115: namasyāmo jagannāthaṃ devakīṃ ca hariṃ sadā || *HV_113.78*1540:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:19117: śreyas tava sadā viṣṇur vidhāsyati na saṃśayaḥ || *HV_113.78*1540:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:19118: namas tasmin samādhatsva mano 'nudhyāhi tat param | *HV_113.78*1540:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:19119: upāsyaś ca sadā viṣṇur manasā rājasattama | *HV_113.78*1540:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:19124: ityuktaṃ bāṇayuddhaṃ te māhātmyaṃ keśavasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19127: keśavasya ca māhātmyaṃ nādharmas tān bhajiṣyati // HV_113.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:19129: teṣāṃ dharmo bhaved rājan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā | *HV_113.80cd*1541 |
GE07hv_conpu:19130: eṣā te vaiṣṇavī caryā mayā kārtsnyena kīrtitā /
GE07hv_conpu:19131: pṛcchatas tāta yajñe 'smin nivṛtte janamejaya // HV_113.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:19132: āścaryaparvam akhilaṃ yo hīdaṃ dhārayen nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:19133: [k: After 82ab, K2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2-4.5(marg.).6 G4 M2 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19135: kalpa utthāya yo nityaṃ kīrtayet susamāhitaḥ | *HV_113.82ab*1542:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19136: na tasya durlabhaṃ kiṃ cid iha loke paratra ca || *HV_113.82ab*1542:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:19137: brāhmaṇaḥ sarvavedī syāt kṣatriyo vijayī bhavet | *HV_113.82ab*1542:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:19138: vaiśyo dhanasamṛddhaḥ syāc chūdro gacchec ca sadgatim | *HV_113.82ab*1542:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:19139: nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃcid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt // HV_113.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:19141: harivaṃśam imaṃ puṇyaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti mahīpatiḥ | *HV_113.82*1543:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19142: āyur ārogyam aiśvaryam atulām ṛddhim āpnuyāt | *HV_113.82*1543:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19144: aputro labhate putram adhano 'pi dhanaṃ vrajet | *HV_113.82*1544:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19146: vāsudeve parāṃ bhaktiṃ bhogān apy atulān bhuvi | *HV_113.82*1544:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:19147: avyāhataṃ pratāpaṃ ca yaśo vindeta mānavaḥ || *HV_113.82*1544:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:19150: [k: G4 cont: T2 G1.3 cont. after 1543*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19151: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ viṣṇubhaktād dvijarṣabhāt | *HV_113.82*1545:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19153: vede rāmāyaṇe caiva harivaṃśe ca bhārata | *HV_113.82*1545:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:19154: ādau madhye tathaivānte hariḥ sarvatra gīyate || *HV_113.82*1545:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:19157: tasya vaṃśam imaṃ puṇyam itihāsaṃ purātanam | *HV_113.82*1545:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:19158: ye narāḥ kīrtayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ | *HV_113.82*1545:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:19159: [k: T2 G1.3.4 cont: D6 T1 G5 M ins. after 82: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19161: manas te niścalaṃ bhūyāt prasanno 'stu janārdanaḥ | *HV_113.82*1546:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19164: śrutavān amalo bhūtvā harivaṃśaṃ dvijarṣabhāḥ // HV_113.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:19165: evaṃ śaunaka saṃkṣepād vistareṇa tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19168: proktā vai sarvavaṃśās te kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te // HV_113.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:19169: [k: After 84, T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19170: śaunakādyās tu munayaḥ prītās tuṣṭās tadābhavan | *HV_113.84*1548:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19172: ādidevaṃ hariṃ viṣṇuṃ namasyanti sma mādhavam | *HV_113.84*1548:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:19179: vedāvāsaṃ sarasvatyā vāsaṃ vyāsaṃ namāmy aham || *HV_113.84*1549:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:19181: yat prasādād ṛte snigdhaṃ jihvā na parivartate | *HV_113.84*1549:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:19182: [h: HV (CE) chapter 114, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 22, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:19185: [k: T2 G1 ins. after the ref: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19187: kasmin pratiṣṭhito vaṃśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_114.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:19188: [k: S1 K N2 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19189: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ mama | *HV_114.1*1551:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19190: tvattaḥ kathayataḥ sarvaṃ vedmy ahaṃ taṃ parisphuṭam | *HV_114.1*1551:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19193: candrāpīḍaś ca nṛpatiḥ sūryāpīḍaś ca mokṣavit // HV_114.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:19195: janamejaya ity eva kṣatraṃ bhuvi pariśrutam // HV_114.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19196: teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhas tu rājāsīt pure vāraṇasāhvaye /
GE07hv_conpu:19199: aputraḥ sa tu dharmātmā praviveśa tapovanam // HV_114.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:19201: sucāror duhitā subhrūr mālinī bhrātṛmālini // HV_114.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:19202: sa tv ajanmani garbhasya śvetakarṇaḥ prajeśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19203: anvagacchata taṃ pūrvair mahāprasthānam acyutam // HV_114.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:19204: sā dṛṣṭvā saṃprayātaṃ taṃ mālinī pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19205: pathi sā suṣuve subhrūr vane rājīvalocanam // HV_114.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:19206: tam apāśya ca tatraiva rājānaṃ sānvagacchata /
GE07hv_conpu:19207: pativratā mahābhāgā draupadīva purā patīn // HV_114.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:19209: dayārthaṃ tasya meghās tu prādurāsan mahātmanaḥ // HV_114.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:19210: śraviṣṭhāyāś ca putrau dvau paippalādau ca tau dvijau /
GE07hv_conpu:19211: dṛṣṭvā kṛpānvitau gṛhya taṃ prakṣālayatāṃ jale // HV_114.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:19212: vighṛṣṭe tasya te pārśve khelena rudhirasrave /
GE07hv_conpu:19213: ajaśyāmau ca pārśvau tāv ubhāv api samāhitau // HV_114.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:19215: ājagamānayo pārśvaṃ pibann apy anayoḥ stanau | *HV_114.12*1552 |
GE07hv_conpu:19218: ājaśyāmasya te pārśve rūḍhe vai saṃabhūvatuḥ | *HV_114.13ab*1553 |
GE07hv_conpu:19220: taṃ tathaiva ca tiṣṭhantaṃ ajapārśve kumārakam | *HV_114.13ab*1554 |
GE07hv_conpu:19221: tato 'japārśva iti tau cakrāte tasya nāma ha // HV_114.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19222: sa tu vemakaśālāyāṃ ubhābhyām abhivardhitaḥ // HV_114.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19223: vemakasya tu bhāryā tam udvahat putrakāraṇāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19225: sevakasya tu tāṃ bhāryām ūhatus tasya kāraṇāt | *HV_114.15ab*1555 |
GE07hv_conpu:19226: vemakyāḥ sa tu putro 'bhūd brāhmaṇau sucivau ca tau // HV_114.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:19227: teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca yugapat tulyajīvinaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19228: sa eṣa pauravo vaṃśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_114.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:19230: jarāsaṃkramaṇe pūrvaṃ tadā prītena dhīmatā // HV_114.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:19231: acandrārkagrahā bhūmir bhaved api na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19232: apauravā na tu mahī bhaviṣyati kadācana // HV_114.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:19235: [h: HV (CE) chapter 115, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 26, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:19237: ukto 'yaṃ harivaṃśas te parvāṇi nikhilāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19238: yathā puroktāni tathā vyāsaśiṣyeṇa dhīmatā // HV_115.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:19241: [k: K1.2.4 N V B Dn Ds D2-6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19245: saute kim akarot paścāt sarpasatrād anantaram // HV_115.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19247: yad ārabhata pārikṣit tan me kathaya suvrata | *HV_115.3*1558 |
GE07hv_conpu:19250: yad ārabhat tad ākhyāsye sarpasatrād anantaram // HV_115.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:19251: tasmin satre samāpte tu rājā pārikṣitas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:19252: yaṣṭuṃ sa vājimedhena saṃbhārān upacakrame // HV_115.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:19254: yakṣye 'haṃ vājimedhena haya utsṛjyatām iti // HV_115.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:19255: tato 'sya vijñāya cikīrṣitaṃ tadā kṛṣṇo mahātmā sahasājagāma /
GE07hv_conpu:19256: pārikṣitaṃ draṣṭum adīnasattvam dvaipāyanaḥ sarvaparāvarajñaḥ // HV_115.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:19257: pārikṣitas tu nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā tam ṛṣim āgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:19259: tau copaviṣṭāv abhitaḥ sadasyās tasya śaunaka /
GE07hv_conpu:19262: kathā bahuvidhāś citrāś cakrāte vedasaṃhitāḥ // HV_115.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:19263: tataḥ kathānte nṛpatiś codayāmāsa taṃ munim /
GE07hv_conpu:19266: nimeṣamātram iva me sukhaśravyatayā gatam // HV_115.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:19268: tvayā tv abhihitaṃ brahmañ śaṅkhe kṣīram ivāhitam // HV_115.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:19269: nāmṛtenāpi tṛptiḥ syād yathā svargasukhena vā /
GE07hv_conpu:19270: tathā tṛptiṃ na gacchāmi śrutvemāṃ bhāratīṃ kathām // HV_115.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19271: anumānya tu sarvajñaṃ pṛcchāmi bhagavann aham /
GE07hv_conpu:19272: hetuḥ kurūṇāṃ nāśasya rājasūyo mato mama // HV_115.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19274: rājasūyaṃ tathā manye yuddhārtham upakalpitam // HV_115.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:19275: rājasūyo hi somena śrūyate pūrvam āhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19279: hariścandras tu rājarṣir etaṃ kratum avāptavān /
GE07hv_conpu:19280: tatrāpy āḍībakam abhūd yuddhaṃ kṣatravināśanam // HV_115.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:19283: tasya mūlaṃ hi yuddhasya lokakṣayakarasya ha /
GE07hv_conpu:19284: rājasūyo mahāyajñaḥ kimarthaṃ na nivāritaḥ // HV_115.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:19285: rājasūye hy asaṃhārye yajñāṅgaiś ca durāsadaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19286: mithyāpraṇīte yajñāṅge prajānāṃ saṃkṣayo dhruvaḥ // HV_115.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:19287: bhavān api ca sarveṣāṃ pūrveṣāṃ naḥ pitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19288: atītānāgatajñaś ca nāthaś cādikaraś ca naḥ // HV_115.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:19289: te kathaṃ bhagavan netrā buddhimantaś cyutā nayāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19290: anāthā hy aparādhyante kunetāraś ca mānavāḥ // HV_115.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:19292: kālenādya parītās te tava vatsa pitāmahāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19293: na māṃ bhaviṣyaṃ papracchur na cāpṛṣṭo bravīmy aham // HV_115.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:19295: parihartuṃ na śakṣyāmi kālaniṣṭhāṃ hi tāṃ gatim // HV_115.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:19296: tvayā tv idam ahaṃ pṛṣṭo vakṣyāmy āgantu bhāvi yat /
GE07hv_conpu:19297: ataś ca balavān kālaḥ śrutvāpi na kariṣyasi // HV_115.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:19298: na saṃrambhān na cārambhān na vai sthāsyasi pauruṣe /
GE07hv_conpu:19299: lekhā hi kālalikhitā veleva duratikramāḥ // HV_115.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:19301: tena bhāvena te yajñaṃ vāsavo dharṣayiṣyati // HV_115.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:19302: yadi tac chakyate rājan parihartuṃ kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_conpu:19303: daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa mā yajethāś ca taṃ kratum // HV_115.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:19305: tava vā yajamānasya kālo 'tra parameśvaraḥ // HV_115.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:19306: tasya saṃsthāpanam idam kālasya vaśavarti vai /
GE07hv_conpu:19307: tat praṇeyaṃ nibodhasya trailokyaṃ sacarācaram // HV_115.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:19308: yathā yaṣṭā nṛpaḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati yugakṣaye /
GE07hv_conpu:19309: tathā yajñaphalānāṃ ca vikretāro dvijātayaḥ // HV_115.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:19312: śrutvā parihariṣyāmi bhagavan yadi śakyate // HV_115.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:19315: yatasva parihartuṃ tad ity etad bhadram astu te // HV_115.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:19316: tvayā dhṛtaḥ kratuś caiva vājimedhaḥ paraṃtapa /
GE07hv_conpu:19317: kṣatriyā nāhariṣyanti yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati // HV_115.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:19320: ahaṃ nimittaṃ iti ced bhayaṃ tīvraṃ ca jāyate // HV_115.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:19321: kathaṃ hy akīrttyā saṃyuktaḥ sukṛtī madvidho janaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19322: lokān utsahate gantuṃ khaṃ sapāśa iva dvijaḥ // HV_115.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:19323: yathā hy anāgatam idam dṛṣṭam atra praṇāśanam /
GE07hv_conpu:19324: yajñasya punarāvṛttir yady asty āśvāsayasva mām // HV_115.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:19327: [k: T2 G1.3 ins. after the ref: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19328: vihito yajña eṣo 'tra devaiś ca brāhmaṇair api | *HV_115.39*5160 |
GE07hv_conpu:19330: audbhido bhavitā kaścit senānīḥ kāśyapo dvijaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19332: tadyuge tatkulīnaś ca rājasūyam api kratum /
GE07hv_conpu:19337: vinivartiṣyate loke vṛttānte vṛttimatsv api // HV_115.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:19340: tadā hy alpena tapasā siddhiṃ yāsyanti mānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19341: dhanyā dharmaṃ cariṣyanti yugāmte janamejaya // HV_115.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:19342: [h: HV (CE) chapter 116, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 26, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:19344: āsannaṃ viprakṛṣṭaṃ vā yadi kālaṃ na vidmahe /
GE07hv_conpu:19345: tasmād dvāparavidhvaṃsād yugāntaṃ spṛhayāmy aham // HV_116.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:19346: prāptā vayaṃ hi taṃ kālam anayā dharmatṛṣṇayā /
GE07hv_conpu:19347: prāptā vayaṃ ca dharmaṃ svaṃ sukham alpena karmaṇā // HV_116.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:19351: pranaṣṭadharmaṃ dharmajña nimittair vaktum arhasi // HV_116.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19353: pṛṣṭa evaṃ bhaviṣyasya gatiṃ tattvena cintayan /
GE07hv_conpu:19355: evaṃ bhaviṣye tu gatiṃ yogenaiva vicintayan | *HV_116.4ab*1562 |
GE07hv_conpu:19356: yugānte pūrvarūpāṇi bhagavān abravīt tadā // HV_116.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:19361: śūdrāś ca brāhmaṇācārā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // HV_116.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:19371: alpodakās tathā meghā alpasasyā ca medinī | *HV_116.8*1565 |
GE07hv_conpu:19376: nāryaś cāpi kariṣyanti kṛṣim eva kalau yuge | *HV_116.10ab*1566 |
GE07hv_conpu:19377: akutsanā ca patite bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye // HV_116.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:19379: aśāntās tāpasā nityaṃ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge | *HV_116.10*1567 |
GE07hv_conpu:19381: unaṣoḍaśavarṣāś ca prajāsyanti narās tadā // HV_116.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:19383: pramadāḥ keśaśūlāś ca bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // HV_116.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:19385: aṭṭam annam iti proktaṃ śūlo vikraya ucyate | *HV_116.12*1568:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19386: catuṣpathā brāhmaṇa iti śivo veda udāhṛtaḥ | *HV_116.12*1568:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19387: keśo bhaga iti khyāto rājan naivātra saṃśayaḥ | *HV_116.12*1568:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:19389: śūdrā bhovādinaś caiva bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // HV_116.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19391: ṛtavaś ca bhaviṣyanti viparītā yugakṣaye // HV_116.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19395: svādūnāṃ vinivṛttiś ca vidyād antagate yuge // HV_116.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:19397: yathānimnaṃ prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti yugakṣaye // HV_116.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:19399: citravarṣī ca parjanyo yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // HV_116.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:19400: [k: K2-4 N V B D T G3-5 M2.4 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19402: svalpenāḍhyā bhaviṣyanti yat kiṃcit prāpya durgatāḥ | *HV_116.18*1569:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19403: na te dharmaṃ cariṣyanti mānavā nirgate yuge /
GE07hv_conpu:19405: sarve vāṇijakāś caiva bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // HV_116.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:19411: saukumārye tathā rūpe ratne copakṣayaṃ gate /
GE07hv_conpu:19412: bhaviṣyanti yugasyānte nāryaḥ keśair alaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_116.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:19414: yugānte samanuprāpte nānyā bhāryāsamā ratiḥ // HV_116.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:19416: puruṣālpaṃ bahustrīkaṃ tad yugāntasya lakṣaṇam // HV_116.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:19418: [k: K1.4 N2 V2 B Ds D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19422: īhayāsukhino lokā bhaviṣyanti gate yuge // HV_116.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:19424: saṃdigdhaḥ paralokaś ca bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye // HV_116.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:19425: [k: Dn Bomb. Poona eds. G (ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19427: ātmānaṃ bahu manyante manyur evābhyayād dvijān | *HV_116.26*1572:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19431: ṛṇaṃ ca vinayabhraṃśo yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // HV_116.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:19432: bhaviṣyaty aphalo harṣaḥ krodhaś ca saphalo nṛṇām /
GE07hv_conpu:19437: [k: N2 V1.2 B2 Dn D3.5 T2 G1 cont: V3 B1 Ds D6 ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19440: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ vijānāti vṛddhān anupasevya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19441: na kaścid akavir nāma yugānte pratyupasthite // HV_116.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:19443: coraprāyāś ca rājāno yugānte pratyupasthite // HV_116.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:19448: bhogārtham abhipatsyante na ca kaścit paṭhiṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:19451: saṃdhyārāgo 'tha digdāho bhaviṣyaty apare yuge // HV_116.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:19452: pitṝn putrā niyokṣyanti vadhvaḥ śvaśrūś ca karmasu /
GE07hv_conpu:19453: [k: V3 B Ds D2-6 ins. after 37ab: N2 V1.2 Dn after 37: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19454: vākśarais tarjayiṣyanti gurūñ śiṣyās tathaiva ca | *HV_116.37ab*1575 |
GE07hv_conpu:19455: [k: V3 B1.2 Ds D6 cont: N1 ins. after 37: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19456: mukheṣu ca prayokṣyanti pramattāś ca narās tadā | *HV_116.37ab*1576 |
GE07hv_conpu:19457: viyoniṣu cariṣyanti pramadāsu narās tadā // HV_116.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:19459: bhikṣāṃ balim adattvā ca bhokṣyanti puruṣāḥ svayam // HV_116.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:19460: patīn suptān vañcayitvā gamiṣyanti striyo aṇyataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19461: puruṣāś ca prasuptāsu bhāryāsu ca parastriyam // HV_116.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:19463: na kṛtapratikartā ca kāle kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // HV_116.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:19464: [h: HV (CE) chapter 117, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 27, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:19466: eṣaṃ vilulite loke manuṣyāḥ kena pālitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19469: kāṃ ca kāṣṭhāṃ samāsādya prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // HV_117.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:19471: ata ūrdhvaṃ cyute dharme guṇahīnāḥ prajās tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19472: śīlavyasanam āsādya prāpsyante hrāsam āyuṣaḥ // HV_117.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19477: evaṃ gatvā parāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // HV_117.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:19480: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca pramāṇam iti niścitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19482: apramāṇaṃ kariṣyanti vedoktam apare janāḥ // HV_117.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:19483: [k: K N2 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19486: bhaviṣyanti narā mūḍhā mandāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // HV_117.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:19492: bhaviṣyati tadā lokas tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // HV_117.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:19493: viprāṇāṃ śāśvatīṃ vṛttiṃ yadā varṇāvaro janaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19494: abhipatsyati vṛttyarthaṃ tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // HV_117.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:19496: siddhim alpena kālena yāsyanti nirupaskṛtāḥ // HV_117.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19498: bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // HV_117.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19507: vyavāhāropavṛttāś ca cyutā dharmāc ca śāśvatāt // HV_117.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:19513: kathāyogena tān sarvān pūjayiṣyanti mānavāḥ // HV_117.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:19515: bhakṣyabhojyaharāś caiva bhāṇḍānāṃ caiva hāriṇaḥ // HV_117.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:19516: corāś corasya hartāro hantā hartur bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:19517: corāś corakṣaye cāpi kṛte kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_117.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:19518: niḥsāre kṣubhite loke niṣkriye vyantare sthite /
GE07hv_conpu:19520: [k: K N2.3 V1 B Dn Ds D1.3-5 G (ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19522: snuṣāḥ śvaśrūs tathā caiva yugānte paryupasthite | *HV_117.23*1579:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:19526: kṣemaṃ subhikṣam ārogyaṃ sāmagryam atha bandhubhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19529: maṇḍalaiḥ prabhaviṣyanti deśe deśe pṛthak pṛthak // HV_117.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:19531: narās tadā bhaviṣyanti sarve kālapratīkṣiṇaḥ // HV_117.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:19532: tadā skandhe samādāya kumārān pradrutā bhayāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19536: aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca kāśmīrān atha mekalān /
GE07hv_conpu:19538: kṛtsnaṃ ca himavatpārśvaṃ kūlaṃ ca lavaṇāmbhasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19539: araṇyāni ca vatsyanti narā mlecchagaṇaiḥ saha // HV_117.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:19540: naiva śūnyā na cāśūnyā bhaviṣyati vasuṃdharā /
GE07hv_conpu:19541: goptāraś cāpy agoptāraḥ prabhaviṣyanti śāsinaḥ // HV_117.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:19542: mṛgair matsyair vihaṃgaiś ca śvāpadaiḥ sarvakīṭakaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19546: cīraṃ parṇaṃ ca vividhaṃ valkalāny ajināni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19547: svayaṃ kṛtvā nivatsyanti yathā munijanās tathā // HV_117.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:19549: ajaiḍakaṃ kharoṣṭraṃ ca pālayiṣyanti yatnataḥ // HV_117.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:19555: hīnādd hīnaṃ tadā dharmaṃ prajā samanuvartsyati // HV_117.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:19556: āyus tatra ca martyānāṃ paraṃ triṃśad bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:19561: evaṃ viplāvite loke pīḍitāḥ saṃkṣaye kāle | *HV_117.39*1582:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:19568: catuṣpādapravṛttaṃ ca dharmam āpsyanti mānavāḥ // HV_117.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:19570: svādu kiṃ nv iti vijñāya dharma eva svadiṣyati // HV_117.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:19571: yathā hāniḥ kramaprāptā tathā vṛddhiḥ kramāgatā /
GE07hv_conpu:19573: yadā hānir bhaviṣyati kaleḥ sarvāṇi bhūpate | *HV_117.44ab*1583 |
GE07hv_conpu:19574: pragṛhīte tato dharme prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ punaḥ // HV_117.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:19576: eka eva tu kālaḥ sa hīnavarṇo yathā śaśī // HV_117.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:19577: channo hi tamasā somo yathā kaliyuge tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:19578: pūrṇaś ca tapasā hīno yathā kaliyuge tathā // HV_117.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:19579: arthavādaparo dharmo vedārtha iti tu viduḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19580: anirṇiktam avijñātaṃ dāyādyam iva dhāryate // HV_117.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:19581: iṣṭaṃ dānaṃ tapo nāma brahmacaryaṃ supūjitam /
GE07hv_conpu:19582: guṇaiḥ karmābhinirvṛttir guṇās tathyena karmaṇā // HV_117.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:19584: yuge yuge yathākālam ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā // HV_117.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:19586: āśiṣaś ca śubhāḥ puṇyās tathaivāyur yuge yuge // HV_117.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:19590: kṣaṇaṃ na saṃtiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ // HV_117.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:19591: [h: HV (CE) chapter 118, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 29, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:19594: atītānāgataṃ vākyam ṛṣeḥ pariṣadā śrutam // HV_118.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:19596: atarpayata tac chotraṃ maharṣer vāṅmayo rasaḥ // HV_118.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:19598: ramaṇīyaṃ tad ākhyānaṃ kṛtsnaṃ pariṣadā śrutam // HV_118.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19599: kecid aśrūṇi mumucuḥ śrutvā dadhyus tathāpare /
GE07hv_conpu:19600: itihāsaṃ tam ṛṣiṇā pārāśaryeṇa darśitam // HV_118.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:19604: punar drakṣyāma ity uktvā jagāma bhagavān ṛṣiḥ // HV_118.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:19606: loke pravadatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śiṣṭāḥ sarve tapodhanāḥ // HV_118.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:19607: yāte bhagavati vyāse viprāḥ saha maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19608: ṛtvijaḥ pārthivāś caiva pratijagmur yathāgatam // HV_118.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:19610: jagāma roṣam utsṛtya rājā viṣam ivoragaḥ // HV_118.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:19612: āstīko 'py āśramapadaṃ jagāma ca mahāmuniḥ // HV_118.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:19614: anvaśāsac ca muditas tadā pramuditāḥ prajāḥ // HV_118.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:19615: kasyacit tv atha kālasya sa rājā janamejayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19617: saṃjñaptam aśvaṃ tatrāsya devī kāśyā vapuṣṭamā /
GE07hv_conpu:19619: tāṃ tu sarvānavadyāṅgīṃ cakame vāsavas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:19620: saṃjñaptam aśvaṃ āviśya tayā miśrībabhūva saḥ // HV_118.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19621: tasmin vikāre janite viditvā tattvataś ca tat /
GE07hv_conpu:19622: asaṃjñapto 'yam aśvas te dhvaṃsety adhvaryum abravīt // HV_118.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19624: kathayāmāsa rājarṣeḥ śaśāpa sa puraṃdaram // HV_118.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:19626: yady asti me yajñaphalaṃ tapo vā rakṣataḥ prajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19627: phalena tena sarveṇa bravīmi śrūyatām idam // HV_118.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:19629: kṣatriyā vājimedhena na yakṣyantīti śaunaka // HV_118.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:19630: ṛtvijaś cābravīt kruddhaḥ sa rājā janamejayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19631: daurbalyaṃ bhavatām etad yad ayaṃ dharṣitaḥ kratuḥ // HV_118.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:19632: viṣaye me na vastavyaṃ dhvaṃsadhvaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19633: ity uktās tatyajur viprās taṃ nṛpaṃ jātamanyavaḥ // HV_118.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:19635: [k: K N2.3 V B D ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19637: asatīṃ vapuṣṭamām etāṃ nirvāsayata me gṛhāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19639: yayā me caraṇo mūrdhni bhasmareṇūṣitaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_118.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:19640: śauṇḍīryaṃ me 'nayā bhagnaṃ yaśo mānaś ca dūṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19641: naināṃ draṣṭum apīcchāmi parikliṣṭām iva srajam // HV_118.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:19642: na svādu so 'śnāti naraḥ sukhaṃ svapiti vā rahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19643: anvāste yaḥ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pareṇa mṛditām iha // HV_118.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:19644: [k: D5 (marg.) Bom. Poona eds. G (ed.) ins: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19646: evam uccaiḥ prabhāṣantaṃ kruddhaṃ pārikṣitaṃ nṛpam /
GE07hv_conpu:19647: gandharvarājaḥ provāca viśvāvasur idaṃ vācaḥ // HV_118.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:19649: na duṣyatīyaṃ patnī te vihiteyaṃ vapuṣṭamā // HV_118.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:19652: yajñe vivaram āsādya vighnam indreṇa te kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:19653: yajvā hy asi kuruśreṣṭha samṛddhyā vāsavopamaḥ // HV_118.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:19654: bibhety abhibhavāc chakras tava kratuphalair nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:19655: tasmād āvartitaś caiva kratur indreṇa te vibho // HV_118.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:19657: yajñe vivaram āsādya saṃjñaptaṃ dṛśya vājinam /
GE07hv_conpu:19658: ratim indreṇa rambhāyāṃ manyase yāṃ vapuṣṭamām // HV_118.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:19660: bhraṃśitas tvaṃ ca viprāś ca phalād indrasamād iha /
GE07hv_conpu:19662: bibheti hi sadā tvatto brāhmaṇebhyo 'pi vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19663: ekena vai tad ubhayaṃ tīrṇaṃ śakreṇa māyayā // HV_118.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:19665: katham anyair anācīrṇaṃ naptur dārān atikramet // HV_118.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:19666: yathaiva hi parā buddhiḥ paro dharmaḥ paro damaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19669: mā vāsavaṃ mā ca gurum ātmāṇaṃ mā vapuṣtamām /
GE07hv_conpu:19670: gaccha doṣeṇa kālo hi sarvathā duratikramaḥ // HV_118.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:19675: apāpās tyajyamānā vai śapeyur api yoṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19676: aduṣṭās tu striyo rājan divyās tu saviśeṣataḥ // HV_118.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:19677: bhānoḥ prabhā śikhā vahner vedīhotre tathāhutiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19679: grāhyā lālayitavyāś ca pūjyāś ca satataṃ budhaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19680: śīlavatyo namaskāryāḥ pūjyāḥ striya iva striyaḥ // HV_118.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:19682: evaṃ sa viśvāvasunānunītaḥ prasādam āgamya vapuṣṭamāyām /
GE07hv_conpu:19683: cakāra mithyāvyatiśaṅkitātmā śāntiṃ parāṃ tatra sa dharmajuṣṭām // HV_118.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:19684: śramam abhivinivartya mānasaṃ sa samabhilaṣajjanamejayo yaśaḥ svam /
GE07hv_conpu:19685: viṣayam anuśaśāsa dharmabuddhir muditamanā ramayan vapuṣṭamāṃ tām // HV_118.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:19686: na ca viramati viprapūjanān na ca vinivartati yajñaśīlanāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19687: na ca viṣayaparirakṣaṇāc cyuto 'sau na ca parigarhati vapuṣṭamāṃ ca // HV_118.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:19688: vidhivihitam aśakyam anyathā hi kartum yad ṛṣir acintyatapāḥ purābravīt saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19690: na ca tad aśakyam anyathā hi kartum | *HV_118.42a*1588 |*
GE07hv_conpu:19691: iti narapatir ātmavāṃs tadāsau tad anuvicintya babhūva vītamanyuḥ // HV_118.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:19693: iti nṛpatir adīnavikramas tad anuvicintya babhūva nirvṛtaḥ | *HV_118.42*1589 |
GE07hv_conpu:19694: idaṃ mahākāvyam ṛṣer mahātmanaḥ paṭhan nṛṇāṃ pūjyatamo bhaven naraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19695: prakṛṣṭam āyuḥ samavāpya durlabhaṃ labheta sarvajñaphalaṃ ca kevalam // HV_118.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:19696: śatakratoḥ kalmaṣavipramokṣaṇaṃ paṭhan idam mucyati kalmaṣān naraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19697: tathaiva kāmān vividhān samaśnute samāptakāmaś ca cirāya nandati // HV_118.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:19698: yathā hi puṣpaprabhavaṃ phalaṃ drumāt tataḥ prajāyanti punaś ca pādapāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19699: tathā maharṣiprabhavā imā giraḥ pravardhayante tam ṛṣiṃ pravartitāḥ // HV_118.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:19700: putrān aputro labhate suvarcasaś cyutaḥ punar vindati cātmanaḥ sthitim /
GE07hv_conpu:19701: vyādhiṃ na cāpnoti ciraṃ ca bandhanaṃ kriyāṃ ca puṇyāṃ labhate guṇānvitaḥ // HV_118.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:19702: patim upalabhate ca satsu kanyā śravaṇam upetya śubhā munes tu vācaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19703: janayati ca sutān guṇair upetān ripujanamardanavīryaśālinaś ca // HV_118.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:19704: vijayati vasudhāṃ ca kṣatravṛttir dhanam atulaṃ labhate dviṣajjayaṃ ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19705: vipulam api dhanaṃ labhec ca vaiśyaḥ sugatim iyāc chravaṇāc ca śūdrajātiḥ // HV_118.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:19706: purāṇam etac caritaṃ mahātmanām adhītya buddhiṃ labhate ca naiṣṭhikīm /
GE07hv_conpu:19707: vihāya duḥkhāni vimuktasaṅgaḥ sa vītarāgo vicared vasuṃdharām // HV_118.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:19708: ity etad ākhyānam udāhṛtaṃ vaḥ pratismaranto dvijamaṇḍaleṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:19709: sthairyeṇa jātena punaḥ smarantaḥ sukhaṃ bhavanto vicarantu lokam // HV_118.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:19710: iti caritam idaṃ mahātmanām ṛṣikṛtam adbhutavīryakarmaṇām /
GE07hv_conpu:19711: kathitam idaṃ hi samāsavistaraiḥ kim aparam icchasi kiṃ bravīmi te // HV_118.51 //
